  ## <a name="application-guard-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-844">Richtlinien für Application Guard-Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-844">Application Guard settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-845">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-845">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationguardcontainerproxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-846">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-846">ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-container-proxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-847">Application Guard-Containerproxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-847">Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-848">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-848">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-849">Unter Windows seit 84 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-849">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-850">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-850">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-851">Konfiguriert die Proxyeinstellungen für Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-851">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-852">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, ignoriert Microsoft Edge Application Guard andere Quellen von Proxykonfigurationen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-852">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard ignores other sources of proxy configurations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-853">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, verwendet der Microsoft Edge Application Guard die Proxykonfiguration des Hosts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-853">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Application Guard uses the proxy configuration of the host.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-854">Diese Richtlinie hat keinen Einfluss auf die Proxykonfiguration von Microsoft Edge außerhalb von Application Guard (auf dem Host).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-854">This policy does not affect the proxy configuration of Microsoft Edge outside of Application Guard (on the host).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-855">Im Feld „ProxyMode“ können Sie den vom Microsoft Edge Application Guard verwendeten Proxyserver angeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-855">The ProxyMode field lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge Application Guard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-856">Das Feld ProxyPacUrl ist eine URL zu einer Proxy-.pac-Datei.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-856">The ProxyPacUrl field is a URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-857">Das ProxyServer-Feld ist eine URL für den Proxy Server.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-857">The ProxyServer field is a URL for the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-858">Wenn Sie den Wert „direct“ als „ProxyMode“ auswählen, werden alle anderen Felder ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-858">If you choose the 'direct' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-859">Wenn Sie den Wert "auto_detect" als "ProxyMode" auswählen, werden alle anderen Felder ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-859">If you choose the 'auto_detect' value as 'ProxyMode', all other fields are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-860">Wenn Sie den Wert „fixed_servers“ als „ProxyMode“ auswählen, wird das Feld „ProxyServer“ verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-860">If you choose the 'fixed_servers' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyServer' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-861">Wenn Sie den Wert „pac_script“ als „ProxyMode“ auswählen, wird das Feld „ProxyPacUrl“ verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-861">If you choose the 'pac_script' value as 'ProxyMode', the 'ProxyPacUrl' field is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-862">Weitere Informationen zum Identifizieren des Datenverkehrs in Application Guard über den Dual-Proxy finden Sie unter[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-862">For more information about identifying Application Guard traffic via dual proxy, visit [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2134653).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-863">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-863">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-864">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-864">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-865">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-865">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-866">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-866">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-867">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-867">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-868">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-868">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-869">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-869">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-870">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-870">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-871">Eindeutiger GP-Name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-871">GP unique name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-872">GP-Name: Application Guard-Containerproxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-872">GP name: Application Guard Container Proxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-873">GP-Pfad (Pflicht): administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard-Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-873">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Application Guard settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-874">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-874">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-875">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-875">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-876">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-876">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-877">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-877">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-878">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-878">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-879">Wertname: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-879">Value Name: ApplicationGuardContainerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-880">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-880">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-881">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-881">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {
  "ProxyMode": "direct", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-882">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-882">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ApplicationGuardContainerProxy = {"ProxyMode": "direct", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```

  ### <a name="applicationguardfavoritessyncenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-884">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-884">ApplicationGuardFavoritesSyncEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="application-guard-favorites-sync-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-885">Synchronisierung von Application Guard-Favoriten aktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-885">Application Guard Favorites Sync Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-886">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-886">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-887">Unter Windows ab Version 90 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-887">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-888">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-888">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-889">Diese Richtlinie ermöglicht Microsoft Edge-Computern/-Geräten, für die Application Guard aktiviert ist, das Synchronisieren von Favoriten zwischen Host und Container, damit die Favoriten übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-889">This policy allows Microsoft Edge computers/devices that have application guard enabled to sync favorites from the host to the container so the favorites match.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-890">Wenn [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites) konfiguriert sind, werden diese Favoriten auch mit dem Container synchronisiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-890">If [ManagedFavorites](#managedfavorites) are configured, those favorites will also be synced to the container.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-891">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, ist die Bearbeitung von Favoriten im Container deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-891">If you enable this policy, editing favorites in the container is disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-892">Daher werden die Schaltflächen „Favoriten hinzufügen“ und der „Favoritenordner hinzufügen“ in der Benutzeroberfläche des Containerbrowsers abgeblendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-892">So, the add favorites and add favorites folder buttons will be blurred out in the UI of the container browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-893">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden Favoriten auf dem Host nicht für den Container freigegeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-893">If you disable or don't configure this policy, favorites on the host will not be shared to the container.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-894">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-894">Supported features:</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-918">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-918">Supported versions:</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-920">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-920">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-921">Aktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um Google Cast zu aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-921">Enable this policy to enable Google Cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-922">Benutzer können es über das App-Menü, Seitenkontextmenüs, Media-Steuerelemente auf Cast-fähigen Websites und (sofern angezeigt) den Eintrag „Cast“ in der Symbolleiste starten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-922">Users will be able to launch it from the app menu, page context menus, media controls on Cast-enabled websites, and (if shown) the Cast toolbar icon.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-923">Deaktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um Google Cast zu deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-923">Disable this policy to disable Google Cast.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-924">Standardmäßig ist Google Cast aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-924">By default, Google Cast is enabled.</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-953">Legen Sie diese Richtlinie auf "true" fest, um das Cast-Symbol auf der Symbolleiste oder im Überlaufmenü anzuzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-953">Set this policy to true to show the Cast toolbar icon on the toolbar or the overflow menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-954">Benutzer können sie nicht entfernen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-954">Users won't be able to remove it.</span></span>

  ## <a name="content-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-980">Richtlinien für Inhaltseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-980">Content settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-981">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-981">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoselectcertificateforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-982">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-982">AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="automatically-select-client-certificates-for-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-983">Automatisches Auswählen von Clientzertifikaten für diese Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-983">Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-984">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-984">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-985">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-985">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-986">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-986">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-987">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie festlegen, können Sie eine Liste von URL-Mustern erstellen, die Websites angeben, für die Microsoft Edge ein Clientzertifikat automatisch auswählen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-987">Setting the policy lets you make a list of URL patterns that specify sites for which Microsoft Edge can automatically select a client certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-988">Der Wert ist ein Array aus in Zeichenfolgen konvertierten JSON-Wörterbüchern, die jeweils die folgende Form aufweisen: { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, wobei "$URL _PATTERN" ein Inhaltseinstellungsmuster ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-988">The value is an array of stringified JSON dictionaries, each with the form { "pattern": "$URL_PATTERN", "filter" : $FILTER }, where $URL_PATTERN is a content setting pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-989">"$FILTER" schränkt die Clientzertifikate ein, aus denen der Browser automatisch auswählen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-989">$FILTER restricts the client certificates the browser automatically selects from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-990">Unabhängig vom Filter werden nur Zertifikate ausgewählt, die die Zertifikatanforderungen des Servers erfüllen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-990">Independent of the filter, only certificates that match the server's certificate request are selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-991">Beispiele für die Verwendung des Abschnitts "$FILTER":</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-991">Examples for the usage of the $FILTER section:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-992">Wenn "$FILTER" beispielsweise auf { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } } festgelegt ist, werden nur Clientzertifikate ausgewählt, die von einem Zertifikat mit dem CommonName "$ISSUER_CN" ausgegeben wurden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-992">When $FILTER is set to { "ISSUER": { "CN": "$ISSUER_CN" } }, only client certificates issued by a certificate with the CommonName $ISSUER_CN are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-993">Wenn "$Filter" sowohl den Abschnitt "ISSUER" als auch den Abschnitt "SUBJECT" enthält, werden nur Clientzertifikate ausgewählt, die beide Bedingungen erfüllen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-993">When $FILTER contains both the "ISSUER" and the "SUBJECT" sections, only client certificates that satisfy both conditions are selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-994">Wenn "$Filter" einen Abschnitt "SUBJECT" mit dem Wert "O" enthält, muss für ein Zertifikat mindestens eine Organisation mit dem angegebenen Wert übereinstimmen, damit es ausgewählt werden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-994">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with the "O" value, a certificate needs at least one organization matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-995">Wenn "$Filter" einen Abschnitt "SUBJECT" mit einem "OU"-Wert enthält, muss für ein Zertifikat mindestens eine Organisationseinheit mit dem angegebenen Wert übereinstimmen, damit es ausgewählt werden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-995">When $FILTER contains a "SUBJECT" section with a "OU" value, a certificate needs at least one organizational unit matching the specified value to be selected.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-996">Wenn "$Filter" auf {} festgelegt ist, wird die Auswahl der Clientzertifikate nicht weiter eingeschränkt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-996">When $FILTER is set to {}, the selection of client certificates is not additionally restricted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-997">Beachten Sie, dass vom Webserver eingerichtete Filter weiterhin gelten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-997">Note that filters provided by the web server still apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-998">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie nicht einrichten, ist die automatische Auswahl für keine Seite möglich.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-998">If you leave the policy unset, there's no autoselection for any site.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-999">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-999">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1000">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1000">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1001">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1001">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1002">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1002">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1003">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1003">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1004">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1004">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1005">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1005">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1006">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1006">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1007">GP eindeutiger Name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1007">GP unique name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1008">GP-Name: Automatisches Auswählen von Clientzertifikaten für diese Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1008">GP name: Automatically select client certificates for these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1009">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1009">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1010">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1010">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1011">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1011">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1012">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1012">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1013">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1013">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1014">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1014">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1015">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1015">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1016">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1016">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1017">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1017">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoSelectCertificateForUrls\1 = "{\"pattern\":\"https://www.contoso.com\",\"filter\":{\"ISSUER\":{\"CN\":\"certificate issuer name\", \"L\": \"certificate issuer location\", \"O\": \"certificate issuer org\", \"OU\": \"certificate issuer org unit\"}, \"SUBJECT\":{\"CN\":\"certificate subject name\", \"L\": \"certificate subject location\", \"O\": \"certificate subject org\", \"OU\": \"certificate subject org unit\"}}}"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1018">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1018">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1019">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1019">Preference Key Name: AutoSelectCertificateForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1020">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1020">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>{"pattern":"https://www.contoso.com","filter":{"ISSUER":{"CN":"certificate issuer name", "L": "certificate issuer location", "O": "certificate issuer org", "OU": "certificate issuer org unit"}, "SUBJECT":{"CN":"certificate subject name", "L": "certificate subject location", "O": "certificate subject org", "OU": "certificate subject org unit"}}}</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="cookiesallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1022">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1022">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cookies-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1023">Erlauben von Cookies auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1023">Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1024">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1024">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1025">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1025">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1026">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1026">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1027">Sie können eine Liste an Websites, basierend auf URL-Mustern, definieren, die Cookies festlegen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1027">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1028">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1028">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1029">Weitere Informationen hierzu finden Sie unter [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) und [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) Richtlinien.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1029">See the [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1030">Beachten Sie, dass für diese drei Richtlinien keine Konflikt verursachenden URL-Muster festgelegt werden dürfen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1030">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="09666-1031">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1031">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-1032">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1032">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="09666-1033">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1033">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1034">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1034">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1035">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1035">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1036">Konfigurieren Sie die [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)-Richtlinie, um das Löschen von Cookies beim Beenden zu verhindern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1036">To exclude cookies from being deleted on exit, configure the [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1037">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1037">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1038">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1038">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1039">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1039">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1040">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1040">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1041">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1041">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1042">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1042">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1043">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1043">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1044">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1044">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1045">GP eindeutiger Name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1045">GP unique name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1046">GP-Name: Erlauben von Cookies auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1046">GP name: Allow cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1047">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1047">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1048">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1048">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1049">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1049">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1050">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1050">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1051">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1051">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1052">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1052">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1053">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1053">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1054">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1054">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1055">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1055">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1056">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1056">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1057">Einstellung Schlüsselname: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1057">Preference Key Name: CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1058">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1058">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="cookiesblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1060">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1060">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-cookies-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1061">Blockieren von Cookies auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1061">Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1062">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1062">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1063">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1063">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1064">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1064">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1065">Sie können eine Liste an Websites, basierend auf URL-Mustern, definieren, die keine Cookies setzen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1065">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1066">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1066">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1067">Weitere Informationen hierzu finden Sie unter [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) und [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) Richtlinien.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1067">See the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls](#cookiessessiononlyforurls) policies for more information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1068">Beachten Sie, dass für diese drei Richtlinien keine Konflikt verursachenden URL-Muster festgelegt werden dürfen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1068">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-1069">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1069">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="09666-1070">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1070">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="09666-1071">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1071">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>](#cookiessessiononlyforurls)

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1072">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1072">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1073">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1073">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1074">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1074">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1075">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1075">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1076">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1076">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1077">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1077">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1078">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1078">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1079">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1079">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1080">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1080">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1081">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1081">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1082">GP eindeutiger Name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1082">GP unique name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1083">GP-Name: Blockieren von Cookies auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1083">GP name: Block cookies on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1084">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1084">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1085">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1085">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1086">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1086">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1087">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1087">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1088">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1088">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1089">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1089">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1090">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1090">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1091">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1091">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1092">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1092">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1093">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1093">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1094">Einstellung Schlüsselname: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1094">Preference Key Name: CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1095">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1095">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-1096">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1096">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="cookiessessiononlyforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1097">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1097">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="limit-cookies-from-specific-websites-to-the-current-session"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1098">Einschränken von Cookies von bestimmten Websites auf die aktuelle Sitzung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1098">Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1099">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1099">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1100">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1100">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1101">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1101">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1102">Von Websites, die einem von Ihnen definierten URL-Muster entsprechen, erstellte Cookies werden beim Ende der Sitzung gelöscht (wenn das Fenster geschlossen wird).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1102">Cookies created by websites that match a URL pattern you define are deleted when the session ends (when the window closes).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1103">Cookies, die von Websites erstellt wurden, die nicht dem Muster entsprechen, werden durch die [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder durch die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers gesteuert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1103">Cookies created by websites that don't match the pattern are controlled by the [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) policy (if set) or by the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1104">Dies ist auch das Standardverhalten, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1104">This is also the default behavior if you don't configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1105">Wenn Microsoft Edge im Hintergrundmodus ausgeführt wird, wird die Sitzung möglicherweise nicht geschlossen, wenn das letzte Fenster geschlossen wird, was bedeutet, dass die Cookies beim Schließen des Fensters nicht gelöscht werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1105">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1106">Informationen zur Konfiguration dessen, was geschieht, wenn Microsoft Edge im Hintergrundmodus ausgeführt wird, finden Sie in der [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled)-Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1106">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1107">Sie können auch die [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) und [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) Richtlinien verwenden, um zu steuern, welche Websites Cookies erstellen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1107">You can also use the [CookiesAllowedForUrls](#cookiesallowedforurls) and [CookiesBlockedForUrls](#cookiesblockedforurls) policies to control which websites can create cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1108">Beachten Sie, dass für diese drei Richtlinien keine Konflikt verursachenden URL-Muster festgelegt werden dürfen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1108">Note there cannot be conflicting URL patterns set between these three policies:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="09666-1109">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1109">CookiesBlockedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesblockedforurls)

- [<span data-ttu-id="09666-1110">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1110">CookiesAllowedForUrls</span></span>](#cookiesallowedforurls)

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-1111">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1111">CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1112">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1112">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1113">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1113">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1114">Wenn Sie die [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) Richtlinie so festlegen, dass URLs aus vorherigen Sitzungen wiederhergestellt werden, wird diese Richtlinie ignoriert, und Cookies werden für diese Websites dauerhaft gespeichert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1114">If you set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to restore URLs from previous sessions, this policy is ignored, and cookies are stored permanently for those sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1115">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1115">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1116">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1116">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1117">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1117">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1118">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1118">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1119">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1119">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1120">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1120">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1121">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1121">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1122">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1122">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1123">GP eindeutiger Name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1123">GP unique name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1124">GP-Name: Einschränken von Cookies von bestimmten Websites auf die aktuelle Sitzung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1124">GP name: Limit cookies from specific websites to the current session</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1125">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1125">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1126">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1126">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1127">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1127">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1128">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1128">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1129">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1129">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1130">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1130">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1131">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1131">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1132">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1132">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1133">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1133">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1134">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1134">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1135">Einstellung Schlüsselname: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1135">Preference Key Name: CookiesSessionOnlyForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1136">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1136">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="defaultcookiessetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1138">DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1138">DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1139">Configure cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1139">Configure cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1140">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1140">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1141">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1141">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1142">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1142">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1143">Steuern, ob Websites auf dem Gerät des Benutzers Cookies erstellen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1143">Control whether websites can create cookies on the user's device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1144">Diese Richtlinie arbeitet mit absoluten Werten – Sie können zulassen, dass alle Websites Cookies erstellen können, oder dass keine Websites Cookies erstellen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1144">This policy is all or nothing - you can let all websites create cookies, or no websites create cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1145">Sie können diese Richtlinie nicht verwenden, um Cookies nur von bestimmten Websites zuzulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1145">You can't use this policy to enable cookies from specific websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1146">Setzen Sie die Richtlinie auf „SessionOnly“, um Cookies beim Beenden der Sitzung zu löschen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1146">Set the policy to 'SessionOnly' to clear cookies when the session closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1147">Wenn Microsoft Edge im Hintergrundmodus ausgeführt wird, wird die Sitzung möglicherweise nicht geschlossen, wenn das letzte Fenster geschlossen wird, was bedeutet, dass die Cookies beim Schließen des Fensters nicht gelöscht werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1147">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the session might not close when the last window is closed, meaning the cookies won't be cleared when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1148">Informationen zur Konfiguration dessen, was geschieht, wenn Microsoft Edge im Hintergrundmodus ausgeführt wird, finden Sie in der [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled)-Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1148">See [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about configuring what happens when Microsoft Edge runs in background mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1149">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird die Standardeinstellung „AllowCookies“ verwendet. Die Benutzer können diese Einstellung in den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1149">If you don't configure this policy, the default 'AllowCookies' is used, and users can change this setting in Microsoft Edge Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1150">(Wenn Sie nicht möchten, dass die Benutzer diese Einstellung ändern können, legen Sie die Richtlinie fest.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1150">(If you don't want users to be able to change this setting, set the policy.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1151">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1151">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1152">AllowCookies (1) = alle Websites können Cookies erstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1152">AllowCookies (1) = Let all sites create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1153">BlockCookies (2) = keine Website kann Cookies erstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1153">BlockCookies (2) = Don't let any site create cookies</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1154">SessionOnly (4) = Cookies für die Dauer der Sitzung beibehalten, mit Ausnahme derjenigen, die in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit) aufgeführt sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1154">SessionOnly (4) = Keep cookies for the duration of the session, except ones listed in [SaveCookiesOnExit](#savecookiesonexit)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1155">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1155">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1156">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1156">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1157">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1157">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1158">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1158">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1159">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1159">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1160">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1160">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1161">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1161">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1162">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1162">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1163">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1163">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1164">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1164">GP unique name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1165">GP-Name: Konfigurieren von Cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1165">GP name: Configure cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1166">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1166">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1167">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1167">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1168">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1168">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1169">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1169">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1170">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1170">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1171">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1171">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1172">Wertname: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1172">Value Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1173">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1173">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1174">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1174">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1175">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1175">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1176">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultCookiesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1176">Preference Key Name: DefaultCookiesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1177">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1177">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1179">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1179">DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-file-system-api-for-reading"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1180">Steuern der Verwendung der Datei-System-API für den Lesezugriff</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1180">Control use of the File System API for reading</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1181">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1181">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1182">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1182">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1183">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1183">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1184">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "3" festlegen, können Websites Lesezugriff auf das Dateisystem des Hostbetriebssystems mithilfe der Datei-System-API anfordern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1184">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for read access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1185">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "2" festlegen, wird der Zugriff verweigert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1185">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1186">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, können Websites Zugriff anfordern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1186">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1187">Diese Einstellung kann von Benutzern geändert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1187">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1188">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1188">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1189">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = nicht zulassen, dass eine Website Lesezugriff auf Dateien und Verzeichnisse über die Datei System-API anfordert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1189">BlockFileSystemRead (2) = Don't allow any site to request read access to files and directories via the File System API</span></span>

  ### <a name="defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1215">DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1215">DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-file-system-api-for-writing"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1216">Steuern der Verwendung der Datei-System-API für den Schreibzugriff</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1216">Control use of the File System API for writing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1217">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1217">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1218">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1218">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1219">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1219">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1220">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "3" festlegen, können Websites Schreibzugriff auf das Dateisystem des Hostbetriebssystems mithilfe der Datei-System-API anfordern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1220">If you set this policy to 3, websites can ask for write access to the host operating system's filesystem using the File System API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1221">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "2" festlegen, wird der Zugriff verweigert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1221">If you set this policy to 2, access is denied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1222">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, können Websites Zugriff anfordern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1222">If you don't set this policy, websites can ask for access.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1223">Diese Einstellung kann von Benutzern geändert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1223">Users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1224">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1224">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1225">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = nicht zulassen, dass Websites Schreibzugriff auf Dateien und Verzeichnisse anfordern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1225">BlockFileSystemWrite (2) = Don't allow any site to request write access to files and directories</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1226">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = zulassen, dass Websites vom Benutzer Schreibzugriff auf Dateien und Verzeichnisse anfordern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1226">AskFileSystemWrite (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant write access to files and directories</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1227">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1227">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1228">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1228">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1229">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1229">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1230">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1230">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1231">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1231">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1232">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1232">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1233">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1233">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1234">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1234">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1235">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1235">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1236">Eindeutiger GP-Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1236">GP unique name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1237">GP-Name: Steuern der Verwendung der Datei-System-API für den Schreibzugriff</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1237">GP name: Control use of the File System API for writing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1238">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1238">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1239">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1239">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1240">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1240">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1241">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1241">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1242">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1242">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1243">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1243">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1244">Wertname: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1244">Value Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1245">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1245">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1246">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1246">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1247">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1247">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1248">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1248">Preference Key Name: DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1249">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1249">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultgeolocationsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1251">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1251">DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-geolocation-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1252">Standardeinstellung für Geolocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1252">Default geolocation setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1253">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1253">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1254">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1254">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1255">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1255">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1256">Legen Sie fest, ob Websites den Aufenthaltsort der Benutzer nachverfolgen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1256">Set whether websites can track users' physical locations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1257">Sie können die Standortbestimmung standardmäßig zulassen („AllowGeolocation“), sie standardmäßig verweigern („BlockGeolocation“) oder den Benutzer jedes Mal Fragen, wenn eine Website seinen Standort anfordert („AskGeolocation“).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1257">You can allow tracking by default ('AllowGeolocation'), deny it by default ('BlockGeolocation'), or ask the user each time a website requests their location ('AskGeolocation').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1258">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird „AskGeolocation“ verwendet, und der Benutzer kann dies ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1258">If you don't configure this policy, 'AskGeolocation' is used and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1259">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1259">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1260">AllowGeolocation (1) = zulassen, dass Websites den Standort der Benutzer nachverfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1260">AllowGeolocation (1) = Allow sites to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1261">BlockGeolocation (2) = nicht zulassen, dass Websites den Standort der Benutzer nachverfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1261">BlockGeolocation (2) = Don't allow any site to track users' physical location</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1262">AskGeolocation (3) = immer fragen, wenn eine Website den Standort der Benutzer nachverfolgen möchte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1262">AskGeolocation (3) = Ask whenever a site wants to track users' physical location</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1263">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1263">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1264">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1264">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1265">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1265">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1266">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1266">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1267">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1267">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1268">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1268">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1269">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1269">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1270">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1270">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1271">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1271">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1272">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1272">GP unique name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1273">GP-Name: Standardeinstellung für Geolocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1273">GP name: Default geolocation setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1274">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1274">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1275">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1275">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1276">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1276">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1277">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1277">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1278">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1278">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1279">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1279">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1280">Wertname: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1280">Value Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1281">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1281">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1282">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1282">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1283">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1283">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1284">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1284">Preference Key Name: DefaultGeolocationSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1285">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1285">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
