  ### <a name="defaultimagessetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1287">DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1287">DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-images-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1288">Standardeinstellung für Bilder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1288">Default images setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1289">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1289">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1290">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1290">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1291">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1291">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1292">Legen Sie fest, ob Websites Bilder anzeigen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1292">Set whether websites can display images.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1293">Sie können Bilder auf allen Websites zulassen („AllowImages“) oder auf allen Websites blockieren („BlockImages“).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1293">You can allow images on all sites ('AllowImages') or block them on all sites ('BlockImages').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1294">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, sind Bilder standardmäßig zulässig und der Benutzer kann diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1294">If you don't configure this policy, images are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1295">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1295">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1296">AllowImages (1) = zulassen, dass alle Websites alle Bilder anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1296">AllowImages (1) = Allow all sites to show all images</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1297">BlockImages (2) = nicht zulassen, dass Websites Bilder anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1297">BlockImages (2) = Don't allow any site to show images</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1298">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1298">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1299">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1299">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1300">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1300">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1301">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1301">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1302">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1302">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1303">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1303">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1304">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1304">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1305">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1305">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1306">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1306">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1307">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1307">GP unique name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1308">GP-Name: Standardeinstellung für Bilder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1308">GP name: Default images setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1309">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1309">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1310">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1310">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1311">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1311">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1312">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1312">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1313">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1313">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1314">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1314">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1315">Wertname: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1315">Value Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1316">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1316">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1317">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1317">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1319">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultImagesSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1319">Preference Key Name: DefaultImagesSetting</span></span>


  ### <a name="defaultinsecurecontentsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1322">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1322">DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-insecure-content-exceptions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1323">Verwendung von unsicheren Inhaltsausnahmen steuern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1323">Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1324">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1324">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1325">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1325">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1326">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1326">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1327">Sie können festlegen, ob Benutzer Ausnahmen hinzufügen können, um gemischten Inhalt für bestimmte Websites zuzulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1327">Allows you to set whether users can add exceptions to allow mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1328">Diese Richtlinie kann für bestimmte URL-Muster überschrieben werden, indem die Richtlinien [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) und [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) verwendet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1328">This policy can be overridden for specific URL patterns using the [InsecureContentAllowedForUrls](#insecurecontentallowedforurls) and [InsecureContentBlockedForUrls](#insecurecontentblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1329">Wenn diese Richtlinie nicht festgelegt ist, können Benutzer Ausnahmen hinzufügen, um blockierbare Mischinhalte zuzulassen und automatische Upgrades für optional blockierbare Mischinhalte zu deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1329">If this policy isn't set, users will be allowed to add exceptions to allow blockable mixed content and disable autoupgrades for optionally blockable mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1330">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1330">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1331">BlockInsecureContent (2) = nicht zulassen, dass eine Website gemischten Inhalt lädt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1331">BlockInsecureContent (2) = Do not allow any site to load mixed content</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1332">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Benutzern erlauben, Ausnahmen hinzuzufügen, um Mischinhalte zuzulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1332">AllowExceptionsInsecureContent (3) = Allow users to add exceptions to allow mixed content</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1333">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1333">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1334">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1334">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1335">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1335">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1336">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1336">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1337">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1337">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1338">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1338">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1339">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1339">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1340">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1340">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1341">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1341">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1342">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1342">GP unique name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1343">GP-Name: Verwendung von unsicheren Inhaltsausnahmen steuern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1343">GP name: Control use of insecure content exceptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1344">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1344">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1345">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1345">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1346">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1346">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1347">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1347">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1348">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1348">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1349">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1349">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1350">Wertname: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1350">Value Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1351">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1351">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1352">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1352">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1353">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1353">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1354">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1354">Preference Key Name: DefaultInsecureContentSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1355">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1355">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultjavascriptsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1357">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1357">DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-javascript-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1358">Standardeinstellung für JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1358">Default JavaScript setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1359">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1359">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1360">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1360">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1361">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1361">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1362">Legen Sie fest, ob Websites JavaScript ausführen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1362">Set whether websites can run JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1363">Sie können es für alle Websites erlauben („AllowJavaScript“) oder für alle Websites blockieren („BlockJavaScript“).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1363">You can allow it for all sites ('AllowJavaScript') or block it for all sites ('BlockJavaScript').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1364">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können alle Websites JavaScript standardmäßig ausführen und der Benutzer kann diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1364">If you don't configure this policy, all sites can run JavaScript by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1365">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1365">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1366">AllowJavaScript (1) = zulassen, dass alle Websites JavaScript ausführen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1366">AllowJavaScript (1) = Allow all sites to run JavaScript</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1367">BlockJavaScript (2) = nicht zulassen, dass Websites JavaScript ausführen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1367">BlockJavaScript (2) = Don't allow any site to run JavaScript</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1368">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1368">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1369">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1369">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1370">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1370">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1371">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1371">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1372">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1372">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1373">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1373">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1374">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1374">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1375">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1375">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1376">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1376">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1377">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1377">GP unique name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1378">GP-Name: Standardeinstellung für JavaScript</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1378">GP name: Default JavaScript setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1379">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1379">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1380">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1380">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1381">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1381">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1382">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1382">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1383">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1383">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1384">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1384">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1385">Wertname: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1385">Value Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1386">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1386">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1387">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1387">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1388">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1388">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1389">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1389">Preference Key Name: DefaultJavaScriptSetting</span></span>

``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultnotificationssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1392">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1392">DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-notification-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1393">Standardeinstellung für Benachrichtigungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1393">Default notification setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1394">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1394">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1395">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1395">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1396">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1396">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1397">Legen Sie fest, ob Websites Desktopbenachrichtigungen anzeigen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1397">Set whether websites can display desktop notifications.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1398">Sie können diese standardmäßig zulassen („AllowNotifications“), sie standardmäßig ablehnen („BlockNotifications“) oder den Benutzer jedes Mal Fragen, wenn eine Website eine Benachrichtigung anzeigen möchte („AskNotifications“).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1398">You can allow them by default ('AllowNotifications'), deny them by default ('BlockNotifications'), or have the user be asked each time a website wants to show a notification ('AskNotifications').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1399">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, sind Benachrichtigungen standardmäßig zulässig und der Benutzer kann diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1399">If you don't configure this policy, notifications are allowed by default, and the user can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1400">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1400">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1401">AllowNotifications (1) = zulassen, dass Websites Desktopbenachrichtigungen anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1401">AllowNotifications (1) = Allow sites to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1402">BlockNotifications (2) = nicht zulassen, dass Websites Desktopbenachrichtigungen anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1402">BlockNotifications (2) = Don't allow any site to show desktop notifications</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1403">AskNotifications (3) = jedes Mal fragen, wenn eine Website Desktopbenachrichtigungen anzeigen möchte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1403">AskNotifications (3) = Ask every time a site wants to show desktop notifications</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1404">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1404">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1405">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1405">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1406">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1406">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1407">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1407">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1408">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1408">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1409">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1409">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1410">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1410">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1411">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1411">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1412">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1412">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1413">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1413">GP unique name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1414">GP-Name: Standardeinstellung für Benachrichtigungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1414">GP name: Default notification setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1415">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1415">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1416">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1416">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1417">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1417">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1418">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1418">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1419">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1419">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1420">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1420">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1421">Wertname: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1421">Value Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1422">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1422">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1423">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1423">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1424">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1424">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1425">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1425">Preference Key Name: DefaultNotificationsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1426">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1426">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultpluginssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1428">DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1428">DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-adobe-flash-setting-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1429">Standardeinstellung für Adobe Flash (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1429">Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-1430">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach der Microsoft Edge-Version 87 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1430">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1431">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1431">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1432">Unter Windows und macOS seit 77 bis 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1432">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1433">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1433">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1434">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nicht, da Flash nicht mehr von Microsoft Edge unterstützt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1434">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1435">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) und [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) werden zuerst überprüft, dann diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1435">[PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) are checked first, then this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1436">Die Optionen lauten "ClickToPlay" und "BlockPlugins".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1436">The options are 'ClickToPlay' and 'BlockPlugins'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1437">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "BlockPlugins" festlegen, wird dieses Plugin für alle Websites abgelehnt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1437">If you set this policy to 'BlockPlugins', this plugin is denied for all websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1438">Mit "ClickToPlay" kann das Flash-Plugin ausgeführt werden, die Benutzer klicken aber auf den Platzhalter, um es zu starten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1438">'ClickToPlay' lets the Flash plugin run, but users click the placeholder to start it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1439">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer diese Einstellung manuell ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1439">If you don't configure this policy, the user can change this setting manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1440">Hinweis: Die automatische Wiedergabe gilt nur für Domänen, die in der Richtlinie [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) explizit aufgelistet sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1440">Note: Automatic playback is only for domains explicitly listed in the [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1441">Wenn Sie die automatische Wiedergabe für alle Websites aktivieren möchten, fügen Sie "http://*" und "https://*" zur Liste der zulässigen URLs hinzu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1441">To turn automatic playback on for all sites, add http://\* and https://\* to the allowed list of URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1442">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1442">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1443">BlockPlugins (2) = Blockieren des Adobe Flash-Plug-Ins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1443">BlockPlugins (2) = Block the Adobe Flash plugin</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1444">ClickToPlay (3) = zum Abspielen klicken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1444">ClickToPlay (3) = Click to play</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1445">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1445">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1446">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1446">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1447">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1447">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1448">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1448">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1449">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1449">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1450">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1450">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1451">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1451">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1452">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1452">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1453">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1453">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1454">Eindeutiger GP-Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1454">GP unique name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1455">GP-Name: Standardeinstellung für Adobe Flash (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1455">GP name: Default Adobe Flash setting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1456">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1456">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1457">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1457">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1458">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1458">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1459">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1459">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1460">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1460">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1461">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1461">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1462">Wertname: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1462">Value Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1463">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1463">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1464">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1464">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1465">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1465">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1466">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultPluginsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1466">Preference Key Name: DefaultPluginsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1467">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1467">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="defaultpopupssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1469">DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1469">DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-pop-up-window-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1470">Standardeinstellung für Popupfenster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1470">Default pop-up window setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1471">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1471">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1472">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1472">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1473">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1473">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1474">Legen Sie fest, ob Websites Popupfenster anzeigen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1474">Set whether websites can show pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1475">Sie können sie auf allen Websites zulassen („AllowPopups“) oder sie auf allen Websites blockieren („BlockPopups“).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1475">You can allow them on all websites ('AllowPopups') or block them on all sites ('BlockPopups').</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1476">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden Popupfenster standardmäßig blockiert und der Benutzer kann diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1476">If you don't configure this policy, pop-up windows are blocked by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1477">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1477">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1478">AllowPopups (1) = zulassen, dass alle Websites Popupfenster anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1478">AllowPopups (1) = Allow all sites to show pop-ups</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1479">BlockPopups (2) = nicht zulassen, dass Websites Popups anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1479">BlockPopups (2) = Do not allow any site to show popups</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1480">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1480">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1481">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1481">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1482">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1482">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1483">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1483">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1484">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1484">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1485">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1485">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1486">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1486">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1487">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1487">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1488">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1488">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1489">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1489">GP unique name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1490">GP-Name: Standardeinstellung für Popupfenster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1490">GP name: Default pop-up window setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1491">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1491">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1492">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1492">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1493">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1493">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1494">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1494">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1495">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1495">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1496">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1496">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1497">Wertname: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1497">Value Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1498">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1498">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1499">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1499">Example value:</span></span>

```

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1500">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1500">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1501">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultPopupsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1501">Preference Key Name: DefaultPopupsSetting</span></span>


  ### <a name="defaultwebbluetoothguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1504">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1504">DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-web-bluetooth-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1505">Steuern der Verwendung der Web-Bluetooth-API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1505">Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1506">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1506">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1507">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1507">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1508">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1508">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1509">Steuern, ob Websites auf in der Nähe befindliche Bluetooth-Geräte zugreifen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1509">Control whether websites can access nearby Bluetooth devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1510">Sie können den Zugriff vollständig blockieren oder es für die Website erforderlich machen, den Benutzer jedes Mal zu fragen, wenn sie auf ein Bluetooth-Gerät zugreifen möchte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1510">You can completely block access or require the site to ask the user each time it wants to access a Bluetooth device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1511">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der Standardwert („AskWebBluetooth“, d. h. die Benutzer werden jedes Mal gefragt) verwendet, und die Benutzer können ihn ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1511">If you don't configure this policy, the default value ('AskWebBluetooth', meaning users are asked each time) is used and users can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1512">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1512">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1513">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = nicht zulassen, dass eine Website Zugriff auf Bluetooth-Geräte über die Web-Bluetooth-API anfordert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1513">BlockWebBluetooth (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to Bluetooth devices via the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1514">AskWebBluetooth (3) = zulassen, dass Websites den Benutzer um Zugriff auf ein in der Nähe befindliches Bluetooth-Gerät bitten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1514">AskWebBluetooth (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a nearby Bluetooth device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1515">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1515">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1516">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1516">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1517">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1517">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1518">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1518">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1519">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1519">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1520">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1520">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1521">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1521">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1522">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1522">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1523">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1523">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1524">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1524">GP unique name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1525">GP-Name: Steuern der Verwendung der Web-Bluetooth-API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1525">GP name: Control use of the Web Bluetooth API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1526">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1526">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1527">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1527">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1528">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1528">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1529">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1529">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1530">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1530">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1531">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1531">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1532">Wertname: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1532">Value Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1533">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1533">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1534">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1534">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1535">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1535">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1536">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1536">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1537">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1537">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultwebusbguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1539">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1539">DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-webusb-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1540">Steuern der Verwendung der WebUSB-API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1540">Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1541">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1541">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1542">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1542">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1543">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1543">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1544">Legen Sie fest, ob Websites auf angeschlossene USB-Geräte zugreifen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1544">Set whether websites can access connected USB devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1545">Sie können den Zugriff vollständig blockieren oder den Benutzer jedes Mal fragen, wenn eine Website auf angeschlossene USB-Geräte zugreifen möchte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1545">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to connected USB devices.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1546">Sie können diese Richtlinie für bestimmte URL-Muster außer Kraft setzen, indem Sie die [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) und [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) Richtlinien verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1546">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) and [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1547">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können Websites Benutzer standardmäßig fragen, ob sie auf verbundene USB-Geräte zugreifen können („AskWebUsb“) und die Benutzer können diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1547">If you don't configure this policy, sites can ask users whether they can access the connected USB devices ('AskWebUsb') by default, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1548">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1548">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1549">BlockWebUsb (2) = nicht zulassen, dass Websites Zugriff auf USB-Geräte über die WebUSB-API anfordern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1549">BlockWebUsb (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to USB devices via the WebUSB API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1550">AskWebUsb (3) = zulassen, dass Websites den Benutzer um Zugriff auf ein verbundenes USB-Gerät bitten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1550">AskWebUsb (3) = Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a connected USB device</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1551">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1551">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1552">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1552">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1553">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1553">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1554">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1554">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1555">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1555">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1556">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1556">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1557">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1557">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1558">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1558">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1559">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1559">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1560">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1560">GP unique name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1561">GP-Name: Steuern der Verwendung der WebUSB-API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1561">GP name: Control use of the WebUSB API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1562">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1562">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1563">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1563">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1564">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1564">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1565">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1565">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1566">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1566">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1567">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1567">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1568">Wertname: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1568">Value Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1569">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1569">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1570">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1570">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1571">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1571">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1572">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1572">Preference Key Name: DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1573">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1573">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="filesystemreadaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1575">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1575">FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-read-access-via-the-file-system-api-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1576">Lesezugriff über die Datei-System-API auf diesen Websites zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1576">Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1577">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1577">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1578">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1578">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1579">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1579">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1580">Beim Festlegen der Richtlinie können Sie die URL-Muster auflisten, mit denen angegeben wird, welche Websites vom Benutzer Lesezugriff auf Dateien oder Verzeichnisse im Dateisystem des Hostbetriebssystems über die Dateisystem-API anfordern dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1580">Setting the policy lets you list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1581">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie nicht festlegen, bedeutet dies, dass [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) für alle Websites gilt, sofern diese festgelegt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1581">Leaving the policy unset means [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1582">Ist dies nicht der Fall, werden die persönlichen Einstellungen der Benutzer übernommen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1582">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1583">URL-Muster dürfen nicht mit [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls) in Konflikt stehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1583">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls](#filesystemreadblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1584">Keine der Richtlinien hat Vorrang, wenn eine URL mit beiden übereinstimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1584">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1585">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1585">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1586">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1586">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1587">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1587">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1588">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1588">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1589">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1589">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1590">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1590">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1591">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1591">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1592">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1592">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1593">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1593">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1594">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1594">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1595">Eindeutiger GP-Name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1595">GP unique name: FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1596">GP-Name: Lesezugriff über die Datei-System-API auf diesen Websites zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1596">GP name: Allow read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1597">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1597">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1598">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1598">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1599">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1599">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1600">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1600">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1601">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1601">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1602">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1602">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1603">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1603">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1604">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1604">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
```

  ### <a name="filesystemreadblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1610">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1610">FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-read-access-via-the-file-system-api-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1611">Lesezugriff über die Datei-System-API auf diesen Websites blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1611">Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1612">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1612">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1613">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1613">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1614">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1614">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1615">Beim Festlegen der Richtlinie können Sie die URL-Muster auflisten, mit denen angegeben wird, welche Websites vom Benutzer keinen Lesezugriff auf Dateien oder Verzeichnisse im Dateisystem des Hostbetriebssystems über die Dateisystem-API anfordern dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1615">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can't ask users to grant them read access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system via the File System API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1616">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie nicht festlegen, gilt [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) für alle Websites, sofern diese festgelegt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1616">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemReadGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemreadguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1617">Ist dies nicht der Fall, werden die persönlichen Einstellungen der Benutzer übernommen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1617">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1618">URL-Muster dürfen nicht mit [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls) in Konflikt stehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1618">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemReadAskForUrls](#filesystemreadaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1619">Keine der Richtlinien hat Vorrang, wenn eine URL mit beiden übereinstimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1619">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1620">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1620">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1621">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1621">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1622">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1622">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1623">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1623">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1624">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1624">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1625">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1625">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1627">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1627">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1628">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1628">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1629">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1629">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1630">Eindeutiger GP-Name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1630">GP unique name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1631">GP-Name: Lesezugriff über die Datei-System-API auf diesen Websites blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1631">GP name: Block read access via the File System API on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1632">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1632">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1633">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1633">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1634">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1634">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1635">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1635">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1636">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1636">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1637">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1637">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1638">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1638">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1639">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1639">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1640">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1640">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1641">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1641">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1642">Einstellung Schlüsselname: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1642">Preference Key Name: FileSystemReadBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1643">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1643">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="filesystemwriteaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1645">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1645">FileSystemWriteAskForUrls</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1650">Beim Festlegen der Richtlinie können Sie die URL-Muster auflisten, mit denen angegeben wird, welche Websites vom Benutzer Schreibzugriff auf Dateien oder Verzeichnisse im Dateisystem des Hostbetriebssystems anfordern dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1650">If you set this policy, you can list the URL patterns that specify which sites can ask users to grant them write access to files or directories in the host operating system's file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1651">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie nicht festlegen, gilt [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) für alle Websites, sofern diese festgelegt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1651">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1652">Ist dies nicht der Fall, werden die persönlichen Einstellungen der Benutzer übernommen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1652">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1653">URL-Muster dürfen nicht mit [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls) in Konflikt stehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1653">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls](#filesystemwriteblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1654">Keine der Richtlinien hat Vorrang, wenn eine URL mit beiden übereinstimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1654">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1655">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1655">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1656">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1656">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1667">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1667">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1672">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1672">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1686">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie nicht festlegen, gilt [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) für alle Websites, sofern diese festgelegt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1686">If you don't set this policy, [DefaultFileSystemWriteGuardSetting](#defaultfilesystemwriteguardsetting) applies for all sites, if it's set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1687">Ist dies nicht der Fall, werden die persönlichen Einstellungen der Benutzer übernommen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1687">If not, users' personal settings apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1688">URL-Muster dürfen nicht mit [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls) in Konflikt stehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1688">URL patterns can't conflict with [FileSystemWriteAskForUrls](#filesystemwriteaskforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1689">Keine der Richtlinien hat Vorrang, wenn eine URL mit beiden übereinstimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1689">Neither policy takes precedence if a URL matches with both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1690">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1690">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1691">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1691">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>
