  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1700">Eindeutiger GP-Name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1700">GP unique name: FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1701">GP-Name: Schreibzugriff auf Dateien und Verzeichnisse auf diesen Websites blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1701">GP name: Block write access to files and directories on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1702">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1702">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1703">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1703">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1704">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1704">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1705">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1705">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1706">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1706">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1707">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1707">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1708">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1708">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1710">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1710">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\FileSystemWriteBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  ### <a name="imagesallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1715">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1715">ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-images-on-these-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1716">Zulassen von Bildern auf diesen Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1716">Allow images on these sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1717">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1717">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1718">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1718">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1719">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1719">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1720">Sie können eine Liste an Websites, basierend auf URL-Mustern, definieren, die Bilder anzeigen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1720">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1721">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird für alle Websites der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1721">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value is used for all sites either from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1722">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1722">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1723">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1723">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1724">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1724">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1725">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1725">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1726">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1726">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1727">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1727">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1729">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1729">List of strings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1731">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1731">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1732">GP eindeutiger Name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1732">GP unique name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1733">GP-Name: Zulassen von Bildern auf diesen Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1733">GP name: Allow images on these sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1734">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1734">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1735">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1735">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1736">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1736">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1737">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1737">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1738">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1738">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1739">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1739">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1740">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1740">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1741">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1741">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1742">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1742">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1743">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1743">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1744">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1744">Preference Key Name: ImagesAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1745">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1745">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml

  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="imagesblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1747">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1747">ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1750">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1750">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1751">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1751">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1752">Sie können eine Liste an Websites, basierend auf URL-Mustern, definieren, die keine Bilder anzeigen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1752">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that aren't allowed to display images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1753">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1753">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultImagesSetting](#defaultimagessetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1754">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1754">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1755">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1755">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1756">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1756">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1757">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1757">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1758">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1758">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1759">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1759">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1761">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1761">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1762">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1762">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1763">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1763">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1764">GP eindeutiger Name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1764">GP unique name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1765">GP-Name: Blockieren von Bildern auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1765">GP name: Block images on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1766">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1766">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1768">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1768">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1769">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1769">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1770">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1770">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1771">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1771">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1772">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1772">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1773">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1773">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1774">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1774">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ImagesBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1776">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1776">Preference Key Name: ImagesBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  ### <a name="insecurecontentallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1779">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1779">InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-insecure-content-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1780">Zulassen von unsicheren Inhalten auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1780">Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1781">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1781">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1782">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1782">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1783">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1783">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1784">Erstellen Sie eine Liste von URL-Mustern, um Websites festzulegen, die unsicheren gemischten Inhalt anzeigen können (also HTTP-Inhalte auf HTTPS-Websites).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1784">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that can display insecure mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1785">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden blockierbare Mischinhalte blockiert und optional können blockierbare Mischinhalte auch aktualisiert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1785">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1786">Benutzer können jedoch Ausnahmen festlegen, um unsichere Mischinhalte auf bestimmten Websites zuzulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1786">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1787">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1787">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1788">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1788">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1789">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1789">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1790">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1790">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1791">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1791">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1792">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1792">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1793">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1793">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1794">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1794">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1795">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1795">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1796">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1796">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1797">GP eindeutiger Name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1797">GP unique name: InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1798">GP-Name: Zulassen von unsicheren Inhalten auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1798">GP name: Allow insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1799">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1799">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1800">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1800">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1801">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1801">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1802">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1802">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1803">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1803">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1804">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1804">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1805">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1805">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1806">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1806">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"

```

  ### <a name="insecurecontentblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1812">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1812">InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-insecure-content-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1813">Blockieren von unsicheren Inhalten auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1813">Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1814">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1814">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1815">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1815">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1816">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1816">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1817">Erstellen Sie eine Liste von URL-Mustern, um Websites festzulegen, die keine blockierbaren (d h. aktiven) gemischten Inhalte (also HTTP-Inhalte auf HTTPS-Websites) anzeigen dürfen und für die optional blockierbare Mischinhalte aktualisiert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1817">Create a list of URL patterns to specify sites that aren't allowed to display blockable (i.e. active) mixed content (that is, HTTP content on HTTPS sites) and for which optionally blockable mixed content upgrades will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1818">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden blockierbare Mischinhalte blockiert und optional können blockierbare Mischinhalte auch aktualisiert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1818">If you don't configure this policy, blockable mixed content will be blocked and optionally blockable mixed content will be upgraded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1819">Benutzer können jedoch Ausnahmen festlegen, um unsichere Mischinhalte auf bestimmten Websites zuzulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1819">However, users will be allowed to set exceptions to allow insecure mixed content for specific sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1820">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1820">For detailed information about valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1821">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1821">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1822">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1822">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1823">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1823">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1824">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1824">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1825">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1825">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1826">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1826">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1827">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1827">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1828">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1828">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1829">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1829">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1830">GP eindeutiger Name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1830">GP unique name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1831">GP-Name: Blockieren von unsicheren Inhalten auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1831">GP name: Block insecure content on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1832">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1832">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1833">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1833">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1834">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1834">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1835">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1835">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1836">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1836">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1837">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1837">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1838">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1838">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1839">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1839">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1840">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1840">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InsecureContentBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1841">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1841">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1842">Einstellung Schlüsselname: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1842">Preference Key Name: InsecureContentBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1843">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1843">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="javascriptallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1845">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1845">JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1848">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1848">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1849">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1849">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1850">Sie können eine Liste an Websites, basierend auf URL-Mustern, definieren, die JavaScript ausführen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1850">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are allowed to run JavaScript.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1851">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1851">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultJavaScriptSetting](#defaultjavascriptsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1859">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1859">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1860">GP eindeutiger Name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1860">GP unique name: JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1861">GP-Name: JavaScript auf bestimmten Websites zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1861">GP name: Allow JavaScript on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1862">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1862">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1864">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1864">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1865">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1865">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1866">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1866">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1868">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1868">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1869">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1869">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1870">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1870">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1896">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1896">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1897">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1897">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1898">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1898">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1899">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1899">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1900">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1900">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\JavaScriptBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1901">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1901">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1902">Einstellung Schlüsselname: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1902">Preference Key Name: JavaScriptBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1903">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1903">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1905">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1905">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-default-legacy-samesite-cookie-behavior-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1906">Standardeinstellung für das Verhalten von Legacy-SameSite-Cookies aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1906">Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1907">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1907">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1908">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1908">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1909">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1909">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1910">Hiermit können Sie alle Cookies auf das alte SameSite-Verhalten zurücksetzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1910">Lets you revert all cookies to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1911">Durch das Zurückkehren zum alten Verhalten werden Cookies, die kein SameSite-Attribut angeben, so behandelt, als wären sie "SameSite = None", und die Anforderung an "SameSite = None"-Cookies, das "Secure"-Attribut zu übermitteln, wird entfernt. Darüber hinaus wird der Schemavergleich beim Überprüfen, ob zwei Websites der gleichen Seite angehören, übersprungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1911">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1912">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, ist das standardmäßige SameSite-Verhalten für Cookies von anderen Konfigurationsquellen für das "SameSite-by-default"-Feature, das "Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure"-Feature und das "Schemeful Same-Site"-Feature abhängig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1912">If you don't set this policy, the default SameSite behavior for cookies will depend on other configuration sources for the SameSite-by-default feature, the Cookies-without-SameSite-must-be-secure feature, and the Schemeful Same-Site feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1913">Diese Funktionen können auch durch eine Feldprüfung oder durch das "same-site-by-default-cookies"-Flag, das "cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure"-Flag oder das "schemeful-same-site"-Flag unter edge://flags konfiguriert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1913">These features can also be configured by a field trial or the same-site-by-default-cookies flag, the cookies-without-same-site-must-be-secure flag, or the schemeful-same-site flag in edge://flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1914">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1914">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1915">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = wiederherstellen des Legacy-SameSite-Verhaltens für Cookies auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1915">DefaultToLegacySameSiteCookieBehavior (1) = Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-1916">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = verwenden von standardmäßigem SameSite-Verhalten für Cookies auf allen Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1916">DefaultToSameSiteByDefaultCookieBehavior (2) = Use SameSite-by-default behavior for cookies on all sites</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1917">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1917">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1918">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1918">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1919">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1919">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1920">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1920">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1921">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1921">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1922">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1922">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1923">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1923">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1924">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1924">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1925">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1925">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1926">GP eindeutiger Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1926">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1927">GP-Name: Standardeinstellung für das Verhalten von Legacy-SameSite-Cookies aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1927">GP name: Enable default legacy SameSite cookie behavior setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1928">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1928">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1929">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1929">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1930">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1930">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1931">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1931">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1932">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1932">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1933">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1933">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1934">Wertname: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1934">Value Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1935">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1935">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1936">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1936">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1937">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1937">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1938">Einstellung Schlüsselname: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1938">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1939">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1939">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabledfordomainlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1941">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1941">LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>

  #### <a name="revert-to-legacy-samesite-behavior-for-cookies-on-specified-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1942">Zurückkehren zum alten SameSite-Verhalten für Cookies auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1942">Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1943">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1943">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1944">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1944">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1945">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1945">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1946">Cookies, die für Domänen mit den angegebenen Mustern gesetzt wurden, werden auf das alte SameSite-Verhalten zurückfallen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1946">Cookies set for domains match specified patterns will revert to legacy SameSite behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1947">Durch das Zurückkehren zum alten Verhalten werden Cookies, die kein SameSite-Attribut angeben, so behandelt, als wären sie "SameSite = None", und die Anforderung an "SameSite = None"-Cookies, das "Secure"-Attribut zu übermitteln, wird entfernt. Darüber hinaus wird der Schemavergleich beim Überprüfen, ob zwei Websites der gleichen Seite angehören, übersprungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1947">Reverting to legacy behavior causes cookies that don't specify a SameSite attribute to be treated as if they were "SameSite=None", removes the requirement for "SameSite=None" cookies to carry the "Secure" attribute, and skips the scheme comparison when evaluating if two sites are same-site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1948">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, wird der globale Standardwert verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1948">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1949">Der globale Standardwert wird auch für Cookies in Domänen verwendet, die nicht unter die von Ihnen angegebenen Muster fallen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1949">The global default will also be used for cookies on domains not covered by the patterns you specify.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1950">Der globale Standardwert kann mit der Richtlinie [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) konfiguriert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1950">The global default value can be configured using the [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1951">Wenn [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) nicht eingestellt wird, greift der globale Standardwert auf andere Konfigurationsquellen zurück.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1951">If [LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabled](#legacysamesitecookiebehaviorenabled) is unset, the global default value falls back to other configuration sources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1952">Beachten Sie, dass die von Ihnen in dieser Richtlinie aufgelisteten Muster als Domänen und nicht als URLs behandelt werden, daher sollten Sie kein(en) Schema oder Port angeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1952">Note that patterns you list in this policy are treated as domains, not URLs, so you should not specify a scheme or port.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1953">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1953">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1954">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1954">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1955">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1955">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1956">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1956">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1957">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1957">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1958">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1958">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1959">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1959">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1960">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1960">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1961">GP eindeutiger Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1961">GP unique name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1962">GP-Name: Zurückkehren zum alten SameSite-Verhalten für Cookies auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1962">GP name: Revert to legacy SameSite behavior for cookies on specified sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1963">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1963">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1964">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1964">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1965">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1965">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1966">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1966">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1967">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1967">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1968">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1968">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1969">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1969">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1970">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1970">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1971">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1971">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\1 = "www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1972">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1972">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1973">Einstellung Schlüsselname: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1973">Preference Key Name: LegacySameSiteCookieBehaviorEnabledForDomainList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1974">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1974">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="notificationsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1976">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1976">NotificationsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-notifications-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1977">Zulassen von Benachrichtigungen bei bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1977">Allow notifications on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1978">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1978">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1979">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1979">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1980">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1980">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-1981">Ermöglicht Ihnen, eine Liste von URL-Mustern zu erstellen, um Websites anzugeben, die Benachrichtigungen anzeigen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1981">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-1982">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, wird für alle Websites der globale Standardwert verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1982">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1983">Dieser Standardwert stammt aus der Richtlinie [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting), sofern diese festgelegt ist, oder aus der persönlichen Konfiguration des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1983">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-1984">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1984">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1985">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1985">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1986">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1986">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1987">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1987">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1988">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1988">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1989">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1989">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-1990">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1990">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1991">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1991">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-1992">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-1992">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2013">Ermöglicht Ihnen, eine Liste von URL-Mustern zu erstellen, um Sites anzugeben, die keine Benachrichtigungen anzeigen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2013">Allows you to create a list of url patterns to specify sites that are not allowed to display notifications.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2014">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, wird für alle Websites der globale Standardwert verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2014">If you don't set this policy, the global default value will be used for all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2015">Dieser Standardwert stammt aus der Richtlinie [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting), sofern diese festgelegt ist, oder aus der persönlichen Konfiguration des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2015">This default value will be from the [DefaultNotificationsSetting](#defaultnotificationssetting) policy if it's set, or from the user's personal configuration.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2016">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2016">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  ### <a name="pluginsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2040">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2040">PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-adobe-flash-plug-in-on-specific-sites-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2041">Zulassen des Adobe Flash-Plug-Ins auf bestimmten Websites (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2041">Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-2042">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach der Microsoft Edge-Version 87 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2042">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2043">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2043">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2044">Unter Windows und macOS seit 77 bis 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2044">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2045">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2045">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2046">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nicht, da Flash nicht mehr von Microsoft Edge unterstützt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2046">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2047">Sie können eine Liste an Websites, basierend auf URL-Mustern, definieren, die das Adobe Flash-Plug-In ausführen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2047">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can run the Adobe Flash plug-in.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2048">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2048">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2049">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2049">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2050">Ab M85 werden jedoch Muster mit den Platzhaltern „\*“ und „[\*.]“ für diese Richtlinie nicht mehr unterstützt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2050">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2051">Unterstützte Features:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2051">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2052">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2052">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2053">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2053">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2054">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2054">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2056">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2056">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2057">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2057">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2058">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2058">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2059">Eindeutiger GP-Name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2059">GP unique name: PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2060">GP-Name: Zulassen des Adobe Flash-Plug-Ins auf bestimmten Websites (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2060">GP name: Allow the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2061">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2061">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2062">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2062">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2063">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2063">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2064">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2064">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2065">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2065">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2066">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2066">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2067">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2067">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2068">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2068">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2069">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2069">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PluginsAllowedForUrls\2 = "http://contoso.edu:8080"

```

  #### <a name="block-the-adobe-flash-plug-in-on-specific-sites-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2075">Blockieren des Adobe Flash-Plug-Ins auf bestimmten Websites (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2075">Block the Adobe Flash plug-in on specific sites (obsolete)</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2079">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2079">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2080">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nicht, da Flash nicht mehr von Microsoft Edge unterstützt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2080">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2081">Sie können eine Liste an Websites, basierend auf URL-Mustern, definieren, die das Adobe Flash-Plug-In nicht ausführen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2081">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked from running Adobe Flash.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2082">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2082">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2083">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2083">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2084">Ab M85 werden jedoch Muster mit den Platzhaltern „\*“ und „[\*.]“ für diese Richtlinie nicht mehr unterstützt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2084">However, starting in M85, patterns with '\*' and '[\*.]' wildcards in the host are no longer supported for this policy.</span></span>

  ### <a name="popupsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2108">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2108">PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-pop-up-windows-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2109">Popupfenster auf bestimmten Websites zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2109">Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2110">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2110">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2111">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2111">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2112">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2112">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2113">Sie können eine Liste an Websites, basierend auf URL-Mustern, definieren, die Popup-Fenster öffnen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2113">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can open pop-up windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2114">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2114">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2115">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2115">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultPopupsSetting](#defaultpopupssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2116">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2116">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2118">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2118">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2119">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2119">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2123">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2123">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2124">GP eindeutiger Name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2124">GP unique name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2125">GP-Name: Popupfenster auf bestimmten Websites zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2125">GP name: Allow pop-up windows on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2126">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2126">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2127">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2127">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2128">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2128">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2129">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2129">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2130">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2130">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2131">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2131">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2132">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2132">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2133">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2133">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2134">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2134">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PopupsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2135">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2135">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2136">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2136">Preference Key Name: PopupsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2137">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2137">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="registeredprotocolhandlers"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2170">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2170">RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>

  #### <a name="register-protocol-handlers"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2171">Registrieren von Protokollhandlern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2171">Register protocol handlers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2172">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2172">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2173">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2173">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2174">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2174">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2175">Legen Sie diese Richtlinie (nur empfohlen) fest, um eine Liste von Protokollhandlern zu registrieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2175">Set this policy (recommended only) to register a list of protocol handlers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2176">Diese Liste wird mit denen vom Benutzer registrierten zusammengeführt, und beide stehen zur Nutzung zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2176">This list is merged with ones registered by the user and both are available to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2177">So registrieren Sie einen Protokollhandler:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2177">To register a protocol handler:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-2178">Legen Sie die Protocol-Eigenschaft auf das Schema fest (z.B. „mailto“)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2178">Set the protocol property to the scheme (for example, "mailto")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="09666-2179">Setzen Sie die URL-Eigenschaft auf die URL-Eigenschaft der Anwendung, die das im Feld „Protokoll“ angegebene Schema verarbeitet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2179">Set the URL property to the URL property of the application that handlers the scheme specified in the "protocol" field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2180">Das Muster kann einen „%s“ enthalten, der durch die verarbeitete URL ersetzt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2180">The pattern can include a "%s" placeholder, which the handled URL replaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2181">Benutzer können einen durch diese Richtlinie registrierten Protokollhandler nicht entfernen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2181">Users can't remove a protocol handler registered by this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2182">Sie können jedoch einen neuen Standard-Protokollhandler installieren, um die vorhandenen Protokollhandler zu überschreiben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2182">However, they can install a new default protocol handler to override the existing protocol handlers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2183">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2183">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2184">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2184">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2185">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2185">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2186">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2186">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2187">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2187">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2188">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2188">Dictionary</span></span>
