  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2190">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2190">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2191">GP eindeutiger Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2191">GP unique name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2192">GP-Name: Registrieren von Protokollhandlern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2192">GP name: Register protocol handlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2193">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2193">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2194">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Inhaltseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2194">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2195">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2195">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2196">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2196">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2197">Pfad (verpflichtend): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2197">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2198">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2198">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2199">Wertname: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2199">Value Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2200">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2200">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2201">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2201">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [
  {
    "default": true, 
    "protocol": "mailto", 
    "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2202">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2202">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RegisteredProtocolHandlers = [{"default": true, "protocol": "mailto", "url": "https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2203">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2203">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2204">Einstellung Schlüsselname: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2204">Preference Key Name: RegisteredProtocolHandlers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2205">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2205">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>RegisteredProtocolHandlers</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>default</key>
    <true/>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>mailto</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://mail.contoso.com/mail/?extsrc=mailto&url=%s</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2226">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2226">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2227">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2227">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2228">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2228">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2229">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2229">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2232">Wertname: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2232">Value Name: SpotlightExperiencesAndRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="webusballowdevicesforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2236">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2236">WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="grant-access-to-specific-sites-to-connect-to-specific-usb-devices"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2237">Bestimmten Websites die Herstellung einer Verbindung zu bestimmten USB-Geräten gewähren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2237">Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2238">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2238">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2239">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2239">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2240">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2240">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2241">Ermöglicht es Ihnen, eine Liste von URLs festzulegen, die festlegt, welche Websites automatisch die Berechtigung für den Zugriff auf ein USB-Gerät mit den angegebenen Lieferanten- und Produkt-IDs erhalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2241">Allows you to set a list of urls that specify which sites will automatically be granted permission to access a USB device with the given vendor and product IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2242">Jedes Element in der Liste muss sowohl Geräte als auch URLs enthalten, damit die Richtlinie gültig ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2242">Each item in the list must contain both devices and urls in order for the policy to be valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2243">Jedes Element in „Geräte“ kann ein Feld "Lieferanten-ID" und "Produkt-ID" enthalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2243">Each item in devices can contain a vendor ID and product ID field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2244">Jede weggelassene ID wird als Platzhalter mit einer Ausnahme behandelt, und diese Ausnahme besteht darin, dass keine Produkt-ID angegeben werden kann, ohne dass auch eine Lieferanten-ID angegeben wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2244">Any ID that is omitted is treated as a wildcard with one exception, and that exception is that a product ID cannot be specified without a vendor ID also being specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2245">Andernfalls ist die Richtlinie ungültig und wird ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2245">Otherwise, the policy will not be valid and will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2246">Beim USB-Berechtigungsmodell wird die URL der anfordernden Website ("anfordernde URL") und die URL der Frame-Website der obersten Ebene ("Einbettende URL") verwendet, um der anfordernden URL die Berechtigung für den Zugriff auf das USB-Gerät zu erteilen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2246">The USB permission model uses the URL of the requesting site ("requesting URL") and the URL of the top-level frame site ("embedding URL") to grant permission to the requesting URL to access the USB device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2247">Die anfordernde URL unterscheidet sich möglicherweise von der Einbettenden URL, wenn die anfordernde Website in einen iframe geladen wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2247">The requesting URL may be different than the embedding URL when the requesting site is loaded in an iframe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2248">Daher kann das Feld "URLs" bis zu zwei URL-Zeichenfolgen enthalten, die durch ein Komma getrennt sind, um die anfordernde von der einbettenden URL zu unterscheiden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2248">Therefore, the "urls" field can contain up to two URL strings delimited by a comma to specify the requesting and embedding URL respectively.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2249">Wenn nur eine URL angegeben ist, wird der Zugriff auf die entsprechenden USB-Geräte gewährt, wenn die URL der anfordernden Website dieser URL unabhängig vom Einbettungsstatus entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2249">If only one URL is specified, then access to the corresponding USB devices will be granted when the requesting site's URL matches this URL regardless of embedding status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2250">Die URLs in "URLs" müssen gültige URLs sein, andernfalls wird die Richtlinie ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2250">The URLs in "urls" must be valid URLs, otherwise the policy will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2251">Falls diese Richtlinie nicht festgelegt wurde, wird für alle Websites der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder andernfalls die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2251">If this policy is left not set, the global default value will be used for all sites either from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy if it is set, or the user's personal configuration otherwise.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2252">URL-Muster in dieser Richtlinie sollten keine Konflikte mit denen verursachen, die in [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) konfiguriert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2252">URL patterns in this policy should not clash with the ones configured via [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2253">Wenn ein Konflikt vorliegt, hat diese Richtlinie Vorrang vor [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) und [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2253">If there is a clash, this policy will take precedence over [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) and [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2254">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2254">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2255">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2255">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2256">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2256">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2257">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2257">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2258">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2258">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2259">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2259">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2260">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2260">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2261">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2261">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2262">GP eindeutiger Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2262">GP unique name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2263">GP-Name: Bestimmten Websites die Herstellung einer Verbindung zu bestimmten USB-Geräten gewähren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2263">GP name: Grant access to specific sites to connect to specific USB devices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2264">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2264">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2265">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2265">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2266">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2266">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2267">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2267">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2268">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2268">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2269">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2269">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2270">Wertname: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2270">Value Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2271">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2271">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2272">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2272">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [
  {
    "devices": [
      {
        "product_id": 5678, 
        "vendor_id": 1234
      }
    ], 
    "urls": [
      "https://contoso.com", 
      "https://fabrikam.com"
    ]
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2273">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2273">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls = [{"devices": [{"product_id": 5678, "vendor_id": 1234}], "urls": ["https://contoso.com", "https://fabrikam.com"]}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2274">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2274">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2275">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2275">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2276">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2276">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebUsbAllowDevicesForUrls</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>devices</key>
    <array>
      <dict>
        <key>product_id</key>
        <integer>5678</integer>
        <key>vendor_id</key>
        <integer>1234</integer>
      </dict>
    </array>
    <key>urls</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://contoso.com</string>
      <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
    </array>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webusbaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2278">WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2278">WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-webusb-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2279">Erlauben von WebUSB auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2279">Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2280">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2280">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2281">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2281">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2282">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2282">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2283">Definieren Sie eine Liste der-Websites, die auf URL-Mustern basiert, die den Benutzer um Zugriff auf ein USB-Gerät bitten können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2283">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2284">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2284">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2285">Die in dieser Richtlinie definierten URL-Muster dürfen nicht mit den in der [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) Richtlinie konfigurierten Konflikten in Konflikt stehen. Sie können eine URL nicht sowohl zulassen als auch blockieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2285">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbBlockedForUrls](#webusbblockedforurls) policy - you can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2286">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2286">For detailed information on valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2287">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2287">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2288">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2288">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2289">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2289">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2290">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2290">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2291">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2291">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2292">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2292">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2293">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2293">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2294">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2294">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2295">GP eindeutiger Name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2295">GP unique name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2296">GP-Name: Erlauben von WebUSB auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2296">GP name: Allow WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2297">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2297">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2298">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2298">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2299">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2299">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2300">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2300">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2301">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2301">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2302">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2302">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2303">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2303">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2304">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2304">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2305">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2305">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2306">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2306">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2307">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WebUsbAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2307">Preference Key Name: WebUsbAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2308">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2308">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webusbblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2310">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2310">WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2315">Definieren Sie eine Liste der-Websites, die auf URL-Mustern basiert, die den Benutzer nicht um Zugriff auf ein USB-Gerät bitten können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2315">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a USB device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2316">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2316">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultWebUsbGuardSetting](#defaultwebusbguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2317">URL-Muster in dieser Richtlinie dürfen nicht mit denen in Konflikt stehen, die in der [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) Richtlinie konfiguriert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2317">URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [WebUsbAskForUrls](#webusbaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2318">Sie können eine URL nicht sowohl zulassen als auch blockieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2318">You can't both allow and block a URL.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2319">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2319">For detailed information on valid url patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2320">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2320">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2321">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2321">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2322">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2322">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2323">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2323">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2327">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2327">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2328">GP eindeutiger Name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2328">GP unique name: WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2329">GP-Name: Blockieren von WebUSB auf bestimmten Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2329">GP name: Block WebUSB on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2330">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2330">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Content settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2331">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2331">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2332">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2332">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2333">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2333">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2334">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2334">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebUsbBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2335">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2335">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2336">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2336">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2337">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2337">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2338">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2338">Example value:</span></span>

  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>

  ## <a name="default-search-provider-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2343">Richtlinien des standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2343">Default search provider policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-2344">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2344">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2345">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2345">DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-default-search-provider"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2346">Standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieter aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2346">Enable the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2347">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2347">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2348">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2348">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2349">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2349">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2350">Ermöglicht die Verwendung eines Standardsuchanbieters.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2350">Enables the ability to use a default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2351">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, kann ein Benutzer nach einem Begriff suchen, indem er ihn in die Adressleiste tippt (sofern es sich nicht um eine URL handelt).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2351">If you enable this policy, a user can search for a term by typing in the address bar (as long as what they type isn't a URL).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2352">Sie können den zu verwendenden Standard-Suchanbieter angeben, indem Sie die restlichen Standard-Suchrichtlinien aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2352">You can specify the default search provider to use by enabling the rest of the default search policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2353">Wenn diese leer (nicht konfiguriert) bleiben oder nicht ordnungsgemäß konfiguriert sind, kann der Benutzer den Standardanbieter auswählen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2353">If these are left empty (not configured) or configured incorrectly, the user can choose the default provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2354">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, kann der Benutzer nicht über die Adressleiste suchen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2354">If you disable this policy, the user can't search from the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2355">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder deaktivieren, können die Benutzer sie nicht ändern oder außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2355">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2356">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, ist der standardmäßige Suchanbieter aktiviert, und der Benutzer kann den standardmäßigen Suchanbieter auswählen und die Suchanbieterliste festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2356">If you don't configure this policy, the default search provider is enabled, and the user can choose the default search provider and set the search provider list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2357">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2357">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX..</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2358">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 84 können Sie diese Richtlinie als empfohlene Richtlinie festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2358">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2359">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2359">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2360">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2360">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2361">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2361">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2362">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2362">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2363">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2363">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2364">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2364">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2365">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2365">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2366">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2366">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2367">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2367">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2368">GP-Name: Standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieter aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2368">GP name: Enable the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2369">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2369">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2370">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Standardsuchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2370">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2371">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2371">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2372">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2372">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2373">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2373">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2374">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2374">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2375">Wertname: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2375">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2376">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2376">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2377">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2377">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2378">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2378">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2379">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2379">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2380">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2380">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderencodings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2382">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2382">DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-encodings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2383">Verschlüsselung standardmäßiger Suchdienstanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2383">Default search provider encodings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2384">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2384">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2385">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2385">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2386">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2386">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2387">Geben Sie die vom Suchanbieter unterstützten Zeichencodierungen an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2387">Specify the character encodings supported by the search provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2388">Codierungen sind Codepagenamen wie UTF-8, GB2312 und ISO-8859-1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2388">Encodings are code page names like UTF-8, GB2312, and ISO-8859-1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2389">Sie werden in der bereitgestellten Reihenfolge ausprobiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2389">They are tried in the order provided.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2390">Diese Richtlinie ist optional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2390">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2391">Wenn dies nicht konfiguriert ist, wird standardmäßig UTF-8 verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2391">If not configured, the default, UTF-8, is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2392">Diese Richtlinie wird nur angewendet, wenn Sie die Richtlinien [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) und [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2392">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2393">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 84 können Sie diese Richtlinie als empfohlene Richtlinie festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2393">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2394">Wenn der Benutzer bereits einen standardmäßigen Suchanbieter festgelegt hat, wird der von dieser empfohlenen Richtlinie konfigurierte Standardsuchanbieter nicht zur Liste der Suchanbieter hinzugefügt, aus denen der Benutzer auswählen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2394">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2395">Wenn dies das gewünschte Verhalten ist, verwenden Sie die[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2395">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2396">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2396">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2397">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2397">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2398">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2398">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2399">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2399">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2400">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2400">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2401">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2401">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2402">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2402">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2403">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2403">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2404">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2404">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2405">GP-Name: Verschlüsselung standardmäßiger Suchdienstanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2405">GP name: Default search provider encodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2406">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2406">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2407">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Standardsuchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2407">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2408">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2408">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2409">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2409">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2410">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2410">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2411">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2411">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2412">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2412">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2413">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2413">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2414">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2414">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\1 = "UTF-8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\2 = "UTF-16"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\3 = "GB2312"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\DefaultSearchProviderEncodings\4 = "ISO-8859-1"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2415">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2415">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2416">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2416">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderEncodings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2417">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2417">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>UTF-8</string>
  <string>UTF-16</string>
  <string>GB2312</string>
  <string>ISO-8859-1</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderimageurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2419">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2419">DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-the-search-by-image-feature-for-the-default-search-provider"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2420">Spezifiziert das Feature „Suche nach Bild“ für den standardmäßigen Suchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2420">Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2421">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2421">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2422">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2422">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2423">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2423">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2424">Gibt die URL für die Suchmaschine an, die für die die Bildsuche verwendet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2424">Specifies the URL to the search engine used for image search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2425">Suchanforderungen werden mithilfe der GET-Methode gesendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2425">Search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2426">Diese Richtlinie ist optional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2426">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2427">Wenn Sie sie nicht konfigurieren, ist die Bildsuche nicht verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2427">If you don't configure it, image search isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2428">Legen Sie Bings Bildsuch-URL folgendermaßen fest: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2428">Specify Bing's Image Search URL as: '{bing:baseURL}images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload&FORM=ANCMS1#enterInsights'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2429">Legen Sie Googles Bildsuch-URL folgendermaßen fest: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2429">Specify Google's Image Search URL as: '{google:baseURL}searchbyimage/upload'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2430">Sehen Sie in der [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) Richtlinie nach, um die Konfiguration der Bildsuche abzuschließen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2430">See [DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams](#defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams) policy to finish configuring image search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2431">Diese Richtlinie wird nur angewendet, wenn Sie die Richtlinien [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) und [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2431">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2432">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 84 können Sie diese Richtlinie als empfohlene Richtlinie festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2432">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2433">Wenn der Benutzer bereits einen standardmäßigen Suchanbieter festgelegt hat, wird der von dieser empfohlenen Richtlinie konfigurierte Standardsuchanbieter nicht zur Liste der Suchanbieter hinzugefügt, aus denen der Benutzer auswählen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2433">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2434">Wenn dies das gewünschte Verhalten ist, verwenden Sie die[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2434">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2435">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2435">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2436">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2436">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2437">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2437">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2438">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2438">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2439">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2439">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2440">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2440">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2441">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2441">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2442">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2442">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2443">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2443">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2444">GP-Name: Spezifiziert das Feature „Suche nach Bild“ für den standardmäßigen Suchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2444">GP name: Specifies the search-by-image feature for the default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2445">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2445">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2446">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Standardsuchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2446">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2447">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2447">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2448">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2448">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2449">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2449">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2450">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2450">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2451">Wertname: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2451">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2452">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2452">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2453">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2453">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2454">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2454">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2455">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2455">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2456">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2456">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/searchbyimage/upload</string>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderimageurlpostparams"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2458">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2458">DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>

  #### <a name="parameters-for-an-image-url-that-uses-post"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2459">Parameter für eine Bild-URL, die POST verwendet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2459">Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2460">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2460">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2461">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2461">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2462">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2462">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2463">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden die Parameter angegeben, die verwendet werden, wenn eine Bildsuche, die POST verwendet, ausgeführt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2463">If you enable this policy, it specifies the parameters used when an image search that uses POST is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2464">Die Richtlinie besteht aus durch Trennzeichen getrennten Namen/Wert-Paaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2464">The policy consists of comma-separated name/value pairs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2465">Wenn ein Wert ein Vorlagenparameter ist, z.B. {Bildminiaturansicht} im vorangehenden Beispiel, wird er durch eine reale Miniaturbilddatei ersetzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2465">If a value is a template parameter, like {imageThumbnail} in the preceding example, it's replaced with real image thumbnail data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2466">Diese Richtlinie wird nur angewendet, wenn Sie die Richtlinien [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) und [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2466">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2467">Legen Sie die POST-Parameter für Bings Bildsuch-URL folgendermaßen fest: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2467">Specify Bing's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'imageBin={google:imageThumbnailBase64}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2468">Legen Sie die POST-Parameter für Googles Bildsuch-URL folgendermaßen fest: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2468">Specify Google's Image Search URL Post Params as: 'encoded_image={google:imageThumbnail},image_url={google:imageURL},sbisrc={google:imageSearchSource},original_width={google:imageOriginalWidth},original_height={google:imageOriginalHeight}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2469">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, werden die Anforderungen für die Bildsuche mithilfe der GET-Methode gesendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2469">If you don't set this policy, image search requests are sent using the GET method.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2470">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 84 können Sie diese Richtlinie als empfohlene Richtlinie festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2470">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2471">Wenn der Benutzer bereits einen standardmäßigen Suchanbieter festgelegt hat, wird der von dieser empfohlenen Richtlinie konfigurierte Standardsuchanbieter nicht zur Liste der Suchanbieter hinzugefügt, aus denen der Benutzer auswählen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2471">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2472">Wenn dies das gewünschte Verhalten ist, verwenden Sie die[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2472">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2473">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2473">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2474">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2474">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2475">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2475">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2476">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2476">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2480">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2480">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2481">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2481">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2482">GP-Name: Parameter für eine Bild-URL, die POST verwendet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2482">GP name: Parameters for an image URL that uses POST</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2483">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2483">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2484">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Standardsuchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2484">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2485">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2485">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2486">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2486">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2487">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2487">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2488">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2488">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2489">Wertname: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2489">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2490">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2490">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2491">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2491">Example value:</span></span>

```
"content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}"
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2493">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2493">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderImageURLPostParams</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2494">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2494">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="defaultsearchproviderkeyword"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2496">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2496">DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-keyword"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2497">Schlüsselwort standardmäßiger Suchdienstanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2497">Default search provider keyword</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2498">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2498">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2499">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2499">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2500">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2500">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2501">Gibt das Schlüsselwort an, das in der Adressleiste als Abkürzung verwendet wird, um die Suche mit diesem Anbieter auszulösen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2501">Specifies the keyword, which is the shortcut used in the Address Bar to trigger the search for this provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2502">Diese Richtlinie ist optional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2502">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2503">Wenn Sie sie nicht konfigurieren, wird der Suchanbieter durch kein Schlüsselwort aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2503">If you don't configure it, no keyword activates the search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2504">Diese Richtlinie wird nur angewendet, wenn Sie die Richtlinien [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) und [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2504">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2505">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 84 können Sie diese Richtlinie als empfohlene Richtlinie festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2505">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2506">Wenn der Benutzer bereits einen standardmäßigen Suchanbieter festgelegt hat, wird der von dieser empfohlenen Richtlinie konfigurierte Standardsuchanbieter nicht zur Liste der Suchanbieter hinzugefügt, aus denen der Benutzer auswählen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2506">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2507">Wenn dies das gewünschte Verhalten ist, verwenden Sie die[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2507">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2508">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2508">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2509">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2509">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2510">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2510">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2511">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2511">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2514">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2514">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2515">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2515">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2516">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2516">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2517">GP-Name: Schlüsselwort standardmäßiger Suchdienstanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2517">GP name: Default search provider keyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2518">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2518">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2519">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Standardsuchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2519">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2520">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2520">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2521">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2521">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2522">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2522">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2523">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2523">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2524">Wertname: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2524">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2525">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2525">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2526">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2526">Example value:</span></span>

```
"mis"
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2528">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2528">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderKeyword</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2529">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2529">Example value:</span></span>
