  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidername"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2531">DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2531">DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2532">Name des standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2532">Default search provider name</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2533">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2533">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2534">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2534">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2535">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2535">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2536">Gibt den Namen des Standardsuchanbieters an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2536">Specifies the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2537">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, legen Sie den Namen des standardmäßigen Such-Dienstanbieters fest.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2537">If you enable this policy, you set the name of the default search provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2538">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht aktivieren oder Sie leer lassen, wird der in der Such-URL angegebene Hostname verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2538">If you don't enable this policy or if you leave it empty, the host name specified by the search URL is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2539">"DefaultSearchProviderName" sollte auf einen vom Unternehmen genehmigten, verschlüsselten Suchanbieter festgelegt sein, der dem verschlüsselten Suchanbieter in DTBC-0008 entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2539">'DefaultSearchProviderName' should be set to an organization-approved encrypted search provider that corresponds to the encrypted search provider set in DTBC-0008.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2540">Diese Richtlinie wird nur angewendet, wenn Sie die Richtlinien [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) und [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2540">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2541">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 84 können Sie diese Richtlinie als empfohlene Richtlinie festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2541">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2542">Wenn der Benutzer bereits einen standardmäßigen Suchanbieter festgelegt hat, wird der von dieser empfohlenen Richtlinie konfigurierte Standardsuchanbieter nicht zur Liste der Suchanbieter hinzugefügt, aus denen der Benutzer auswählen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2542">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2543">Wenn dies das gewünschte Verhalten ist, verwenden Sie die[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2543">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2544">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2544">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2545">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2545">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2546">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2546">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2547">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2547">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2548">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2548">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2549">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2549">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2550">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2550">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2551">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2551">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2552">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2552">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2553">GP-Name: Name des standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2553">GP name: Default search provider name</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2554">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2554">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2555">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Standardsuchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2555">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2556">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2556">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2557">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2557">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2558">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2558">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2559">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2559">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2560">Wertname: DefaultSearchProviderName</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2560">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderName</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2561">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2561">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

```
"My Intranet Search"
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidersearchurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2567">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2567">DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-search-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2568">Such-URL des standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2568">Default search provider search URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2569">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2569">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2570">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2570">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2571">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2571">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2572">Gibt die URL für die Suchmaschine an, die für die Standardsuche verwendet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2572">Specifies the URL of the search engine used for a default search.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2573">Die URL enthält die Zeichenfolge "{searchTerms}", die zum Zeitpunkt der Abfrage durch die vom Benutzer gesuchten Ausdrücke ersetzt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2573">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the terms the user is searching for.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2574">Legen Sie die Bing-Such-URL wie folgt fest:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2574">Specify Bing's search URL as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2575">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2575">'{bing:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2576">Legen Sie die Google-Such-URL wie folgt fest:: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2576">Specify Google's search URL as: '{google:baseURL}search?q={searchTerms}&{google:RLZ}{google:originalQueryForSuggestion}{google:assistedQueryStats}{google:searchFieldtrialParameter}{google:searchClient}{google:sourceId}ie={inputEncoding}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2577">Diese Richtlinie ist erforderlich, wenn Sie die Richtlinie [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) aktivieren. Wenn Sie diese letztgenannte Richtlinie nicht aktivieren, wird diese Richtlinie ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2577">This policy is required when you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy; if you don't enable the latter policy, this policy is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2578">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 84 können Sie diese Richtlinie als empfohlene Richtlinie festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2578">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2579">Wenn der Benutzer bereits einen standardmäßigen Suchanbieter festgelegt hat, wird der von dieser empfohlenen Richtlinie konfigurierte Standardsuchanbieter nicht zur Liste der Suchanbieter hinzugefügt, aus denen der Benutzer auswählen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2579">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2580">Wenn dies das gewünschte Verhalten ist, verwenden Sie die[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2580">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2581">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2581">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2582">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2582">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2583">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2583">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2584">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2584">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2585">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2585">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2586">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2586">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2587">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2587">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2588">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2588">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2589">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2589">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2590">GP-Name: Such-URL des standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2590">GP name: Default search provider search URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2591">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2591">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2592">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Standardsuchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2592">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2593">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2593">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2594">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2594">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2595">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2595">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2596">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2596">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2597">Wertname: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2597">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2598">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2598">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2599">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2599">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2600">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2600">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2601">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2601">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2602">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2602">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/search?q={searchTerms}</string>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidersuggesturl"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2604">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2604">DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-search-provider-url-for-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2605">URL des standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieters für Vorschläge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2605">Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2606">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2606">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2607">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2607">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2608">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2608">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2609">Gibt die URL für die Suchmaschine an, durch die Suchvorschläge bereitgestellt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2609">Specifies the URL for the search engine used to provide search suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2610">Die URL enthält die Zeichenfolge "{searchTerms}", die zum Zeitpunkt der Abfrage durch den vom Benutzer bisher eingegebenen Text ersetzt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2610">The URL contains the string '{searchTerms}', which is replaced at query time by the text the user has entered so far.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2611">Diese Richtlinie ist optional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2611">This policy is optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2612">Wenn Sie sie nicht konfigurieren, werden Benutzern keine Suchvorschläge angezeigt. Sie sehen Vorschläge aus dem Browserverlauf und den Favoriten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2612">If you don't configure it, users won't see search suggestions; they will see suggestions from their browsing history and favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2613">Bings Vorschlags-URL kann folgendermaßen angegeben werden:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2613">Bing's suggest URL can be specified as:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2614">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2614">'{bing:baseURL}qbox?query={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2615">Googles Vorschlags-URL kann folgendermaßen angegeben werden: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2615">Google's suggest URL can be specified as: '{google:baseURL}complete/search?output=chrome&q={searchTerms}'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2616">Diese Richtlinie wird nur angewendet, wenn Sie die Richtlinien [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) und [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2616">This policy is applied only if you enable the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2617">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 84 können Sie diese Richtlinie als empfohlene Richtlinie festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2617">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2618">Wenn der Benutzer bereits einen standardmäßigen Suchanbieter festgelegt hat, wird der von dieser empfohlenen Richtlinie konfigurierte Standardsuchanbieter nicht zur Liste der Suchanbieter hinzugefügt, aus denen der Benutzer auswählen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2618">If the user has already set a default search provider, the default search provider configured by this recommended policy will not be added to the list of search providers the user can choose from.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2619">Wenn dies das gewünschte Verhalten ist, verwenden Sie die[ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2619">If this is the desired behavior, use the [ManagedSearchEngines](#managedsearchengines) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2620">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2620">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2621">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2621">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2622">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2622">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2623">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2623">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2624">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2624">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2625">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2625">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2626">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2626">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2627">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2627">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2628">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2628">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2629">GP-Name: URL des standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieters für Vorschläge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2629">GP name: Default search provider URL for suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2630">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2630">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2631">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Standardsuchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2631">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2632">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2632">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2633">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2633">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2634">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2634">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2635">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2635">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2636">Wertname: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2636">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2637">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2637">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2638">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2638">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2639">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2639">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2640">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2640">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderSuggestURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2641">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2641">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://search.contoso.com/suggest?q={searchTerms}</string>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagesearchbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2643">NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2643">NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-new-tab-page-search-box-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2644">Konfigurieren das neuen Suchfeld für die Registerkartenoberfläche </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2644">Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2645">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2645">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2646">Auf Windows und MacOS ab 85 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2646">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2647">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2647">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2648">Sie können das neue Suchfeld für die Registerkartenseite so konfigurieren, dass "Suchfeld (empfohlen)" oder "Adressleiste" zum Suchen auf neuen Registerkarten verwendet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2648">You can configure the new tab page search box to use "Search box (Recommended)" or "Address bar" to search on new tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2649">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nur, wenn Sie die Suchfunktion auf einen anderen Wert als Bing festlegen, indem Sie die beiden folgenden Richtlinien festlegen: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) und [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2649">This policy only works if you set the search engine to a value other than Bing by setting the following two policies: [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) and [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl).</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="09666-2650">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren und:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2650">If you disable or don't configure this policy and:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-2651">Wenn die Standardsuchmaschine der Adressleiste Bing ist, verwendet die Registerkarte "neu" das Suchfeld, um auf neuen Registerkarten zu suchen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2651">If the address bar default search engine is Bing, the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="09666-2652">Wenn die Standardsuchmaschine der Adressleiste nicht Bing ist, wird den Benutzern bei der Suche auf neuen Registerkarten eine weitere Option ("Adressleiste") angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2652">If the address bar default search engine is not Bing, users are offered an additional choice (use "Address bar") when searching on new tabs.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="09666-2653">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren und folgende Einstellungen festlegen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2653">If you enable this policy and set it to:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-2654">"Suchfeld (empfohlen)" ("Bing"), die Registerkarte "neu" verwendet das Suchfeld, um auf neuen Registerkarten zu suchen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2654">"Search box (Recommended)" ('bing'), the new tab page uses the search box to search on new tabs.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="09666-2655">"Adressleiste" ("Umleitung"), das neue Suchfeld der Registerkarte verwendet die Adressleiste, um auf neuen Registerkarten zu suchen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2655">"Address bar" ('redirect'), the new tab page search box uses the address bar to search on new tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2656">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2656">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-2657">Bing (Bing) = Suchfeld (empfohlen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2657">bing (bing) = Search box (Recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-2658">Redirect (Umleitung) = Adressleiste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2658">redirect (redirect) = Address bar</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2659">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2659">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2660">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2660">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2661">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2661">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2662">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2662">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2663">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2663">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2664">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2664">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2665">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2665">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2666">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2666">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2667">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2667">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2668">Eindeutiger Name des GP: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2668">GP unique name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2669">GP-Name: Konfigurieren des neuen Suchfelds für die Registerkartenoberfläche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2669">GP name: Configure the new tab page search box experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2670">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2670">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2671">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Standardsuchanbieter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2671">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Default search provider</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2672">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2672">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2673">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2673">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2674">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2674">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2675">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2675">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2676">Value Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2676">Value Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2677">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2677">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2678">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2678">Example value:</span></span>

```
"bing"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2679">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2679">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2680">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: NewTabPageSearchBox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2680">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSearchBox</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2681">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2681">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>bing</string>
```

  ## <a name="extensions-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2683">Erweiterungsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2683">Extensions policies</span></span>

  ### <a name="blockexternalextensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2685">BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2685">BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>

  #### <a name="blocks-external-extensions-from-being-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2686">Blockiert die Installation externer Erweiterungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2686">Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2687">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2687">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2688">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2688">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2689">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2689">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2690">Steuern Sie die Installation externer Erweiterungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2690">Control the installation of external extensions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2691">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren, wird die Installation externer Erweiterungen blockiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2691">If you enable this setting, external extensions are blocked from being installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2692">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren oder nicht festlegen, können externe Erweiterungen installiert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2692">If you disable this setting or leave it unset, external extensions are allowed to be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2693">Externe Erweiterungen und ihre Installation sind unter https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options dokumentiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2693">External extensions and their installation are documented at https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/developer-guide/alternate-distribution-options.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2694">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2694">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2695">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2695">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2696">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2696">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2697">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2697">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2698">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2698">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2699">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2699">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2700">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2700">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2701">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2701">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2702">Eindeutiger GP-Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2702">GP unique name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2703">Name der Gruppenrichtlinie: blockiert die Installation externer Erweiterungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2703">GP name: Blocks external extensions from being installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2704">GP-Pfad (zwingend erforderlich): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2704">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2705">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2705">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2706">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2706">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2707">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2707">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2708">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2708">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2709">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2709">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2710">Wertname: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2710">Value Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2711">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2711">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2712">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2712">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2713">Mac-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2713">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2714">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BlockExternalExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2714">Preference Key Name: BlockExternalExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2715">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2715">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="extensionallowedtypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2717">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2717">ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-allowed-extension-types"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2718">Konfigurieren von zulässigen Erweiterungstypen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2718">Configure allowed extension types</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2719">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2719">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2720">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2720">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2721">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2721">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2722">Durch Festlegen der Richtlinie wird gesteuert, welche Apps und Erweiterungen in Microsoft Edge installiert werden können, mit welchen Hosts Sie interagieren können und es wird der Zugriff auf die Laufzeit eingeschränkt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2722">Setting the policy controls which apps and extensions may be installed in Microsoft Edge, which hosts they can interact with, and limits runtime access.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2723">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, gibt es keine Einschränkungen für zulässige Erweiterungen und App-Typen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2723">If you don't set this policy, there aren't any restrictions on acceptable extension and app types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2724">Erweiterungen und Apps, die einen Typ aufweisen, der nicht in der Liste enthalten ist, werden nicht installiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2724">Extensions and apps which have a type that's not on the list won't be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2725">Jeder Wert sollte eine der folgenden Zeichenfolgen sein:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2725">Each value should be one of these strings:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-2726">„extension“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2726">"extension"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-2727">„theme“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2727">"theme"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-2728">„user_script“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2728">"user_script"</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-2729">„hosted_app“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2729">"hosted_app"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2730">Weitere Informationen zu diesen Typen finden Sie in der Dokumentation zu Microsoft Edge-Erweiterungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2730">See the Microsoft Edge extensions documentation for more information about these types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2731">Hinweis: Diese Richtlinie wirkt sich auch auf Erweiterungen und Apps aus, deren Installation mithilfe von [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) erzwungen werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2731">Note: This policy also affects extensions and apps to be force-installed using [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2732">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2732">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2733">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2733">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2734">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2734">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2735">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2735">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2736">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2736">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2737">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2737">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2738">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2738">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2739">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2739">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2740">GP eindeutiger Name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2740">GP unique name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2741">GP-Name: Konfigurieren von zulässigen Erweiterungstypen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2741">GP name: Configure allowed extension types</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2742">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2742">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2743">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2743">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2744">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2744">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2745">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2745">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2746">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2746">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2747">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2747">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2748">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2748">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2749">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2749">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2750">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2750">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionAllowedTypes\1 = "hosted_app"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2751">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2751">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2752">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2752">Preference Key Name: ExtensionAllowedTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2753">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2753">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>hosted_app</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="extensioninstallallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2755">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2755">ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-specific-extensions-to-be-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2756">Zulassen, dass bestimmte Erweiterungen installiert werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2756">Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2757">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2757">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2758">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2758">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2759">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2759">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2760">Durch Festlegen dieser Richtlinie wird angegeben, welche Erweiterungen nicht der Blockierungsliste unterliegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2760">Setting this policy specifies which extensions are not subject to the blocklist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2761">Ein Blocklistenwert von \* bedeutet, dass alle Erweiterungen blockiert sind und Benutzer nur Erweiterungen installieren können, die in der Zulassungsliste aufgeführt sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2761">A blocklist value of \* means all extensions are blocked and users can only install extensions listed in the allow list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2762">Standardmäßig sind alle Erweiterungen zulässig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2762">By default, all extensions are allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2763">Wenn Sie jedoch Erweiterungen nach Richtlinie verboten haben, können Sie die Liste der zulässigen Erweiterungen verwenden, um diese Richtlinie zu ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2763">However, if you prohibited extensions by policy, you can use the list of allowed extensions to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2764">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2764">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2765">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2765">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2766">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2766">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2767">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2767">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2768">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2768">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2769">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2769">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2770">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2770">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2771">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2771">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2772">GP eindeutiger Name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2772">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2773">GP-Name: Zulassen, dass bestimmte Erweiterungen installiert werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2773">GP name: Allow specific extensions to be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2774">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2774">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2775">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2775">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2776">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2776">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2777">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2777">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2778">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2778">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2779">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2779">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2780">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2780">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2781">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2781">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2782">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2782">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallAllowlist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2783">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2783">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2784">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2784">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2785">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2785">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="extensioninstallblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2787">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2787">ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-extensions-cannot-be-installed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2788">Steuern, welche Erweiterungen nicht installiert werden können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2788">Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2789">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2789">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2790">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2790">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2791">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2791">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2792">Mit dieser Option können Sie angeben, welche Erweiterungen die Benutzer nicht installieren können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2792">Lets you specify which extensions the users CANNOT install.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2793">Erweiterungen, die bereits installiert sind, werden deaktiviert, wenn Sie blockiert werden, ohne eine Möglichkeit für den Benutzer, Sie zu aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2793">Extensions already installed will be disabled if blocked, without a way for the user to enable them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2794">Nachdem eine deaktivierte Erweiterung aus der Blockierungsliste entfernt wurde, wird Sie automatisch wieder aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2794">After a disabled extension is removed from the blocklist it will automatically get re-enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2795">Ein Blockierungslistenwert von „\*“ bedeutet, dass alle Erweiterungen blockiert sind, es sei denn, Sie werden explizit in der Zulassungsliste aufgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2795">A blocklist value of '\*' means all extensions are blocked unless they are explicitly listed in the allowlist.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2796">Wenn diese Richtlinie nicht eingerichtet ist, kann der Benutzer eine beliebige Erweiterung in Microsoft Edge installieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2796">If this policy isn't set, the user can install any extension in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2797">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2797">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2798">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2798">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2799">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2799">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2800">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2800">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2801">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2801">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2802">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2802">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2803">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2803">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2804">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2804">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2805">GP eindeutiger Name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2805">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2806">GP-Name: Steuern, welche Erweiterungen nicht installiert werden können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2806">GP name: Control which extensions cannot be installed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2807">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2807">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2808">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2808">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2809">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2809">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2810">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2810">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2811">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2811">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2812">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2812">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2813">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2813">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2814">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2814">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2815">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2815">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\1 = "extension_id1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallBlocklist\2 = "extension_id2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2816">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2816">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2817">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2817">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2818">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2818">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>extension_id1</string>
  <string>extension_id2</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="extensioninstallforcelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2820">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2820">ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-extensions-are-installed-silently"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2821">Steuern, welche Erweiterungen im Hintergrund installiert werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2821">Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2822">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2822">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2823">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2823">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2824">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2824">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2825">Legen Sie diese Richtlinie fest, um eine Liste der Apps und Erweiterungen anzugeben, die ohne Benutzerinteraktion im Hintergrund installiert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2825">Set this policy to specify a list of apps and extensions that install silently, without user interaction.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2826">Benutzer können diese Einstellung nicht deinstallieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2826">Users can't uninstall or turn off this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2827">Berechtigungen werden implizit gewährt, einschließlich der Erweiterungs-APIs enterprise.deviceAttributes und enterprise.platformKeys.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2827">Permissions are granted implicitly, including the enterprise.deviceAttributes and enterprise.platformKeys extension APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2828">Hinweis: Diese beiden APIs sind für Apps und Erweiterungen, deren Installation nicht erzwungen wird, nicht verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2828">Note: These 2 APIs aren't available to apps and extensions that aren't force-installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2829">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, werden keine Apps oder Erweiterungen automatisch installiert, und Benutzer können jede beliebige App in Microsoft Edge deinstallieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2829">If you don't set this policy, no apps or extensions are autoinstalled and users can uninstall any app in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2830">Diese Richtlinie ersetzt die [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist)-Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2830">This policy supercedes [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2831">Wenn eine App oder Erweiterung, deren Installation zuvor erzwungen wurde, aus dieser Liste entfernt wird, wird Sie von Microsoft Edge automatisch deinstalliert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2831">If a previously force-installed app or extension is removed from this list, Microsoft Edge automatically uninstalls it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2832">Auf Microsoft Windows-Instanzen kann die Installation von Apps und Erweiterungen von außerhalb der Microsoft Edge Add-ons-Website nur dann erzwungen werden, wenn die Instanz mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verbunden ist und Windows 10 Pro ausgeführt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2832">On Microsoft Windows instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be forced installed if the instance is joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, and running Windows 10 Pro.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2833">Auf macOS-Instanzen kann die Installation von Apps und Erweiterungen von außerhalb der Microsoft Edge-Add-ons-Website nur dann erzwungen werden, wenn die Instanz über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX mit einer Domäne verbunden wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2833">On macOS instances, apps and extensions from outside the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website can only be force installed if the instance is managed via MDM, or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2834">Der Quellcode einer beliebigen Erweiterung kann von Benutzern mit Entwicklertools geändert werden, wodurch die Erweiterung möglicherweise nicht mehr funktionsfähig ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2834">The source code of any extension can be altered by users with developer tools, potentially rendering the extension unfunctional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2835">Wenn dies ein Problem darstellt, konfigurieren Sie die DeveloperToolsDisabled-Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2835">If this is a concern, configure the DeveloperToolsDisabled policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2836">Jedes Listenelement der Richtlinie ist eine Zeichenfolge, die eine Erweiterungs-ID und optional eine durch ein Semikolon (;) abgetrennte „Update“-URL enthält.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2836">Each list item of the policy is a string that contains an extension ID and, optionally, an "update" URL separated by a semicolon (;).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2837">Die Erweiterungs-ID ist die Zeichenfolge mit 32 Buchstaben, die beispielsweise auf edge://extensions im Entwicklermodus gefunden wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2837">The extension ID is the 32-letter string found, for example, on edge://extensions when in Developer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2838">Wenn angegeben, sollte die „Update“-URL auf ein Update-Manifest-XML-Dokument ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ) verweisen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2838">If specified, the "update" URL should point to an Update Manifest XML document ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2839">Standardmäßig wird die Update-URL der Microsoft Edge-Add-ons-Website verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2839">By default, the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website's update URL is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2840">Die in dieser Richtlinie gesetzte „Update“-URL wird nur für die Erstinstallation verwendet; bei nachfolgenden Aktualisierungen der Erweiterung wird die Update-URL im Manifest der Erweiterung verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2840">The "update" URL set in this policy is only used for the initial installation; subsequent updates of the extension use the update URL in the extension's manifest.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2841">Hinweis: Diese Richtlinie gilt nicht für den InPrivate-Modus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2841">Note: This policy doesn't apply to InPrivate mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2842">Informieren Sie sich über Hosting-Erweiterungen (https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2842">Read about hosting extensions (https://docs.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/extensions-chromium/enterprise/hosting-and-updating).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2843">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2843">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2844">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2844">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2845">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2845">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2846">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2846">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2847">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2847">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2848">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2848">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2849">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2849">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2850">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2850">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2851">GP eindeutiger Name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2851">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2852">GP-Name: Steuern, welche Erweiterungen im Hintergrund installiert werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2852">GP name: Control which extensions are installed silently</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2853">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2853">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2854">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2854">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2855">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2855">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2856">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2856">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2857">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2857">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2858">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2858">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2859">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2859">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2860">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2860">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2861">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2861">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\1 = "gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallForcelist\2 = "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop"

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2863">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2863">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallForcelist</span></span>

``` xml
<array>
  <string>gbchcmhmhahfdphkhkmpfmihenigjmpp;https://edge.microsoft.com/extensionwebstorebase/v1/crx</string>
  <string>abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop</string>
</array>
```
