  ### <a name="extensioninstallsources"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2866">ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2866">ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-and-user-script-install-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2867">Konfigurieren von Erweiterungen und Installationsquellen für Benutzerskripts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2867">Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2868">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2868">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2869">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2869">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2870">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2870">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2871">URLs definieren, von denen Erweiterungen und Designs installiert werden können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2871">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2872">URLs definieren, von denen Erweiterungen und Designs direkt installiert werden können, ohne dass die Pakete per Drag & Drop auf die Seite edge://extensions gezogen werden müssen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2872">Define URLs that can install extensions and themes directly without having to drag and drop the packages to the edge://extensions page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2873">Jedes Element in dieser Liste ist ein Übereinstimmungsmuster im Erweiterungs-Stil (siehe [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2873">Each item in this list is an extension-style match pattern (see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095039)).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2874">Benutzer können Elemente ganz einfach von einer beliebigen URL aus installieren, die einem Element in dieser Liste entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2874">Users can easily install items from any URL that matches an item in this list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2875">Sowohl der Speicherort der Datei "\*.crx" als auch die Seite, von der der Download ausgeführt wird (mit anderen Worten, der Referrer), muss von diesen Mustern her zulässig sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2875">Both the location of the \*.crx file and the page where the download is started from (in other words, the referrer) must be allowed by these patterns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2876">Hosten Sie die Dateien nicht an einem Ort, für den eine Authentifizierung erforderlich ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2876">Do not host the files at a location that requires authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2877">Die Richtlinie [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) hat Vorrang vor dieser Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2877">The [ExtensionInstallBlocklist](#extensioninstallblocklist) policy takes precedence over this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2878">Erweiterungen, die sich in der Blockier-Liste befinden, werden nicht installiert, auch wenn sie von einer-Website in dieser Liste stammen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2878">Any extensions that's on the block list won't be installed, even if it comes from a site on this list.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2879">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2879">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2880">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2880">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2881">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2881">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2882">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2882">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2883">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2883">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2884">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2884">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2885">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2885">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2886">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2886">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2887">GP eindeutiger Name: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2887">GP unique name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2888">GP-Name: Konfigurieren von Erweiterungen und Installationsquellen für Benutzerskripts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2888">GP name: Configure extension and user script install sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2889">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2889">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2890">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2890">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2891">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2891">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2892">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2892">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2893">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2893">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2894">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2894">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2895">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2895">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2896">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2896">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2897">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2897">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionInstallSources\1 = "https://corp.contoso.com/*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2898">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2898">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2899">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ExtensionInstallSources</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2899">Preference Key Name: ExtensionInstallSources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2900">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2900">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://corp.contoso.com/*</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="extensionsettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2902">ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2902">ExtensionSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-extension-management-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2903">Konfigurieren der Erweiterungsverwaltungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2903">Configure extension management settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2904">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2904">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2905">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2905">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2906">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2906">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2907">Die Einstellung dieser Richtlinie steuert die Einstellungen für die Erweiterungsverwaltung von Microsoft Edge, einschließlich aller Einstellungen, die durch vorhandene erweiterungsbezogene Richtlinien gesteuert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2907">Setting this policy controls extension management settings for Microsoft Edge, including any controlled by existing extension-related policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2908">Diese Richtlinie ersetzt alle älteren Richtlinien, die möglicherweise festgelegt wurden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2908">This policy supersedes any legacy policies that might be set.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2909">Diese Richtlinie ordnet eine Erweiterungs-ID oder eine Update-URL nur der jeweiligen Einstellung zu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2909">This policy maps an extension ID or an update URL to its specific setting only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2910">Für die spezielle ID "\*" kann eine Standardkonfiguration eingerichtet werden, die für alle Erweiterungen ohne benutzerdefinierte Konfiguration in dieser Richtlinie gilt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2910">A default configuration can be set for the special ID "\*", which applies to all extensions without a custom configuration in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2911">Bei einer Update-URL gilt die Konfiguration für Erweiterungen mit der exakten Update-URL, die im Erweiterungsmanifest angegeben ist ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2911">With an update URL, configuration applies to extensions with the exact update URL stated in the extension manifest ( [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095043) ).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2912">Um Erweiterungen aus einem bestimmten Drittanbieter-Store zu blockieren, müssen Sie nur die update_url für den diesen Store blockieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2912">To block extensions from a particular third party store, you only need to block the update_url for that store.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2913">Wenn Sie z. B. Erweiterungen aus dem Chrome Web Store blockieren möchten, können Sie den folgenden JSON verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2913">For example, if you want to block extensions from Chrome Web Store, you can use the following JSON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2914">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2914">{"update_url:https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx":{"installation_mode":"blocked"}}</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2915">Beachten Sie, dass Sie [extensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) und [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) weiterhin verwenden können, um die Installation bestimmter Erweiterungen zu erzwingen/zu erlauben, auch wenn der Store mit dem JSON im vorherigen Beispiel blockiert wurde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2915">Note that you can still use [ExtensionInstallForcelist](#extensioninstallforcelist) and [ExtensionInstallAllowlist](#extensioninstallallowlist) to allow / force install specific extensions even if the store is blocked using the JSON in the previous example.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2916">Hinweis: für Windows-Instanzen, die nicht zu einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne hinzugefügt wurden, ist die erzwungene Installation auf Apps und Erweiterungen auf der Microsoft Edge-Add-Ons-Website limitiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2916">Note: For Windows instances not joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, forced installation is limited to apps and extensions listed in the Microsoft Edge Add-ons website.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2917">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2917">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2918">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2918">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2919">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2919">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2920">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2920">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2921">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2921">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2922">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2922">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2923">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2923">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2924">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2924">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2925">GP eindeutiger Name: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2925">GP unique name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2926">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der Erweiterungsverwaltungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2926">GP name: Configure extension management settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2927">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2927">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2928">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2928">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2929">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2929">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2930">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2930">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2931">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2931">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2932">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2932">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2933">Wertname: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2933">Value Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2934">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2934">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2935">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2935">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {
  "*": {
    "allowed_types": [
      "hosted_app"
    ], 
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "downloads", 
      "bookmarks"
    ], 
    "install_sources": [
      "https://company-intranet/apps"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "blocked", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ]
  }, 
  "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "history"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed", 
    "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"
  }, 
  "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "force_installed", 
    "runtime_allowed_hosts": [
      "*://good.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "runtime_blocked_hosts": [
      "*://*.contoso.com"
    ], 
    "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"
  }, 
  "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", 
    "installation_mode": "blocked"
  }, 
  "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {
    "blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", 
    "installation_mode": "removed"
  }, 
  "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {
    "allowed_permissions": [
      "downloads"
    ], 
    "blocked_permissions": [
      "wallpaper"
    ], 
    "installation_mode": "allowed"
  }
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2936">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2936">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ExtensionSettings = {"*": {"allowed_types": ["hosted_app"], "blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "blocked_permissions": ["downloads", "bookmarks"], "install_sources": ["https://company-intranet/apps"], "installation_mode": "blocked", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"]}, "abcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnop": {"blocked_permissions": ["history"], "installation_mode": "allowed", "minimum_version_required": "1.0.1"}, "bcdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopa": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "installation_mode": "force_installed", "runtime_allowed_hosts": ["*://good.contoso.com"], "runtime_blocked_hosts": ["*://*.contoso.com"], "update_url": "https://contoso.com/update_url"}, "cdefghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopab": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "defghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabc,efghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcd": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom error message.", "installation_mode": "blocked"}, "fghijklmnopabcdefghijklmnopabcde": {"blocked_install_message": "Custom removal message.", "installation_mode": "removed"}, "update_url:https://www.contoso.com/update.xml": {"allowed_permissions": ["downloads"], "blocked_permissions": ["wallpaper"], "installation_mode": "allowed"}}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2937">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2937">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2938">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ExtensionSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2938">Preference Key Name: ExtensionSettings</span></span>

  ### <a name="allowcrossoriginauthprompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2943">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2943">AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-cross-origin-http-authentication-prompts"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2944">Zulassen ursprungsübergreifender HTTP-Authentifizierungsaufforderungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2944">Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2945">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2945">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2946">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2946">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2947">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2947">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2948">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2948">Controls whether third-party images on a page can show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2949">Normalerweise ist dies als Phishing-Abwehr deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2949">Typically, this is disabled as a phishing defense.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2950">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, ist sie deaktiviert, und Bilder von Drittanbietern können keine Authentifizierungsaufforderung anzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2950">If you don't configure this policy, it's disabled and third-party images can't show an authentication prompt.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2951">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2951">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2952">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2952">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2953">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2953">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2954">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2954">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2955">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2955">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2956">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2956">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2957">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2957">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2958">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2958">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2959">GP eindeutiger Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2959">GP unique name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2960">GP-Name: Zulassen ursprungsübergreifender HTTP-Authentifizierungsaufforderungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2960">GP name: Allow cross-origin HTTP Authentication prompts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2961">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2961">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2962">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2962">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2963">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2963">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2964">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2964">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2965">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2965">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2966">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2966">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2967">Wertname: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2967">Value Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2968">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2968">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2969">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2969">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2970">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2970">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2971">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2971">Preference Key Name: AllowCrossOriginAuthPrompt</span></span>

  ### <a name="authnegotiatedelegateallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2974">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2974">AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-a-list-of-servers-that-microsoft-edge-can-delegate-user-credentials-to"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2975">Gibt eine Liste der Server an, an die Microsoft Edge Benutzeranmeldeinformationen delegieren kann</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2975">Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2976">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2976">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2977">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2977">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2978">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2978">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-2979">Konfiguriert die Liste der Server an, an die Microsoft Edge delegieren kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2979">Configure the list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2980">Trennen Sie mehrere Servernamen durch Kommas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2980">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-2981">Platzhalter (\*) sind zulässig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2981">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-2982">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, delegiert Microsoft Edge keine Benutzeranmeldeinformationen, auch wenn ein Server als Intranet erkannt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2982">If you don't configure this policy Microsoft Edge won't delegate user credentials even if a server is detected as Intranet.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2983">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2983">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2984">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2984">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2985">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2985">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2986">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2986">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2987">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2987">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2988">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2988">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2989">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2989">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2990">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2990">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2991">GP eindeutiger Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2991">GP unique name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2992">GP-Name: Gibt eine Liste der Server an, an die Microsoft Edge Benutzeranmeldeinformationen delegieren kann</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2992">GP name: Specifies a list of servers that Microsoft Edge can delegate user credentials to</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2993">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2993">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2994">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2994">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2995">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2995">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-2996">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2996">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2997">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2997">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2998">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2998">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-2999">Wertname: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-2999">Value Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3000">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3000">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3001">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3001">Example value:</span></span>

```
"contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3002">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3002">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3003">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3003">Preference Key Name: AuthNegotiateDelegateAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3004">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3004">Example value:</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3008">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3008">Supported versions:</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3010">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3010">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3011">Gibt an, welche HTTP-Authentifizierungsschemas unterstützt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3011">Specifies which HTTP authentication schemes are supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3012">Sie können die Richtlinie mit diesen Werten konfigurieren: "basic", "digest", "NTLM" und "negotiate".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3012">You can configure the policy by using these values: 'basic', 'digest', 'ntlm', and 'negotiate'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3013">Trennen Sie mehrere Werte durch Kommata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3013">Separate multiple values with commas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3014">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden alle vier Schemas verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3014">If you don't configure this policy, all four schemes are used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3015">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3015">Supported features:</span></span>

  ### <a name="authserverallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3038">AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3038">AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-list-of-allowed-authentication-servers"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3039">Konfigurieren der Liste der zulässigen Authentifizierungsserver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3039">Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3040">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3040">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3041">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3041">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3042">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3042">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3043">Gibt an, welche Server für die integrierte Authentifizierung aktiviert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3043">Specifies which servers to enable for integrated authentication.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3044">Die integrierte Authentifizierung ist nur verfügbar, wenn Microsoft Edge eine Authentifizierungsabfrage von einem Proxy oder von einem Server in dieser Liste empfängt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3044">Integrated authentication is only enabled when Microsoft Edge receives an authentication challenge from a proxy or from a server in this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3045">Trennen Sie mehrere Servernamen durch Kommas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3045">Separate multiple server names with commas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3046">Platzhalter (\*) sind zulässig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3046">Wildcards (\*) are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3047">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, versucht Microsoft Edge zu erkennen, ob sich ein Server im Intranet befindet. Nur dann reagiert es auf IWA-Anforderungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3047">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to detect if a server is on the intranet - only then will it respond to IWA requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3048">Wenn sich der Server im Internet befindet, werden IWA-Anfragen dieses Servers von Microsoft Edge ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3048">If the server is on the internet, IWA requests from it are ignored by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3049">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3049">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3050">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3050">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3051">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3051">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3052">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3052">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3053">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3053">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3054">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3054">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3055">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3055">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3056">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3056">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3057">GP eindeutiger Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3057">GP unique name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3058">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der Liste der zulässigen Authentifizierungsserver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3058">GP name: Configure list of allowed authentication servers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3059">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3059">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3060">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3060">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3061">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3061">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3062">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3062">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3063">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3063">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3064">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3064">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3065">Wertname: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3065">Value Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3066">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3066">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3067">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3067">Example value:</span></span>

```
"*contoso.com,contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3068">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3068">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3069">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AuthServerAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3069">Preference Key Name: AuthServerAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3070">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3070">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>*contoso.com,contoso.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="basicauthoverhttpenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3072">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3072">BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-basic-authentication-for-http"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3073">Standardauthentifizierung für HTTP zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3073">Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3074">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3074">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3075">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3075">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3076">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3076">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3077">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht festlegen, sind Standardauthentifizierungsanforderungen zulässig, die über nicht sicheres HTTP empfangen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3077">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, Basic authentication challenges received over non-secure HTTP will be allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3078">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden nicht sichere HTTP-Anforderungen aus dem Standardauthentifizierungsschema blockiert, und nur sicheres HTTPS ist zulässig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3078">If you disable this policy,  non-secure HTTP requests from the Basic authentication scheme are blocked, and only secure HTTPS is allowed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3079">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3079">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3080">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3080">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3081">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3081">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3082">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3082">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3083">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3083">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3084">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3084">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3085">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3085">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3086">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3086">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3087">Eindeutiger GP-Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3087">GP unique name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3088">GP-Name: Standardauthentifizierung für HTTP zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3088">GP name: Allow Basic authentication for HTTP</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3089">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3089">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3090">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3090">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3091">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3091">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3092">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3092">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3093">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3093">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3094">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3094">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3095">Wertname: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3095">Value Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3096">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3096">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3097">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3097">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3098">Mac-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3098">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3099">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3099">Preference Key Name: BasicAuthOverHttpEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="disableauthnegotiatecnamelookup"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3102">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3102">DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-cname-lookup-when-negotiating-kerberos-authentication"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3103">Deaktivieren des CNAME-Lookup beim Verhandeln der Kerberos-Authentifizierung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3103">Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3104">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3104">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3105">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3105">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3106">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3106">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3107">Bestimmt, ob der generierte Kerberos-SPN auf dem kanonischen DNS-Namen (CNAME) oder auf dem ursprünglich eingegebenen Namen basiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3107">Determines whether the generated Kerberos SPN is based on the canonical DNS name (CNAME) or on the original name entered.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3108">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird das CNAME-Lookup übersprungen, und der Servername (wie eingegeben) wird verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3108">If you enable this policy, CNAME lookup is skipped and the server name (as entered) is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3109">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird der kanonische Name des Servers verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3109">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, the canonical name of the server is used.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3110">Dies wird durch CNAME-Lookup bestimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3110">This is determined through CNAME lookup.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3111">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3111">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3112">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3112">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3113">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3113">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3114">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3114">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3115">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3115">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3116">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3116">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3117">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3117">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3118">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3118">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3119">GP eindeutiger Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3119">GP unique name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3120">GP-Name: Deaktivieren des CNAME-Lookup beim Verhandeln der Kerberos-Authentifizierung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3120">GP name: Disable CNAME lookup when negotiating Kerberos authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3121">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3121">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3122">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3122">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3123">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3123">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3124">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3124">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3125">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3125">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3126">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3126">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3127">Wertname: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3127">Value Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3128">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3128">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3129">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3129">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3130">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3130">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3131">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3131">Preference Key Name: DisableAuthNegotiateCnameLookup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3132">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3132">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="enableauthnegotiateport"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3134">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3134">EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>

  #### <a name="include-non-standard-port-in-kerberos-spn"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3135">Einschließen eines nicht standardmäßigen Ports in Kerberos-SPN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3135">Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3136">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3136">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3137">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3137">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3138">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3138">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3139">Gibt an, ob der generierte Kerberos-SPN einen nicht-standardmäßigen Port enthalten soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3139">Specifies whether the generated Kerberos SPN should include a non-standard port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3140">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren und ein Benutzer einen nicht-standardmäßigen Port (einen Port außer "80" oder "443") in einer URL einschließt, ist dieser Port Bestandteil des generierten Kerberos-SPN.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3140">If you enable this policy, and a user includes a non-standard port (a port other than 80 or 443) in a URL, that port is included in the generated Kerberos SPN.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3141">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder deaktivieren, enthält der generierte Kerberos-SPN in keinem Fall einen Port.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3141">If you don't configure or disable this policy, the generated Kerberos SPN won't include a port in any case.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3142">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3142">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3143">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3143">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3144">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3144">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3145">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3145">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3146">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3146">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3147">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3147">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3148">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3148">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3149">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3149">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3150">GP eindeutiger Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3150">GP unique name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3151">GP-Name: Einschließen eines nicht standardmäßigen Ports in Kerberos-SPN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3151">GP name: Include non-standard port in Kerberos SPN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3152">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3152">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3153">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3153">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3154">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3154">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3155">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3155">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3156">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3156">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3157">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3157">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3158">Wertname: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3158">Value Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3159">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3159">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3160">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3160">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3161">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3161">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3162">Einstellung Schlüsselname: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3162">Preference Key Name: EnableAuthNegotiatePort</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3163">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3163">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="ntlmv2enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3165">NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3165">NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-whether-ntlmv2-authentication-is-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3166">Steuern, ob die NTLMv2-Authentifizierung aktiviert ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3166">Control whether NTLMv2 authentication is enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3167">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3167">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3168">Auf macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3168">On macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3169">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3169">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3170">Steuert, ob NTLMv2 aktiviert ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3170">Controls whether NTLMv2 is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3171">Alle neueren Versionen von Samba und Windows-Servern unterstützen NTLMv2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3171">All recent versions of Samba and Windows servers support NTLMv2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3172">Sie sollten NTLMv2 nur deaktivieren, um Probleme mit der Abwärtskompatibilität zu beheben, da dadurch die Sicherheit der Authentifizierung verringert wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3172">You should only disable NTLMv2 to address issues with backwards compatibility as it reduces the security of authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3173">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, ist NTLMv2 standardmäßig aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3173">If you don't configure this policy, NTLMv2 is enabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3174">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3174">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3175">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3175">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3176">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3176">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3177">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3177">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3178">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3178">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3179">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3179">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3180">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3180">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3181">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NtlmV2Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3181">Preference Key Name: NtlmV2Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3182">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3182">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="windowshelloforhttpauthenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3184">WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3184">WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-hello-for-http-auth-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3185">Windows Hello für HTTP-Authentifizierung aktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3185">Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3186">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3186">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3187">Unter Windows ab Version 90 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3187">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3188">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3188">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3189">Gibt an, ob die Benutzeroberfläche für Windows-Anmeldeinformationen verwendet werden soll, um auf NTLM- und Aushandlungs-Authentifizierungsaufforderungen zu antworten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3189">Indicates if Windows Credential UI should be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate authentication challenges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3190">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird eine einfache Eingabeaufforderung mit Benutzername und Kennwort verwendet, um auf NTLM- und Aushandlungs-Aufforderungen zu reagieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3190">If you disable this policy, a basic username and password prompt will be used to respond to NTLM and Negotiate challenges.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3191">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird die Benutzeroberfläche für Windows-Anmeldeinformationen verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3191">If you enable or don't configure this policy, Windows Credential UI will be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3192">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3192">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3193">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3193">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3194">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3194">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3195">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3195">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3196">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3196">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3197">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3197">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3198">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3198">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3199">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3199">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3200">GP eindeutiger Name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3200">GP unique name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3201">GP-Name: Windows Hello für HTTP-Authentifizierung aktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3201">GP name: Windows Hello For HTTP Auth Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3202">GP-Pfad (Verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3202">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3203">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/HTTP-Authentifizierung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3203">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/HTTP authentication</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3204">GP ADMX-Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3204">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3205">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3205">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3206">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3206">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3207">Pfad (empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3207">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3208">Wertname: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3208">Value Name: WindowsHelloForHTTPAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3209">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3209">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3210">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3210">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="kioskaddressbareditingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3214">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3214">KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-address-bar-editing-for-kiosk-mode-public-browsing-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3215">Konfigurieren der Adressleistenbearbeitung für die öffentliche Browsernutzung im Kioskmodus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3215">Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3216">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3216">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3217">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3217">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3218">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3218">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3219">Diese Richtlinie gilt nur für den Microsoft Edge-Kioskmodus, während die öffentliche Browseroberfläche verwendet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3219">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode while using the public browsing experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3220">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer die URL in der Adressleiste ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3220">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can change the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3221">Durch Aktivieren dieser Richtlinie wird verhindert, dass Benutzer die URL in der Adressleiste ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3221">If you disable this policy, it prevents users from changing the URL in the address bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3222">Ausführliche Informationen zum Konfigurieren des Kioskmodus finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3222">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3223">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3223">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3224">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3224">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3225">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3225">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3226">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3226">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3227">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3227">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3228">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3228">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3229">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3229">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3230">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3230">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3231">Eindeutiger GP-Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3231">GP unique name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3232">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der Adressleistenbearbeitung für die öffentliche Browsernutzung im Kioskmodus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3232">GP name: Configure address bar editing for kiosk mode public browsing experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3233">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3233">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3234">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3234">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3235">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3235">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3236">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3236">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3237">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3237">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3238">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3238">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3239">Wertname: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3239">Value Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3240">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3240">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3241">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3241">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3242">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3242">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3243">Einstellung Schlüsselname: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3243">Preference Key Name: KioskAddressBarEditingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3244">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3244">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
