  ### <a name="kioskdeletedownloadsonexit"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3246">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3246">KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>

  #### <a name="delete-files-downloaded-as-part-of-kiosk-session-when-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3247">Löschen von Dateien, die während einer Kiosk-Sitzung heruntergeladen wurden, wenn Microsoft Edge geschlossen wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3247">Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3248">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3248">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3249">Unter Windows seit 87 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3249">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3250">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3250">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3251">Diese Richtlinie bezieht sich nur auf Microsoft Edge-Kioskmodus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3251">This policy only applies to Microsoft Edge kiosk mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3252">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden Dateien, die während einer Kiosk-Sitzung heruntergeladen wurden, beim Schließen von Microsoft Edge jedes Mal gelöscht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3252">If you enable this policy, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are deleted each time Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3253">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden Dateien, die während einer Kiosk-Sitzung heruntergeladen wurden, beim Schließen von Microsoft Edge nicht gelöscht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3253">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, files downloaded as part of the kiosk session are not deleted when Microsoft Edge closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3254">Ausführliche Informationen zum Konfigurieren des Kioskmodus finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3254">For detailed information on configuring kiosk Mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2137578).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3255">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3255">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3256">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3256">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3257">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3257">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3258">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3258">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3259">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3259">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3260">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3260">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3261">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3261">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3262">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3262">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3263">Eindeutiger GP-Name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3263">GP unique name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3264">GP-Name: Löschen von Dateien, die während einer Kiosk-Sitzung heruntergeladen wurden, wenn Microsoft Edge geschlossen wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3264">GP name: Delete files downloaded as part of kiosk session when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3265">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3265">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Kiosk Mode settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3266">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3266">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3267">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3267">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3268">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3268">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3269">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3269">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3270">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3270">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3271">Wertname: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3271">Value Name: KioskDeleteDownloadsOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3272">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3272">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3273">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3273">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ## <a name="manageability-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3275">Richtlinien zur Verwaltbarkeit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3275">Manageability policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3276">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3276">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="mamenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3277">MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3277">MAMEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="mobile-app-management-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3278">Verwaltung mobiler Apps aktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3278">Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3279">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3279">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3280">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 89 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3280">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3281">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3281">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3282">Ermöglicht dem Microsoft Edge-Browser, Richtlinien von den Intune-Anwendungsverwaltungsdiensten abzurufen und sie auf Benutzerprofile anzuwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3282">Allows the Microsoft Edge browser to retrieve policies from the Intune application management services and apply them to users' profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3283">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Richtlinien für die mobile App-Verwaltung (Mobile App Management, MAM) angewendet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3283">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Mobile App Management (MAM) Policies can be applied.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3284">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, kommuniziert Microsoft Edge nicht mit Intune, um die MAM-Richtlinien anzufordern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3284">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not communicate with Intune to request MAM Policies.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3285">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3285">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3286">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3286">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3287">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3287">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3288">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3288">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3289">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3289">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3290">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3290">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3291">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3291">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3292">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3292">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3293">GP eindeutiger Name: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3293">GP unique name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3294">GP-Name: Verwaltung mobiler Apps aktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3294">GP name: Mobile App Management Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3295">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Manageability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3295">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Manageability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3296">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3296">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3297">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3297">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3298">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3298">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3299">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3299">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3300">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3300">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3301">Wertname: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3301">Value Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3302">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3302">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3303">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3303">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3304">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3304">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3305">Einstellung Schlüsselname: MAMEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3305">Preference Key Name: MAMEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3306">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3306">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ## <a name="native-messaging-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3308">Richtlinien zum systemeigenen Messaging</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3308">Native Messaging policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3309">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3309">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nativemessagingallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3310">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3310">NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-which-native-messaging-hosts-users-can-use"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3311">Steuern, welche systemeigenen Messaging-Hosts Benutzer verwenden können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3311">Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3312">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3312">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3313">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3313">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3314">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3314">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3315">Durch Festlegen der Richtlinie wird angegeben, welche systemeigenen Messaging-Hosts nicht der Verweigerungsliste unterliegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3315">Setting the policy specifies which native messaging hosts aren't subject to the deny list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3316">Der Wert für die Verweigerungsliste von \* bedeutet, dass alle systemeigenen Messaging-Hosts verweigert werden, es sei denn, Sie werden ausdrücklich zugelassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3316">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3317">Standardmäßig sind alle systemeigenen Messaging-Hosts zugelassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3317">All native messaging hosts are allowed by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3318">Wenn jedoch ein systemeigener Messaging-Host durch eine Richtlinie abgelehnt wird, kann der Administrator die Zulassen-Liste verwenden, um diese Richtlinie zu ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3318">However, if a native messaging host is denied by policy, the admin can use the allow list to change that policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3319">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3319">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3320">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3320">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3321">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3321">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3322">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3322">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3323">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3323">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3324">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3324">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3325">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3325">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3326">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3326">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3327">GP eindeutiger Name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3327">GP unique name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3328">GP-Name: Steuern, welche systemeigenen Messaging-Hosts Benutzer verwenden können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3328">GP name: Control which native messaging hosts users can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3329">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3329">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3330">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3330">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3331">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3331">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3332">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3332">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3333">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3333">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3334">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3334">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3335">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3335">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3336">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3336">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3337">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3337">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingAllowlist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3338">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3338">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3339">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3339">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3340">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3340">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3341">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3341">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nativemessagingblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3342">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3342">NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-native-messaging-block-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3343">Konfigurieren der systemeigenen Nachrichten-Sperrliste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3343">Configure native messaging block list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3344">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3344">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3345">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3345">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3346">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3346">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3347">Durch Festlegen dieser Richtlinie wird angegeben, welche systemeigenen Messaging-Hosts nicht geladen werden sollten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3347">Setting this policy specifies which native messaging hosts shouldn't be loaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3348">Der Wert für die Verweigerungsliste von \* bedeutet, dass alle systemeigenen Messaging-Hosts verweigert werden, es sei denn, Sie werden ausdrücklich zugelassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3348">A deny list value of \* means all native messaging hosts are denied unless they're explicitly allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3349">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht feststellen, lädt Microsoft Edge alle installierten systemeigenen Messaging-Hosts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3349">If you leave this policy unset , Microsoft Edge loads all installed native messaging hosts.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3350">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3350">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3351">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3351">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3352">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3352">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3353">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3353">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3354">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3354">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3355">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3355">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3356">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3356">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3357">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3357">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3358">GP eindeutiger Name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3358">GP unique name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3359">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der systemeigenen Nachrichten-Sperrliste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3359">GP name: Configure native messaging block list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3360">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3360">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3361">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3361">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3362">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3362">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3363">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3363">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3364">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3364">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3365">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3365">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3366">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3366">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3367">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3367">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3368">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3368">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\1 = "com.native.messaging.host.name1"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NativeMessagingBlocklist\2 = "com.native.messaging.host.name2"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3369">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3369">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3370">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3370">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3371">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3371">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name1</string>
  <string>com.native.messaging.host.name2</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="nativemessaginguserlevelhosts"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3373">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3373">NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-user-level-native-messaging-hosts-installed-without-admin-permissions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3374">Zulassen systemeigener Messaging-Hosts auf Benutzerebene (ohne Administratorberechtigungen installiert)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3374">Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3375">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3375">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3376">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3376">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3377">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3377">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3378">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf Aktiviert setzen oder sie nicht aktivieren, kann Microsoft Edge systemeigene Messaging-Hosts verwenden, die auf der Benutzerebene installiert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3378">If you set this policy to Enabled or leave it unset, Microsoft Edge can use native messaging hosts installed at the user level.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3379">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf Deaktiviert festlegen, kann Microsoft Edge diese Hosts nur verwenden, wenn Sie auf Systemebene installiert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3379">If you set this policy to Disabled, Microsoft Edge can only use these hosts if they're installed at the system level.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3380">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3380">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3381">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3381">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3382">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3382">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3383">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3383">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3384">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3384">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3385">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3385">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3386">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3386">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3387">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3387">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3388">GP eindeutiger Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3388">GP unique name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3389">GP-Name: Zulassen systemeigener Messaging-Hosts auf Benutzerebene (ohne Administratorberechtigungen installiert)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3389">GP name: Allow user-level native messaging hosts (installed without admin permissions)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3390">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3390">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Native Messaging</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3391">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3391">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3392">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3392">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3393">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3393">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3394">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3394">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3395">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3395">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3396">Wertname: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3396">Value Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3397">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3397">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3398">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3398">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3399">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3399">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3400">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3400">Preference Key Name: NativeMessagingUserLevelHosts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3401">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3401">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ## <a name="password-manager-and-protection-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3403">Kennwortmanager- und Schutz-Richtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3403">Password manager and protection policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3404">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3404">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordmanagerenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3405">PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3405">PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-saving-passwords-to-the-password-manager"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3406">Aktivieren des Speicherung von Kennwörtern im Kennwort-Manager</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3406">Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3407">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3407">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3408">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3408">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3409">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3409">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3410">Aktivieren, dass Microsoft Edge Benutzerkennwörter speichert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3410">Enable Microsoft Edge to save user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3411">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können die Benutzer ihre Kennwörter in Microsoft Edge speichern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3411">If you enable this policy, users can save their passwords in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3412">Wenn Sie eine Website das nächste Mal besuchen, gibt Microsoft Edge das Kennwort automatisch ein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3412">The next time they visit the site, Microsoft Edge will enter the password automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3413">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können die Benutzer keine neuen Kennwörter speichern, sie können aber weiterhin bisher gespeicherte Kennwörter verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3413">If you disable this policy, users can't save new passwords, but they can still use previously saved passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3414">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder deaktivieren, können die Benutzer sie in Microsoft Edge nicht ändern oder außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3414">If you enable or disable this policy, users can't change or override it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3415">Wenn Sie sie nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer Kennwörter speichern und diese Funktion deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3415">If you don't configure it, users can save passwords, as well as turn this feature off.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3416">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3416">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3417">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3417">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3418">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3418">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3419">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3419">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3420">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3420">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3421">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3421">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3422">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3422">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3423">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3423">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3424">GP eindeutiger Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3424">GP unique name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3425">GP-Name: Aktivieren des Speicherung von Kennwörtern im Kennwort-Manager</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3425">GP name: Enable saving passwords to the password manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3426">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3426">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3427">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3427">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3428">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3428">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3429">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3429">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3430">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3430">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3431">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3431">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3432">Wertname: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3432">Value Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3433">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3433">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3434">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3434">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3435">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3435">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3436">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PasswordManagerEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3436">Preference Key Name: PasswordManagerEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3437">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3437">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="passwordmonitorallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3439">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3439">PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-be-alerted-if-their-passwords-are-found-to-be-unsafe"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3440">Zulassen, dass Benutzer benachrichtigt werden, wenn Ihre Kennwörter als unsicher eingestuft werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3440">Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3441">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3441">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3442">Auf Windows seit 85 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3442">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3443">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3443">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3444">Zulassen, dass Microsoft Edge Benutzerkennwörter überwacht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3444">Allow Microsoft Edge to monitor user passwords.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3445">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren und ein Benutzer dem Aktivieren der Richtlinie zustimmt, wird der Benutzer benachrichtigt, wenn eines der in Microsoft Edge gespeicherten Kennwörter als unsicher eingestuft wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3445">If you enable this policy and a user consents to enabling the policy, the user will get alerted if any of their passwords stored in Microsoft Edge are found to be unsafe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3446">In Microsoft Edge wird eine Warnung angezeigt, und diese Informationen sind auch in den Einstellungen > Kennwörter > Kennwort-Monitor verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3446">Microsoft Edge will show an alert and this information will also be available in Settings > Passwords > Password Monitor.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3447">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Benutzer nicht um Erlaubnis gebeten, dieses Feature zu aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3447">If you disable this policy, users will not be asked for permission to enable this feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3448">Ihre Kennwörter werden nicht gescannt, und Sie werden auch nicht benachrichtigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3448">Their passwords will not be scanned and they will not be alerted either.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3449">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer dieses Feature aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3449">If you enable or don't configure the policy, users can turn this feature on or off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3450">Wenn Sie mehr darüber erfahren möchten, wie Microsoft Edge unsichere Kennwörter findet, lesen Sie [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3450">To learn more about how Microsoft Edge finds unsafe passwords see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2133833)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3451">Zusätzliche Anleitung:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3451">Additional guidance:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3452">Diese Richtlinie kann sowohl als empfohlen als auch als obligatorisch festgelegt werden, jedoch mit einer wichtigen Legende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3452">This policy can be set as both Recommended as well as Mandatory, however with an important callout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3453">Obligatorische Aktivierung: vorausgesetzt, dass die Zustimmung des einzelnen Benutzers eine Voraussetzung für die Aktivierung dieses Features für einen bestimmten Benutzer ist, gibt es für diese Richtlinie keine Einstellung "erforderlich".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3453">Mandatory enabled: Given that individual user consent is a pre-condition to enabling this feature for a given user, this policy does not have a Mandatory enabled setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3454">Wenn die Richtlinie auf "obligatorisch" aktiviert ist, ändert sich die Benutzeroberfläche in "Einstellungen" nicht, und die folgende Fehlermeldung wird in edge://policy angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3454">If the policy is set to Mandatory enabled, the UI in Settings will not change and the following error message will be displayed in edge://policy</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3455">Beispiel Fehlerstatusmeldung: "dieser Richtlinienwert wird ignoriert, da für die Kennwortüberwachung das Einverständnis des jeweiligen Benutzers erforderlich ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3455">Example Error state message: "This policy value is ignored because Password Monitor requires the consent of the individual user for it to be turned on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3456">Sie können die Benutzer in Ihrer Organisation bitten, zu Einstellungen > Profil > Kennwort zu wechseln, und das Feature aktivieren."</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3456">You can ask users in your Organization to go to Settings > Profile > Password and turn on the feature."</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3457">Empfohlene Aktivierung: Wenn für die Richtlinie die Option „Empfohlen“ aktiviert festgelegt ist, verbleiben die Benutzeroberfläche in Einstellungen im Status "aus", aber es wird ein Aktenkoffersymbol angezeigt, bei dem diese Beschreibung beim Hovern angezeigt wird: "Ihre Organisation empfiehlt einen bestimmten Wert für diese Einstellung, und Sie haben einen anderen Wert gewählt"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3457">Recommended enabled: If the policy is set to Recommended enabled, the UI in Settings will remain in 'Off' state, but a briefcase icon will be made visible next to it with this description displayed on hover - "Your organization recommends a specific value for this setting and you have chosen a different value"</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3458">Obligatorisch und Empfohlen deaktiviert: beide Zustände funktionieren in der normalen Weise, wobei die normalen Beschriftungen Benutzern angezeigt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3458">Mandatory and Recommended disabled: Both these states will work the normal way, with the usual captions being shown to users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3459">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3459">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3460">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3460">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3461">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3461">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3462">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3462">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3463">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3463">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3464">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3464">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3465">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3465">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3466">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3466">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3467">Eindeutiger Name des GP: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3467">GP unique name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3468">GP-Name: erlauben Sie Benutzern, benachrichtigt zu werden, wenn Ihre Kennwörter als unsicher eingestuft werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3468">GP name: Allow users to be alerted if their passwords are found to be unsafe</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3469">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3469">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3470">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3470">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3471">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3471">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3472">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3472">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3473">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3473">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3474">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3474">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3475">Wertname: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3475">Value Name: PasswordMonitorAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3476">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3476">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3477">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3477">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```
