  ### <a name="passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3479">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3479">PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-change-password-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3480">Konfigurieren der URL für das Ändern eines Kennworts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3480">Configure the change password URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3481">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3481">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3482">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3482">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3483">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3483">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3484">Konfiguriert die Kennwort-Ändern-URL (nur HTTP- und HTTPS-Schemata).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3484">Configures the change password URL (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3485">Der Kennwortschutzdienst leitet Benutzer an diese URL weiter, um ihr Kennwort zu ändern, nachdem ihnen eine Warnung im Browser angezeigt wurde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3485">Password protection service will send users to this URL to change their password after seeing a warning in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3486">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, sendet der Kennwortschutzdienst Benutzer an diese URL, um ihr Kennwort zu ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3486">If you enable this policy, then password protection service sends users to this URL to change their password.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3487">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, leitet der Kennwortschutzdienst Benutzer nicht zu einer Kennwort-Ändern-URL um.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3487">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, then password protection service will not redirect users to a change password URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3488">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3488">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3489">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3489">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3490">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3490">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3491">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3491">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3492">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3492">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3493">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3493">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3494">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3494">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3495">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3495">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3496">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3496">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3497">GP eindeutiger Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3497">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3498">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der URL für das Ändern eines Kennworts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3498">GP name: Configure the change password URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3499">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3499">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3500">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3500">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3501">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3501">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3502">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3502">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3503">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3503">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3504">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3504">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3505">Wertname: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3505">Value Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3506">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3506">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3507">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3507">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/change_password.html"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3508">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3508">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3509">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3509">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3510">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3510">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/change_password.html</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3511">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3511">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordprotectionloginurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3512">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3512">PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-enterprise-login-urls-where-the-password-protection-service-should-capture-salted-hashes-of-a-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3513">Konfigurieren Sie die Liste der Unternehmens-Login-URLs, bei denen der Kennwortschutzdienst gesalzene Hashes eines Kennworts sammeln soll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3513">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3514">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3514">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3515">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3515">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3516">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3516">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3517">Konfigurieren Sie die Liste der Unternehmensanmelde-URLs (nur HTTP- und HTTPS-Schemata), bei denen Microsoft Edge die gesalzenen Hashes von Kennwörtern sammeln und für die Erkennung der Kennwortwiederverwendung verwenden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3517">Configure the list of enterprise login URLs (HTTP and HTTPS schemes only) where Microsoft Edge should capture the salted hashes of passwords and use it for password reuse detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3518">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, erfasst der Kennwortschutzdienst Fingerabdrücke von Kennwörtern auf den definierten URLs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3518">If you enable this policy, the password protection service captures fingerprints of passwords on the defined URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3519">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden keine Kennwort-Fingerabdrücke erfasst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3519">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, no password fingerprints are captured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3520">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3520">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3521">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3521">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3522">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3522">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3523">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3523">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3524">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3524">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3525">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3525">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3526">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3526">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3527">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3527">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3528">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3528">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3529">GP eindeutiger Name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3529">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3530">GP-Name: Konfigurieren Sie die Liste der Unternehmensanmelde-URLs, bei denen der Kennwortschutzdienst gesalzene Hashes eines Kennworts sammeln soll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3530">GP name: Configure the list of enterprise login URLs where the password protection service should capture salted hashes of a password</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3531">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3531">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3532">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3532">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3533">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3533">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3534">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3534">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3535">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3535">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3536">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3536">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3537">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3537">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3538">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3538">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3539">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3539">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com/login.html"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PasswordProtectionLoginURLs\2 = "https://login.contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3540">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3540">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3541">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3541">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionLoginURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3542">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3542">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com/login.html</string>
  <string>https://login.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3543">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3543">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordprotectionwarningtrigger"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3544">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3544">PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-password-protection-warning-trigger"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3545">Auslösung der Warnung zum Kennwortschutz konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3545">Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3546">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3546">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3547">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3547">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3548">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3548">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3549">Ermöglicht es Ihnen, zu steuern, wann Kennwortschutz-Warnungen ausgelöst werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3549">Allows you to control when to trigger password protection warning.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3550">Kennwortschutz benachrichtigt Benutzer, wenn diese Ihre geschützten Kennwörter auf potenziell verdächtigen Websites wiederverwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3550">Password protection alerts users when they reuse their protected password on potentially suspicious sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3551">Sie können die Richtlinien [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) und [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) verwenden, um zu konfigurieren, welche Kennwörter geschützt werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3551">You can use the [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) policies to configure which passwords to protect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3552">Ausnahmen: Kennwörter für die in [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) und [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl) aufgeführten Websites sowie für die in [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains) aufgeführten Websites lösen keine Warnung durch den Kennwortschutz aus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3552">Exemptions: Passwords for the sites listed in [PasswordProtectionLoginURLs](#passwordprotectionloginurls) and [PasswordProtectionChangePasswordURL](#passwordprotectionchangepasswordurl), as well as for the sites listed in [SmartScreenAllowListDomains](#smartscreenallowlistdomains), will not trigger a password-protection warning.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3553">Auf „PasswordProtectionWarningOff“ setzen, um keine Kennwortschutzwarnungen anzuzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3553">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOff' to not show password protection warningss.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3554">Auf „PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse“ setzen, um Kennwortschutzwarnungen anzuzeigen, wenn der Benutzer sein geschütztes Kennwort auf einer Website wiederverwendet, die nicht auf einer Erlaubnisliste steht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3554">Set to 'PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse' to show password protection warnings when the user reuses their protected password on a non-allowlisted site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3555">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird dieser Warnhinweis nicht angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3555">If you disable or don't configure this policy, then the warning trigger is not shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3556">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3556">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3557">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = Kennwortschutzwarnung ist deaktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3557">PasswordProtectionWarningOff (0) = Password protection warning is off</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3558">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = Kennwortschutzwarnung wird durch Wiederverwendung von Kennwörtern ausgelöst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3558">PasswordProtectionWarningOnPasswordReuse (1) = Password protection warning is triggered by password reuse</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3559">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3559">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3560">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3560">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3561">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3561">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3562">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3562">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3563">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3563">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3564">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3564">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3565">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3565">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3566">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3566">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3567">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3567">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3568">GP eindeutiger Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3568">GP unique name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3569">GP-Name: Auslösung der Warnung zum Kennwortschutz konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3569">GP name: Configure password protection warning trigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3570">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3570">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3571">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3571">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3572">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3572">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3573">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3573">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3574">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3574">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3575">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3575">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3576">Wertname: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3576">Value Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3577">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3577">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3578">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3578">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3579">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3579">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3580">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3580">Preference Key Name: PasswordProtectionWarningTrigger</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3581">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3581">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3582">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3582">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="passwordrevealenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3583">PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3583">PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-password-reveal-button"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3584">Schaltfläche „Kennwort anzeigen“ aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3584">Enable Password reveal button</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3585">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3585">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3586">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3586">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3587">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3587">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3588">Ermöglicht es Ihnen, die Standardanzeige der Browser-Schaltfläche "Kennwort anzeigen" für Kennworteingabefelder auf Websites zu konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3588">Lets you configure the default display of the browser password reveal button for password input fields on websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3589">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden die Benutzereinstellungen des Browsers die Schaltfläche „Kennwort anzeigen“ standardmäßig anzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3589">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the browser user setting defaults to displaying the password reveal button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3590">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Benutzereinstellungen des Browsers die Schaltfläche „Kennwort anzeigen“ nicht anzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3590">If you disable this policy, the browser user setting won't display the password reveal button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3591">Für die Barrierefreiheit können Benutzer die Browsereinstellung gegenüber der Standardrichtlinie ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3591">For accessibility, users can change the browser setting from the default policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3592">Diese Richtlinie hat nur Einfluss auf die Browser-Schaltfläche „Kennwort anzeigen“. Sie wirkt sich nicht auf benutzerdefinierte Anzeigeschaltflächen in Websites aus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3592">This policy only affects the browser password reveal button, it doesn't affect websites' custom reveal buttons.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3593">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3593">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3594">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3594">Can be mandatory: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3595">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3595">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3596">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3596">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3597">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3597">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3598">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3598">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3599">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3599">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3600">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3600">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3601">Eindeutiger GP-Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3601">GP unique name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3602">GP-Name: Schaltfläche „Kennwort anzeigen“ aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3602">GP name: Enable Password reveal button</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3603">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3603">GP path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3604">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Password manager and protection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3604">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Password manager and protection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3605">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3605">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3606">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3606">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3607">Pfad (verpflichtend): N/A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3607">Path (Mandatory): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3608">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3608">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3609">Wertname: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3609">Value Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3610">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3610">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3611">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3611">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3612">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3612">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3613">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PasswordRevealEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3613">Preference Key Name: PasswordRevealEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3614">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3614">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ## <a name="performance-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3616">Leistungsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3616">Performance policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3617">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3617">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="startupboostenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3618">StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3618">StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-startup-boost"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3619">Startbeschleunigung aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3619">Enable startup boost</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3620">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3620">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3621">Unter Windows ab Version 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3621">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3622">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3622">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3623">Microsoft Edge-Prozesse können bei der Betriebssystem-Anmeldung starten und nach dem Schließen des letzten Browserfensters im Hintergrund neu starten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3623">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and restart in background after the last browser window is closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3624">Wenn Microsoft Edge im Hintergrundmodus ausgeführt wird, wird der Browser u. U. nicht geschlossen, wenn das letzte Fenster geschlossen wird, und nach dem Schließen des Fensters nicht im Hintergrund neu gestartet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3624">If Microsoft Edge is running in background mode, the browser might not close when the last window is closed and the browser won't be restarted in background when the window closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3625">Informationen dazu, was nach dem Konfigurieren von Microsoft Edge für den Hintergrundmodus geschieht, finden Sie in der [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled)-Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3625">See the [BackgroundModeEnabled](#backgroundmodeenabled) policy for information about what happens after configuring Microsoft Edge background mode behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3626">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, ist die Startbeschleunigung aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3626">If you enable this policy, startup boost is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3627">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, ist die Startbeschleunigung deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3627">If you disable this policy, startup boost is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3628">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, ist die Startbeschleunigung möglicherweise anfänglich aktiviert oder deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3628">If you don't configure this policy, startup boost may initially be off or on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3629">Der Benutzer kann das Verhalten unter edge://settings/system konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3629">The user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3630">Weitere Informationen zur Startbeschleunigung finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3630">Learn more about startup boost: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2147018)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3631">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3631">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3632">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3632">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3633">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3633">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3638">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3638">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3639">Eindeutiger GP-Name: StartupBoostEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3639">GP unique name: StartupBoostEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3640">GP-Name: Startbeschleunigung aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3640">GP name: Enable startup boost</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3641">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Performance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3641">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Performance</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3642">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Performance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3642">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Performance</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3643">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3643">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3644">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3644">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3645">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3645">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3646">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3646">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3648">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3648">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ## <a name="printing-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3651">Richtlinien zum Drucken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3651">Printing policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3652">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3652">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="defaultprinterselection"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3653">DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3653">DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-printer-selection-rules"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3654">Regeln zur Auswahl des Standarddruckers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3654">Default printer selection rules</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3655">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3655">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3656">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3656">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3657">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3657">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3658">Setzt die Auswahlregeln für Standarddrucker für Microsoft Edge außer Kraft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3658">Overrides Microsoft Edge default printer selection rules.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3659">Diese Richtlinie bestimmt die Regeln für die Auswahl des Standarddruckers in Microsoft Edge, was passiert, wenn ein Benutzer zum ersten Mal versucht, eine Seite zu drucken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3659">This policy determines the rules for selecting the default printer in Microsoft Edge, which happens the first time a user tries to print a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3660">Wenn diese Richtlinie festgelegt ist, versucht Microsoft Edge, einen Drucker zu finden, der allen angegebenen Attributen entspricht, und verwendet ihn als Standarddrucker.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3660">When this policy is set, Microsoft Edge tries to find a printer that matches all of the specified attributes and uses it as default printer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3661">Wenn mehrere Drucker vorhanden sind, die die Kriterien erfüllen, wird der erste übereinstimmende Drucker verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3661">If there are multiple printers that meet the criteria, the first printer that matches is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3662">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder keine übereinstimmenden Drucker innerhalb des Timeouts gefunden werden, ist der Drucker standardmäßig der integrierte PDF-Drucker oder kein Drucker, wenn der PDF-Drucker nicht verfügbar ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3662">If you don't configure this policy or no matching printers are found within the timeout, the printer defaults to the built-in PDF printer or no printer, if the PDF printer isn't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3663">Der Wert wird als JSON-Objekt analysiert und ist mit dem folgenden Schema konform: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3663">The value is parsed as a JSON object, conforming to the following schema: { "type": "object", "properties": { "idPattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer id.", "type": "string" }, "namePattern": { "description": "Regular expression to match printer display name.", "type": "string" } } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3664">Wenn ein Feld ausgelassen wird, bedeutet dies, dass alle Werte übereinstimmen. Wenn Sie beispielsweise "Konnektivität" nicht angeben, beginnt die Druckansicht, alle Arten von lokalen Druckern zu erkennen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3664">Omitting a field means all values match; for example, if you don't specify connectivity Print Preview starts discovering all kinds of local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3665">Muster regulärer Ausdrücke müssen der JavaScript-RegExp-Syntax entsprechen, und bei Übereinstimmungen wird die Groß-/Kleinschreibung beachtet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3665">Regular expression patterns must follow the JavaScript RegExp syntax and matches are case sensitive.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3666">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3666">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3667">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3667">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3668">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3668">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3669">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3669">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3670">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3670">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3671">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3671">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3672">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3672">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3673">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3673">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3674">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3674">GP unique name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3675">GP-Name: Regeln zur Auswahl des Standarddruckers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3675">GP name: Default printer selection rules</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3676">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3676">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3677">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3677">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3678">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3678">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3679">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3679">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3680">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3680">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3681">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3681">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3682">Wertname: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3682">Value Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3683">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3683">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3684">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3684">Example value:</span></span>

```
"{ \"idPattern\": \".*public\", \"namePattern\": \".*Color\" }"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3685">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3685">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3686">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultPrinterSelection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3686">Preference Key Name: DefaultPrinterSelection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3687">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3687">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>{ "idPattern": ".*public", "namePattern": ".*Color" }</string>
```

  ### <a name="printheaderfooter"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3689">PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3689">PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-headers-and-footers"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3690">Drucken von Kopf- und Fußzeilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3690">Print headers and footers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3691">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3691">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3692">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3692">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3693">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3693">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3694">Erzwingen Sie im Dialogfeld "Drucken" die Option "Kopf- und Fußzeilen".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3694">Force 'headers and footers' to be on or off in the printing dialog.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3695">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer entscheiden, ob sie Kopf- und Fußzeilen drucken möchten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3695">If you don't configure this policy, users can decide whether to print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3696">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können Benutzer keine Kopf- und Fußzeilen drucken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3696">If you disable this policy, users can't print headers and footers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3697">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, drucken Benutzer immer Kopf- und Fußzeilen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3697">If you enable this policy, users always print headers and footers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3698">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3698">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3699">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3699">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3700">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3700">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3701">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3701">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3702">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3702">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3703">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3703">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3704">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3704">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3705">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3705">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3706">GP eindeutiger Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3706">GP unique name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3707">GP-Name: Drucken von Kopf- und Fußzeilen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3707">GP name: Print headers and footers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3708">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3708">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3709">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3709">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3710">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3710">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3711">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3711">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3712">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3712">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3713">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3713">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3714">Wertname: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3714">Value Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3715">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3715">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3716">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3716">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3717">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3717">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3718">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PrintHeaderFooter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3718">Preference Key Name: PrintHeaderFooter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3719">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3719">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="printpreviewusesystemdefaultprinter"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3721">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3721">PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-system-default-printer-as-the-default-printer"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3722">Standarddrucker des Systems als Standarddrucker festlegen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3722">Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3723">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3723">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3724">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3724">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3725">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3725">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3726">Teilt Microsoft Edge mit, den Standarddrucker des Systems als Standardoption für die Seitenansicht anstelle des zuletzt verwendeten Druckers zu verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3726">Tells Microsoft Edge to use the system default printer as the default choice in Print Preview instead of the most recently used printer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3727">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, verwendet die Seitenansicht den zuletzt verwendeten Drucker als Standardziel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3727">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Print Preview uses the most recently used printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3728">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, verwendet die Seitenansicht den Standarddrucker des Betriebssystems als Standardziel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3728">If you enable this policy, Print Preview uses the OS system default printer as the default destination choice.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3729">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3729">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3730">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3730">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3731">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3731">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3732">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3732">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3733">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3733">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3734">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3734">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3735">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3735">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3736">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3736">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3737">GP eindeutiger Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3737">GP unique name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3738">GP-Name: Standarddrucker des Systems als Standarddrucker festlegen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3738">GP name: Set the system default printer as the default printer</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3739">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3739">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3740">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3740">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3741">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3741">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3742">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3742">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3743">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3743">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3744">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3744">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3745">Wertname: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3745">Value Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3746">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3746">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3747">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3747">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3749">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3749">Preference Key Name: PrintPreviewUseSystemDefaultPrinter</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3750">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3750">Example value:</span></span>
