``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3751">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3751">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printrasterizationmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3752">PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3752">PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="print-rasterization-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3753">Druckrastermodus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3753">Print Rasterization Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3754">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3754">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3755">Unter Windows ab Version 90 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3755">On Windows since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3756">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3756">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3757">Steuert, wie Microsoft Edge unter Windows druckt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3757">Controls how Microsoft Edge prints on Windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3758">Wenn Sie unter Windows auf einem Nicht-PostScript-Drucker drucken, müssen Druckaufträge manchmal gerastert werden, um korrekt zu drucken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3758">When printing to a non-PostScript printer on Windows, sometimes print jobs need to be rasterized to print correctly.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3759">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "Vollständig" setzen oder nicht konfigurieren, führt Microsoft Edge bei Bedarf eine vollständige Seitenrasterung durch.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3759">If you set this policy to 'Full' or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will do full page rasterization if necessary.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3760">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "Schnell" festlegen, reduziert Microsoft Edge die Rasterung, wodurch die Druckauftragsgröße reduziert und die Druckgeschwindigkeit erhöht werden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3760">If you set this policy to 'Fast', Microsoft Edge will reduce the amount of rasterization which can help reduce print job sizes and increase printing speed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3761">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3761">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3762">Vollständig (0) = Rasterung ganzer Seiten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3762">Full (0) = Full page rasterization</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3763">Schnell (1) = Rasterung möglichst vermeiden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3763">Fast (1) = Avoid rasterization if possible</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3764">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3764">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3765">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3765">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3766">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3766">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3767">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3767">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3768">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3768">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3769">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3769">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3770">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3770">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3771">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3771">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3772">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3772">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3773">GP eindeutiger Name: PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3773">GP unique name: PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3774">GP-Name: Druckrastermodus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3774">GP name: Print Rasterization Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3775">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3775">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3776">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3776">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3777">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3777">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3778">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3778">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3779">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3779">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3780">Pfad (empfohlen): N/V</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3780">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3781">Wertname: PrintRasterizationMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3781">Value Name: PrintRasterizationMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3782">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3782">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3783">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3783">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3784">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3784">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printertypedenylist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3785">PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3785">PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-printer-types-on-the-deny-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3786">Deaktivieren von Druckertypen in der Verweigerungsliste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3786">Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3787">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3787">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3788">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3788">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3789">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3789">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3790">Die Druckertypen auf der Verweigerungsliste werden nicht ermittelt, oder ihre Funktionen werden nicht abgerufen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3790">The printer types on the deny list won't be discovered or have their capabilities fetched.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3791">Wenn alle Druckertypen auf die Verweigerungsliste gesetzt werden, wird das Drucken effektiv deaktiviert, da es kein Druckziel für Dokumente gibt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3791">Placing all printer types on the deny list effectively disables printing, because there's no print destination for documents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3792">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder die Druckerliste leer ist, können alle Druckertypen ermittelt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3792">If you don't configure this policy, or the printer list is empty, all printer types are discoverable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3793">Zu den Druckerzielen gehören Erweiterungsdrucker und lokale Drucker.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3793">Printer destinations include extension printers and local printers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3794">Erweiterungsdrucker werden auch als Druckanbieterziele bezeichnet und umfassen alle Ziele, die zu einer Microsoft Edge-Erweiterung gehören.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3794">Extension printers are also known as print provider destinations, and include any destination that belongs to a Microsoft Edge extension.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-3795">Lokale Drucker werden auch als native Druckziele bezeichnet und umfassen Ziele, die für den lokalen Computer und freigegebene Netzwerkdrucker verfügbar sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3795">Local printers are also known as native printing destinations, and include destinations available to the local machine and shared network printers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3796">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3796">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3797">privet (privet) = Zeroconf-basierte (mDNS + DNS-SD) Protokollziele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3797">privet (privet) = Zeroconf-based (mDNS + DNS-SD) protocol destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3798">extension (extension) = erweiterungsbasierte Ziele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3798">extension (extension) = Extension-based destinations</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3799">pdf (pdf) = das „Als PDF speichern“-Ziel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3799">pdf (pdf) = The 'Save as PDF' destination</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3800">local (local) = Lokale Druckerziele</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3800">local (local) = Local printer destinations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3801">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3801">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3802">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3802">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3803">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3803">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3804">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3804">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3805">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3805">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3806">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3806">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3807">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3807">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3808">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3808">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3809">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3809">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3810">Eindeutiger GP-Name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3810">GP unique name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3811">GP-Name: Deaktivieren von Druckertypen in der Verweigerungsliste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3811">GP name: Disable printer types on the deny list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3812">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3812">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3813">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3813">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3814">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3814">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3815">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3815">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3816">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3816">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3817">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3817">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3818">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3818">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3819">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3819">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3820">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3820">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\1 = "local"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\PrinterTypeDenyList\2 = "privet"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3821">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3821">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3822">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PrinterTypeDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3822">Preference Key Name: PrinterTypeDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3823">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3823">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>local</string>
  <string>privet</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-3824">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3824">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="printingallowedbackgroundgraphicsmodes"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3825">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3825">PrintingAllowedBackgroundGraphicsModes</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-background-graphics-printing-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3826">Einschränken des Druckmodus für Hintergrundgrafiken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3826">Restrict background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3827">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3827">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3828">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 89 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3828">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3829">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3829">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3830">Schränkt den Druckmodus für Hintergrundgrafiken ein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3830">Restricts background graphics printing mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3831">Wenn diese Richtlinie nicht aktiviert ist, gibt es keine Einschränkungen beim Drucken von Hintergrundgrafiken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3831">If this policy isn't set there's no restriction on printing background graphics.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3832">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3832">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3833">Any (Any) = Drucken mit und ohne Hintergrundgrafiken zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3833">any (any) = Allow printing with and without background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3834">enabled (enabled) = Druck nur mit Hintergrundgrafiken zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3834">enabled (enabled) = Allow printing only with background graphics</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3835">Disabled (disabled) = Druck nur ohne Hintergrundgrafiken zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3835">disabled (disabled) = Allow printing only without background graphics</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3836">Verwenden Sie die vorhergehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3836">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3837">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3837">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3838">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3838">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3839">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3839">Can be recommended: No</span></span>

  ### <a name="printingbackgroundgraphicsdefault"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3860">PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3860">PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-background-graphics-printing-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3861">Standarddruckmodus für Hintergrundgrafiken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3861">Default background graphics printing mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3862">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3862">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3863">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 89 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3863">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3864">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3864">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3865">Überschreibt die zuletzt verwendete Einstellung zum Drucken von Hintergrundgrafiken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3865">Overrides the last used setting for printing background graphics.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-3866">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren, ist das Drucken von Hintergrundgrafiken aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3866">If you enable this setting, background graphics printing is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-3867">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren, ist das Drucken von Hintergrundgrafiken deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3867">If you disable this setting, background graphics printing is disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3868">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3868">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3869">enabled (enabled) = Standardmäßiges Aktivieren des Druckmodus für Hintergrundgrafiken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3869">enabled (enabled) = Enable background graphics printing mode by default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-3870">Disabled (disabled) = standardmäßiges Deaktivieren des Druckmodus für Hintergrundgrafiken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3870">disabled (disabled) = Disable background graphics printing mode by default</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3871">Verwenden Sie die vorhergehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3871">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3872">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3872">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3873">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3873">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3874">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3874">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3875">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3875">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3876">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3876">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3877">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3877">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3878">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3878">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3879">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3879">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3880">GP-eindeutiger Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3880">GP unique name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3881">GP-Name: Standarddruckmodus für Hintergrundgrafiken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3881">GP name: Default background graphics printing mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3882">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3882">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3883">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3883">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3884">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3884">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3885">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3885">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3886">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3886">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3887">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3887">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3888">Wertname: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3888">Value Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3889">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3889">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3890">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3890">Example value:</span></span>

```
"enabled"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3891">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3891">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3892">Name des Präferenzschlüssels: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3892">Preference Key Name: PrintingBackgroundGraphicsDefault</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3893">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3893">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="printingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3895">PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3895">PrintingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-printing"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3896">Drucken aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3896">Enable printing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3897">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3897">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3898">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3898">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3899">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3899">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3900">Aktiviert das Drucken in Microsoft Edge und hindert Benutzer daran, diese Einstellung zu ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3900">Enables printing in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3901">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer drucken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3901">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3902">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können Benutzer nicht aus Microsoft Edge drucken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3902">If you disable this policy, users can't print from Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3903">Das Drucken ist im Menü "Schraubenschlüssel", "Erweiterungen", "JavaScript-Anwendungen" usw. deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3903">Printing is disabled in the wrench menu, extensions, JavaScript applications, and so on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3904">Benutzer können weiterhin über Plug-Ins drucken, die Microsoft Edge beim Drucken umgehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3904">Users can still print from plug-ins that bypass Microsoft Edge while printing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3905">So gibt es beispielsweise bei bestimmten Adobe Flash-Anwendungen die Option Drucken im Kontextmenü, die von dieser Richtlinie nicht abgedeckt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3905">For example, certain Adobe Flash applications have the print option in their context menu, which isn't covered by this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3906">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3906">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3907">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3907">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3908">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3908">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3909">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3909">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3910">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3910">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3911">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3911">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3912">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3912">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3913">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3913">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3914">GP eindeutiger Name: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3914">GP unique name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3915">GP-Name: Drucken aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3915">GP name: Enable printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3916">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3916">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3917">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3917">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3918">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3918">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3919">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3919">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3920">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3920">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3921">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3921">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3922">Wertname: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3922">Value Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3923">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3923">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3924">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3924">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3925">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3925">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3926">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PrintingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3926">Preference Key Name: PrintingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3927">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3927">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="printingpapersizedefault"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3929">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3929">PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-printing-page-size"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3930">Standardmäßiges Seitenformat für den Druck</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3930">Default printing page size</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3931">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3931">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3932">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3932">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3933">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3933">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3934">Außerkraftsetzung des standardmäßigen Seitenformats für den Druck.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3934">Overrides default printing page size.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3935">Der Name sollte eines der aufgeführten Formate oder "Benutzerdefiniert" enthalten, wenn das erforderliche Papierformat nicht in der Liste enthalten ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3935">name should contain one of the listed formats or 'custom' if required paper size is not in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3936">Wenn der Wert "Benutzerdefiniert" angegeben wird, sollte die Eigenschaft "custom_size" angegeben werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3936">If 'custom' value is provided custom_size property should be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3937">Sie beschreibt die gewünschte Höhe und Breite in Mikrometer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3937">It describes the desired height and width in micrometers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3938">Andernfalls sollte die "custom_size"-Eigenschaft nicht angegeben werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3938">Otherwise custom_size property shouldn't be specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-3939">Richtlinien, die diese Regeln verletzen, werden ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3939">Policy that violates these rules is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3940">Wenn das Seitenformat auf dem vom Benutzer ausgewählten Drucker nicht verfügbar ist, wird diese Richtlinie ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3940">If the page size is unavailable on the printer chosen by the user this policy is ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3941">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3941">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3942">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3942">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3943">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3943">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3944">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3944">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3945">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3945">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3946">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3946">Dictionary</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3951">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3951">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3954">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3954">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3955">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3955">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3956">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3956">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3957">Wertname: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3957">Value Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3959">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3959">Example value:</span></span>

```

  "custom_size": {

    "width": 210000
  },

}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3960">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3960">Compact example value:</span></span>

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3961">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3961">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3962">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3962">Preference Key Name: PrintingPaperSizeDefault</span></span>

``` xml
<key>PrintingPaperSizeDefault</key>
<dict>
  <key>custom_size</key>
  <dict>
    <key>height</key>
    <integer>297000</integer>
    <key>width</key>
    <integer>210000</integer>
  </dict>
  <key>name</key>
  <string>custom</string>
</dict>
```

  ### <a name="usesystemprintdialog"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3965">UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3965">UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3967">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3967">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3968">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3968">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3969">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3969">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-3970">Zeigt das System-Dialogfeld "Drucken" anstelle der Seitenansicht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3970">Shows the system print dialog instead of print preview.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3971">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, öffnet Microsoft Edge das System-Dialogfeld „Drucken“ anstatt der integrierten Seitenansicht, wenn ein Benutzer eine Seite druckt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3971">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge opens the system print dialog instead of the built-in print preview when a user prints a page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-3972">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder deaktivieren, wird mit den Druckbefehlen der Bildschirm "Microsoft Edge-Druckvorschau" aufgerufen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3972">If you don't configure or disable this policy, print commands trigger the Microsoft Edge print preview screen.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3973">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3973">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3974">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3974">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3975">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3975">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3976">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3976">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3983">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3983">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Printing</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3985">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3985">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3987">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3987">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3989">Wertname: UseSystemPrintDialog</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3989">Value Name: UseSystemPrintDialog</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-3990">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3990">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ### <a name="proxybypasslist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3998">ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3998">ProxyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-proxy-bypass-rules-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-3999">Proxy-Umgehungsregeln konfigurieren (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-3999">Configure proxy bypass rules (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-4000">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4000">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4001">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4001">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4002">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4002">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4003">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4003">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4004">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4004">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4005">Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet. Verwenden Sie stattdessen [ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4005">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4006">Funktioniert nicht in Microsoft Edge Version 91.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4006">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4007">Gibt eine Liste von Hosts an, für die Microsoft Edge jeden Proxy umgeht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4007">Defines a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge bypasses any proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4008">Diese Richtlinie wird nur angewendet, wenn die Richtlinie für [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) nicht angegeben ist und Sie in der Richtlinie [ProxyMode](#proxymode) „fixed_servers“ ausgewählt haben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4008">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected fixed_servers in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4009">Wenn Sie irgend einen anderen Modus zum Konfigurieren von Proxy-Richtlinien ausgewählt haben, sollten Sie diese Richtlinie nicht aktivieren oder konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4009">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4010">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können Sie eine Liste mit Hosts erstellen, für die Microsoft Edge keinen Proxy verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4010">If you enable this policy, you can create a list of hosts for which Microsoft Edge doesn't use a proxy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4011">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird keine Liste mit Hosts erstellt, für die Microsoft Edge einen Proxy umgeht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4011">If you don't configure this policy, no list of hosts is created for which Microsoft Edge bypasses a proxy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4012">Lassen Sie diese Richtlinie unkonfiguriert, wenn Sie eine andere Methode zum Festlegen von Proxy-Richtlinien festgelegt haben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4012">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4013">Ausführlichere Beispiele finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4013">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4014">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4014">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4015">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4015">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4016">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4016">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4017">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4017">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4018">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4018">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4019">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4019">String</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4021">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4021">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4022">GP eindeutiger Name: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4022">GP unique name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4023">GP-Name: Proxy-Umgehungsregeln konfigurieren (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4023">GP name: Configure proxy bypass rules (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4024">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4024">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4025">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4025">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4026">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4026">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4027">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4027">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4028">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4028">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4029">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4029">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4030">Wertname: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4030">Value Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4031">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4031">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4034">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ProxyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4034">Preference Key Name: ProxyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-proxy-server-settings-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4038">Proxyservereinstellungen konfigurieren (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4038">Configure proxy server settings (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-4039">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4039">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4040">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4040">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4041">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4041">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4042">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4042">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4043">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4043">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4044">Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet. Verwenden Sie stattdessen [ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4044">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4045">Funktioniert nicht in Microsoft Edge Version 91.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4045">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4046">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können Sie den von Microsoft Edge verwendeten Proxyserver angeben, und Benutzer können die Proxyeinstellungen nicht ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4046">If you set this policy to Enabled you can specify the proxy server Microsoft Edge uses and prevents users from changing proxy settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4047">Microsoft Edge ignoriert alle Proxy-bezogenen Optionen, die über die Befehlszeile angegeben werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4047">Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4048">Diese Richtlinie wird nur angewendet, wenn die Richtlinie für [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) nicht angegeben wurde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4048">The policy is only applied if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4049">Wenn Sie eine der folgenden Optionen auswählen, werden andere Optionen ignoriert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4049">Other options are ignored if you choose one of the following options:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4050">direct = nie einen Proxy Server verwenden und immer eine direkte Verbindung herstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4050">direct = Never use a proxy server and always connect directly</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4051">system = System-Proxyeinstellungen verwenden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4051">system = Use system proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4052">auto_detect = Proxyserver automatisch bestimmen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4052">auto_detect = Auto detect the proxy server</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4053">Bei Auswahl folgender Optionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4053">If you choose to use:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4054">fixed_servers = festgelegte Proxyserver verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4054">fixed_servers = Fixed proxy servers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4055">Sie können weitere Optionen mit [Proxyserver](#proxyserver) und [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist) angeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4055">You can specify further options with [ProxyServer](#proxyserver) and [ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist).</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4056">pac_script = .pac-Proxyskript verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4056">pac_script =  A .pac proxy script.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4057">Verwenden Sie [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl), um die URL zu einer Proxy-.pac-Datei anzugeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4057">Use [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) to set the URL to a proxy .pac file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4058">Ausführliche Beispiele finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4058">For detailed examples, go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4059">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer ihre eigenen Proxyeinstellungen auswählen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4059">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4060">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4060">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4061">ProxyDisabled (direct) = niemals einen Proxy verwenden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4061">ProxyDisabled (direct) = Never use a proxy</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4062">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = automatisches Erkennen von Proxyeinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4062">ProxyAutoDetect (auto_detect) = Auto detect proxy settings</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4063">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = verwenden eines PAC-Proxyskripts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4063">ProxyPacScript (pac_script) = Use a .pac proxy script</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4064">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = verwenden von festen Proxyservern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4064">ProxyFixedServers (fixed_servers) = Use fixed proxy servers</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4065">ProxyUseSystem (System) = System Proxyeinstellungen verwenden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4065">ProxyUseSystem (system) = Use system proxy settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4066">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4066">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

Verwenden Sie stattdessen [ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4097">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4098">Funktioniert nicht in Microsoft Edge Version 91.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4098">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4099">Legt die URL für eine Proxy-Autokonfigurationsdatei (PAC-Datei) fest.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4099">Specifies the URL for a proxy auto-config (PAC) file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4100">Diese Richtlinie wird nur angewendet, wenn die Richtlinie für [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) nicht angegeben ist und Sie in der Richtlinie [ProxyMode](#proxymode) „pac_script“ ausgewählt haben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4100">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected pac_script in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4101">Wenn Sie irgend einen anderen Modus zum Konfigurieren von Proxy-Richtlinien ausgewählt haben, sollten Sie diese Richtlinie nicht aktivieren oder konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4101">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4102">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können Sie die URL für eine PAC-Datei angeben, die definiert, wie der Browser automatisch den richtigen Proxyserver auswählt, um eine bestimmte Website abzurufen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4102">If you enable this policy, you can specify the URL for a PAC file, which defines how the browser automatically chooses the appropriate proxy server for fetching a particular website.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4103">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird keine PAC-Datei angegeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4103">If you disable or don't configure this policy, no PAC file is specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4104">Lassen Sie diese Richtlinie unkonfiguriert, wenn Sie eine andere Methode zum Festlegen von Proxy-Richtlinien festgelegt haben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4104">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4115">GP-Name: Proxy-.pac-Datei-URL festlegen (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4115">GP name: Set the proxy .pac file URL (deprecated)</span></span>

  ### <a name="proxyserver"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4129">ProxyServer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4129">ProxyServer</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4135">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4135">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4136">Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet. Verwenden Sie stattdessen [ProxySettings](#proxysettings).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4136">This policy is deprecated, use [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4137">Funktioniert nicht in Microsoft Edge Version 91.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4137">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4138">Gibt die URL des Proxyservers an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4138">Specifies the URL of the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4139">Diese Richtlinie wird nur angewendet, wenn die Richtlinie für [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) nicht angegeben ist und Sie in der Richtlinie [ProxyMode](#proxymode) „fixed_servers“ ausgewählt haben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4139">This policy is applied only if the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy isn't specified and you have selected fixed_servers in the [ProxyMode](#proxymode) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4140">Wenn Sie irgend einen anderen Modus zum Konfigurieren von Proxy-Richtlinien ausgewählt haben, sollten Sie diese Richtlinie nicht aktivieren oder konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4140">If you selected any other mode for configuring proxy policies, don't enable or configure this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4141">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird der durch diese Richtlinie konfigurierte Proxy Server für alle URLs verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4141">If you enable this policy, the proxy server configured by this policy will be used for all URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4142">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer ihre eigenen Proxyeinstellungen auswählen, während sie sich in diesem Proxymodus befinden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4142">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings while in this proxy mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4143">Lassen Sie diese Richtlinie unkonfiguriert, wenn Sie eine andere Methode zum Festlegen von Proxy-Richtlinien festgelegt haben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4143">Leave this policy unconfigured if you've specified any other method for setting proxy policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4144">Weitere Optionen und detaillierte Beispiele finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4144">For more options and detailed examples, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4152">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4152">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4155">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4155">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4156">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4156">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4157">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4157">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4158">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4158">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4159">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4159">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4160">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4160">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  ### <a name="proxysettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4168">ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4168">ProxySettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="proxy-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4169">Proxyeinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4169">Proxy settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4170">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4170">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4171">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4171">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4172">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4172">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4173">Konfiguriert die Proxyeinstellungen für Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4173">Configures the proxy settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4174">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, ignoriert Microsoft Edge alle Proxy-bezogenen Optionen, die von der Befehlszeile aus angegeben wurden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4174">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge ignores all proxy-related options specified from the command line.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4175">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer ihre eigenen Proxyeinstellungen auswählen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4175">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose their own proxy settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4176">Mit dieser Richtlinie werden die folgenden einzelnen Richtlinien außer Kraft gesetzt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4176">This policy overrides the following individual policies:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4177">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4177">[ProxyMode](#proxymode)
[ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl)
[ProxyServer](#proxyserver)
[ProxyBypassList](#proxybypasslist)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4178">Beim Festlegen der [ProxySettings](#proxysettings)-Richtlinie sind die folgenden Felder zulässig:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4178">Setting the [ProxySettings](#proxysettings) policy accepts the following fields:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4179">„ProxyMode“, über das Sie den von Microsoft Edge verwendeten Proxyserver angeben können. Dies verhindert, dass Benutzer Proxyeinstellungen ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4179">ProxyMode, which lets you specify the proxy server used by Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing proxy settings</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4180">„ProxyPacUrl“, eine URL zu einer Proxy-.pac-Datei</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4180">ProxyPacUrl, a URL to a proxy .pac file</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4181">„ProxyServer“, eine URL für den Proxy Server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4181">ProxyServer, a URL for the proxy server</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4182">„ProxyBypassList“, eine Liste von Proxy-Hosts, die von Microsoft Edge umgangen werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4182">ProxyBypassList, a list of proxy hosts that Microsoft Edge bypasses</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4183">Bei Auswahl der folgenden Werte für „ProxyMode“:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4183">For ProxyMode, if you choose the value:</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4184">direct: Es wird kein Proxy verwendet, und alle anderen Felder werden ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4184">direct, a proxy is never used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4185">system: Es wird der Proxy des Systems verwendet, und alle anderen Felder werden ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4185">system, the systems's proxy is used and all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4186">auto_detect: Alle anderen Felder werden ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4186">auto_detect, all other fields are ignored.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4187">fixed_servers: Die Felder „ProxyServer“ und „ProxyBypassList“ werden verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4187">fixed_servers, the ProxyServer and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>
  * <span data-ttu-id="09666-4188">pac_script: Die Felder „ProxyPacUrl“ und „ProxyBypassList“ werden verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4188">pac_script, the ProxyPacUrl and ProxyBypassList fields are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4189">Ausführlichere Beispiele finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4189">For more detailed examples go to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094936).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4190">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4190">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4191">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4191">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4192">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4192">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4193">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4193">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4194">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4194">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4195">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4195">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4196">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4196">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4197">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4197">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4198">GP eindeutiger Name: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4198">GP unique name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4199">GP-Name: Konfigurieren von Proxyeinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4199">GP name: Proxy settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4200">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4200">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4201">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4201">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4202">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4202">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4203">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4203">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4204">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4204">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4205">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4205">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4206">Wertname: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4206">Value Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4207">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4207">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4208">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4208">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {
  "ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", 
  "ProxyMode": "pac_script", 
  "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", 
  "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4209">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4209">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ProxySettings = {"ProxyBypassList": "https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/", "ProxyMode": "pac_script", "ProxyPacUrl": "https://internal.site/example.pac", "ProxyServer": "123.123.123.123:8080"}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4210">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4210">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4211">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ProxySettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4211">Preference Key Name: ProxySettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4212">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4212">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ProxySettings</key>
<dict>
  <key>ProxyBypassList</key>
  <string>https://www.example1.com,https://www.example2.com,https://internalsite/</string>
  <key>ProxyMode</key>
  <string>pac_script</string>
  <key>ProxyPacUrl</key>
  <string>https://internal.site/example.pac</string>
  <key>ProxyServer</key>
  <string>123.123.123.123:8080</string>
</dict>
```
