  ## <a name="sleeping-tabs-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4214">Einstellungsrichtlinien für „Schlafende Registerkarten“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4214">Sleeping tabs settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-4215">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4215">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="sleepingtabsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4216">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4216">SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-sleeping-tabs-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4217">„Schlafende Registerkarten“ auf bestimmten Websites blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4217">Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4218">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4218">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4219">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4219">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4220">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4220">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4221">Definieren Sie eine auf URL-Mustern basierende Liste von Websites, die nicht durch „Schlafende Registerkarten“ in den Ruhezustand versetzt werden dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4221">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are not allowed to be put to sleep by sleeping tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4222">Wenn die Richtlinie [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) deaktiviert ist, wird diese Liste nicht verwendet und keine Websites werden automatisch in den Ruhezustand versetzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4222">If the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is disabled, this list is not used and no sites will be put to sleep automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4223">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können alle Websites in den Ruhezustand versetzt werden, es sei denn, die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers blockiert sie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4223">If you don't configure this policy, all sites will be eligible to be put to sleep unless the user's personal configuration blocks them.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4224">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4224">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4225">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4225">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4226">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4226">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4227">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4227">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4228">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4228">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4229">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4229">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4230">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4230">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4231">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4231">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4232">Eindeutiger GP-Name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4232">GP unique name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4233">GP-Name: „Schlafende Registerkarten“ auf bestimmten Websites blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4233">GP name: Block sleeping tabs on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4234">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4234">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4235">GP-Pfad (empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese überschreiben)/Sleeping tabs settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4235">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4236">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4236">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4237">Windows Registry-Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4237">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4238">Pfad (zwingend erforderlich): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4238">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4239">Pfad (empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4239">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4240">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4240">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4241">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4241">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4242">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4242">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4243">Mac-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4243">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4244">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4244">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4245">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4245">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="sleepingtabsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4247">SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4247">SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-sleeping-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4248">„Schlafende Registerkarten“ konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4248">Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4249">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4249">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4250">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4250">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4251">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4251">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4252">Mit dieser Richtlinieneinstellung können Sie konfigurieren, ob „Schlafende Registerkarten“ aktiviert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4252">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on sleeping tabs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4253">Die Funktion „Schlafende Registerkarten“ senkt die CPU-, Batterie- und Speichernutzung, indem sie inaktive Hintergrund-Registerkarten in den Ruhezustand versetzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4253">Sleeping tabs reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage by putting idle background tabs to sleep.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4254">Microsoft Edge verwendet Heuristiken, um zu gewährleisten, dass keine Tabs in den Ruhezustand versetzt werden, die im Hintergrund nützliche Arbeit verrichten, z. B. Benachrichtigungen anzeigen, Ton wiedergeben und Video streamen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4254">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid putting tabs to sleep that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4255">Standardmäßig ist die Funktion „Schlafende Registerkarten“ aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4255">By default, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4256">Einzelne Websites können möglicherweise durch Konfigurieren der Richtlinie [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls) nicht in den Ruhezustand versetzt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4256">Individual sites may be blocked from being put to sleep by configuring the policy [SleepingTabsBlockedForUrls](#sleepingtabsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4257">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren, ist „Schlafende Registerkarten“ eingeschaltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4257">If you enable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4258">Wenn Sie diese Funktion deaktivieren, ist „Schlafende Registerkarten“ ausgeschaltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4258">If you disable this setting, sleeping tabs is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4259">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer wählen, ob sie „Schlafende Registerkarten“ verwenden möchten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4259">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use sleeping tabs.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4260">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4260">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4261">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4261">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4262">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4262">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4263">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4263">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4264">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4264">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4265">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4265">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4266">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4266">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4267">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4267">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4268">Eindeutiger GP-Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4268">GP unique name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4269">GP-Name: „Schlafende Registerkarten“ konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4269">GP name: Configure sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4270">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4270">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4271">GP-Pfad (empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese überschreiben)/Sleeping tabs settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4271">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4272">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4272">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4273">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4273">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4274">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4274">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4275">Pfad (empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4275">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4276">Wertname: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4276">Value Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4277">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4277">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4278">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4278">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4279">Mac-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4279">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4280">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SleepingTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4280">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4281">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4281">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="sleepingtabstimeout"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4283">SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4283">SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-background-tab-inactivity-timeout-for-sleeping-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4284">Zeitlimit für die Inaktivität der Hintergrundregisterkarte für „Schlafende Registerkarten“ festlegen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4284">Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4285">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4285">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4286">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4286">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4287">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4287">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4288">Mit dieser Richtlinieneinstellung können Sie die Zeitüberschreitung in Sekunden konfigurieren, nach der inaktive Hintergrund-Registerkarten automatisch in den Ruhezustand versetzt werden, wenn „Schlafende Registerkarten“ aktiviert ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4288">This policy setting lets you configure the timeout, in seconds, after which inactive background tabs will be automatically put to sleep if sleeping tabs is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4289">Standardmäßig beträgt diese Zeitüberschreitung 7 200Sekunden (2Stunden).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4289">By default, this timeout is 7,200 seconds (2 hours).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4290">Tabs werden nur dann automatisch in den Ruhezustand versetzt, wenn die Richtlinie [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) aktiviert ist, oder nicht konfiguriert ist und der Benutzer die Einstellung „Schlafende Registerkarten“ aktiviert hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4290">Tabs are only put to sleep automatically when the policy [SleepingTabsEnabled](#sleepingtabsenabled) is enabled or is not configured and the user has enabled the sleeping tabs setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4291">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer den Wert für die Zeitüberschreitung wählen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4291">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose the timeout value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4292">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4292">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4293">5Minuten (300) = 5Minuten Inaktivität</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4293">5Minutes (300) = 5 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4294">15Minuten (900) = 15Minuten Inaktivität</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4294">15Minutes (900) = 15 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4295">30Minuten (1.800) = 30Minuten Inaktivität</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4295">30Minutes (1800) = 30 minutes of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4296">1Stunde (3.600) = 1Stunde Inaktivität</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4296">1Hour (3600) = 1 hour of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4297">2Stunden (7.200) = 2Stunden Inaktivität</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4297">2Hours (7200) = 2 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4298">3Stunden (10.800) = 3Stunden Inaktivität</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4298">3Hours (10800) = 3 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4299">6Stunden (21.600) = 6Stunden Inaktivität</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4299">6Hours (21600) = 6 hours of inactivity</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4300">12Stunden (43.200) = 12Stunden Inaktivität</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4300">12Hours (43200) = 12 hours of inactivity</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4301">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4301">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4302">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4302">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4303">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4303">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4304">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4304">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4305">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4305">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4306">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4306">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4307">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4307">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4308">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4308">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4309">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4309">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4310">Eindeutiger GP-Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4310">GP unique name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4311">GP-Name: Festlegen des Zeitlimits für die Inaktivität der Hintergrund-Registerkarte für „Schlafende Registerkarten“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4311">GP name: Set the background tab inactivity timeout for sleeping tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4312">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4312">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4313">GP-Pfad (empfohlen): Administrative Vorlagen/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese überschreiben)/Sleeping tabs settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4313">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Sleeping tabs settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4314">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4314">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4315">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4315">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4316">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4316">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4317">Pfad (empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4317">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4318">Wertname: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4318">Value Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4319">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4319">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4320">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4320">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000384
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4321">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4321">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4322">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SleepingTabsTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4322">Preference Key Name: SleepingTabsTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4323">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4323">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>900</integer>
```

  ## <a name="smartscreen-settings-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4325">SmartScreen-Einstellungs-Richtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4325">SmartScreen settings policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-4326">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4326">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="preventsmartscreenpromptoverride"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4327">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4327">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-bypassing-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-prompts-for-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4328">Umgehung der Microsoft Defender SmartScreen-Aufforderungen für Websites verhindern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4328">Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4329">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4329">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4330">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4330">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4331">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4331">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4332">Mit dieser Richtlinieneinstellung können Sie festlegen, ob Benutzer die Microsoft Defender SmartScreen-Warnungen zu möglicherweise schädlichen Websites übergehen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4332">This policy setting lets you decide whether users can override the Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about potentially malicious websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4333">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren, können Benutzer Microsoft Defender SmartScreen-Warnungen nicht ignorieren, und sie werden am Aufrufen der Website gehindert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4333">If you enable this setting, users can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and they are blocked from continuing to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4334">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer Microsoft Defender SmartScreen-Warnungen ignorieren und die Website aufrufen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4334">If you disable or don't configure this setting, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and continue to the site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4335">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4335">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4336">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4336">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4337">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4337">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4338">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4338">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4339">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4339">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4340">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4340">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4341">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4341">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4342">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4342">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4343">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4343">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4344">GP eindeutiger Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4344">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4345">GP-Name: Umgehung der Microsoft Defender SmartScreen-Aufforderungen für Websites verhindern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4345">GP name: Prevent bypassing Microsoft Defender SmartScreen prompts for sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4346">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4346">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4347">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4347">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4348">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4348">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4349">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4349">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4350">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4350">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4351">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4351">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4352">Wertname: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4352">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4353">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4353">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4354">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4354">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4355">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4355">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4356">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4356">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4357">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4357">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-4358">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4358">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="preventsmartscreenpromptoverrideforfiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4359">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4359">PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-bypassing-of-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-warnings-about-downloads"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4360">Verhindern der Umgehung von Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen-Warnungen zu Downloads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4360">Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4361">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4361">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4362">Auf Windows ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4362">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4363">Auf macOS ab 79 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4363">On macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4364">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4364">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4365">Mit dieser Richtlinie können Sie ermitteln, ob Benutzer die SmartScreen-Warnungen von Microsoft Defender über nicht überprüfte Downloads außer Kraft setzen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4365">This policy lets you determine whether users can override Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4366">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können die Benutzer in Ihrer Organisation die Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen-Warnungen nicht ignorieren und sie werden daran gehindert, die nicht überprüften Downloads abzuschließen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4366">If you enable this policy, users in your organization can't ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings, and they're prevented from completing the unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4367">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen-Warnungen ignorieren und nicht überprüfte Downloads abschließen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4367">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can ignore Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings and complete unverified downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4368">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4368">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4369">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4369">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4370">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4370">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4371">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4371">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4372">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4372">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4373">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4373">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4374">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4374">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4375">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4375">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4376">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4376">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4377">GP eindeutiger Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4377">GP unique name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4378">GP-Name: Verhindern der Umgehung von Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen-Warnungen zu Downloads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4378">GP name: Prevent bypassing of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings about downloads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4379">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4379">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4380">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4380">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4381">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4381">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4382">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4382">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4383">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4383">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4384">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4384">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4385">Wertname: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4385">Value Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4386">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4386">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4387">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4387">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4388">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4388">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4389">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4389">Preference Key Name: PreventSmartScreenPromptOverrideForFiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4390">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4390">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-4391">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4391">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartscreenallowlistdomains"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4392">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4392">SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-domains-for-which-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-wont-trigger-warnings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4393">Konfigurieren der Liste der Domänen, für die Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen keine Warnungen auslöst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4393">Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4394">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4394">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4395">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4395">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4396">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4396">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4397">Konfigurieren der Liste der für Microsoft Defender SmartScreen vertrauenswürdigen Domänen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4397">Configure the list of Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusted domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4398">Dies bedeutet: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen überprüft nicht auf potenziell bösartige Ressourcen wie Phishingsoftware und andere Malware, wenn die Quell-URLs einer hier aufgeführten Domäne entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4398">This means: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't check for potentially malicious resources like phishing software and other malware if the source URLs match these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-4399">Der Microsoft Defender SmartScreen-Download Schutzdienst überprüft die auf diesen Domänen gehosteten Downloads nicht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4399">The Microsoft Defender SmartScreen download protection service won't check downloads hosted on these domains.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4400">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, vertraut Microsoft Defender SmartScreen diesen Domänen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4400">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen trusts these domains.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-4401">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht festlegen, wird der standardmäßige Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen-Schutz auf alle Ressourcen angewendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4401">If you disable or don't set this policy, default Microsoft Defender SmartScreen protection is applied to all resources.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4402">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4402">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-4403">Beachten Sie auch, dass diese Richtlinie nicht zutrifft, wenn Ihre Organisation Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection aktiviert hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4403">Also note that this policy does not apply if your organization has enabled Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4404">Sie müssen stattdessen Ihre Zulassungs- und Sperrlisten im Microsoft Defender Security Center konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4404">You must configure your allow and block lists in Microsoft Defender Security Center instead.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4405">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4405">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4406">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4406">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4407">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4407">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4408">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4408">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4409">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4409">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4410">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4410">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4411">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4411">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4412">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4412">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4413">GP eindeutiger Name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4413">GP unique name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4414">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der Liste der Domänen, für die Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen keine Warnungen auslöst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4414">GP name: Configure the list of domains for which Microsoft Defender SmartScreen won't trigger warnings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4415">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4415">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4416">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4416">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4417">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4417">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4418">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4418">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4419">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4419">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4420">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4420">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4421">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4421">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4422">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4422">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4423">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4423">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartScreenAllowListDomains\2 = "myuniversity.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4424">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4424">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4425">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4425">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenAllowListDomains</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4426">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4426">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>mydomain.com</string>
  <string>myuniversity.edu</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-4427">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4427">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="smartscreenenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4428">SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4428">SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-microsoft-defender-smartscreen"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4429">Konfigurieren des Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4429">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4430">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4430">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4431">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4431">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4432">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4432">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4433">Mit dieser Richtlinieneinstellung können Sie konfigurieren, ob Microsoft Defender SmartScreen aktiviert werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4433">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4434">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen sendet Warnmeldungen, um zum Schutz Ihrer Benutzer vor potenziellen Betrugsversuchen durch Phishing oder Schadsoftware beizutragen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4434">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect your users from potential phishing scams and malicious software.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4435">Microsoft Defender SmartScreen ist standardmäßig aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4435">By default, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4436">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren, wird Microsoft Defender SmartScreen aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4436">If you enable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4437">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren, ist Microsoft Defender SmartScreen deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4437">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4438">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer entscheiden, ob sie Microsoft Defender SmartScreen verwenden möchten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4438">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4439">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4439">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4440">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4440">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4441">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4441">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4442">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4442">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4443">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4443">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4444">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4444">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4445">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4445">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4446">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4446">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4447">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4447">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4448">GP eindeutiger Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4448">GP unique name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4449">GP-Name: Konfigurieren des Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4449">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4450">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4450">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4451">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4451">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4452">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4452">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4453">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4453">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4454">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4454">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4455">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4455">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4456">Wertname: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4456">Value Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4457">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4457">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4458">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4458">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4459">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4459">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4460">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SmartScreenEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4460">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="smartscreenfortrusteddownloadsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4463">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4463">SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-checks-on-downloads-from-trusted-sources"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4464">Erzwingen der Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen-Überprüfung für Downloads aus vertrauenswürdigen Quellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4464">Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4465">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4465">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4466">Auf Windows ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4466">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4467">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4467">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4468">Diese Richtlinieneinstellung ermöglicht es Ihnen, zu konfigurieren, ob Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen den Ruf des Downloads mittels einer vertrauenswürdigen Quelle überprüft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4468">This policy setting lets you configure whether Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks download reputation from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4469">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, überprüft Microsoft Defender SmartScreen den Ruf des Downloads unabhängig von der Quelle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4469">If you enable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks the download's reputation regardless of source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4470">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren, überprüft Microsoft Defender SmartScreen beim Herunterladen aus einer vertrauenswürdigen Quelle den Ruf des Downloads nicht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4470">If you disable this setting, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen doesn't check the download's reputation when downloading from a trusted source.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4471">Diese Richtlinie gilt nur für Windows-Instanzen, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4471">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4472">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4472">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4473">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4473">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4474">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4474">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4475">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4475">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4476">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4476">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4477">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4477">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4478">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4478">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4479">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4479">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4480">GP eindeutiger Name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4480">GP unique name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4481">GP-Name: Erzwingen der Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen-Überprüfung für Downloads aus vertrauenswürdigen Quellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4481">GP name: Force Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks on downloads from trusted sources</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4482">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4482">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4483">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4483">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4484">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4484">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4485">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4485">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4486">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4486">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4487">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4487">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4488">Wertname: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4488">Value Name: SmartScreenForTrustedDownloadsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4489">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4489">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4490">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4490">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="smartscreenpuaenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4492">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4492">SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-microsoft-defender-smartscreen-to-block-potentially-unwanted-apps"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4493">Konfigurieren von Microsoft Defender SmartScreen, sodass potenziell unerwünschte Apps blockiert werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4493">Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4494">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4494">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4495">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4495">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4496">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4496">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4497">Mit dieser Richtlinieneinstellung können Sie konfigurieren, ob die Blockierung potenziell unerwünschter Apps mit Microsoft Defender SmartScreen aktiviert werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4497">This policy setting lets you configure whether to turn on blocking for potentially unwanted apps with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4498">Die Funktion zum Blockieren potenziell unerwünschter Apps mit Microsoft Defender SmartScreen bietet Warnmeldungen, die beim Schutz von Benutzern vor Adware, Coin Minern, Bundleware und anderen Apps mit schlechtem Ruf helfen, die von Websites gehostet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4498">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen provides warning messages to help protect users from adware, coin miners, bundleware, and other low-reputation apps that are hosted by websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4499">Die Funktion zum Blockieren potenziell unerwünschter Apps mit Microsoft Defender SmartScreen ist standardmäßig deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4499">Potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4500">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren, wird die Funktion zum Blockieren potenziell unerwünschter Apps mit Microsoft Defender SmartScreen aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4500">If you enable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4501">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren, wird die Funktion zum Blockieren potenziell unerwünschter Apps mit Microsoft Defender SmartScreen deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4501">If you disable this setting, potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4502">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer entscheiden, ob sie die Funktion zum Blockieren potenziell unerwünschter Apps mit Microsoft Defender SmartScreen verwenden möchten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4502">If you don't configure this setting, users can choose whether to use potentially unwanted app blocking with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4503">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4503">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4504">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4504">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4505">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4505">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4506">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4506">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4507">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4507">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4508">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4508">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4509">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4509">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4510">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4510">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4511">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4511">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4512">GP eindeutiger Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4512">GP unique name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4513">GP-Name: Konfigurieren von Microsoft Defender SmartScreen, sodass potenziell unerwünschte Apps blockiert werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4513">GP name: Configure Microsoft Defender SmartScreen to block potentially unwanted apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4514">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4514">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4515">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/SmartScreen settings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4515">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/SmartScreen settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4516">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4516">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4517">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4517">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4518">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4518">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4519">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4519">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4520">Wertname: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4520">Value Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4521">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4521">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4522">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4522">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4523">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4523">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4524">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4524">Preference Key Name: SmartScreenPuaEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4525">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4525">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
