  ## <a name="startupcomma-home-page-and-new-tab-page-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4527">Richtlinien für Start&comma; Homepage und neue Registerkarten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4527">Startup&comma; home page and new tab page policies</span></span>

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-4528">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4528">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="homepageisnewtabpage"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4529">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4529">HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-new-tab-page-as-the-home-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4530">Festlegen einer neuen Registerkarte als Startseite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4530">Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4531">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4531">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4532">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4532">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4533">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4533">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4534">Konfiguriert die Standardstartseite in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4534">Configures the default home page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4535">Sie können die Startseite auf eine URL festlegen, die Sie angeben, oder auf eine neue Registerkartenseite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4535">You can set the home page to a URL you specify or to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4536">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird die neue Registerkartenseite immer als Homepage verwendet, und der Speicherort der Homepage wird ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4536">If you enable this policy, the new tab page is always used for the home page, and the home page URL location is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4537">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, kann die Startseite des Benutzers nicht die neue Registerkartenseite sein, es sei denn, die URL ist auf "edge://newtab" festgelegt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4537">If you disable this policy, the user's home page can't be the new tab page, unless the URL is set to 'edge://newtab'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4538">Wenn nicht konfiguriert, können Benutzer wählen, ob es sich bei der neuen Registerkartenseite um ihre Startseite handelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4538">If not configured users can choose whether the new tab page is their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4539">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4539">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4540">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4540">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4541">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4541">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4542">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4542">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4543">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4543">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4544">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4544">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4545">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4545">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4546">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4546">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4547">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4547">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4548">GP eindeutiger Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4548">GP unique name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4549">GP-Name: Festlegen einer neuen Registerkarte als Startseite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4549">GP name: Set the new tab page as the home page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4550">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4550">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4551">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4551">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4552">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4552">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4553">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4553">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4554">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4554">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4555">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4555">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4556">Wertname: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4556">Value Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4557">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4557">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4558">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4558">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4559">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4559">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4560">Einstellung Schlüsselname: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4560">Preference Key Name: HomepageIsNewTabPage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4561">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4561">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="homepagelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4563">HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4563">HomepageLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-home-page-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4564">Konfigurieren der Startseiten-URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4564">Configure the home page URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4565">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4565">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4566">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4566">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4567">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4567">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4568">Konfiguriert die Standardstartseiten-URL in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4568">Configures the default home page URL in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4569">Die Startseite ist die Seite, die von der Schaltfläche "Start" geöffnet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4569">The home page is the page opened by the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4570">Die beim Start geöffneten Seiten werden von den Richtlinien [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) gesteuert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4570">The pages that open on startup are controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4571">Sie können hier entweder eine URL festlegen oder festlegen, dass die Startseite die neue Registerkartenseite öffnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4571">You can either set a URL here or set the home page to open the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4572">Wenn Sie auswählen, dass die neue Registerkartenseite geöffnet werden soll, wird diese Richtlinie nicht wirksam.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4572">If you select to open the new tab page, then this policy doesn't take effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4573">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können die Benutzer ihre Startseiten-URL zwar nicht ändern, aber sie können die neue Registerkartenseite als Startseite verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4573">If you enable this policy, users can't change their home page URL, but they can choose to use the new tab page as their home page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4574">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer eine eigene Startseite auswählen, sofern die [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) Richtlinie nicht aktiviert ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4574">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can choose their own home page, as long as the [HomepageIsNewTabPage](#homepageisnewtabpage) policy isn't enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4575">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4575">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4576">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4576">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4577">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4577">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4578">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4578">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4579">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4579">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4580">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4580">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4581">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4581">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4582">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4582">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4583">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4583">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4584">GP eindeutiger Name: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4584">GP unique name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4585">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der Startseiten-URL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4585">GP name: Configure the home page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4586">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4586">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4587">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4587">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4588">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4588">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4589">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4589">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4590">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4590">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4591">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4591">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4592">Wertname: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4592">Value Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4593">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4593">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4594">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4594">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4595">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4595">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4596">Einstellung Schlüsselname: HomepageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4596">Preference Key Name: HomepageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4597">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4597">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpageallowedbackgroundtypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4599">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4599">NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-background-types-allowed-for-the-new-tab-page-layout"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4600">Konfigurieren der für das neue Registerkartenseiten-Layout zulässigen Hintergrundtypen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4600">Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4601">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4601">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4602">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4602">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4603">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4603">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4604">Sie können festlegen, welche Arten von Hintergrundbildern im neuen Registerkartenseiten-Layout in Microsoft Edge zulässig sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4604">You can configure which types of background image that are allowed on the new tab page layout in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4605">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden alle Hintergrundbildtypen auf der neuen Registerkarte aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4605">If you don't configure this policy, all background image types on the new tab page are enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4606">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4606">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4607">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = Deaktivieren des täglichen Hintergrundbildtyps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4607">DisableImageOfTheDay (1) = Disable daily background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4608">DisableCustomImage (2) = Deaktivieren des benutzerdefinierten täglichen Hintergrundbildtyps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4608">DisableCustomImage (2) = Disable custom background image type</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4609">DisableAll (3) = Deaktivieren aller Hintergrundbildtypen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4609">DisableAll (3) = Disable all background image types</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4610">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4610">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4611">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4611">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4612">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4612">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4613">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4613">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4614">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4614">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4615">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4615">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4616">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4616">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4617">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4617">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4618">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4618">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4619">Eindeutiger GP-Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4619">GP unique name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4620">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der zulässigen Hintergrundtypen für das neue Registerkartenseiten-Layout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4620">GP name: Configure the background types allowed for the new tab page layout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4621">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4621">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4622">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4622">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4623">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4623">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4624">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4624">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4625">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4625">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4626">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4626">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4627">Wertname: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4627">Value Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4628">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4628">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4629">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4629">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4630">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4630">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4631">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4631">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageAllowedBackgroundTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4632">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4632">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-4633">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4633">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpagecompanylogo"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4634">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4634">NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-new-tab-page-company-logo-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4635">Firmenlogo für „Neuer Tab“-Seite festlegen (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4635">Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-4636">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach Microsoft Edge 85 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4636">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4637">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4637">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4638">Unter Windows und macOS ab 79 bis 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4638">On Windows and macOS since 79, until 85</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4639">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4639">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4640">Diese Richtlinie hat aufgrund veränderter betrieblicher Anforderungen nicht erwartungsgemäß funktioniert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4640">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4641">Deshalb ist sie veraltet und sollte nicht verwendet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4641">Therefore it's obsolete and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4642">Gibt das Firmenlogo an, das auf der neuen Registerkartenseite in Microsoft Edge verwendet werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4642">Specifies the company logo to use on the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4643">Die Richtlinie sollte als Zeichenfolge konfiguriert werden, die das Logo/die Logos im JSON-Format ausdrückt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4643">The policy should be configured as a string that expresses the logo(s) in JSON format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4644">Beispiel: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "Hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4644">For example: { "default_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png", "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29" }, "light_logo": { "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png", "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737" } }</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4645">Sie konfigurieren diese Richtlinie, indem Sie die URL angeben, aus der Microsoft Edge das Logo und dessen Kryptografie-Hash (SHA-256) herunterladen kann, mit dem die Integrität des Downloads überprüft wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4645">You configure this policy by specifying the URL from which Microsoft Edge can download the logo and its cryptographic hash (SHA-256), which is used to verify the integrity of the download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4646">Das Logo muss im PNG- oder SVG-Format vorliegen, und die Dateigröße darf 16 MB nicht überschreiten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4646">The logo must be in PNG or SVG format, and its file size must not exceed 16 MB.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4647">Das Logo wird heruntergeladen und zwischengespeichert, und es wird immer dann erneut heruntergeladen, wenn sich die URL oder der Hashwert ändert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4647">The logo is downloaded and cached, and it will be redownloaded whenever the URL or the hash changes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4648">Die URL muss ohne Authentifizierung erreichbar sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4648">The URL must be accessible without any authentication.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4649">Das "default_logo" ist erforderlich und wird verwendet, wenn kein Hintergrundbild verfügbar ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4649">The 'default_logo' is required and will be used when there's no background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4650">Wenn "light_logo" angeboten wird, wird dies verwendet, wenn die neue Registerkartenseite des Benutzers ein Hintergrundbild aufweist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4650">If 'light_logo' is provided, it will be used when the user's new tab page has a background image.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4651">Wir empfehlen ein horizontales Logo mit einem transparenten Hintergrund, das linksbündig und vertikal mittig ausgerichtet ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4651">We recommend a horizontal logo with a transparent background that is left-aligned and vertically centered.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4652">Das Logo sollte eine Mindesthöhe von 32 Pixeln und ein Seitenverhältnis von 1:1 bis 4:1 aufweisen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4652">The logo should have a minimum height of 32 pixels and an aspect ratio from 1:1 to 4:1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4653">Das "default_logo" sollte einen guten Kontrast gegen einen weißen/schwarzen Hintergrund aufweisen, während das "light_logo" einen guten Kontrast zu einem Hintergrundbild aufweisen sollte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4653">The 'default_logo' should have proper contrast against a white/black background while the 'light_logo' should have proper contrast against a background image.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4654">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, downloadet Microsoft Edge das angegebene Logo bzw. die Logos und zeigt sie auf der neuen Registerkartenseite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4654">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge downloads and shows the specified logo(s) on the new tab page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4655">Benutzer können die Logos nicht umgehen oder ausblenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4655">Users can't override or hide the logo(s).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4656">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, zeigt Microsoft Edge auf der neuen Registerkartenseite kein Firmenlogo oder ein Microsoft-Logo an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4656">If you disable or don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show no company logo or a Microsoft logo on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4657">Hilfe zur Ermittlung des SHA-256-Hashs finden Sie unter https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4657">For help with determining the SHA-256 hash, see https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/get-filehash.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4658">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4658">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4659">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4659">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4660">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4660">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4661">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4661">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4662">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4662">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4663">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4663">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4664">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4664">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4665">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4665">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4666">GP eindeutiger Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4666">GP unique name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4667">GP-Name: Firmenlogo für „Neuer Tab“-Seite festlegen (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4667">GP name: Set new tab page company logo (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4668">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4668">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4669">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4669">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4670">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4670">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4671">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4671">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4672">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4672">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4673">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4673">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4674">Wertname: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4674">Value Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4675">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4675">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4676">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4676">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {
  "default_logo": {
    "hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"
  }, 
  "light_logo": {
    "hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"
  }
}
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4677">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4677">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageCompanyLogo = {"default_logo": {"hash": "cd0aa9856147b6c5b4ff2b7dfee5da20aa38253099ef1b4a64aced233c9afe29", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/logo.png"}, "light_logo": {"hash": "517d286edb416bb2625ccfcba9de78296e90da8e32330d4c9c8275c4c1c33737", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png"}}
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4678">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4678">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4679">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4679">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageCompanyLogo</span></span>

``` xml
<key>NewTabPageCompanyLogo</key>
<dict>

    <string>https://www.contoso.com/logo.png</string>
  </dict>
  <key>light_logo</key>
  <dict>

    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/light_logo.png</string>
  </dict>
</dict>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpagehidedefaulttopsites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4682">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4682">NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-default-top-sites-from-the-new-tab-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4683">Ausblenden der standardmäßigen Top-Websites auf der neuen Registerkartenseite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4683">Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4684">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4684">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4685">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4685">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4686">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4686">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4687">Ausblenden der standardmäßigen Top-Websites auf der neuen Registerkartenseite in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4687">Hides the default top sites from the new tab page in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4688">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "wahr" festlegen, werden die Kacheln der standardmäßigen Top-Websites ausgeblendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4688">If you set this policy to true, the default top site tiles are hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4689">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "falsch" festlegen oder sie nicht konfigurieren, bleiben die Kacheln für die standardmäßigen Top-Websites sichtbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4689">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the default top site tiles remain visible.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4690">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4690">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4691">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4691">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4692">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4692">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4693">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4693">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4694">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4694">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4695">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4695">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4696">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4696">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4697">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4697">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4698">GP eindeutiger Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4698">GP unique name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4699">GP-Name: Ausblenden der standardmäßigen Top-Websites auf der neuen Registerkartenseite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4699">GP name: Hide the default top sites from the new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4700">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4700">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4701">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4701">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4702">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4702">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4703">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4703">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4704">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4704">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4705">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4705">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4706">Wertname: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4706">Value Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4707">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4707">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4708">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4708">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4709">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4709">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4710">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4710">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageHideDefaultTopSites</span></span>

  ### <a name="newtabpagelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4713">NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4713">NewTabPageLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-new-tab-page-url"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4714">Konfigurieren der URL der neuen Registerkartenseite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4714">Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4715">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4715">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4716">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4716">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4717">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4717">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4718">Konfiguriert die Standard-URL für die neue Tab-Seite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4718">Configures the default URL for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4719">Die empfohlene Version dieser Richtlinie ist derzeit nicht funktionsfähig und funktioniert genau wie die zwingend erforderlich Version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4719">The recommended version of this policy does not currently work and functions exactly like the mandatory version.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4720">Diese Richtlinie bestimmt die Seite, die beim Erstellen neuer Tabs (auch beim Öffnen neuer Fenster) geöffnet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4720">This policy determines the page that's opened when new tabs are created (including when new windows are opened).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4721">Er wirkt sich auch auf die Startseite aus, wenn diese auf die neue Registerkartenseite festgelegt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4721">It also affects the startup page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4722">Diese Richtlinie bestimmt nicht, welche Seite beim Start geöffnet wird. Dies wird durch die Richtlinie [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) gesteuert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4722">This policy doesn't determine which page opens on startup; that's controlled by the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4723">Es wirkt sich auch nicht auf die Startseite aus, wenn diese auf die neue Registerkartenseite festgelegt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4723">It also doesn't affect the home page if that's set to open to the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4724">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird die standardmäßige neue Registerkartenseite verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4724">If you don't configure this policy, the default new tab page is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4725">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie *und* die Richtlinie [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) konfigurieren, hat diese Richtlinie Vorrang.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4725">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype) policy, this policy has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4726">Wenn eine leere Registerkarte bevorzugt wird, ist „about:blank“ die richtige zu verwendende URL, nicht „about://blank“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4726">If a blank tab is preferred, "about:blank" is the correct URL to use, not "about://blank".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4727">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4727">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4728">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4728">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4729">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4729">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4730">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4730">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4731">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4731">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4732">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4732">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4733">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4733">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4734">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4734">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4735">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4735">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4736">GP eindeutiger Name: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4736">GP unique name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4737">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der URL der neuen Registerkartenseite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4737">GP name: Configure the new tab page URL</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4738">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4738">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4739">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4739">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4740">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4740">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4741">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4741">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4742">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4742">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4743">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4743">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4744">Wertname: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4744">Value Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4745">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4745">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4746">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4746">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://www.fabrikam.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4747">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4747">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4748">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NewTabPageLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4748">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4749">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4749">Example value:</span></span>

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-4750">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4750">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="newtabpagemanagedquicklinks"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4751">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4751">NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-new-tab-page-quick-links"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4752">Festlegen der Quicklinks auf der neuen Registerkartenseite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4752">Set new tab page quick links</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4753">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4753">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4754">Auf Windows und macOS ab 79 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4754">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4755">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4755">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4756">Standardmäßig zeigt Microsoft Edge Quicklinks auf der neuen Registerkartenseite, die aus vom Benutzer hinzugefügten Verknüpfungen und Top-Websites aus dem Browserverlauf bestehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4756">By default, Microsoft Edge displays quick links on the new tab page from user-added shortcuts and top sites based on browsing history.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4757">Mit dieser Richtlinie können Sie bis zu drei Kacheln auf der neuen Registerkartenseite konfigurieren, die als JSON-Objekt ausgedrückt werden:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4757">With this policy, you can configure up to three quick link tiles on the new tab page, expressed as a JSON object:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4758">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4758">[ { "url": "https://www.contoso.com", "title": "Contoso Portal", "pinned": true/false }, ... ]</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4759">Das Feld "url" ist erforderlich. "title" und "pinned" sind optional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4759">The 'url' field is required; 'title' and 'pinned' are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4760">Wenn "title" nicht angegeben ist, wird die URL als Standardtitel verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4760">If 'title' is not provided, the URL is used as the default title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4761">Wenn "pinned" nicht angegeben ist, lautet der Standardwert falsch.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4761">If 'pinned' is not provided, the default value is false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4762">Microsoft Edge zeigt diese in der genannten Reihenfolge, von links nach rechts, an, wobei alle angepinnten Kacheln vor nicht-angepinnten Kacheln angezeigt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4762">Microsoft Edge presents these in the order listed, from left to right, with all pinned tiles displayed ahead of non-pinned tiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4763">Wenn die Richtlinie als verpflichtend festgelegt ist, wird das Feld "pinned" ignoriert, und alle Kacheln werden angeheftet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4763">If the policy is set as mandatory, the 'pinned' field will be ignored and all tiles will be pinned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4764">Die Kacheln können nicht vom Benutzer gelöscht werden und werden immer am Anfang der Liste der Quicklinks angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4764">The tiles can't be deleted by the user and will always appear at the front of the quick links list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4765">Wenn die Richtlinie wie empfohlen festgelegt ist, bleiben angeheftete Kacheln in der Liste, aber der Benutzer kann sie bearbeiten und löschen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4765">If the policy is set as recommended, pinned tiles will remain in the list but the user has the ability to edit and delete them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4766">Quicklink-Kacheln, die nicht angepinnt sind, verhalten sich wie standardmäßige Top-Websites und werden in der Liste nicht mehr angezeigt, wenn andere Websites häufiger besucht werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4766">Quick link tiles that aren't pinned behave like default top sites and are pushed off the list if other websites are visited more frequently.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4767">Wenn nicht angepinnte Links über diese Richtlinie auf ein vorhandenes Browserprofil angewendet werden, werden die Links möglicherweise überhaupt nicht angezeigt, je nachdem, wie häufig sie im Vergleich zum Browserverlauf des Benutzers besucht wurden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4767">When applying non-pinned links via this policy to an existing browser profile, the links may not appear at all, depending on how they rank compared to the user's browsing history.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4768">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4768">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4769">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4769">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4770">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4770">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4771">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4771">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4772">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4772">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4773">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4773">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4774">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4774">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4775">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4775">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4776">GP eindeutiger Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4776">GP unique name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4777">GP-Name: Festlegen der Quicklinks auf der neuen Registerkartenseite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4777">GP name: Set new tab page quick links</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4778">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4778">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4779">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4779">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4780">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4780">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4781">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4781">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4782">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4782">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4783">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4783">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4784">Wertname: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4784">Value Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4785">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4785">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4786">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4786">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [
  {
    "pinned": true, 
    "title": "Contoso Portal", 
    "url": "https://contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "title": "Fabrikam", 
    "url": "https://fabrikam.com"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4787">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4787">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks = [{"pinned": true, "title": "Contoso Portal", "url": "https://contoso.com"}, {"title": "Fabrikam", "url": "https://fabrikam.com"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4788">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4788">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4789">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4789">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4790">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4790">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>NewTabPageManagedQuickLinks</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>pinned</key>
    <true/>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Contoso Portal</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>title</key>
    <string>Fabrikam</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://fabrikam.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="newtabpageprerenderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4792">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4792">NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-preload-of-the-new-tab-page-for-faster-rendering"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4793">Aktivieren des Vorabladens der neuen Registerkarte für schnellere Darstellung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4793">Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4794">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4794">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4795">Auf Windows und MacOS ab 85 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4795">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4796">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4796">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4797">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren, ist das Vorladen der neuen Registerkarte aktiviert, und die Benutzer können diese Einstellung nicht ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4797">If you configure this policy, preloading the New tab page is enabled, and users can't change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4798">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, ist das Vorladen aktiviert, und ein Benutzer kann diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4798">If you don't configure this policy, preloading is enabled and a user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4799">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4799">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4800">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4800">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4801">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4801">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4802">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4802">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4803">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4803">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4804">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4804">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4805">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4805">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4806">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4806">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4807">Eindeutiger Name des GP: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4807">GP unique name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4808">GP-Name: Aktivieren des Vorabladens der neuen Registerkarte für schnellere Darstellung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4808">GP name: Enable preload of the new tab page for faster rendering</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4809">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4809">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4810">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4810">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4811">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4811">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4812">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4812">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4813">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4813">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4814">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4814">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4815">Wertname: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4815">Value Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4816">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4816">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4817">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4817">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4818">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4818">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4819">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4819">Preference Key Name: NewTabPagePrerenderEnabled</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```
