  ### <a name="newtabpagesetfeedtype"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4822">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4822">NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-microsoft-edge-new-tab-page-experience-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4823">Konfigurieren der neuen Registerkartenoberfläche für Microsoft Edge (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4823">Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-4824">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4824">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4825">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4825">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4826">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4826">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4827">Auf Windows und macOS ab 79 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4827">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4828">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4828">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4829">Diese Richtlinie wird nicht mehr unterstützt, da die neue Version der Registerkartenseite „Unternehmen“ die Auswahl zwischen verschiedenen Inhaltstypen nicht mehr erfordert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4829">We are deprecating this policy because the new version of the enterprise new tab page no longer requires choosing between different content types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4830">Stattdessen können die dem Benutzer angezeigten Inhalte über das Microsoft 365 Admin Center gesteuert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4830">Instead, the content that is presented to the user can be controlled via the Microsoft 365 admin center.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4831">Um zum Microsoft 365 Admin Center zu gelangen, melden Sie sich bei https://admin.microsoft.com mit Ihrem Administratorkonto an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4831">To get to the Microsoft 365 admin center, sign in at https://admin.microsoft.com with your admin account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4832">Diese Richtlinie wird nach der Microsoft Edge-Version 90 inaktiv gesetzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4832">The policy will be made obsolete after Microsoft Edge version 90.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4833">Ermöglicht es Ihnen, entweder die Microsoft News oder den Office 365-Feed für die neue Registerkartenseite auszuwählen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4833">Lets you choose either the Microsoft News or Office 365 feed experience for the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4834">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Microsoft News“ setzen, wird den Benutzern auf der neuen Registerkartenseite der "Microsoft-Newsfeeds" angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4834">When you set this policy to 'News', users will see the Microsoft News feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4835">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Office“ setzen, wird den Benutzern mit einer Azure Active Directory-Browser-Anmeldung auf der neuen Registerkartenseite das Office 365-Feed angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4835">When you set this policy to 'Office', users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the Office 365 feed experience on the new tab page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4836">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4836">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-4837">Benutzern mit einer Azure Active Directory-Browser-Anmeldung wird auf der neuen Registerkartenseite der "Office 365-Feed" sowie die neue standardmäßige Feed-Umgebung angeboten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4837">Users with an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in are offered the Office 365 new tab page feed experience, as well as the standard new tab page feed experience.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-4838">Benutzer ohne Azure Active Directory-Browser-Anmeldung sehen die standardmäßige Oberfläche der neuen Registerkartenseite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4838">Users without an Azure Active Directory browser sign-in will see the standard new tab page experience.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4839">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie *und* die Richtlinie [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) konfigurieren, hat die [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) Richtlinie Vorrang.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4839">If you configure this policy *and* the [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) policy, [NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation) has precedence.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4840">Standardeinstellung: Deaktiviert oder nicht konfiguriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4840">Default setting:  Disabled or not configured.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4841">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4841">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4842">Microsoft News (0) = Microsoft-Newsfeed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4842">News (0) = Microsoft News feed experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4843">Office (1) = Office 365-Feed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4843">Office (1) = Office 365 feed experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4844">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4844">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4845">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4845">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4846">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4846">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4847">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4847">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4848">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4848">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4849">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4849">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4850">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4850">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4851">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4851">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4852">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4852">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4853">GP eindeutiger Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4853">GP unique name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4854">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der neuen Registerkartenoberfläche für Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4854">GP name: Configure the Microsoft Edge new tab page experience (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4855">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4855">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4856">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4856">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4857">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4857">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4858">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4858">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4859">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4859">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4860">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4860">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4861">Wertname: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4861">Value Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4862">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4862">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4863">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4863">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4864">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4864">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4865">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4865">Preference Key Name: NewTabPageSetFeedType</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4866">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4866">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```

  ### <a name="restoreonstartup"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4868">RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4868">RestoreOnStartup</span></span>

  #### <a name="action-to-take-on-startup"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4869">Auszuführende Aktion beim Start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4869">Action to take on startup</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4870">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4870">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4871">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4871">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4872">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4872">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4873">Legen Sie fest, wie sich Microsoft Edge beim Start verhält.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4873">Specify how Microsoft Edge behaves when it starts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4874">Wenn Sie möchten, dass beim Start immer eine neue Registerkarte geöffnet wird, wählen Sie „RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage“ aus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4874">If you want a new tab to always open on startup, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4875">Wenn Sie URLs wieder öffnen möchten, die beim letzten Schließen von Microsoft Edge geöffnet waren, wählen Sie „RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession“ aus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4875">If you want to reopen URLs that were open the last time Microsoft Edge closed, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4876">Die Browsersitzung wird unverändert wiederhergestellt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4876">The browsing session will be restored as it was.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4877">Beachten Sie, dass mit dieser Option einige Einstellungen deaktiviert werden, die auf Sitzungen angewiesen sind oder beim Beenden Aktionen ausführen (z.B. Löschen des Browserverlaufs beim Beenden oder nur-sitzungsbasierte Cookies).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4877">Note that this option disables some settings that rely on sessions or that perform actions on exit (such as Clear browsing data on exit or session-only cookies).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4878">Wenn Sie eine bestimmte Gruppe von URLs öffnen möchten, wählen Sie „RestoreOnStartupIsURLs“ aus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4878">If you want to open a specific set of URLs, choose 'RestoreOnStartupIsURLs'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4879">Diese Einstellung zu deaktivieren hat den gleichen Effekt wie sie nicht zu konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4879">Disabling this setting is equivalent to leaving it not configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4880">Benutzer können sie in Microsoft Edge ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4880">Users will be able to change it in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4881">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4881">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4882">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4882">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4883">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = neue Registerkarte öffnen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4883">RestoreOnStartupIsNewTabPage (5) = Open a new tab</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4884">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = die letzte Sitzung wiederherstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4884">RestoreOnStartupIsLastSession (1) = Restore the last session</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-4885">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = eine Liste von URLs öffnen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4885">RestoreOnStartupIsURLs (4) = Open a list of URLs</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4886">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4886">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4887">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4887">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4888">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4888">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4889">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4889">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4890">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4890">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4891">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4891">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4892">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4892">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4893">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4893">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4894">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4894">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4895">GP eindeutiger Name: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4895">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4896">GP-Name: Auszuführende Aktion beim Start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4896">GP name: Action to take on startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4897">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4897">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4898">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4898">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4899">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4899">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4900">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4900">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4901">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4901">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4902">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4902">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4903">Wertname: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4903">Value Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4904">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4904">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4905">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4905">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000004
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4906">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4906">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4907">Einstellung Schlüsselname: RestoreOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4907">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4908">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4908">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>4</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-4909">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4909">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="restoreonstartupurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4910">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4910">RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-to-open-when-the-browser-starts"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4911">Websites, die beim Start des Browsers geöffnet werden sollen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4911">Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4912">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4912">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4913">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4913">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4914">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4914">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4915">Sie können eine Liste mit Websites angeben, die beim Start des Browsers automatisch geöffnet werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4915">Specify a list of websites to open automatically when the browser starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4916">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird beim Start keine Website geöffnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4916">If you don't configure this policy, no site is opened on startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4917">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nur, wenn Sie auch die [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) Richtlinie so festlegen, dass eine Liste von URLs geöffnet wird (4).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4917">This policy only works if you also set the [RestoreOnStartup](#restoreonstartup) policy to 'Open a list of URLs' (4).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4918">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4918">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4919">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4919">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4920">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4920">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4921">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4921">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4922">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4922">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4923">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4923">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4924">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4924">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4925">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4925">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4926">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4926">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4927">GP eindeutiger Name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4927">GP unique name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4928">GP-Name: Websites, die beim Start des Browsers geöffnet werden sollen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4928">GP name: Sites to open when the browser starts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4929">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4929">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4930">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4930">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4931">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4931">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4932">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4932">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4933">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4933">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4934">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4934">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4935">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4935">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4936">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4936">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4937">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4937">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\1 = "https://contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\RestoreOnStartupURLs\2 = "https://www.fabrikam.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4938">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4938">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4939">Einstellung Schlüsselname: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4939">Preference Key Name: RestoreOnStartupURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4940">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4940">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://www.fabrikam.com</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="showhomebutton"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4942">ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4942">ShowHomeButton</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-home-button-on-toolbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4943">Schaltfläche „Start“ auf der Symbolleiste anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4943">Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4944">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4944">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4945">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4945">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4946">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4946">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4947">Zeigt die Schaltfläche "Start" auf der Microsoft Edge-Symbolleiste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4947">Shows the Home button on Microsoft Edge's toolbar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4948">Aktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um immer die Schaltfläche "Start" anzuzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4948">Enable this policy to always show the Home button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4949">Deaktivieren Sie diese Option, um die Schaltfläche niemals anzuzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4949">Disable it to never show the button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-4950">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer auswählen, ob die Schaltfläche Start angezeigt werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4950">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to show the home button.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4951">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4951">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4952">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4952">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4953">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4953">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4954">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4954">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4955">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4955">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4956">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4956">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4957">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4957">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4958">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4958">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4959">GP eindeutiger Name: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4959">GP unique name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4960">GP-Name: Schaltfläche „Start“ auf der Symbolleiste anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4960">GP name: Show Home button on toolbar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4961">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4961">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4962">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4962">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/Startup, home page and new tab page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4963">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4963">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4964">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4964">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4965">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4965">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4966">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4966">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4967">Wertname: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4967">Value Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4968">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4968">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4969">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4969">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4970">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4970">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4971">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ShowHomeButton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4971">Preference Key Name: ShowHomeButton</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4972">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4972">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ## <a name="additional-policies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4974">Weitere Richtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4974">Additional policies</span></span>

  ### <a name="addressbarmicrosoftsearchinbingproviderenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4976">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4976">AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-microsoft-search-in-bing-suggestions-in-the-address-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4977">Aktivieren von Microsoft Search in Bing-Vorschlägen in der Adressleiste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4977">Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4978">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4978">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4979">Auf Windows und macOS ab 81 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4979">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4980">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4980">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-4981">Aktiviert die Anzeige der relevanten Microsoft-Suche in Bing-Vorschläge in der Vorschlagsliste der Adressleiste, wenn der Benutzer eine Suchzeichenfolge in der Adressleiste eingibt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4981">Enables the display of relevant Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar's suggestion list when the user types a search string in the address bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4982">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer Ergebnisse anzeigen, die von Microsoft Suche in Bing in der Vorschlagsliste der Microsoft Edge-Adressleiste angezeigt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4982">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can see internal results powered by Microsoft Search in Bing in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-4983">Um die Microsoft-Suche in Bing-Resultate anzuzeigen, muss der Benutzer mit seinem Azure AD-Konto für diese Organisation bei Microsoft Edge angemeldet sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4983">To see the Microsoft Search in Bing results, the user must be signed into Microsoft Edge with their Azure AD account for that organization.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-4984">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können die Benutzer interne Ergebnisse in der Vorschlagsliste der Microsoft Edge-Adressleiste nicht anzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4984">If you disable this policy, users can't see internal results in the Microsoft Edge address bar suggestion list.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-4985">Ab Microsoft Edge Version 89 wird Microsoft Search in Bing-Vorschlägen auch dann verfügbar sein, wenn Bing nicht der Standardsuchanbieter des Benutzers ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4985">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 89, Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions will be available even if Bing isn't the user's default search provider.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4986">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4986">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4987">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4987">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4988">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4988">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4989">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4989">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4990">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4990">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4991">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4991">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4992">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4992">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4993">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4993">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4994">GP eindeutiger Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4994">GP unique name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4995">GP-Name: Aktivieren von Microsoft Search in Bing-Vorschlägen in der Adressleiste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4995">GP name: Enable Microsoft Search in Bing suggestions in the address bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4996">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4996">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4997">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4997">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-4998">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4998">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-4999">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-4999">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5000">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5000">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5001">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5001">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5002">Wertname: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5002">Value Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5003">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5003">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5004">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5004">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5005">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5005">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5006">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5006">Preference Key Name: AddressBarMicrosoftSearchInBingProviderEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5007">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5007">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="adssettingforintrusiveadssites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5009">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5009">AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>

  #### <a name="ads-setting-for-sites-with-intrusive-ads"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5010">Anzeigeneinstellung für Websites mit aufdringlichen Anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5010">Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5011">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5011">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5012">Auf Windows und macOS ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5012">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5013">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5013">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5014">Steuert, ob Werbung auf Websites mit aufdringlichen Anzeigen blockiert wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5014">Controls whether ads are blocked on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5015">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5015">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5016">AllowAds (1) = Werbung auf allen Websites zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5016">AllowAds (1) = Allow ads on all sites</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5017">BlockAds (2) = Werbung auf Websites mit aufdringlichen Anzeigen blockieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5017">BlockAds (2) = Block ads on sites with intrusive ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5018">(Standardwert)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5018">(Default value)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5019">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5019">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5020">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5020">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5021">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5021">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5022">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5022">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5023">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5023">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5024">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5024">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5025">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5025">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5026">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5026">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5027">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5027">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5028">GP eindeutiger Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5028">GP unique name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5029">GP-Name: Anzeigeneinstellung für Websites mit aufdringlichen Anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5029">GP name: Ads setting for sites with intrusive ads</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5030">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5030">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5031">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5031">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5032">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5032">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5033">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5033">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5034">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5034">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5035">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5035">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5036">Wertname: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5036">Value Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5037">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5037">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5038">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5038">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5039">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5039">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5040">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5040">Preference Key Name: AdsSettingForIntrusiveAdsSites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5041">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5041">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="allowdeletingbrowserhistory"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5043">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5043">AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-deleting-browser-and-download-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5044">Löschen des Browser- und Downloadverlaufs aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5044">Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5045">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5045">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5046">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5046">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5047">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5047">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5048">Hiermit können Sie den Browserverlauf und den Downloadverlauf löschen und verhindern, dass Benutzer diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5048">Enables deleting browser history and download history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5049">Beachten Sie, dass auch bei Abschaltung dieser Richtlinie nicht sichergestellt ist, dass der Browser- und Downloadverlauf unbedingt aufbewahrt wird: Benutzer können die Verlaufsdatenbankdateien direkt bearbeiten oder löschen und der Browser selbst kann (basierend auf dem Ablaufzeitraum) Verlaufselemente jederzeit löschen oder archivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5049">Note that even with this policy is disabled, the browsing and download history aren't guaranteed to be retained: users can edit or delete the history database files directly, and the browser itself may remove (based on expiration period) or archive any or all history items at any time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5050">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer den Browser- und Downloadverlauf löschen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5050">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can delete the browsing and download history.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5051">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können Benutzer den Browser- und Downloadverlauf nicht löschen, und die Verlaufssynchronisierung ist deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5051">If you disable this policy, users can't delete browsing and download history, and history sync will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5052">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, aktivieren Sie die Richtlinie [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) nicht, da sich beide auf das Löschen von Daten auswirken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5052">If you enable this policy, don't enable the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy, because they both deal with deleting data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5053">Wenn Sie beide Optionen aktivieren, hat die [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit)-Richtlinie Vorrang und löscht alle Daten, wenn Microsoft Edge geschlossen wird – unabhängig davon, wie diese Richtlinie konfiguriert ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5053">If you enable both, the [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) policy takes precedence and deletes all data when Microsoft Edge closes, regardless of how this policy is configured.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5054">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5054">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5055">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5055">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5056">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5056">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5057">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5057">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5058">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5058">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5059">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5059">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5060">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5060">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5061">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5061">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5062">GP eindeutiger Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5062">GP unique name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5063">GP-Name: Löschen des Browser- und Downloadverlaufs aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5063">GP name: Enable deleting browser and download history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5064">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5064">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5065">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5065">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5066">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5066">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5067">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5067">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5068">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5068">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5069">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5069">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5070">Wertname: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5070">Value Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5071">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5071">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5072">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5072">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5073">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5073">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5074">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5074">Preference Key Name: AllowDeletingBrowserHistory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5075">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5075">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="allowfileselectiondialogs"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5077">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5077">AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-file-selection-dialogs"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5078">Dialogfelder „Dateiauswahl“ zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5078">Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5079">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5079">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5080">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5080">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5081">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5081">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5082">Ermöglichen Sie den Zugriff auf lokale Dateien, indem Sie Dateiauswahl-Dialogfelder in Microsoft Edge anzeigen lassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5082">Allow access to local files by letting Microsoft Edge display file selection dialogs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5083">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer die Dateiauswahl Dialogfelder normal öffnen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5083">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open file selection dialogs as normal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5084">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren und der Benutzer eine Aktion ausführt, durch die ein Dateiauswahl-Dialogfeld ausgelöst wird (z.B. beim Importieren von Favoriten, beim Hochladen von Dateien oder beim Speichern von Links), wird stattdessen eine Nachricht angezeigt, und es wird so verfahren, als hätte der Benutzer im Dateiauswahl-Dialogfeld auf „Abbrechen“ geklickt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5084">If you disable this policy, whenever the user performs an action that triggers a file selection dialog (like importing favorites, uploading files, or saving links), a message is displayed instead, and the user is assumed to have clicked Cancel on the file selection dialog.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5085">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5085">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5086">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5086">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5087">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5087">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5088">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5088">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5089">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5089">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5090">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5090">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5091">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5091">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5092">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5092">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5093">GP eindeutiger Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5093">GP unique name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5094">GP-Name: Dialogfelder „Dateiauswahl“ zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5094">GP name: Allow file selection dialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5095">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5095">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5096">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5096">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5097">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5097">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5098">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5098">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5099">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5099">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5100">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5100">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5101">Wertname: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5101">Value Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5102">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5102">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5103">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5103">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5104">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5104">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5105">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5105">Preference Key Name: AllowFileSelectionDialogs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5106">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5106">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="allowpopupsduringpageunload"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5108">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5108">AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-a-page-to-show-popups-during-its-unloading-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5109">Ermöglicht es einer Seite, Popups während ihrer Entladung anzuzeigen (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5109">Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-5110">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach der Microsoft Edge-Version 87 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5110">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5111">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5111">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5112">Unter Windows und macOS seit 78 bis 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5112">On Windows and macOS since 78, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5113">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5113">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5114">Diese Richtlinie ermöglicht es einem Administrator anzugeben, dass eine Seite während der Entladung Popups anzeigen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5114">This policy allows an admin to specify that a page can show popups during its unloading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5115">Wenn die Richtlinie auf "aktiviert" festgelegt ist, können Seiten Popups anzeigen, während sie entladen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5115">When the policy is set to enabled, pages are allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5116">Wenn die Richtlinie deaktiviert oder nicht eingerichtet ist, dürfen Seiten keine Popups anzeigen, während sie entladen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5116">When the policy is set to disabled or unset, pages aren't allowed to show popups while they're being unloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5117">Dies ist gemäß der Spezifikation: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5117">This is as per the spec: (https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#apis-for-creating-and-navigating-browsing-contexts-by-name).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5118">Diese Richtlinie wurde in Microsoft Edge 88 entfernt und wird ignoriert, wenn festgelegt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5118">This policy was removed in Microsoft Edge 88 and is ignored if set.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5119">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5119">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5120">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5120">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5121">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5121">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5122">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5122">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5124">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5124">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5125">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5125">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5126">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5126">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5127">GP eindeutiger Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5127">GP unique name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5128">GP-Name: Ermöglicht es einer Seite, Popups während ihrer Entladung anzuzeigen (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5128">GP name: Allows a page to show popups during its unloading (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5129">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5129">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5130">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5130">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5131">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5131">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5132">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5132">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5133">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5133">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5134">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5134">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5135">Wertname: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5135">Value Name: AllowPopupsDuringPageUnload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5136">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5136">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5137">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5137">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="allowsyncxhrinpagedismissal"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5172">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5172">AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-pages-to-send-synchronous-xhr-requests-during-page-dismissal-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5173">Seiten das Senden synchroner XHR-Anforderungen während der Seitenschließung ermöglichen (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5173">Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-5174">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5174">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5175">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5175">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5176">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5176">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5177">Auf Windows und macOS ab 79 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5177">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5178">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5178">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5179">Diese Richtlinie wird nicht mehr unterstützt, weil sie nur als kurzfristiger Mechanismus vorgesehen ist, um Unternehmen mehr Zeit zum Aktualisieren ihrer Webinhalte zu verschaffen, falls diese mit der Änderung inkompatibel sind, um synchrone XHR-Anforderungen während der Seitenschließung abzulehnen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5179">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the change to disallow synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5180">Dies wird in Microsoft Edge, Version 93 nicht funktionieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5180">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 93.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5181">Mit dieser Richtlinie können Sie festlegen, dass während der Schließung einer Seite synchrone XHR-Anforderungen gesendet werden können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5181">This policy lets you specify that a page can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5182">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können Seiten synchrone XHR-Anforderungen während der Seitenschließung senden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5182">If you enable this policy, pages can send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5183">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, dürfen Seiten während der Seitenschließung keine synchronen XHR-Anforderungen senden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5183">If you disable this policy or don't configure this policy, pages aren't allowed to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5184">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5184">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5185">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5185">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5186">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5186">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5187">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5187">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5188">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5188">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5189">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5189">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5190">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5190">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5191">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5191">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5192">GP eindeutiger Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5192">GP unique name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5193">GP-Name: Seiten das Senden synchroner XHR-Anforderungen während der Seitenschließung ermöglichen (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5193">GP name: Allow pages to send synchronous XHR requests during page dismissal (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5194">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5194">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5195">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5195">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5196">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5196">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5197">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5197">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5198">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5198">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5199">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5199">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5200">Wertname: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5200">Value Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5201">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5201">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5202">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5202">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5203">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5203">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5204">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5204">Preference Key Name: AllowSyncXHRInPageDismissal</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5205">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5205">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
