  ### <a name="allowtokenbindingforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5207">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5207">AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-sites-for-which-microsoft-edge-will-attempt-to-establish-a-token-binding-with"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5208">Konfigurieren Sie die Liste der Websites, für die Microsoft Edge versucht, eine Tokenbindung einzurichten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5208">Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5209">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5209">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5210">Auf Windows ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5210">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5211">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5211">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5212">Konfigurieren Sie die Liste der URL-Muster für Websites, bei denen der Browser versucht, das Token Binding-Protokoll auszuführen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5212">Configure the list of URL patterns for sites that the browser will attempt to perform the Token Binding protocol with.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-5213">Bei den Domänen in dieser Liste sendet der Browser das Token Binding-ClientHello im TLS-Handshake (siehe https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5213">For the domains on this list, the browser will send the Token Binding ClientHello in the TLS handshake (See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8472).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-5214">Wenn der Server mit einer gültigen ServerHello-Antwort antwortet, erstellt und sendet der Browser Token-Binding-Meldungen bei nachfolgenden HTTPS-Anforderungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5214">If the server responds with a valid ServerHello response, the browser will create and send Token Binding messages on subsequent https requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5215">Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5215">See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8471 for more info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5216">Wenn diese Liste leer ist, wird die Tokenbindung deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5216">If this list is empty, Token Binding will be disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5217">Diese Richtlinie steht nur auf Windows 10-Geräten zur Verfügung, die den Modus für virtuelle Sicherheit aufweisen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5217">This policy is only available on Windows 10 devices with Virtual Secure Mode capability.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5218">Ab Microsoft Edge 86 unterstützt diese Richtlinie keine dynamische Aktualisierung mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5218">Starting in Microsoft Edge 86, this policy no longer supports dynamic refresh.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5219">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5219">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5220">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5220">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5221">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5221">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5222">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5222">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5223">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5223">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5224">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5224">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5225">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5225">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5226">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5226">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5227">GP eindeutiger Name: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5227">GP unique name: AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5228">GP-Name: Konfigurieren Sie die Liste der Websites, für die Microsoft Edge versucht, eine Tokenbindung einzurichten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5228">GP name: Configure the list of sites for which Microsoft Edge will attempt to establish a Token Binding with</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5229">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5229">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5230">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5230">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5231">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5231">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5232">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5232">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5233">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5233">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5234">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5234">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5235">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5235">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5236">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5236">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5237">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5237">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\1 = "mydomain.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\2 = "[*.]mydomain2.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTokenBindingForUrls\3 = "[*.].mydomain2.com"

```

  ### <a name="allowtrackingforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5239">AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5239">AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-tracking-prevention-exceptions-for-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5240">Konfigurieren der Ausnahmen für die Nachverfolgungs-Vorbeugung für bestimmte Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5240">Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5241">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5241">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5242">Auf Windows und macOS ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5242">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5243">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5243">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5244">Konfigurieren Sie die Liste der URL-Muster, die vom Nachverfolgungsschutz ausgeschlossen sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5244">Configure the list of URL patterns that are excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5245">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren, wird die Liste der konfigurierten URL-Muster vom Nachverfolgungsschutz ausgeschlossen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5245">If you configure this policy, the list of configured URL patterns is excluded from tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5246">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der „Blockieren der Nachverfolgung der Webbrowsing-Aktivitäten des Benutzers“-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5246">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the "Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity" policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5247">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5247">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5248">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5248">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5249">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5249">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5250">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5250">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5251">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5251">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5252">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5252">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5253">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5253">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5254">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5254">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5255">GP eindeutiger Name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5255">GP unique name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5256">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der Ausnahmen für die Nachverfolgungs-Vorbeugung für bestimmte Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5256">GP name: Configure tracking prevention exceptions for specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5257">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5257">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5258">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5258">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5259">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5259">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5260">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5260">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5261">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5261">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5262">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5262">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5263">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5263">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5264">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5264">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5265">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5265">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AllowTrackingForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5266">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5266">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5267">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AllowTrackingForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5267">Preference Key Name: AllowTrackingForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5268">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5268">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="alternateerrorpagesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5270">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5270">AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="suggest-similar-pages-when-a-webpage-cant-be-found"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5271">Ähnliche Seiten vorschlagen, wenn eine Webseite nicht gefunden werden kann</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5271">Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5272">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5272">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5273">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5273">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5274">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5274">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5275">Microsoft Edge kann eine Verbindung mit einem Webdienst herstellen, um URL- und Suchvorschläge zu Verbindungsproblemen wie DNS-Fehlern zu generieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5275">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a connection to a web service to generate URL and search suggestions for connectivity issues such as DNS errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5276">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird ein Webdienst verwendet, um URL- und Suchvorschläge zu Netzwerkfehlern zu generieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5276">If you enable this policy, a web service is used to generate url and search suggestions for network errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5277">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden keine Abfragen an den Webdienst gesendet und es wird eine Standardfehlerseite angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5277">If you disable this policy, no calls to the web service are made and a standard error page is shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5278">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, respektiert Microsoft Edge die Benutzereinstellungen, die unter Dienste unter Edge://Settings/Privacy festgelegt sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5278">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-5279">Insbesondere gibt es ein Auswahlfeld namens **ähnliche Seiten vorschlagen, wenn eine Webseite nicht gefunden werden kann**, das der Benutzer ein- oder ausschalten kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5279">Specifically, there's a **Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5280">Beachten Sie, dass wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktiviert haben (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), die Einstellung „ähnliche Seiten vorschlagen, wenn eine Webseite nicht gefunden werden kann“ eingeschaltet ist, doch der Benutzer kann die Einstellung nicht mithilfe des Auswahlfeldes ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5280">Note that if you have enable this policy (AlternateErrorPagesEnabled), the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5281">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird die Einstellung „ähnliche Seiten vorschlagen, wenn eine Webseite nicht gefunden werden kann“ deaktiviert, und der Benutzer kann die Einstellung nicht mithilfe der Umschaltfläche ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5281">If you disable this policy, the Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5282">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5282">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5283">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5283">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5284">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5284">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5285">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5285">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5286">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5286">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5287">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5287">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5288">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5288">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5289">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5289">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5290">GP eindeutiger Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5290">GP unique name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5291">GP-Name: Ähnliche Seiten vorschlagen, wenn eine Webseite nicht gefunden werden kann</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5291">GP name: Suggest similar pages when a webpage can't be found</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5292">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5292">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5293">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5293">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5294">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5294">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5295">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5295">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5296">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5296">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5297">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5297">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5298">Wertname: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5298">Value Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5299">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5299">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5300">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5300">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5301">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5301">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5302">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5302">Preference Key Name: AlternateErrorPagesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5303">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5303">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="alwaysopenpdfexternally"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5305">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5305">AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>

  #### <a name="always-open-pdf-files-externally"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5306">PDF-Dateien immer extern öffnen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5306">Always open PDF files externally</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5307">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5307">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5308">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5308">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5309">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5309">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5310">Deaktiviert den internen PDF-Viewer in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5310">Disables the internal PDF viewer in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5311">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, behandelt Microsoft Edge PDF-Dateien als Downloads und ermöglicht es Benutzern, diese mit der Standardanwendung zu öffnen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5311">If you enable this policy Microsoft Edge treats PDF files as downloads and lets users open them with the default application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5312">Wenn Microsoft Edge der Standard-PDF-Reader ist, werden die PDF-Dateien nicht heruntergeladen und weiterhin in Microsoft Edge geöffnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5312">If Microsoft Edge is the default PDF reader, PDF files aren't downloaded and will continue to open in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5313">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder nicht aktivieren, öffnet Microsoft Edge PDF-Dateien (es sei denn, der Benutzer deaktiviert dies).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5313">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will open PDF files (unless the user disables it).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5314">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5314">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5315">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5315">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5316">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5316">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5317">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5317">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5318">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5318">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5319">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5319">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5320">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5320">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5321">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5321">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5322">GP eindeutiger Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5322">GP unique name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5323">GP-Name: PDF-Dateien immer extern öffnen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5323">GP name: Always open PDF files externally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5324">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5324">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5325">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5325">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5326">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5326">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5327">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5327">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5328">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5328">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5329">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5329">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5330">Wertname: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5330">Value Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5331">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5331">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5332">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5332">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5333">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5333">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5334">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5334">Preference Key Name: AlwaysOpenPdfExternally</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5335">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5335">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="ambientauthenticationinprivatemodesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5337">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5337">AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-ambient-authentication-for-inprivate-and-guest-profiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5338">Aktivieren der Umgebungsauthentifizierung für InPrivate- und Gastprofile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5338">Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5339">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5339">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5340">Auf Windows und macOS ab 81 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5340">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5341">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5341">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5342">Konfigurieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um die Umgebungsauthentifizierung für InPrivate- und Gastprofile in Microsoft Edge zuzulassen oder abzulehnen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5342">Configure this policy to allow/disallow ambient authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5343">Die Umgebungsauthentifizierung ist eine HTTP-Authentifizierung mit Standardanmeldeinformationen, wenn explizite Anmeldeinformationen nicht über NTLM/Kerberos/Negotiate Challenge/Antwortschemen bereitgestellt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5343">Ambient Authentication is http authentication with default credentials when explicit credentials aren't provided via NTLM/Kerberos/Negotiate challenge/response schemes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5344">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf „RegularOnly“ festlegen, wird die Ambient-Authentifizierung nur für reguläre Sitzungen zugelassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5344">If you set the policy to 'RegularOnly', it allows ambient authentication for Regular sessions only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5345">InPrivate- und Gastsitzungen dürfen keine Ambient-Authentifizierung durchführen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5345">InPrivate and Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5346">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf „InPrivateAndRegular“ festlegen, wird die Ambient-Authentifizierung für InPrivate und reguläre Sitzungen zugelassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5346">If you set the policy to 'InPrivateAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for InPrivate and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5347">Gastsitzungen dürfen keine Ambient-Authentifizierung durchführen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5347">Guest sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5348">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf „GuestAndRegular“ festlegen, ist die Ambient-Authentifizierung für Gast- und normale Sitzungen zugelassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5348">If you set the policy to 'GuestAndRegular', it allows ambient authentication for Guest and Regular sessions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5349">InPrivate-Sitzungen dürfen keine Ambient-Authentifizierung durchführen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5349">InPrivate sessions won't be allowed to ambiently authenticate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5350">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf „All“ festlegen, wird die Umgebungsauthentifizierung für alle Sitzungen zugelassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5350">If you set the policy to 'All', it allows ambient authentication for all sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5351">Beachten Sie, dass die Ambient-Authentifizierung in normalen Profilen immer zulässig ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5351">Note that ambient authentication is always allowed on regular profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5352">Wenn die Richtlinie in der Microsoft Edge-Version 81 und neuer nicht festgelegt ist, wird die Ambient-Authentifizierung nur in regulären Sitzungen aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5352">In Microsoft Edge version 81 and later, if the policy is left not set, ambient authentication will be enabled in regular sessions only.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5353">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5353">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5354">RegularOnly (0) = Ambient-Authentifizierung nur in regulären Sitzungen aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5354">RegularOnly (0) = Enable ambient authentication in regular sessions only</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5355">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = Aktivieren der Ambient-Authentifizierung für InPrivate- und reguläre Sitzungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5355">InPrivateAndRegular (1) = Enable ambient authentication in InPrivate and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5356">GuestAndRegular (2) = Aktivieren der Ambient-Authentifizierung für Gast- und reguläre Sitzungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5356">GuestAndRegular (2) = Enable ambient authentication in guest and regular sessions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5357">All (3) = Aktivieren der Ambient-Authentifizierung für reguläre, InPrivate- und Gastsitzungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5357">All (3) = Enable ambient authentication in regular, InPrivate and guest sessions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5358">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5358">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5359">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5359">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5360">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5360">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5361">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5361">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5362">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5362">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5363">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5363">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5364">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5364">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5365">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5365">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5366">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5366">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5367">GP eindeutiger Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5367">GP unique name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5368">GP-Name: Aktivieren der Umgebungsauthentifizierung für InPrivate- und Gastprofile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5368">GP name: Enable Ambient Authentication for InPrivate and Guest profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5369">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5369">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5370">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5370">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5371">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5371">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5372">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5372">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5373">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5373">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5374">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5374">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5375">Wertname: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5375">Value Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5376">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5376">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5377">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5377">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5378">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5378">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5379">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5379">Preference Key Name: AmbientAuthenticationInPrivateModesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5380">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5380">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```
