  ### <a name="appcacheforceenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5382">AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5382">AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-the-appcache-feature-to-be-re-enabled-even-if-its-turned-off-by-default"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5383">Ermöglicht das erneute Aktivieren des AppCache-Features, auch wenn es standardmäßig deaktiviert ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5383">Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5384">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5384">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5385">Auf Windows und MacOS ab 84 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5385">On Windows and macOS since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5386">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5386">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5387">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "wahr" festlegen, ist die AppCache aktiviert, auch wenn AppCache in Microsoft Edge standardmäßig nicht verfügbar ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5387">If you set this policy to true, the AppCache is enabled, even when AppCache in Microsoft Edge is not available by default.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5388">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "falsch" festlegen oder nicht festlegen, folgt AppCache den Standardwerten von Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5388">If you set this policy to false, or don't set it, AppCache will follow Microsoft Edge's defaults.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5389">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5389">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5390">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5390">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5391">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5391">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5392">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5392">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5393">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5393">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5394">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5394">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5395">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5395">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5396">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5396">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5397">Eindeutiger Name des GP: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5397">GP unique name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5398">GP-Name: Ermöglicht das erneute Aktivieren des AppCache-Features, auch wenn es standardmäßig deaktiviert ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5398">GP name: Allows the AppCache feature to be re-enabled, even if it's turned off by default</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5399">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5399">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5400">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5400">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5401">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5401">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5402">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5402">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5403">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5403">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5404">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5404">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5405">Wertname: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5405">Value Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5406">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5406">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5407">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5407">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5408">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5408">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5409">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: AppCacheForceEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5409">Preference Key Name: AppCacheForceEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5410">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5410">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-5411">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5411">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="applicationlocalevalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5412">ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5412">ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-application-locale"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5413">Festlegen des Anwendungsgebietsschemas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5413">Set application locale</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5414">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5414">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5415">Auf Windows ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5415">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5416">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5416">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5417">Konfiguriert das App-Gebietsschema in Microsoft Edge und hindert Benutzer daran, das Gebietsschema zu ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5417">Configures the application locale in Microsoft Edge and prevents users from changing the locale.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5418">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge das angegebene Gebietsschema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5418">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified locale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5419">Wenn das konfigurierte Gebietsschema nicht unterstützt wird, wird stattdessen "en-US" verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5419">If the configured locale isn't supported, 'en-US' is used instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5420">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge entweder das vom Benutzer angegebene bevorzugte Gebietsschema (sofern konfiguriert) oder das Fallback-Gebietsschema "en-US".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5420">If you disable or don't configure this setting, Microsoft Edge uses either the user-specified preferred locale (if configured) or the fallback locale 'en-US'.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5421">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5421">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5422">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5422">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5423">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5423">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5424">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5424">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5425">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5425">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5426">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5426">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5427">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5427">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5428">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5428">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5429">GP unique name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5429">GP unique name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5430">GP-Name: Festlegen des Anwendungsgebietsschemas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5430">GP name: Set application locale</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5431">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5431">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5432">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5432">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5433">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5433">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5434">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5434">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5435">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5435">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5436">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5436">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5437">Wertname: ApplicationLocaleValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5437">Value Name: ApplicationLocaleValue</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5438">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5438">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5439">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5439">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en"
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-5440">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5440">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="audiocaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5441">AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5441">AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-block-audio-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5442">Audio-Aufnahme zulassen oder blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5442">Allow or block audio capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5443">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5443">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5444">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5444">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5445">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5445">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5446">Ermöglicht es Ihnen, festzulegen, ob ein Benutzer aufgefordert wird, einer Website Zugriff auf sein Audioaufnahmegerät einzuräumen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5446">Allows you to set whether a user is prompted to grant a website access to their audio capture device.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5447">Diese Richtlinie gilt für alle URLs außer denen, die in der Liste [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) konfiguriert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5447">This policy applies to all URLs except for those configured in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5448">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren (die Standardeinstellung), wird der Benutzer für den Zugriff auf Audioaufzeichnungsgeräte aufgefordert, außer bei den URLs in der Liste [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5448">If you enable this policy or don't configure it (the default setting), the user is prompted for audio capture access except from the URLs in the [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5449">Diesen aufgelisteten URLs wird ohne Aufforderung an den Benutzer der Zugriff gewährt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5449">These listed URLs are granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5450">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird der Benutzer nicht aufgefordert, und die Audioaufzeichnung kann nur für die in [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls) konfigurierten URLs aufgerufen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5450">If you disable this policy, the user is not prompted, and audio capture is accessible only to the URLs configured in [AudioCaptureAllowedUrls](#audiocaptureallowedurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5451">Diese Richtlinie wirkt sich auf alle Arten von Audio-Eingabegeräten aus, nicht nur auf das integrierte Mikrofon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5451">This policy affects all types of audio inputs, not only the built-in microphone.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5452">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5452">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5453">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5453">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5454">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5454">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5455">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5455">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5456">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5456">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5457">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5457">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5458">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5458">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5459">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5459">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5460">GP eindeutiger Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5460">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5461">GP-Name: Audio-Aufnahme zulassen oder blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5461">GP name: Allow or block audio capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5462">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5462">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5463">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5463">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5464">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5464">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5465">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5465">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5466">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5466">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5467">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5467">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5468">Wertname: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5468">Value Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5469">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5469">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5470">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5470">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5471">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5471">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5472">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AudioCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5472">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5473">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5473">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-5474">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5474">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="audiocaptureallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5475">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5475">AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-that-can-access-audio-capture-devices-without-requesting-permission"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5476">Websites, die auf Audio-Aufnahmegeräte zugreifen können, ohne eine Berechtigung anfordern zu müssen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5476">Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5477">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5477">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5478">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5478">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5479">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5479">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5480">Sie können auf der Grundlage von URL-Mustern Websites angeben, die Audioaufnahmegeräte verwenden können, ohne den Benutzer um Erlaubnis zu bitten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5480">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use audio capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5481">Muster in dieser Liste werden mit dem Sicherheitsursprung der anfordernden URL abgeglichen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5481">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5482">Wenn eine Übereinstimmung vorliegt, wird automatisch der Zugriff auf die Audioaufnahmegeräte gewährt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5482">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to audio capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5483">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5483">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5484">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5484">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5485">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5485">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5486">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5486">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5487">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5487">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5488">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5488">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5489">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5489">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5490">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5490">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5491">GP eindeutiger Name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5491">GP unique name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5492">GP-Name: Websites, die auf Audio-Aufnahmegeräte zugreifen können, ohne eine Berechtigung anfordern zu müssen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5492">GP name: Sites that can access audio capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5493">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5493">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5494">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5494">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5495">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5495">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5496">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5496">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5497">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5497">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5498">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5498">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5499">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5499">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5500">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5500">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5501">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5501">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AudioCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5502">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5502">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5503">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5503">Preference Key Name: AudioCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5504">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5504">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-5505">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5505">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="audiosandboxenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5506">AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5506">AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-audio-sandbox-to-run"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5507">Audio-Sandkasten ausführen lassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5507">Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5508">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5508">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5509">Auf Windows und macOS ab 81 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5509">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5510">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5510">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5511">Diese Richtlinie steuert die Audioprozess-Sandbox.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5511">This policy controls the audio process sandbox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5512">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird der Audiovorgang in der Sandbox ausgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5512">If you enable this policy, the audio process will run sandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5513">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird der Audiovorgang nicht in der Sandbox ausgeführt, und das WebRTC-Audioverarbeitungsmodul wird im Rendererprozess ausgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5513">If you disable this policy, the audio process will run unsandboxed and the WebRTC audio-processing module will run in the renderer process.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-5514">Damit bleiben die Benutzer offen für Sicherheitsrisiken, die mit der Ausführung des Audio-Subsystems außerhalb einer Sandbox verbunden sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5514">This leaves users open to security risks related to running the audio subsystem unsandboxed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5515">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird die Standardkonfiguration für die Audio-Sandbox verwendet, die je nach Plattform unterschiedlich sein kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5515">If you don't configure this policy, the default configuration for the audio sandbox will be used, which might differ based on the platform.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5516">Diese Richtlinie soll Unternehmen Flexibilität beim Deaktivieren der Audio-Sandbox bieten, wenn sie Sicherheitssoftware-Setups verwenden, welche die Sandbox behindert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5516">This policy is intended to give enterprises flexibility to disable the audio sandbox if they use security software setups that interfere with the sandbox.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5517">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5517">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5518">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5518">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5519">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5519">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5520">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5520">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5521">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5521">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5522">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5522">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5523">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5523">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5524">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5524">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5525">GP eindeutiger Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5525">GP unique name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5526">GP-Name: Audio-Sandkasten ausführen lassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5526">GP name: Allow the audio sandbox to run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5527">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5527">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5528">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5528">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5529">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5529">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5530">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5530">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5531">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5531">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5532">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5532">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5533">Wertname: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5533">Value Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5534">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5534">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5535">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5535">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5536">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5536">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5537">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AudioSandboxEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5537">Preference Key Name: AudioSandboxEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5538">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5538">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-5539">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5539">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoimportatfirstrun"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5540">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5540">AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>

  #### <a name="automatically-import-another-browsers-data-and-settings-at-first-run"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5541">Automatisches Importieren der Daten und Einstellungen eines anderen Browsers bei der ersten Ausführung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5541">Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5542">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5542">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5543">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5543">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5544">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5544">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5545">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden alle unterstützten Datentypen und Einstellungen aus dem angegebenen Browser bei der ersten Ausführung automatisch und im Hintergrund importiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5545">If you enable this policy, all supported datatypes and settings from the specified browser will be silently and automatically imported at first run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5546">In der Benutzererfahrung zur ersten Ausführung wird der Import-Abschnitt ebenfalls übersprungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5546">During the First Run Experience, the import section will also be skipped.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5547">Die Browserdaten aus Microsoft Edge Legacy werden bei der ersten Ausführung unabhängig vom Wert dieser Richtlinie immer automatisch migriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5547">The browser data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will always be silently migrated at the first run, irrespective of the value of this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5548">Wenn diese Richtlinie auf „FromDefaultBrowser“ eingestellt ist, werden die Datentypen importiert, die dem Standardbrowser auf dem verwalteten Gerät entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5548">If this policy is set to 'FromDefaultBrowser', then the datatypes corresponding to the default browser on the managed device will be imported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5549">Wenn der als Wert dieser Richtlinie angegebene Browser nicht auf dem verwalteten Gerät vorhanden ist, wird der Import durch Microsoft Edge einfach übersprungen, ohne dass eine Benachrichtigung an den Benutzer erfolgt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5549">If the browser specified as the value of this policy is not present in the managed device, Microsoft Edge will simply skip the import without any notification to the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5550">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „DisabledAutoImport“ festgelegt haben, wird der Import-Abschnitt der Benutzererfahrung zur ersten Ausführung vollständig übersprungen, und Microsoft Edge importiert keine Browserdaten und -Einstellungen automatisch.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5550">If you set this policy to 'DisabledAutoImport', the import section of the first-run experience is skipped entirely and Microsoft Edge doesn't import browser data and settings automatically.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5551">Wenn diese Richtlinie auf den Wert „FromInternetExplorer“ eingestellt ist, werden die folgenden Datentypen aus Internet Explorer importiert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5551">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromInternetExplorer', the following datatypes will be imported from Internet Explorer:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5552">Favoriten oder Lesezeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5552">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5553">Gespeicherte Kennwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5553">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5554">Suchmaschinen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5554">Search engines</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5555">Browserverlauf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5555">Browsing history</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5556">Startseite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5556">Home page</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5557">Wenn diese Richtlinie auf den Wert „FromGoogleChrome“ festgelegt ist, werden die folgenden Datentypen aus Google Chrome importiert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5557">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromGoogleChrome', the following datatypes will be imported from Google Chrome:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5558">Favoriten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5558">Favorites</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5559">Gespeicherte Kennwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5559">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5560">Adressen und weiteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5560">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5561">Zahlungsinformationen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5561">Payment info</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5562">Browserverlauf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5562">Browsing history</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5563">Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5563">Settings</span></span>
7. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5564">Angepinnte und geöffnete Registerkarten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5564">Pinned and Open tabs</span></span>
8. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5565">Extensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5565">Extensions</span></span>
9. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5566">Cookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5566">Cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5567">Hinweis: Weitere Informationen dazu, was aus Google Chrome importiert wird, finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5567">Note: For more details on what is imported from Google Chrome, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2120835)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5568">Wenn diese Richtlinie auf den Wert „FromSafari“ eingestellt ist, werden Benutzerdaten nicht mehr in Microsoft Edge importiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5568">If this policy is set to the value of 'FromSafari', user data is no longer imported into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5569">Dies ist aufgrund der Funktionsweise von Full Disk Access auf Mac.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5569">This is due to the way Full Disk Access works on Mac.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-5570">Auf MacOS Mojave und höher ist es nicht mehr möglich, Safari-Daten automatisch und unbeaufsichtigt in Microsoft Edge zu importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5570">On macOS Mojave and above, it's no longer possible to have automated and unattended import of Safari data into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5571">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge Version 83 werden die folgenden Datentypen aus Mozilla Firefox importiert, wenn diese Richtlinie auf den Wert „FromMozillaFirefox“ gesetzt ist:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5571">Starting with Microsoft Edge version 83, if this policy is set to the value of 'FromMozillaFirefox', the following datatypes will be imported from Mozilla Firefox:</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5572">Favoriten oder Lesezeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5572">Favorites or bookmarks</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5573">Gespeicherte Kennwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5573">Saved passwords</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5574">Adressen und weiteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5574">Addresses and more</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="09666-5575">Browserverlauf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5575">Browsing History</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5576">Wenn Sie verhindern möchten, dass bestimmte Datentypen auf verwalteten Geräten importiert werden, können Sie diese Richtlinie mit anderen Richtlinien wie [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites) usw. verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5576">If you want to restrict specific datatypes from getting imported on the managed devices, you can use this policy with other policies such as [ImportAutofillFormData](#importautofillformdata), [ImportBrowserSettings](#importbrowsersettings), [ImportFavorites](#importfavorites), and etc.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5577">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5577">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5578">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = importiert automatisch alle unterstützten Datentypen und Einstellungen aus dem Standardbrowser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5578">FromDefaultBrowser (0) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from the default browser</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5579">FromDefaultBrowser (1) = importiert automatisch alle unterstützten Datentypen und Einstellungen aus dem Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5579">FromInternetExplorer (1) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Internet Explorer</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5580">FromGoogleChrome (2) = importiert automatisch alle unterstützten Datentypen und Einstellungen von Google Chrome</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5580">FromGoogleChrome (2) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Google Chrome</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5581">FromSafari (3) = importiert automatisch alle unterstützten Datentypen und Einstellungen aus Safari</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5581">FromSafari (3) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Safari</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5582">DisabledAutoImport (4) = deaktiviert den automatischen Import und überspringt den Import-Abschnitt der Benutzererfahrung zur ersten Ausführung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5582">DisabledAutoImport (4) = Disables automatic import, and the import section of the first-run experience is skipped</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5583">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = importiert automatisch alle unterstützten Datentypen und Einstellungen aus Mozilla Firefox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5583">FromMozillaFirefox (5) = Automatically imports all supported datatypes and settings from Mozilla Firefox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5584">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5584">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5585">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5585">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5586">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5586">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5587">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5587">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5588">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5588">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5589">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5589">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5590">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5590">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5591">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5591">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5592">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5592">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5593">GP eindeutiger Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5593">GP unique name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5594">GP-Name: Automatisches Importieren der Daten und Einstellungen eines anderen Browsers bei der ersten Ausführung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5594">GP name: Automatically import another browser's data and settings at first run</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5595">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5595">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5596">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5596">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5597">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5597">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5598">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5598">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5599">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5599">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5600">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5600">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5601">Wertname: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5601">Value Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5602">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5602">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5603">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5603">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5604">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5604">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5605">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5605">Preference Key Name: AutoImportAtFirstRun</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5606">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5606">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="autolaunchprotocolsfromorigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5608">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5608">AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-a-list-of-protocols-that-can-launch-an-external-application-from-listed-origins-without-prompting-the-user"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5609">Eine Liste der Protokolle definieren, mit denen eine externe Anwendung von den aufgeführten Ursprüngen aus gestartet werden kann, ohne den Benutzer aufzufordern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5609">Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5610">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5610">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5611">Auf Windows und MacOS ab 85 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5611">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5612">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5612">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5613">Ermöglicht es Ihnen, eine Liste der Protokolle und für jedes Protokoll eine zugeordnete Liste zulässiger Ursprungsmuster festzulegen, die eine externe Anwendung starten können, ohne den Benutzer aufzufordern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5613">Allows you to set a list of protocols, and for each protocol an associated list of allowed origin patterns, that can launch an external application without prompting the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5614">Das nachgestellte Trennzeichen sollte nicht einbezogen werden, wenn das Protokoll aufgelistet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5614">The trailing separator should not be included when listing the protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5615">Listen Sie beispielsweise "Skype" anstelle von "Skype:" oder "Skype://" auf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5615">For example, list "skype" instead of "skype:" or "skype://".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5616">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren, ist es nur zulässig, ein Protokoll zu starten, ohne dass eine externe Anwendung durch Richtlinie angefordert wird wenn:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5616">If you configure this policy, a protocol will only be permitted to launch an external application without prompting by policy if:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-5617">das Protokoll aufgelistet ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5617">the protocol is listed</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-5618">der Ursprung der Website, die versucht, das Protokoll zu starten, einem der Ursprungsmuster entspricht in der allowed_origins Liste dieses Protokolls.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5618">the origin of the site trying to launch the protocol matches one of the origin patterns in that protocol's allowed_origins list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5619">Wenn eine der Bedingungen falsch ist, wird die Eingabeaufforderung für den externen Protokollstart nicht durch Richtlinien ausgelassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5619">If either condition is false, the external protocol launch prompt will not be omitted by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5620">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können keine Protokolle ohne Eingabeaufforderung gestartet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5620">If you don't configure this policy, no protocols can launch without a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5621">Benutzer können die Eingabeaufforderungen auf Protokoll-/Website Basis deaktivieren, es sei denn, die Richtlinie [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) ist deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5621">Users can opt out of prompts on a per-protocol/per-site basis unless the [ExternalProtocolDialogShowAlwaysOpenCheckbox](#externalprotocoldialogshowalwaysopencheckbox) policy is set to Disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5622">Diese Richtlinie wirkt sich nicht auf die von Benutzern festgelegten Ausnahmen pro Protokoll/Website aus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5622">This policy has no impact on per-protocol/per-site prompt exemptions set by users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5623">Bei den Mustern für den Ursprung entsprechen dieselben Formate wie für die [URLBlocklist-](#urlblocklist) Richtlinie, die bei[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)dokumentiert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5623">The origin matching patterns use a similar format to those for the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy, which are documented at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5624">Allerdings können die Ursprungs Übereinstimmungsmuster für diese Richtlinie keine "/Path"-oder "@Query"-Elemente enthalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5624">However, origin matching patterns for this policy cannot contain "/path" or "@query" elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5625">Jedes Muster, das das Element "/Path" oder "@Query" enthält, wird ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5625">Any pattern that does contain a "/path" or "@query" element will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5626">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5626">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5627">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5627">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5628">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5628">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5629">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5629">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5630">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5630">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5631">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5631">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5632">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5632">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5633">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5633">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5634">Eindeutiger Name des GP: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5634">GP unique name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5635">GP-Name: Eine Liste der Protokolle definieren, mit denen eine externe Anwendung von den aufgeführten Ursprüngen aus gestartet werden kann, ohne den Benutzer aufzufordern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5635">GP name: Define a list of protocols that can launch an external application from listed origins without prompting the user</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5636">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5636">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5637">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5637">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5638">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5638">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5639">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5639">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5640">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5640">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5641">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5641">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5642">Wertname: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5642">Value Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5643">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5643">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5644">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5644">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "example.com", 
      "http://www.example.com:8080"
    ], 
    "protocol": "spotify"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "https://example.com", 
      "https://.mail.example.com"
    ], 
    "protocol": "teams"
  }, 
  {
    "allowed_origins": [
      "*"
    ], 
    "protocol": "outlook"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5645">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5645">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins = [{"allowed_origins": ["example.com", "http://www.example.com:8080"], "protocol": "spotify"}, {"allowed_origins": ["https://example.com", "https://.mail.example.com"], "protocol": "teams"}, {"allowed_origins": ["*"], "protocol": "outlook"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5646">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5646">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5647">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5647">Preference Key Name: AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5648">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5648">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>AutoLaunchProtocolsFromOrigins</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>example.com</string>
      <string>http://www.example.com:8080</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>spotify</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>https://example.com</string>
      <string>https://.mail.example.com</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>teams</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>allowed_origins</key>
    <array>
      <string>*</string>
    </array>
    <key>protocol</key>
    <string>outlook</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="autoopenallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5650">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5650">AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>

  #### <a name="urls-where-autoopenfiletypes-can-apply"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5651">URLs, auf die AutoOpenFileTypes angewendet werden können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5651">URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5652">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5652">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5653">Auf Windows und MacOS ab 85 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5653">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5654">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5654">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5655">Eine Liste der URLs, auf die [AutoOpenFileTypes-](#autoopenfiletypes) angewendet werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5655">A list of URLs to which [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will apply to.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5656">Diese Richtlinie hat keine Auswirkungen auf automatisch geöffnete Werte, die von Benutzern über das Download-Feld festgelegt werden... > Menüeintrag "Dateien dieser Art immer öffnen".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5656">This policy has no impact on automatically open values set by users via the download shelf ... > "Always open files of this type" menu entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5657">Wenn Sie URLs in dieser Richtlinie festlegen, werden Dateien nur nach Richtlinie automatisch geöffnet, wenn die URL Bestandteil dieses Satzes ist und der Dateityp in [AutoOpenFileTypes-](#autoopenfiletypes)aufgelistet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5657">If you set URLs in this policy, files will only automatically open by policy if the URL is part of this set and the file type is listed in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5658">Wenn eine der beiden Voraussetzungen falsch ist, wird der Download nicht automatisch durch Richtlinie geöffnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5658">If either condition is false, the download won't automatically open by policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5659">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, werden alle Downloads, bei denen der Dateityp in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) ist, automatisch geöffnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5659">If you don't set this policy, all downloads where the file type is in [AutoOpenFileTypes](#autoopenfiletypes) will automatically open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5660">Ein URL-Muster muss gemäß [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322)formatiert sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5660">A URL pattern has to be formatted according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5661">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5661">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5662">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5662">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5663">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5663">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5664">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5664">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5665">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5665">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5666">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5666">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5667">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5667">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5668">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5668">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5669">Eindeutiger Name des GP: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5669">GP unique name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5670">GP-Name: URLs, auf die AutoOpenFileTypes angewendet werden können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5670">GP name: URLs where AutoOpenFileTypes can apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5671">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5671">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5672">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5672">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5673">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5673">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5674">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5674">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5675">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5675">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5676">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5676">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5677">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5677">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5678">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5678">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5679">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5679">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\1 = "example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenAllowedForURLs\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5680">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5680">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5681">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5681">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenAllowedForURLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5682">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5682">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>example.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-5683">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5683">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="autoopenfiletypes"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5684">AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5684">AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>

  #### <a name="list-of-file-types-that-should-be-automatically-opened-on-download"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5685">Liste der Dateitypen, die beim Download automatisch geöffnet werden sollen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5685">List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5686">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5686">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5687">Auf Windows und MacOS ab 85 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5687">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5688">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5688">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5689">Mit dieser Richtlinie wird eine Liste der Dateitypen festgelegt, die beim Download automatisch geöffnet werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5689">This policy sets a list of file types that should be automatically opened on download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5690">Hinweis: beim Auflisten des Dateityps sollte das führende Trennzeichen nicht einbezogen werden, also wird "txt" anstelle von ".txt" aufgelistet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5690">Note: The leading separator should not be included when listing the file type, so list "txt" instead of ".txt".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5691">Standardmäßig werden diese Dateitypen automatisch für alle URLs geöffnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5691">By default, these file types will be automatically opened on all URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5692">Sie können die [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) Richtlinie verwenden, um die URLs einzuschränken, für die diese Dateitypen automatisch geöffnet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5692">You can use the [AutoOpenAllowedForURLs](#autoopenallowedforurls) policy to restrict the URLs for which these file types will be automatically opened on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5693">Dateien mit Typen, die automatisch geöffnet werden sollten, unterliegen weiterhin der aktivierten Microsoft Defender-SmartScreen-Überprüfung und werden nicht geöffnet, wenn diese Überprüfung fehlschlägt. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5693">Files with types that should be automatically opened will still be subject to the enabled Microsoft Defender SmartScreen checks and won't be opened if they fail those checks.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5694">Die Dateitypen, die ein Benutzer bereits für das automatische öffnen angegeben hat, werden beim Herunterladen weiterhin durchgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5694">File types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will continue to do so when downloaded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5695">Der Benutzer kann weiterhin weitere Dateitypen angeben, die automatisch geöffnet werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5695">The user will continue to be able to specify other file types to be automatically opened.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5696">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, werden nur die Dateitypen, die ein Benutzer bereits für das automatische öffnen angegeben hat, beim Herunterladen verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5696">If you don't set this policy, only file types that a user has already specified to automatically be opened will do so when downloaded.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5697">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5697">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5698">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5698">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5699">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5699">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5700">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5700">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5701">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5701">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5702">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5702">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5703">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5703">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5704">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5704">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5705">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5705">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5706">Eindeutiger Name des GP: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5706">GP unique name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5707">GP-Name: Liste der Dateitypen, die beim Download automatisch geöffnet werden sollen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5707">GP name: List of file types that should be automatically opened on download</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5708">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5708">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5709">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5709">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5710">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5710">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5711">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5711">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5712">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5712">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5713">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5713">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5714">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5714">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5715">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5715">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5716">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5716">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\1 = "exe"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\AutoOpenFileTypes\2 = "txt"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5717">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5717">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5718">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: AutoOpenFileTypes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5718">Preference Key Name: AutoOpenFileTypes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5719">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5719">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>exe</string>
  <string>txt</string>
</array>
```
