  ### <a name="autofilladdressenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5721">AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5721">AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-autofill-for-addresses"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5722">Automatisches Ausfüllen von Adressen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5722">Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5723">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5723">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5724">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5724">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5725">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5725">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5726">Aktiviert das Feature "AutoFill" und ermöglicht es Benutzern, Adressinformationen in Webformularen mit zuvor gespeicherten Informationen automatisch zu vervollständigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5726">Enables the AutoFill feature and allows users to auto-complete address information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5727">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden Adressinformationen von AutoFill niemals vorgeschlagen oder ausgefüllt, und es werden auch keine weiteren Adressinformationen gespeichert, die der Benutzer während des Surfens im Internet möglicherweise senden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5727">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills in address information, nor does it save additional address information that the user might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5728">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer AutoFill für Adressen über die Benutzeroberfläche steuern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5728">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for addresses in the user interface.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5729">Beachten Sie, dass Sie, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, auch alle Aktivitäten aller Webformulare beenden, außer Zahlungs- und Kennwort-Formularen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5729">Note that if you disable this policy you also stop all activity for all web forms, except payment and password forms.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5730">Es werden keine weiteren Einträge gespeichert, und Microsoft Edge schlägt keine vorherigen Einträge vor oder verwendet AutoFill.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5730">No further entries are saved, and Microsoft Edge won't suggest or AutoFill any previous entries.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5731">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5731">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5732">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5732">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5733">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5733">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5734">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5734">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5735">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5735">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5736">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5736">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5737">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5737">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5738">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5738">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5739">GP eindeutiger Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5739">GP unique name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5740">GP-Name: Automatisches Ausfüllen von Adressen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5740">GP name: Enable AutoFill for addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5741">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5741">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5742">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5742">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5743">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5743">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5744">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5744">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5745">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5745">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5746">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5746">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5747">Wertname: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5747">Value Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5748">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5748">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5749">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5749">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5750">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5750">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5751">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AutofillAddressEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5751">Preference Key Name: AutofillAddressEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5752">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5752">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="autofillcreditcardenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5754">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5754">AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-autofill-for-credit-cards"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5755">AutoFill für Kreditkartendaten aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5755">Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5756">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5756">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5757">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5757">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5758">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5758">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5759">Aktiviert das Feature "AutoFill" in Microsoft Edge und lässt Benutzer Kreditkarteninformationen in Webformularen mit zuvor gespeicherten Informationen automatisch vervollständigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5759">Enables Microsoft Edge's AutoFill feature and lets users auto complete credit card information in web forms using previously stored information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5760">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden Kreditkarteninformationen von AutoFill niemals vorgeschlagen oder ausgefüllt, und es werden auch keine weiteren Kreditkarteninformationen gespeichert, die Benutzer während des Surfens im Internet möglicherweise senden können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5760">If you disable this policy, AutoFill never suggests or fills credit card information, nor will it save additional credit card information that users might submit while browsing the web.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5761">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer AutoFill für Kreditkarten steuern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5761">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can control AutoFill for credit cards.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5762">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5762">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5763">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5763">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5764">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5764">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5765">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5765">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5766">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5766">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5767">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5767">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5768">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5768">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5769">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5769">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5770">GP eindeutiger Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5770">GP unique name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5771">GP-Name: AutoFill für Kreditkartendaten aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5771">GP name: Enable AutoFill for credit cards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5772">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5772">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5773">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5773">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5774">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5774">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5775">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5775">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5776">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5776">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5777">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5777">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5778">Wertname: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5778">Value Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5779">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5779">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5780">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5780">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5781">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5781">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5782">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5782">Preference Key Name: AutofillCreditCardEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5783">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5783">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="autoplayallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5785">AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5785">AutoplayAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-media-autoplay-for-websites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5786">Zulassen der automatischen Wiedergabe von Medien für Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5786">Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5787">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5787">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5788">Auf Windows und macOS ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5788">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5789">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5789">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5790">Mit dieser Richtlinie wird die Medien AutoPlay-Richtlinie für Websites festgelegt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5790">This policy sets the media autoplay policy for websites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5791">Die Standardeinstellung "nicht konfiguriert" respektiert die aktuellen Einstellungen für die Wiedergabe von Medien und ermöglicht Benutzern, ihre Einstellungen für die automatische Wiedergabe zu konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5791">The default setting, "Not configured" respects the current media autoplay settings and lets users configure their autoplay settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5792">Wenn Sie die Richtlinine auf "aktiviert" festlegen, wird die automatische Wiedergabe auf "zulassen" festgelegt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5792">Setting to "Enabled" sets media autoplay to "Allow".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5793">Allen Websites ist die Wiedergabe von Medien gestattet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5793">All websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5794">Benutzer können diese Richtlinie nicht außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5794">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5795">Wenn Sie die Richtlinine auf "deaktiviert" festlegen, wird die automatische Wiedergabe auf "blockieren" festgelegt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5795">Setting to "Disabled" sets media autoplay to "Block".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5796">Keiner Website ist die Wiedergabe von Medien gestattet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5796">No websites are allowed to autoplay media.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5797">Benutzer können diese Richtlinie nicht außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5797">Users can't override this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5798">Eine Registerkarte muss geschlossen und erneut geöffnet werden, damit diese Richtlinie wirksam wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5798">A tab will need to be closed and re-opened for this policy to take effect.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5799">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5799">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5800">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5800">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5801">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5801">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5802">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5802">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5803">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5803">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5804">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5804">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5805">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5805">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5806">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5806">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5807">GP eindeutiger Name: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5807">GP unique name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5808">GP-Name: Zulassen der automatischen Wiedergabe von Medien für Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5808">GP name: Allow media autoplay for websites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5809">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5809">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5810">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5810">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5811">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5811">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5812">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5812">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5813">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5813">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5814">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5814">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5815">Wertname: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5815">Value Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5816">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5816">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5817">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5817">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5818">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5818">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5819">Einstellung Schlüsselname: AutoplayAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5819">Preference Key Name: AutoplayAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5820">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5820">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="backgroundmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5822">BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5822">BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="continue-running-background-apps-after-microsoft-edge-closes"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5823">Ausführung von Hintergrund-Apps zulassen, nachdem Microsoft Edge geschlossen wurde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5823">Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5824">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5824">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5825">Auf Windows ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5825">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5826">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5826">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5827">Microsoft Edge-Prozesse können bei der Betriebssystem-Anmeldung starten und nach dem Schließen des letzten Browserfensters weiterhin ausgeführt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5827">Allows Microsoft Edge processes to start at OS sign-in and keep running after the last browser window is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5828">In diesem Szenario bleiben Hintergrund-Apps und die aktuelle Browsersitzung aktiv, einschließlich aller Sitzungscookies.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5828">In this scenario, background apps and the current browsing session remain active, including any session cookies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5829">Bei einem geöffneten Hintergrundprozess wird ein Symbol in der Taskleiste angezeigt, und er kann immer von dort aus geschlossen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5829">An open background process displays an icon in the system tray and can always be closed from there.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5830">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, ist der Hintergrundmodus aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5830">If you enable this policy, background mode is turned on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5831">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, ist der Hintergrundmodus deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5831">If you disable this policy, background mode is turned off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5832">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, ist der Hintergrundmodus anfänglich deaktiviert, und der Benutzer kann dessen Verhalten in Edge://Settings/System konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5832">If you don't configure this policy, background mode is initially turned off, and the user can configure its behavior in edge://settings/system.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5833">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5833">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5834">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5834">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5835">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5835">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5836">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5836">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5837">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5837">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5838">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5838">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5839">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5839">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5840">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5840">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5841">GP eindeutiger Name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5841">GP unique name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5842">GP-Name: Ausführung von Hintergrund-Apps zulassen, nachdem Microsoft Edge geschlossen wurde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5842">GP name: Continue running background apps after Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5843">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5843">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5844">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5844">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5845">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5845">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5846">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5846">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5847">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5847">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5848">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5848">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5849">Wertname: BackgroundModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5849">Value Name: BackgroundModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5850">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5850">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5851">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5851">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="backgroundtemplatelistupdatesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5853">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5853">BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enables-background-updates-to-the-list-of-available-templates-for-collections-and-other-features-that-use-templates"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5854">Aktiviert Hintergrundaktualisierungen der Liste verfügbarer Vorlagen für Kollektionen und andere Features, die Vorlagen verwenden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5854">Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5855">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5855">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5856">Auf Windows und macOS ab 79 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5856">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5857">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5857">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5858">Aktiviert oder deaktiviert Hintergrundaktualisierungen der Liste verfügbarer Vorlagen für Kollektionen und andere Features, die Vorlagen verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5858">Lets you enable or disable background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5859">Vorlagen werden verwendet, um umfangreiche Metadaten aus einer Webseite zu extrahieren, wenn die Seite in einer Sammlung gespeichert wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5859">Templates are used to extract rich metadata from a webpage when the page is saved to a collection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5860">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren oder die Einstellung nicht konfiguriert ist, wird die Liste der verfügbaren Vorlagen alle 24 Stunden im Hintergrund von einem Microsoft-Dienst heruntergeladen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5860">If you enable this setting or the setting is unconfigured, the list of available templates will be downloaded in the background from a Microsoft service every 24 hours.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5861">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren, wird die Liste der verfügbaren Vorlagen bei Bedarf heruntergeladen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5861">If you disable this setting the list of available templates will be downloaded on demand.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5862">Diese Art von Download kann zu kleinen Leistungseinbußen bei Sammlungen und anderen Features führen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5862">This type of download might result in small performance penalties for Collections and other features.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5863">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5863">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5864">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5864">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5865">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5865">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5866">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5866">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5867">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5867">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5868">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5868">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5869">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5869">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5870">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5870">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5871">GP eindeutiger Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5871">GP unique name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5872">GP-Name: Aktiviert Hintergrundaktualisierungen der Liste verfügbarer Vorlagen für Kollektionen und andere Features, die Vorlagen verwenden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5872">GP name: Enables background updates to the list of available templates for Collections and other features that use templates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5873">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5873">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5874">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5874">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5875">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5875">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5876">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5876">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5877">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5877">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5878">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5878">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5879">Wertname: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5879">Value Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5880">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5880">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5881">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5881">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5882">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5882">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5883">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5883">Preference Key Name: BackgroundTemplateListUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5884">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5884">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="bingadssuppression"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5886">BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5886">BingAdsSuppression</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-all-ads-on-bing-search-results"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5887">Blockieren aller Anzeigen in Bing-Suchergebnissen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5887">Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5888">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5888">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5889">Auf Windows und macOS ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5889">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5890">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5890">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5891">Ermöglicht eine Suchumgebung ohne Werbung auf Bing.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5891">Enables an ad-free search experience on Bing.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5892">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, kann ein Benutzer auf Bing.com suchen, ohne dass dabei Werbung angezeigt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5892">If you enable this policy, then a user can search on bing.com and have an ad-free search experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5893">Gleichzeitig wird die SafeSearch-Einstellung auf "Strikt" festgelegt und kann vom Benutzer nicht geändert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5893">At the same time, the SafeSearch setting will be set to 'Strict' and can't be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5894">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden in den Suchergebnissen auf Bing.com Werbeanzeigen angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5894">If you don't configure this policy, then the default experience will have ads in the search results on bing.com.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5895">SafeSearch wird standardmäßig auf "moderat" festgelegt und kann vom Benutzer geändert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5895">SafeSearch will be set to 'Moderate' by default and can be changed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5896">Diese Richtlinie steht nur für K-12-SKUs zur Verfügung, die von Microsoft als EDU-Mandanten anerkannt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5896">This policy is only available for K-12 SKUs that are identified as EDU tenants by Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5897">Wenn Sie weitere Informationen zu dieser Richtlinie erhalten möchten oder die folgenden Szenarien auf Sie zutreffen, lesen Sie bitte [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5897">Please refer to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2119711) to learn more about this policy or if the following scenarios apply to you:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5898">Sie verfügen über einen EDU-Mandanten, aber die Richtlinie funktioniert nicht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5898">You have an EDU tenant, but the policy doesn't work.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5899">Ihre IP-Adresse wurde für das werbefreie Sucherlebnis auf eine Zulassungsliste gesetzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5899">You had your IP allowlisted for having an ad free search experience.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-5900">Bei Vorgängerversion von Microsoft Edge hatten Sie bereits die werbefreie Suchumgebung und möchten ein Upgrade auf die neue Version von Microsoft Edge durchführen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5900">You were experiencing an ad-free search experience on Microsoft Edge Legacy and want to upgrade to the new version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5901">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5901">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5902">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5902">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5903">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5903">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5904">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5904">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5905">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5905">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5906">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5906">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5907">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5907">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5908">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5908">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5909">GP eindeutiger Name: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5909">GP unique name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5910">GP-Name: Blockieren aller Anzeigen in Bing-Suchergebnissen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5910">GP name: Block all ads on Bing search results</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5911">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5911">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5912">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5912">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5913">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5913">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5914">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5914">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5915">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5915">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5916">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5916">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5917">Wertname: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5917">Value Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5918">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5918">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5919">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5919">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5920">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5920">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5921">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BingAdsSuppression</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5921">Preference Key Name: BingAdsSuppression</span></span>

  ### <a name="blockthirdpartycookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5924">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5924">BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-third-party-cookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5925">Blockieren der Cookies von Drittanbietern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5925">Block third party cookies</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5926">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5926">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5927">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5927">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5928">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5928">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5929">Blockieren von Cookies, die von Webseitenelementen stammen, die nicht zu der Domäne gehören, die sich in der Adressleiste befindet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5929">Block web page elements that aren't from the domain that's in the address bar from setting cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5930">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können Webseitenelemente, die sich nicht in der Domäne befinden, die sich in der Adressleiste befindet, keine Cookies setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5930">If you enable this policy, web page elements that are not from the domain that is in the address bar can't set cookies</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5931">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können Webseitenelemente aus anderen Domänen als in der Adressleiste Cookies setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5931">If you disable this policy, web page elements from domains other than in the address bar can set cookies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5932">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden Cookies von Drittanbietern aktiviert, aber die Benutzer können diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5932">If you don't configure this policy, third-party cookies are enabled but users can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5933">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5933">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5934">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5934">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5935">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5935">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5936">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5936">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5937">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5937">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5938">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5938">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5939">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5939">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5940">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5940">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5941">GP eindeutiger Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5941">GP unique name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5942">GP-Name: Blockieren der Cookies von Drittanbietern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5942">GP name: Block third party cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5943">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5943">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5944">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5944">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5945">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5945">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5946">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5946">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5947">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5947">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5948">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5948">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5949">Wertname: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5949">Value Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5950">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5950">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5951">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5951">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5952">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5952">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5953">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5953">Preference Key Name: BlockThirdPartyCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5954">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5954">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="browseraddprofileenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5956">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5956">BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-profile-creation-from-the-identity-flyout-menu-or-the-settings-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5957">Aktivieren der Profilerstellung im Flyout „Identität“ oder auf der Seite „Einstellungen“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5957">Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5958">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5958">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5959">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5959">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5960">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5960">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5961">Ermöglicht es Benutzern, neue Profile zu erstellen, indem Sie die Option **Profil hinzufügen** verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5961">Allows users to create new profiles, using the **Add profile** option.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-5962">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, ermöglicht Microsoft Edge Benutzern, **Profil hinzufügen** im Identitäts-Flyoutmenü oder auf der Seite „Einstellungen“ zu verwenden, um neue Profile zu erstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5962">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge allows users to use **Add profile** on the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page to create new profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5963">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können Benutzer im Identitäts-Flyoutmenü oder auf der Seite "Einstellungen" keine neuen Profile hinzufügen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5963">If you disable this policy, users cannot add new profiles from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5964">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5964">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5965">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5965">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5966">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5966">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5967">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5967">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5968">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5968">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5969">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5969">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5970">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5970">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5971">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5971">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5972">GP eindeutiger Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5972">GP unique name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5973">GP-Name: Aktivieren der Profilerstellung im Flyout „Identität“ oder auf der Seite „Einstellungen“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5973">GP name: Enable profile creation from the Identity flyout menu or the Settings page</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5974">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5974">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5975">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5975">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5976">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5976">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5977">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5977">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5978">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5978">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5979">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5979">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5980">Wertname: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5980">Value Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5981">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5981">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5982">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5982">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5983">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5983">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5984">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5984">Preference Key Name: BrowserAddProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5985">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5985">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="browserguestmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5987">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5987">BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-guest-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5988">Gastmodus aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5988">Enable guest mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5989">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5989">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5990">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5990">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5991">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5991">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-5992">Aktiviert die Option, Gastprofile in Microsoft Edge zuzulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5992">Enable the option to allow the use of guest profiles in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-5993">In einem Gastprofil importiert der Browser keine Browserdaten aus vorhandenen Profilen und löscht die Browserdaten, wenn alle Gastprofile geschlossen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5993">In a guest profile, the browser doesn't import browsing data from existing profiles, and it deletes browsing data when all guest profiles are closed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5994">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, ermöglicht Microsoft Edge das Browsen in Gastprofilen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5994">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge lets users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-5995">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, lässt Microsoft Edge keine Benutzer in Gastprofilen browsen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5995">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge doesn't let users browse in guest profiles.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-5996">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5996">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5997">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5997">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5998">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5998">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-5999">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-5999">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6000">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6000">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6001">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6001">Boolean</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6004">GP eindeutiger Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6004">GP unique name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6005">GP-Name: Gastmodus aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6005">GP name: Enable guest mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6006">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6006">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6007">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6007">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6008">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6008">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6009">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6009">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6010">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6010">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6011">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6011">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6012">Wertname: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6012">Value Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6013">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6013">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6014">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6014">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6016">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6016">Preference Key Name: BrowserGuestModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6017">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6017">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="browsernetworktimequeriesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6019">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6019">BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-queries-to-a-browser-network-time-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6020">Abfragen an einen Browser Netzwerk-Zeitdienst zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6020">Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6021">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6021">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6022">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6022">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6023">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6023">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6024">Verhindert, dass Microsoft Edge gelegentlich Abfragen an einen Browser-Netzwerkzeitdienst sendet, um einen genauen Zeitstempel abzurufen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6024">Prevents Microsoft Edge from occasionally sending queries to a browser network time service to retrieve an accurate timestamp.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6025">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, unterlässt Microsoft Edge das Senden von Abfragen an einen Browser-Netzwerkzeitdienst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6025">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will stop sending queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6026">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, sendet Microsoft Edge gelegentlich Abfragen an einen Browser-Netzwerkzeitdienst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6026">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will occasionally send queries to a browser network time service.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6027">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6027">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6028">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6028">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6029">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6029">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6030">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6030">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6031">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6031">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6032">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6032">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6033">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6033">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6034">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6034">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6035">GP eindeutiger Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6035">GP unique name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6036">GP-Name: Abfragen an einen Browser Netzwerk-Zeitdienst zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6036">GP name: Allow queries to a Browser Network Time service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6037">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6037">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6038">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6038">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6039">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6039">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6040">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6040">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6041">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6041">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6042">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6042">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6043">Wertname: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6043">Value Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6044">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6044">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6045">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6045">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6046">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6046">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6047">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6047">Preference Key Name: BrowserNetworkTimeQueriesEnabled</span></span>

