  ### <a name="browsersignin"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6050">BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6050">BrowserSignin</span></span>

  #### <a name="browser-sign-in-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6051">Browser-Anmeldungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6051">Browser sign-in settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6052">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6052">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6053">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6053">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6054">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6054">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6055">Geben Sie an, ob sich ein Benutzer mit seinem Konto bei Microsoft Edge anmelden kann und kontobezogene Dienste wie Synchronisierung und einmaliges Anmelden verwenden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6055">Specify whether a user can sign into Microsoft Edge with their account and use account-related services like sync and single sign on.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6056">Wenn Sie die Verfügbarkeit der Synchronisierung steuern möchten, verwenden Sie stattdessen die [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)-Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6056">To control the availability of sync, use the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy instead.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6057">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Deaktivieren“ festlegen, stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie auch die Richtlinie[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) auf „Deaktiviert“ setzen, da [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) die Erstellung eines automatisch angemeldeten Browser-Profils deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6057">If you set this policy to 'Disable', make sure that you also set the [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) policy to disabled because [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) disables the creation of an automatically signed in browser profile.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6058">Wenn beide Richtlinien festgelegt sind, verwendet Microsoft Edge die Richtlinie "Browser-Anmeldung deaktivieren" und verhält sich, als ob [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) auf deaktiviert festgelegt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6058">If both policies are set, Microsoft Edge will use the 'Disable browser sign-in' policy and behave as if [NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled) is set to disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6059">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Aktivieren“ setzen, können sich die Benutzer im Browser anmelden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6059">If you set this policy to 'Enable', users can sign into the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6060">Das Anmelden beim Browser bedeutet nicht, dass die Synchronisierung standardmäßig aktiviert ist. Der Benutzer muss diesem Feature separat zustimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6060">Signing into the browser doesn't mean that sync is turned on by default; the user must separately opt-in to use this feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6061">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Erzwingen“ setzen, müssen sich die Benutzer in einem Profil anmelden, um den Browser benutzen zu können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6061">If you set this policy to 'Force', users must sign into a profile to use the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6062">Auf diese Weise kann der Benutzer standardmäßig auswählen, ob er die Synchronisierung mit seinem Konto veranlassen möchte, es sei denn, die Synchronisierung wird vom Domänenadministrator oder mit der [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) Richtlinie deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6062">By default, this will allow the user to choose whether they want to sync to their account, unless sync is disabled by the domain admin or with the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6063">Der Standardwert für [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled)-Richtlinie ist auf falsch festgelegt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6063">The default value of [BrowserGuestModeEnabled](#browserguestmodeenabled) policy is set to false.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6064">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer entscheiden, ob Sie die Browser-Anmeldeoption aktivieren und diese so verwenden, wie es für sie geeignet ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6064">If you don't configure this policy users can decide if they want to enable the browser sign-in option and use it as they see fit.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6065">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6065">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6066">Disable (0) = Browser-Anmeldung deaktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6066">Disable (0) = Disable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6067">Enable (1) = Browser-Anmeldung aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6067">Enable (1) = Enable browser sign-in</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6068">Force (2) = erzwingen, dass Benutzer sich anmelden, um den Browser zu verwenden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6068">Force (2) = Force users to sign-in to use the browser</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6069">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6069">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6070">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6070">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6071">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6071">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6072">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6072">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6073">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6073">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6074">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6074">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6075">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6075">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6076">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6076">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6077">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6077">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6078">GP eindeutiger Name: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6078">GP unique name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6079">GP-Name: Browser-Anmeldungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6079">GP name: Browser sign-in settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6080">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6080">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6081">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6081">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6082">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6082">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6083">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6083">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6084">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6084">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6085">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6085">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6086">Wertname: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6086">Value Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6087">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6087">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6088">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6088">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6089">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6089">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6090">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BrowserSignin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6090">Preference Key Name: BrowserSignin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6091">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6091">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-6092">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6092">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="browsingdatalifetime"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6093">BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6093">BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>

  #### <a name="browsing-data-lifetime-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6094">Lebensdauereinstellungen der Browserdaten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6094">Browsing Data Lifetime Settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6095">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6095">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6096">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 89 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6096">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6097">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6097">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6098">Konfiguriert die Lebensdauereinstellungen von Browserdaten für Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6098">Configures browsing data lifetime settings for Microsoft Edge.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-6099">Diese Richtlinie steuert die Lebensdauer ausgewählter Browserdaten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6099">This policy controls the lifetime of selected browsing data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6100">Diese Richtlinie hat keine Auswirkung, wenn die Synchronisierung aktiviert ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6100">This policy has no effect if Sync is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-6101">Die verfügbaren Datentypen sind „browsing_history“, „download_history“, „cookies_and_other_site_data“, „cached_images_and_files“, „password_signin“, „autofill“, „site_settings“ und „hosted_app_data“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6101">The available data types are the 'browsing_history', 'download_history', 'cookies_and_other_site_data', 'cached_images_and_files', 'password_signin', 'autofill', 'site_settings' and 'hosted_app_data'.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-6102">Microsoft Edge entfernt regelmäßig Daten ausgewählter Typen, die älter sind als „time_to_live_in_hours“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6102">Microsoft Edge will regularly remove data of selected types that is older than 'time_to_live_in_hours'.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6103">Da das Löschen von Daten nur in bestimmten Intervallen erfolgt, werden einige Daten möglicherweise etwas länger, aber nie mehr als doppelt so lange wie ihre erwartete „time_to_live_in_hours“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6103">Because data deletion only happens at certain intervals, some data might be kept slightly longer but never more than twice its expected 'time_to_live_in_hours'.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6104">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6104">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6105">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6105">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6106">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6106">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6107">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6107">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6108">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6108">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6109">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6109">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6110">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6110">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6111">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6111">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6112">GP eindeutiger Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6112">GP unique name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6113">GP-Name: Lebensdauereinstellungen der Browserdaten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6113">GP name: Browsing Data Lifetime Settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6114">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6114">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6115">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6115">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6116">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6116">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6117">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6117">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6118">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6118">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6119">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6119">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6120">Wertname: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6120">Value Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6121">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6121">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6122">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6122">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\BrowsingDataLifetime = [
  {
    "data_types": [
      "browsing_history"
    ], 
    "time_to_live_in_hours": 24
  }, 
  {
    "data_types": [
      "password_signin", 
      "autofill"
    ], 
    "time_to_live_in_hours": 12
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6123">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6123">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\BrowsingDataLifetime = [{"data_types": ["browsing_history"], "time_to_live_in_hours": 24}, {"data_types": ["password_signin", "autofill"], "time_to_live_in_hours": 12}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6124">Mac-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6124">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6125">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BrowsingDataLifetime</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6125">Preference Key Name: BrowsingDataLifetime</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6126">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6126">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>BrowsingDataLifetime</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>data_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>browsing_history</string>
    </array>
    <key>time_to_live_in_hours</key>
    <integer>24</integer>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>data_types</key>
    <array>
      <string>password_signin</string>
      <string>autofill</string>
    </array>
    <key>time_to_live_in_hours</key>
    <integer>12</integer>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="builtindnsclientenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6128">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6128">BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-built-in-dns-client"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6129">Verwenden des integrierten DNS-Clients</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6129">Use built-in DNS client</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6130">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6130">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6131">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6131">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6132">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6132">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6133">Steuert, ob der integrierte DNS-Client verwendet werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6133">Controls whether to use the built-in DNS client.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6134">Diese Richtlinie steuert, welcher Softwarestapel für die Kommunikation mit dem DNS-Server verwendet wird: der Betriebssystem-DNS-Client oder der integrierte DNS-Client von Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6134">This policy controls which software stack is used to communicate with the DNS server: the operating system DNS client, or Microsoft Edge's built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6135">Diese Richtlinie hat keine Auswirkungen auf die verwendeten DNS-Server: Wenn das Betriebssystem beispielsweise für die Verwendung eines Unternehmens-DNS-Servers konfiguriert ist, würde derselbe Server vom integrierten DNS-Client verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6135">This policy does not affect which DNS servers are used: if, for example, the operating system is configured to use an enterprise DNS server, that same server would be used by the built-in DNS client.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6136">Sie steuert auch nicht, ob DNS-over-HTTPS verwendet wird. Microsoft Edge verwendet immer den integrierten Resolver für DNS-over-HTTPS-Anforderungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6136">It also does not control if DNS-over-HTTPS is used; Microsoft Edge always uses the built-in resolver for DNS-over-HTTPS requests.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6137">Informationen zum Steuern von DNS-over-HTTPS finden Sie in der Richtlinie[DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6137">Please see the [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) policy for information on controlling DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6138">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird der integrierte DNS-Client verwendet (sofern verfügbar).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6138">If you enable this policy, the built-in DNS client is used, if it's available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6139">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird der integrierte DNS-Client nur verwendet, wenn DNS-over-HTTPS verwendet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6139">If you disable this policy, the built-in DNS client is only used when DNS-over-HTTPS is in use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6140">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, ist der integrierte DNS-Client unter macOS und Android standardmäßig aktiviert (wenn weder privates DNS noch VPN aktiviert sind).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6140">If you don't configure this policy, the built-in DNS client is enabled by default on macOS and Android (when neither Private DNS nor VPN are enabled).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6141">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6141">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6142">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6142">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6143">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6143">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6144">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6144">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6145">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6145">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6146">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6146">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6147">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6147">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6148">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6148">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6149">GP eindeutiger Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6149">GP unique name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6150">GP-Name: Verwenden des integrierten DNS-Clients</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6150">GP name: Use built-in DNS client</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6151">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6151">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6152">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6152">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6153">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6153">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6154">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6154">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6155">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6155">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6156">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6156">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6157">Wertname: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6157">Value Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6158">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6158">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6159">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6159">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6160">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6160">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6161">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6161">Preference Key Name: BuiltInDnsClientEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6162">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6162">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="builtincertificateverifierenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6164">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6164">BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="determines-whether-the-built-in-certificate-verifier-will-be-used-to-verify-server-certificates-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6165">Bestimmt, ob die integrierte Zertifikatprüfung zum Überprüfen von Serverzertifikaten verwendet wird (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6165">Determines whether the built-in certificate verifier will be used to verify server certificates (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-6166">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6166">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6167">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6167">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6168">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6168">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6169">Auf macOS ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6169">On macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6170">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6170">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6171">Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet, da sie nur als kurzfristiger Mechanismus dienen soll, um Unternehmen mehr Zeit zu geben, ihre Umgebungen zu aktualisieren und Probleme zu melden, wenn sich herausstellt, dass sie mit der integrierten Zertifikatsprüfung nicht kompatibel sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6171">This policy is deprecated because it's intended to serve only as a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their environments and report issues if they are found to be incompatible with the built-in certificate verifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6172">Es wird nicht in Microsoft Edge Version 92 funktionieren, wenn die Unterstützung für die alte Zertifikatsüberprüfung unter Mac OS X entfernt werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6172">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 92, when support for the legacy certificate verifier on Mac OS X is planned to be removed.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6173">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6173">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6174">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6174">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6175">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6175">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6176">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6176">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6177">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6177">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6178">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6178">Boolean</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6179">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6179">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6180">Einstellung Schlüsselname: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6180">Preference Key Name: BuiltinCertificateVerifierEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6181">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6181">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
