  ### <a name="componentupdatesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6472">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6472">ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-component-updates-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6473">Aktivieren von Komponentenupdates in Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6473">Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6474">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6474">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6475">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6475">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6476">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6476">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6477">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, sind Komponentenupdates in Microsoft Edge aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6477">If you enable or don't configure this policy, component updates are enabled in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6478">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder auf falsch festlegen, werden die Komponentenupdates für alle Komponenten in Microsoft Edge deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6478">If you disable this policy or set it to false, component updates are disabled for all components in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6479">Einige Komponenten sind jedoch von dieser Richtlinie ausgenommen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6479">However, some components are exempt from this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6480">Dazu gehört jede Komponente, die keinen ausführbaren Code enthält, die das Browserverhalten nicht erheblich ändert oder die für die Sicherheit wichtig ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6480">This includes any component that doesn't contain executable code, that doesn't significantly alter the behavior of the browser, or that's critical for security.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6481">Dies bedeutet, dass Updates, die als "sicherheitskritisch" eingestuft werden, weiterhin angewendet werden, auch wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6481">That is, updates that are deemed "critical for security" are still applied even if you disable this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6482">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6482">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6483">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6483">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6484">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6484">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6485">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6485">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6486">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6486">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6487">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6487">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6488">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6488">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6489">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6489">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6490">GP eindeutiger Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6490">GP unique name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6491">GP-Name: Aktivieren von Komponentenupdates in Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6491">GP name: Enable component updates in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6492">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6492">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6493">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6493">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6494">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6494">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6495">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6495">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6496">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6496">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6497">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6497">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6498">Wertname: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6498">Value Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6499">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6499">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6500">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6500">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6501">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6501">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6502">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6502">Preference Key Name: ComponentUpdatesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6503">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6503">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="configuredonottrack"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6505">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6505">ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-do-not-track"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6506">DNT konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6506">Configure Do Not Track</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6507">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6507">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6508">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6508">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6509">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6509">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6510">Legt fest, ob „Do Not Track“-Anforderungen an Websites gesendet werden sollen, die Nachverfolgungsinformationen anfordern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6510">Specify whether to send Do Not Track requests to websites that ask for tracking info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6511">Do-Not-Track-Anforderungen lassen die Website, die Sie besuchen, wissen, dass Ihre Browseraktivitäten nicht nachverfolgt werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6511">Do Not Track requests let the websites you visit know that you don't want your browsing activity to be tracked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6512">Microsoft Edge sendet standardmäßig keine Do-Not-Track-Anforderungen, aber die Benutzer können dieses Feature aktivieren, um sie zu senden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6512">By default, Microsoft Edge doesn't send Do Not Track requests, but users can turn on this feature to send them.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6513">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden Do Not Track-Anforderungen (nicht verfolgen) immer an Websites gesendet, die Nachverfolgungsinformationen anfordern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6513">If you enable this policy, Do Not Track requests are always sent to websites asking for tracking info.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6514">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden keine Anforderungen gesendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6514">If you disable this policy, requests are never sent.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6515">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer auswählen, ob diese Anforderungen gesendet werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6515">If you don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to send these requests.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6516">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6516">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6517">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6517">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6518">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6518">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6519">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6519">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6520">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6520">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6521">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6521">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6522">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6522">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6523">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6523">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6524">GP eindeutiger Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6524">GP unique name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6525">GP-Name: DNT konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6525">GP name: Configure Do Not Track</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6526">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6526">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6527">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6527">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6528">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6528">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6529">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6529">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6530">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6530">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6531">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6531">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6532">Wertname: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6532">Value Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6533">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6533">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6534">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6534">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6535">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6535">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6536">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6536">Preference Key Name: ConfigureDoNotTrack</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6537">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6537">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-6538">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6538">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="configurefriendlyurlformat"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6539">ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6539">ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-default-paste-format-of-urls-copied-from-microsoft-edge-and-determine-if-additional-formats-will-be-available-to-users"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6540">Konfigurieren des Standardformats für das Einfügen von URLs, die aus MicrosoftEdge kopiert wurden, und zum Ermitteln, ob Benutzern weitere Formate zur Verfügung stehen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6540">Configure the default paste format of URLs copied from Microsoft Edge, and determine if additional formats will be available to users</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6541">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6541">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6542">Unter Windows seit 87 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6542">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6543">Auf macOS ab 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6543">On macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6544">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6544">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6545">Wenn FriendlyURLs aktiviert ist, berechnet Microsoft Edge zusätzliche Darstellungen der URL und platziert Sie in der Zwischenablage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6545">If FriendlyURLs are enabled, Microsoft Edge will compute additional representations of the URL and place them on the clipboard.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6546">Diese Richtlinie konfiguriert, welches Format beim Einfügen durch den Benutzers in externe Anwendungen oder innerhalb von Microsoft Edge ohne das Kontextmenüelement "Einfügen als" eingefügt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6546">This policy configures what format will be pasted when the user pastes in external applications, or inside Microsoft Edge without the 'Paste as' context menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6547">Wenn diese Richtlinie konfiguriert ist, trifft sie eine Auswahl im Namen des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6547">If configured, this policy makes a choice on behalf of the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6548">Die Optionen in edge://settings/shareCopyPaste sind abgeblendet, und die Optionen im Kontextmenü "Einfügen als" stehen nicht zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6548">The options in edge://settings/shareCopyPaste will be grayed out, and the options in the 'Paste As' context menu will not be available.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6549">Nicht konfiguriert = der Benutzer kann sein bevorzugtes Einfügeformat auswählen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6549">Not configured = The user will be able to choose their preferred paste format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6550">Standardmäßig ist dies auf das benutzerfreundliche URL-Format festgelegt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6550">By default, this is set to the friendly URL format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6551">Das Menü "Einfügen als" ist in Microsoft Edge verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6551">The 'Paste As' menu will be available in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6552">1 = In der Zwischenablage werden keine weiteren Formate gespeichert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6552">1 = No additional formats will be stored on the clipboard.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6553">Es wird in Microsoft Edge kein Kontextmenüelement "Einfügen als" vorhanden sein, und das einzige zum Einfügen verfügbare Format ist das Nur-Text-Format der URL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6553">There will be no 'Paste as' context menu item in Microsoft Edge and the only format available to paste will be the plain text URL format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6554">Das Feature für die benutzerfreundliche URL wird effektiv deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6554">Effectively, the friendly URL feature will be disabled.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6555">3 = Der Benutzer erhält eine benutzerfreundliche URL, wenn er in Oberflächen einfügt, die Rich-Text akzeptieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6555">3 = The user will get a friendly URL whenever they paste into surfaces that accept rich text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6556">Die Standard-URL steht weiterhin für Oberflächen zur Verfügung, die keinen Rich-Text akzeptieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6556">The plain URL will still be available for non-rich surfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6557">Das Menü "Einfügen als" wird in Microsoft Edge nicht verfügbar sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6557">There will be no 'Paste As' menu in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6558">4 = (Zurzeit nicht verwendet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6558">4 = (Not currently used)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6559">Die umfangreicheren Formate werden in einigen Einfügezielen und / oder Websites möglicherweise nicht gut unterstützt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6559">The richer formats may not be well-supported in some paste destinations and/or websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6560">Wenn also diese Richtlinie konfiguriert werden soll, wird die Standard-URL-Option empfohlen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6560">As such, if this policy is to be configured, then the plain URL option is recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6561">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6561">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6562">PlainText (1) = die Standard-URL ohne zusätzliche Informationen wie z. B. den Titel der Seite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6562">PlainText (1) = The plain URL without any extra information, such as the page's title.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6563">Dies ist die empfohlene Option, wenn diese Richtlinie konfiguriert wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6563">This is the recommended option when this policy is configured.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6564">Weitere Informationen finden Sie in der Beschreibung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6564">For more information, see the description.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6565">TitledHyperlink (3) = Betitelter Link: Ein Link, der auf die kopierte URL zeigt, dessen sichtbarer Text aber der Titel der Zielseite ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6565">TitledHyperlink (3) = Titled Hyperlink: A hyperlink that points to the copied URL, but whose visible text is the title of the destination page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6566">Dies ist das benutzerfreundliche URL-Format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6566">This is the Friendly URL format.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6567">WebPreview (4) = in Kürze verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6567">WebPreview (4) = Coming soon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6568">Wenn aktiviert, verhält es sich wie die „Standard-URL“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6568">If set, behaves the same as 'Plain URL'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6569">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6569">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6570">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6570">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6571">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6571">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6572">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6572">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6573">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6573">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6574">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6574">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6575">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6575">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6576">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6576">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6577">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6577">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6578">Eindeutiger GP-Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6578">GP unique name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6579">GP-Name: Konfigurieren des Standardformats für das Einfügen von URLs, die aus MicrosoftEdge kopiert wurden, und zum Ermitteln, ob Benutzern weitere Formate zur Verfügung stehen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6579">GP name: Configure the default paste format of URLs copied from Microsoft Edge, and determine if additional formats will be available to users</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6580">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6580">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6582">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6582">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6583">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6583">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6584">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6584">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6585">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6585">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6586">Wertname: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6586">Value Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6587">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6587">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6588">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6588">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6590">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6590">Preference Key Name: ConfigureFriendlyURLFormat</span></span>

  ### <a name="configureonpremisesaccountautosignin"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6593">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6593">ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-automatic-sign-in-with-an-active-directory-domain-account-when-there-is-no-azure-ad-domain-account"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6594">Konfiguration der automatischen Anmeldung mit einem Active Directory-Domänenkonto, wenn kein Azure AD-Domänenkonto vorhanden ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6594">Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6595">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6595">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6596">Auf Windows ab 81 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6596">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6597">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6597">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6598">Aktiviert die Verwendung von Active Directory-Konten für die automatische Anmeldung, wenn die Computer Ihrer Benutzer domänenverbunden sind und Ihre Umgebung nicht hybridverbunden ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6598">Enable the use of Active Directory accounts for automatic sign in if your users' machines are Domain Joined and your environment is not hybrid joined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6599">Wenn Sie möchten, dass Benutzer stattdessen automatisch mit ihren Azure Active Directory-Konten angemeldet werden, stellen Sie Ihre Umgebung bitte auf Azure AD-Anmeldung (Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197)) oder Hybridverbindung (Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) Weitere Informationen) um.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6599">If you want users automatically signed in with their Azure Active Directory accounts instead, please Azure AD join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118197) for more information) or hybrid join (See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2118365) for more information) your environment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6600">Bei jedem Start versucht Microsoft Edge, sich mit dieser Richtlinie zu anmelden, solange das erste gestartete Profil nicht angemeldet ist oder noch keine automatische Anmeldung geschehen ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6600">On every launch, Microsoft Edge will try to sign-in using this policy, as long as the first profile being launched isn't signed-in or an auto sign-in hasn't happened before.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6601">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) auf deaktiviert konfiguriert haben, wird diese Richtlinie nicht wirksam.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6601">If you have configured the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy to disabled, this policy will not take any effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6602">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren und auf „SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable“ setzen, meldet Microsoft Edge Benutzer automatisch an, die sich auf einem domänenverbundenen Computer befinden und ihr Active Directory-Konto verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6602">If you enable this policy and set it to 'SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable', Microsoft Edge will automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines using their Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6603">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Disabled“ setzen oder sie nicht festlegen, meldet Microsoft Edge nicht automatisch Benutzer an, die sich auf einem domänenverbundenen Computer mit Active Directory-Konto befinden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6603">If you set this policy to 'Disabled' or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will not automatically sign in users that are on domain joined machines with Active Directory accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6604">Ab Microsoft Edge 89, wenn ein vorhandenes lokales Profil mit deaktivierter Synchronisierung vorhanden ist und der Computer jetzt hybrid verbunden ist, d. h.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6604">From Microsoft Edge 89 onwards, if there is an existing on-premises profile with sync disabled and machine is now hybrid joined i.e</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6605">es verfügt über ein Azure AD-Konto, wird das lokale Profil automatisch auf ein Azure AD-Profil aktualisiert, um die vollen Azure AD-Synchronisierungsfunktionen zu erhalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6605">it has an Azure AD account, it will auto-upgrade the on-premises profile to Azure AD profile to get full Azure AD sync facilities.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6606">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6606">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6607">Disabled (0) = deaktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6607">Disabled (0) = Disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6608">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = anmelden und Domain-Konto auf „nicht entfernbar“ setzen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6608">SignInAndMakeDomainAccountNonRemovable (1) = Sign in and make domain account non-removable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6609">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6609">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6610">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6610">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6611">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6611">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6612">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6612">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6613">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6613">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6614">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6614">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6615">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6615">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6616">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6616">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6617">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6617">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6618">GP eindeutiger Name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6618">GP unique name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6619">GP-Name: Konfiguration der automatischen Anmeldung mit einem Active Directory-Domänenkonto, wenn kein Azure AD-Domänenkonto vorhanden ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6619">GP name: Configure automatic sign in with an Active Directory domain account when there is no Azure AD domain account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6620">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6620">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6621">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6621">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6622">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6622">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6623">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6623">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6624">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6624">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6625">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6625">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6626">Wertname: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6626">Value Name: ConfigureOnPremisesAccountAutoSignIn</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6627">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6627">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6628">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6628">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="configureonlinetexttospeech"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6630">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6630">ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-online-text-to-speech"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6631">Konfiguration von Text-zu-Sprache Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6631">Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6632">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6632">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6633">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6633">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6634">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6634">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6635">Legen Sie fest, ob der Browser die Sprachfonts von „Online Text zu Sprache“, Teil von Azure Cognitive Services, verwenden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6635">Set whether the browser can leverage Online Text to Speech voice fonts, part of Azure Cognitive Services.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6636">Diese Sprachfonts besitzen eine höhere Qualität als die vorinstallierten System-Sprachfonts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6636">These voice fonts are higher quality than the pre-installed system voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6637">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können webbasierte Anwendungen, die die SpeechSynthesis-API nutzen, Online Text-zu-Sprache Sprachfonts verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6637">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the SpeechSynthesis API can use Online Text to Speech voice fonts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6638">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, sind die Sprachfonts nicht verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6638">If you disable this policy, the voice fonts aren't available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6639">Hier finden Sie weitere Informationen zu diesem Feature: SpeechSynthesis-API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6639">Read more about this feature here: SpeechSynthesis API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110038) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2110141)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6640">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6640">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6641">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6641">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6642">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6642">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6643">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6643">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6644">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6644">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6645">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6645">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6646">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6646">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6647">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6647">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6648">GP eindeutiger Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6648">GP unique name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6649">GP-Name: Konfiguration von Text-zu-Sprache Online</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6649">GP name: Configure Online Text To Speech</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6650">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6650">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6651">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6651">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6652">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6652">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6653">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6653">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6654">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6654">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6655">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6655">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6656">Wertname: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6656">Value Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6658">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6658">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6660">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6660">Preference Key Name: ConfigureOnlineTextToSpeech</span></span>

  ### <a name="configureshare"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6663">ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6663">ConfigureShare</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-share-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6664">Konfiguration der Freigabeoberfläche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6664">Configure the Share experience</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6665">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6665">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6666">Auf Windows ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6666">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6667">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6667">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6668">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „ShareAllowed“ setzen, können die Benutzer über das Menü „Einstellungen und mehr“ in Microsoft Edge auf die Windows 10-Freigabeumgebung zugreifen, um an andere Apps im System zu freizugeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6668">If you set this policy to 'ShareAllowed' (the default), users will be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience from the Settings and More Menu in Microsoft Edge to share with other apps on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6669">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „ShareDisallowed“ setzen, können die Benutzer nicht mehr auf die Windows 10-Freigabeumgebung zugreifen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6669">If you set this policy to 'ShareDisallowed', users won't be able to access the Windows 10 Share experience.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6670">Wenn sich die Schaltfläche "Freigeben" auf der Symbolleiste befindet, wird sie ebenfalls ausgeblendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6670">If the Share button is on the toolbar, it will also be hidden.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6671">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6671">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6672">ShareAllowed (0) = Verwendung der Freigabeoberfläche zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6672">ShareAllowed (0) = Allow using the Share experience</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6673">ShareDisallowed (1) = Verwendung der Freigabeoberfläche nicht zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6673">ShareDisallowed (1) = Don't allow using the Share experience</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6674">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6674">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6675">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6675">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6676">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6676">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6677">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6677">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6678">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6678">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6679">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6679">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6680">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6680">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6681">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6681">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6682">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6682">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6683">GP eindeutiger Name: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6683">GP unique name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6684">GP-Name: Konfiguration der Freigabeoberfläche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6684">GP name: Configure the Share experience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6685">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6685">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6686">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6686">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6687">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6687">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6688">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6688">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6689">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6689">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6690">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6690">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6691">Wertname: ConfigureShare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6691">Value Name: ConfigureShare</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6692">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6692">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6693">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6693">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="customhelplink"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6695">CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6695">CustomHelpLink</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-custom-help-link"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6696">Benutzerdefinierten „Hilfe“-Link konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6696">Specify custom help link</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6697">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6697">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6698">Auf Windows und macOS ab 79 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6698">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6699">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6699">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6700">Angeben eines Links für das Menü "Hilfe" oder "F1".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6700">Specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6701">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, kann ein Administrator einen Link für das Menü "Hilfe" oder die Taste "F1" angeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6701">If you enable this policy, an admin can specify a link for the Help menu or the F1 key.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6702">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird der Standardlink für das Menü "Hilfe" oder "F1" verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6702">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default link for the Help menu or the F1 key is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6703">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6703">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6704">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6704">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6705">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6705">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6706">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6706">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6707">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6707">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6708">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6708">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6709">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6709">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6710">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6710">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6711">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6711">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6712">GP eindeutiger Name: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6712">GP unique name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6713">GP-Name: Benutzerdefinierten „Hilfe“-Link konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6713">GP name: Specify custom help link</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6714">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6714">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6715">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6715">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6716">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6716">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6717">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6717">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6718">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6718">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6719">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6719">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6720">Wertname: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6720">Value Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6721">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6721">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6722">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6722">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6723">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6723">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6724">Einstellung Schlüsselname: CustomHelpLink</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6724">Preference Key Name: CustomHelpLink</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6725">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6725">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080734</string>
```

  ### <a name="dnsinterceptionchecksenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6727">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6727">DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="dns-interception-checks-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6728">DNS-Interception-Prüfungen aktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6728">DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6729">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6729">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6730">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6730">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6731">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6731">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6732">Diese Richtlinie konfiguriert einen lokalen Schalter, der verwendet werden kann, um DNS-Interception-Prüfungen zu deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6732">This policy configures a local switch that can be used to disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6733">Bei diesen Prüfungen wird versucht, zu ermitteln, ob sich der Browser hinter einem Proxy befindet, der unbekannte Hostnamen umleitet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6733">These checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6734">Diese Erkennung ist in einer Unternehmensumgebung, in der die Netzwerkkonfiguration bekannt ist, möglicherweise nicht erforderlich.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6734">This detection might not be necessary in an enterprise environment where the network configuration is known.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6735">Er kann deaktiviert werden, um zusätzlichen DNS- und HTTP-Datenverkehr beim Start und bei jeder Änderung der DNS-Konfiguration zu vermeiden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6735">It can be disabled to avoid additional DNS and HTTP traffic on start-up and each DNS configuration change.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6736">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht festlegen, werden die DNS-Abfangprüfungen durchgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6736">If you enable or don't set this policy, the DNS interception checks are performed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6737">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden DNS-Abfangprüfungen nicht ausgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6737">If you disable this policy, DNS interception checks aren't performed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6738">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6738">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6739">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6739">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6740">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6740">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6741">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6741">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6742">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6742">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6743">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6743">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6744">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6744">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6745">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6745">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6746">GP eindeutiger Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6746">GP unique name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6747">GP-Name: DNS-Interception-Prüfungen aktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6747">GP name: DNS interception checks enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6748">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6748">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6749">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6749">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6750">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6750">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6751">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6751">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6752">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6752">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6753">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6753">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6754">Wertname: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6754">Value Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6755">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6755">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6756">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6756">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6757">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6757">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6758">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6758">Preference Key Name: DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6759">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6759">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="defaultbrowsersettingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6761">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6761">DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-microsoft-edge-as-default-browser"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6762">Festlegen von Microsoft Edge als Standardbrowser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6762">Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6763">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6763">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6764">Auf Windows 7 und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6764">On Windows 7 and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6765">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6765">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6766">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "wahr" festlegen, überprüft Microsoft Edge beim Start immer, ob es als Standardbrowser eingestellt ist und registriert sich, wenn möglich, automatisch.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6766">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge always checks whether it's the default browser on startup and, if possible, automatically registers itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6767">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "falsch" festlegen, wird Microsoft Edge gestoppt, je nachdem, ob es sich um die standardmäßige Einstellung handelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6767">If you set this policy to False, Microsoft Edge is stopped from ever checking if it's the default and turns user controls off for this option.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6768">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, können die Benutzer von Microsoft Edge steuern, ob es sich um die Standardeinstellung handelt und, falls nicht, ob Benutzer Benachrichtigungen angezeigt werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6768">If you don't set this policy, Microsoft Edge lets users control whether it's the default and, if not, whether user notifications should appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6769">Hinweis für Windows-Administratoren: Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nur für PCs unter Windows 7.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6769">Note for Windows administrators: This policy only works for PCs running Windows 7.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6770">In späteren Versionen von Windows müssen Sie eine "Standard-Anwendungszuordnungen"-Datei bereitstellen, die Microsoft Edge als Handler für die HTTPS- und HTTP-Protokolle (und optional das FTP-Protokoll und Dateiformate wie .html, htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp) festlegt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6770">For later versions of Windows, you have to deploy a "default application associations" file that makes Microsoft Edge the handler for the https and http protocols (and, optionally, the ftp protocol and file formats such as .html, .htm, .pdf, .svg, .webp).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6771">Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6771">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094932) for more information.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6772">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6772">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6773">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6773">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6774">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6774">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6775">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6775">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6776">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6776">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6777">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6777">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6778">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6778">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6779">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6779">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6780">GP eindeutiger Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6780">GP unique name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6781">GP-Name: Festlegen von Microsoft Edge als Standardbrowser</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6781">GP name: Set Microsoft Edge as default browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6782">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6782">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6783">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6783">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6784">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6784">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6785">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6785">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6786">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6786">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6787">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6787">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6788">Wertname: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6788">Value Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6789">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6789">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6790">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6790">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6791">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6791">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6792">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6792">Preference Key Name: DefaultBrowserSettingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6793">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6793">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="defaultsearchprovidercontextmenuaccessallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6795">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6795">DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-default-search-provider-context-menu-search-access"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6796">Zugriff auf das Kontextmenü des Standardsuchanbieters zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6796">Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6797">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6797">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6798">Auf Windows und MacOS ab 85 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6798">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6799">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6799">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6800">Aktiviert die Verwendung eines standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieters im Kontextmenü.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6800">Enables the use of a default search provider on the context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6801">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Disabled“ setzen, sind der Eintrag im Suchkontextmenü, der sich auf Ihren standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieter stützt und die Suche in der Seitenleiste sind nicht verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6801">If you set this policy to disabled the search context menu item that relies on your default search provider and sidebar search will not be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6802">Wenn diese Richtlinie auf „Enabled“ gesetzt oder nicht eingestellt ist, ist das Element des Kontextmenüs für den standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieter und die Suche in der Seitenleiste verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6802">If this policy is set to enabled or not set, the context menu item for your default search provider and sidebar search will be available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6803">Der Wert für die Richtlinie wird nur dann angewendet, wenn die Richtlinie „[DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled)“ aktiviert ist und ist ansonsten nicht anwendbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6803">The policy value is only appled when the [DefaultSearchProviderEnabled](#defaultsearchproviderenabled) policy is enabled, and is not applicable otherwise.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6804">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6804">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6805">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6805">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6806">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6806">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6807">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6807">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6808">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6808">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6809">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6809">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6810">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6810">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6811">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6811">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6812">Eindeutiger PGP-Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6812">GP unique name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6813">GP-Name: Dem standardmäßigen Suchdienstanbieter Zugriff auf die Kontextmenüsuche gewähren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6813">GP name: Allow default search provider context menu search access</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6814">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6814">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6815">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6815">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6816">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6816">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6817">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6817">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6818">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6818">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6819">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6819">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6820">Wertname: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6820">Value Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6821">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6821">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6822">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6822">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6823">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6823">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6824">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6824">Preference Key Name: DefaultSearchProviderContextMenuAccessAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6825">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6825">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
