  ### <a name="defaultsensorssetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6827">DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6827">DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="default-sensors-setting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6828">Standardeinstellung für Sensoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6828">Default sensors setting</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6829">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6829">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6830">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6830">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6831">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6831">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6832">Legen Sie fest, ob Websites auf Sensoren wie Bewegungs- und Lichtsensoren zugreifen und diese verwenden dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6832">Set whether websites can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6833">Sie können den Zugriff auf Sensoren für Websites vollständig zulassen oder blockieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6833">You can completely block or allow websites to get access to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6834">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf "1" festlegen, können Websites auf Sensoren zugreifen und diese verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6834">Setting the policy to 1 lets websites access and use sensors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6835">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf "2" festlegen, wird der Zugriff auf Sensoren verweigert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6835">Setting the policy to 2 denies acess to sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6836">Sie können diese Richtlinie für bestimmte URL-Muster außer Kraft setzen, indem Sie die [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls)- und [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls)-Richtlinien verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6836">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6837">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können Websites auf Sensoren zugreifen und diese verwenden, und der Benutzer kann diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6837">If you don't configure this policy, websites can access and use sensors, and users can change this setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6838">Hierbei handelt es sich um die globale Standardeinstellung für [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) und [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6838">This is the global default for [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) and [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6839">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6839">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6840">AllowSensors (1) = Websites dürfen auf Sensoren zugreifen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6840">AllowSensors (1) = Allow sites to access sensors</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6841">BlockSensors (2) = Websites dürfen nicht auf Sensoren zugreifen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6841">BlockSensors (2) = Do not allow any site to access sensors</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6842">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6842">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6843">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6843">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6844">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6844">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6845">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6845">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6846">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6846">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6847">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6847">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6848">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6848">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6849">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6849">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6850">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6850">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6851">Eindeutiger GP-Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6851">GP unique name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6852">GP-Name: Standardeinstellung für Sensoren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6852">GP name: Default sensors setting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6853">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6853">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6854">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6854">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6855">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6855">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6856">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6856">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6857">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6857">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6858">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6858">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6859">Wertname: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6859">Value Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6860">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6860">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6861">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6861">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6862">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6862">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6863">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultSensorsSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6863">Preference Key Name: DefaultSensorsSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6864">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6864">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="defaultserialguardsetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6866">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6866">DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-use-of-the-serial-api"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6867">Steuerung der Verwendung der Serial-API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6867">Control use of the Serial API</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6868">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6868">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6869">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6869">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6870">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6870">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6871">Legen Sie fest, ob Websites auf serielle Anschlüsse zugreifen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6871">Set whether websites can access serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6872">Sie können den Zugriff vollständig blockieren oder festlegen, dass der Benutzer jedes Mal gefragt wird, wenn eine Website auf einen seriellen Anschluss zugreifen möchte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6872">You can completely block access or ask the user each time a website wants to get access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6873">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf "3" festlegen, können Websites Zugriff auf serielle Anschlüsse anfordern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6873">Setting the policy to 3 lets websites ask for access to serial ports.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6874">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf "2" festlegen, wird der Zugriff auf serielle Anschlüsse verweigert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6874">Setting the policy to 2 denies access to serial ports.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6875">Sie können diese Richtlinie für bestimmte URL-Muster außer Kraft setzen, indem Sie die [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls)- und [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls)-Richtlinien verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6875">You can override this policy for specific URL patterns by using the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) and [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6876">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können Websites Benutzer standardmäßig fragen, ob sie auf serielle Anschlüsse zugreifen können, und die Benutzer können diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6876">If you don't configure this policy, by default, websites can ask users whether they can access a serial port, and users can change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6877">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6877">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6878">BlockSerial (2) = nicht zulassen, dass eine Website Zugriff auf serielle Anschlüsse über die Serial API anfordert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6878">BlockSerial (2) = Do not allow any site to request access to serial ports via the Serial API</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6879">AskSerial (3) = Websites gestatten, Benutzerberechtigungen für den Zugriff auf einen seriellen Anschluss anzufordern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6879">AskSerial (3) = Allow sites to ask for user permission to access a serial port</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6880">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6880">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6881">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6881">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6882">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6882">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6883">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6883">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6884">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6884">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6885">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6885">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6886">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6886">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6887">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6887">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6888">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6888">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6889">Eindeutiger GP-Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6889">GP unique name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6890">GP-Name: Steuern der Verwendung der Serial-API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6890">GP name: Control use of the Serial API</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6891">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6891">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6892">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6892">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6893">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6893">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6894">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6894">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6895">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6895">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6896">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6896">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6897">Wertname: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6897">Value Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6898">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6898">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6899">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6899">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6900">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6900">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6901">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6901">Preference Key Name: DefaultSerialGuardSetting</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6902">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6902">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="definepreferredlanguages"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6904">DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6904">DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-an-ordered-list-of-preferred-languages-that-websites-should-display-in-if-the-site-supports-the-language"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6905">Definieren einer geordneten Liste der bevorzugten Sprachen, in der Websites angezeigt werden sollen, wenn die Website die Sprache unterstützt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6905">Define an ordered list of preferred languages that websites should display in if the site supports the language</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6906">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6906">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6907">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 89 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6907">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6908">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6908">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6909">Konfiguriert die Sprachvarianten, die Microsoft Edge als Teil des HTTP-Headers der „Accept-Language“-Anforderung an Websites sendet, und verhindert, dass Benutzer die Reihenfolge der bevorzugten Sprachen in den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen hinzufügen, entfernen oder ändern können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6909">Configures the language variants that Microsoft Edge sends to websites as part of the Accept-Language request HTTP header and prevents users from adding, removing, or changing the order of preferred languages in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6910">Benutzer, welche die Sprachen ändern möchten, in denen Microsoft Edge angezeigt wird oder die Übersetzung von Seiten anbietet, sind auf die in dieser Richtlinie konfigurierten Sprachen beschränkt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6910">Users who want to change the languages Microsoft Edge displays in or offers to translate pages to will be limited to the languages configured in this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6911">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden Websites in der ersten Sprache in der Liste angezeigt, die sie unterstützen, sofern keine andere Website-spezifische Logik zur Bestimmung der Anzeigesprache verwendet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6911">If you enable this policy, websites will appear in the first language in the list that they support unless other site-specific logic is used to determine the display language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6912">Die in dieser Richtlinie definierten Sprachvarianten überschreiben die Sprachen, die als Teil der Richtlinie [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) konfiguriert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6912">The language variants defined in this policy override the languages configured as part of the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6913">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder deaktivieren, sendet Microsoft Edge Websites die vom Benutzer angegebenen bevorzugten Sprachen als Teil des HTTP-Headers der „Accept-Language“-Anforderung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6913">If you don't configure or disable this policy, Microsoft Edge sends websites the user-specified preferred languages as part of the Accept-Language request HTTP header.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6914">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen Sprachvarianten finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6914">For detailed information on valid language variants, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2148854).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6915">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6915">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6916">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6916">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6917">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6917">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6918">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6918">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6919">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6919">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6920">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6920">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6921">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6921">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6922">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6922">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6923">GP eindeutiger Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6923">GP unique name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6924">GP-Name: Definieren einer geordneten Liste der bevorzugten Sprachen, in der Websites angezeigt werden sollen, wenn die Website die Sprache unterstützt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6924">GP name: Define an ordered list of preferred languages that websites should display in if the site supports the language</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6925">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6925">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6926">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6926">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6927">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6927">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6928">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6928">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6929">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6929">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6930">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6930">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6931">Wertname: DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6931">Value Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6932">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6932">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6933">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6933">Example value:</span></span>

```
"en-US,fr,es"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6934">Mac-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6934">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6935">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DefinePreferredLanguages</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6935">Preference Key Name: DefinePreferredLanguages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6936">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6936">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>en-US,fr,es</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-6937">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6937">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6938">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6938">DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>

  #### <a name="require-that-the-enterprise-mode-site-list-is-available-before-tab-navigation"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6939">Voraussetzen, dass die Enterprise Mode Site List vor der Registerkartennavigation verfügbar ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6939">Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6940">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6940">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6941">Unter Windows seit 84 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6941">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6942">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6942">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6943">Sie können angeben, ob die Microsoft Edge-Registerkarten warten, bis der Browser die anfängliche Enterprise Mode Site List heruntergeladen hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6943">Lets you specify whether Microsoft Edge tabs wait to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6944">Diese Einstellung ist für das Szenario vorgesehen, in dem die Browser Startseite im Internet Explorer-Modus geladen werden soll, und es ist wichtig, dass dies im Browser zuerst ausgeführt wird, nachdem der IE-Modus aktiviert ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6944">This setting is intended for the scenario where the browser home page should load in Internet Explorer mode, and it is important that is does so on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6945">Wenn dieses Szenario nicht vorhanden ist, empfiehlt es sich, diese Einstellung nicht zu aktivieren, da sich dies negativ auf die Leistung des Ladens der Startseite auswirken kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6945">If this scenario does not exist, we recommend not enabling this setting because it can negatively impact the performance of loading the home page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6946">Die Einstellung gilt nur, wenn Microsoft Edge nicht über eine im Cache des Enterprise Mode Site List verfügt, z. b. auf dem Browser erst ausgeführt wird, nachdem der IE-Modus aktiviert ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6946">The setting only applies when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached Enterprise Mode Site List, such as on browser first run after IE mode is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6947">Diese Einstellung funktioniert in Verbindung mit: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) auf „IEMode“ und der Richtlinie „[InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist)“, wenn die Liste mindestens einen Eintrag hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6947">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6948">Das Timeout-Verhalten dieser Richtlinie kann mit der Richtlinie für [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout-](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) konfiguriert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6948">The timeout behavior of this policy can be configured with the [NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout](#navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6949">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „All“ setzen und Microsoft Edge nicht über eine zwischengespeicherte Version der Enterprise Mode Site List verfügt, verzögern Registerkarten die Navigation, bis der Browser die Seitenliste heruntergeladen hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6949">If you set this policy to 'All', when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs delay navigating until the browser has downloaded the site list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6950">Websites, die so konfiguriert sind, dass Sie über die Siteliste im Internet Explorer-Modus geöffnet werden, werden im Internet Explorer-Modus geladen, auch während der anfänglichen Navigation im Browser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6950">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will load in Internet Explorer mode, even during the initial navigation of the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6951">Websites, die möglicherweise nicht so konfiguriert werden, dass sie in Internet Explorer geöffnet werden, z.B. jegliche Websites mit einem anderen Schema als http:, https:, file: oder ftp: zögern nicht beim Navigieren und laden sofort im Edge-Modus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6951">Sites that cannot possibly be configured to open in Internet Explorer, such as any site with a scheme other than http:, https:, file:, or ftp: do not delay navigating and load immediately in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6952">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „None“ setzen oder sie nicht konfigurieren und Microsoft Edge nicht über eine zwischengespeicherte Version der Enterprise Mode Site List verfügt, navigieren die Registerkarten sofort und warten nicht darauf, dass der Browser die Enterprise Mode Site List heruntergeladen hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6952">If you set this policy to 'None' or don't configure it, when Microsoft Edge does not have a cached version of the Enterprise Mode Site List, tabs will navigate immediately, and not wait for the browser to download the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6953">Websites, die so konfiguriert sind, dass sie über die Siteliste im Internet Explorer-Modus geöffnet werden, werden im Microsoft Edge-Modus geöffnet, bis der Browser den Download der Enterprise Mode Site List abgeschlossen hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6953">Sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode by the site list will open in Microsoft Edge mode until the browser has finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6954">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6954">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6955">None (0) = keine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6955">None (0) = None</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-6956">All (1) = alle geeigneten Navigationselemente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6956">All (1) = All eligible navigations</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6957">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6957">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6958">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6958">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6959">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6959">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6960">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6960">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6961">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6961">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6962">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6962">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6963">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6963">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6964">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6964">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6965">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6965">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6966">Eindeutiger Name des GP: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownloadvigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6966">GP unique name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6967">GP-Name: Voraussetzen, dass die Enterprise Mode Site List vor der Registerkartennavigation verfügbar ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6967">GP name: Require that the Enterprise Mode Site List is available before tab navigation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6968">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6968">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6969">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6969">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6970">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6970">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6971">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6971">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6972">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6972">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6973">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6973">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6974">Wertname: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6974">Value Name: DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6975">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6975">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6976">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6976">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="deletedataonmigration"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6978">DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6978">DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>

  #### <a name="delete-old-browser-data-on-migration"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6979">Löschen alter Browserdaten bei der Migration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6979">Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6980">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6980">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6981">Auf Windows ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6981">On Windows since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6982">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6982">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-6983">Diese Richtlinie bestimmt, ob Benutzerdaten aus Microsoft Edge Legacy nach der Migration zur Microsoft Edge-Version 81 oder höher gelöscht werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6983">This policy determines whether user browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy will be deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6984">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "aktiviert" festlegen, werden alle Browserdaten aus Microsoft Edge Legacy nach der Migration zur Microsoft Edge-Version 81 oder höher gelöscht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6984">If you set this policy to "Enabled", all browsing data from Microsoft Edge Legacy after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later will be deleted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-6985">Diese Richtlinie muss festgelegt werden, bevor Sie zu Microsoft Edge Version 81 oder höher migrieren, um sich auf die vorhandenen Browserdaten auszuwirken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6985">This policy must be set before migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 81 or later to have any effect on existing browsing data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-6986">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "deaktiviert" festlegen oder die Richtlinie nicht konfiguriert ist, werden die Benutzerdaten nach der Migration zur Microsoft Edge-Version 83 oder höher nicht gelöscht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6986">If you set this policy to "Disabled", or the policy is not configured, user browsing data isn't deleted after migrating to the Microsoft Edge version 83 or later.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6987">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6987">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6988">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6988">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6989">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6989">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6990">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6990">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6991">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6991">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6992">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6992">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6993">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6993">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-6994">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6994">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6995">GP eindeutiger Name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6995">GP unique name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6996">GP-Name: Löschen alter Browserdaten bei der Migration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6996">GP name: Delete old browser data on migration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6997">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6997">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6998">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6998">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-6999">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-6999">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7000">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7000">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7001">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7001">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7002">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7002">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7003">Wertname: DeleteDataOnMigration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7003">Value Name: DeleteDataOnMigration</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7004">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7004">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7005">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7005">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="developertoolsavailability"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7007">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7007">DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-where-developer-tools-can-be-used"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7008">Steuern, wo Entwicklertools verwendet werden können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7008">Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7009">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7009">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7010">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7010">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7011">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7011">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7012">Steuert, wo Entwicklertools verwendet werden können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7012">Control where developer tools can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7013">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions“ setzen, können die Benutzer auf die Entwicklertools und die JavaScript-Konsole im Allgemeinen zugreifen, aber nicht im Rahmen von Erweiterungen, die von der Unternehmensrichtlinie installiert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7013">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions' (the default), users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in general, but not in the context of extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7014">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „DeveloperToolsAllowed“ setzen, können die Benutzer grundsätzlich auf die Entwicklertools und die JavaScript-Konsole zugreifen, einschließlich der von Unternehmensrichtlinien installierten Erweiterungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7014">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsAllowed', users can access the developer tools and the JavaScript console in all contexts, including extensions installed by enterprise policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7015">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „DeveloperToolsDisallowed“ setzen, können die Benutzer nicht auf die Entwicklertools zugreifen oder die Elemente von Websiten prüfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7015">If you set this policy to 'DeveloperToolsDisallowed', users can't access the developer tools or inspect website elements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7016">Die Tastenkombinationen und Menü- oder Kontextmenüeinträge, die die Entwicklertools oder die JavaScript-Konsole öffnen, sind deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7016">Keyboard shortcuts and menu or context menu entries that open the developer tools or the JavaScript Console are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7017">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7017">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7018">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = Blockieren der Entwicklertools für Erweiterungen, die von der Enterprise-Richtlinie installiert wurden, in anderen Kontexten zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7018">DeveloperToolsDisallowedForForceInstalledExtensions (0) = Block the developer tools on extensions installed by enterprise policy, allow in other contexts</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7019">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = Entwicklertools zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7019">DeveloperToolsAllowed (1) = Allow using the developer tools</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7020">DeveloperToolsAllowed (2) = Entwicklertools nicht zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7020">DeveloperToolsDisallowed (2) = Don't allow using the developer tools</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7021">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7021">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7022">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7022">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7023">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7023">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7024">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7024">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7025">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7025">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7026">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7026">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7027">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7027">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7028">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7028">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7029">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7029">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7030">GP eindeutiger Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7030">GP unique name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7031">GP-Name: Steuern, wo Entwicklertools verwendet werden können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7031">GP name: Control where developer tools can be used</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7032">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7032">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7033">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7033">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7034">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7034">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7035">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7035">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7036">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7036">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7037">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7037">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7038">Wertname: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7038">Value Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7039">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7039">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7040">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7040">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7041">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7041">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7042">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7042">Preference Key Name: DeveloperToolsAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7043">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7043">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="diagnosticdata"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7045">DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7045">DiagnosticData</span></span>

  #### <a name="send-required-and-optional-diagnostic-data-about-browser-usage"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7046">Senden erforderlicher und optionaler Diagnosedaten zur Browsernutzung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7046">Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7047">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7047">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7048">Unter Windows 7 und MacOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7048">On Windows 7 and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7049">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7049">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7050">Diese Richtlinie steuert das Senden der erforderlichen und optionalen Diagnosedaten zur Browsernutzung an Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7050">This policy controls sending required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7051">Erforderliche Diagnosedaten werden gesammelt, um Microsoft Edge sicher, aktuell und erwartungsgemäß zu halten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7051">Required diagnostic data is collected keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7052">Zu den optionalen Diagnosedaten gehören Daten zur Verwendung des Browsers, von Ihnen besuchte Websites und Absturzberichte an Microsoft zur Verbesserung von Produkten und Diensten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7052">Optional diagnostic data includes data about how you use the browser, websites you visit and crash reports to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7053">Diese Richtlinie wird auf Windows 10-Geräten nicht unterstützt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7053">This policy is not supported on Windows 10 devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7054">Um diese Datenerfassung unter Windows 10 zu steuern, müssen IT-Administratoren die Windows-Diagnosedaten-Gruppenrichtlinie verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7054">To control this data collection on Windows 10, IT admins must use the Windows diagnostic data group policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7055">Diese Richtlinie lautet je nach Windows-Version entweder "Telemetrie zulassen" oder "Diagnosedaten zulassen".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7055">This policy will either be 'Allow Telemetry' or 'Allow Diagnostic Data', depending on the version of Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7056">Weitere Informationen zur Windows 10-Diagnosedatenerfassung:[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7056">Learn more about Windows 10 diagnostic data collection: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7057">Verwenden Sie eine der folgenden Einstellungen, um diese Richtlinie zu konfigurieren:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7057">Use one of the following settings to configure this policy:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7058">'Aus' deaktiviert die erforderliche und optionale Diagnosedatenerfassung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7058">'Off' turns off required and optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7059">Diese Option wird nicht empfohlen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7059">This option is not recommended.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7060">'RequiredData' sendet die erforderlichen Diagnosedaten, deaktiviert jedoch die optionale Diagnosedatenerfassung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7060">'RequiredData' sends required diagnostic data but turns off optional diagnostic data collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7061">Microsoft Edge sendet die erforderlichen Diagnosedaten, um Microsoft Edge sicher, aktuell und erwartungsgemäß zu halten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7061">Microsoft Edge will send required diagnostic data to keep Microsoft Edge secure, up to date and performing as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7062">'OptionalData' sendet optionale Diagnosedaten, einschließlich Daten zur Browsernutzung, besuchten Websites und Absturzberichten, die zur Produkt- und Serviceverbesserung an Microsoft gesendet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7062">'OptionalData' sends optional diagnostic data includes data about browser usage, websites that are visited, crash reports sent to Microsoft for product and service improvement.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7063">Unter Windows 7/macOS steuert diese Richtlinie das Senden der erforderlichen und optionalen Daten an Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7063">On Windows 7/macOS, this policy controls sending required and optional data to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7064">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder deaktivieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge standardmäßig die Einstellungen des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7064">If you don't configure this policy or disable it, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7065">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7065">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7066">Aus (0) = Aus (Nicht empfohlen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7066">Off (0) = Off (Not recommended)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7067">RequiredData (1) = Erforderliche Daten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7067">RequiredData (1) = Required data</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7068">OptionalData (2) = Optionale Daten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7068">OptionalData (2) = Optional data</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7069">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7069">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7070">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7070">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7071">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7071">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7072">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7072">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7073">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7073">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7074">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7074">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7075">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7075">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7076">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7076">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7077">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7077">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7078">Eindeutiger Name der GP: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7078">GP unique name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7079">GP-Name: Senden Sie die erforderlichen und optionalen Diagnosedaten zur Browsernutzung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7079">GP name: Send required and optional diagnostic data about browser usage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7080">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7080">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7081">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7081">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7082">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7082">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7083">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7083">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7084">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7084">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7085">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7085">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7086">Wertname: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7086">Value Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7087">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7087">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7088">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7088">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7089">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7089">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7090">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: DiagnosticData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7090">Preference Key Name: DiagnosticData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7091">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7091">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="directinvokeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7093">DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7093">DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-open-files-using-the-directinvoke-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7094">Benutzern das Öffnen von Dateien mithilfe des DirectInvoke-Protokolls gestatten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7094">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7095">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7095">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7096">Auf Windows ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7096">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7097">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7097">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7098">Benutzern das Öffnen von Dateien mithilfe des DirectInvoke-Protokolls gestatten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7098">Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7099">Mithilfe des DirectInvoke-Protokolls können Websites fordern, dass der Browser Dateien aus einer bestimmten URL mit einem bestimmten Dateihandler auf dem Computer oder Gerät des Benutzers öffnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7099">The DirectInvoke protocol allows websites to request that the browser open files from a specific URL using a specific file handler on the user's computer or device.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7100">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer Dateien mit dem DirectInvoke-Protokoll öffnen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7100">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7101">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können Benutzer keine Dateien mithilfe des DirectInvoke-Protokolls öffnen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7101">If you disable this policy, users can't open files using the DirectInvoke protocol.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7102">Die Datei wird stattdessen im Dateisystem gespeichert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7102">Instead, the file will be saved to the file system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7103">Hinweis: durch das Deaktivieren von DirectInvoke können bestimmte Microsoft SharePoint Online-Features nicht erwartungsgemäß funktionieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7103">Note: Disabling DirectInvoke may prevent certain Microsoft SharePoint Online features from working as expected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7104">Weitere Informationen zu DirectInvoke finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) und [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7104">For more information about DirectInvoke, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2103872) and [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099871).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7105">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7105">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7106">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7106">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7107">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7107">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7108">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7108">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7109">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7109">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7110">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7110">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7111">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7111">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7112">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7112">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7113">GP eindeutiger Name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7113">GP unique name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7114">GP-Name: Benutzern das Öffnen von Dateien mithilfe des DirectInvoke-Protokolls gestatten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7114">GP name: Allow users to open files using the DirectInvoke protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7115">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7115">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7116">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7116">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7117">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7117">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7118">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7118">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7119">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7119">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7120">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7120">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7121">Wertname: DirectInvokeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7121">Value Name: DirectInvokeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7122">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7122">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7123">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7123">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="disable3dapis"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7125">Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7125">Disable3DAPIs</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-support-for-3d-graphics-apis"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7126">Deaktivieren der Unterstützung für 3D-Grafik-APIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7126">Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7127">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7127">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7128">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7128">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7129">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7129">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7130">Verhindern, dass Webseiten auf die GPU (Grafikkarte/ -prozessor) zugreifen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7130">Prevent web pages from accessing the graphics processing unit (GPU).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7131">Speziell können Webseiten nicht auf die WebGL-API zugreifen und Plug-Ins können die Pepper 3D-API nicht verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7131">Specifically, web pages can't access the WebGL API and plug-ins can't use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7132">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder deaktivieren, ist es möglich, dass Webseiten mithilfe der WebGL-API und Plug-ins die Pepper 3D-API verwenden können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7132">If you don't configure or disable this policy, it potentially allows web pages to use the WebGL API and plug-ins to use the Pepper 3D API.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7133">Microsoft Edge kann in der Standardeinstellung weiterhin Befehlszeilenargumente zur Verwendung dieser APIs erforderlich machen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7133">Microsoft Edge might, by default, still require command line arguments to be passed in order to use these APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7134">Wenn die [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled)-Richtlinie auf falsch festgelegt ist, wird die Einstellung für die "Disable3DAPIs"-Richtlinie ignoriert – das entspricht der Einstellung von "Disable3DAPIs" auf "true".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7134">If [HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled](#hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled) policy is set to false, the setting for 'Disable3DAPIs' policy is ignored - it's the equivalent of setting 'Disable3DAPIs' policy to true.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7135">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7135">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7136">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7136">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7137">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7137">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7138">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7138">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7139">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7139">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7140">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7140">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7141">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7141">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7142">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7142">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7143">GP eindeutiger Name: Disable3DAPIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7143">GP unique name: Disable3DAPIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7144">GP-Name: Deaktivieren der Unterstützung für 3D-Grafik-APIs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7144">GP name: Disable support for 3D graphics APIs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7145">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7145">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7146">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7146">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7147">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7147">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7149">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7149">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>

0x00000000
