  ### <a name="disablescreenshots"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7158">DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7158">DisableScreenshots</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-taking-screenshots"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7159">Deaktivieren der Anfertigung von Screenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7159">Disable taking screenshots</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7160">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7160">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7161">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7161">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7162">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7162">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7163">Steuert, ob Benutzer Screenshots der Browserseite erstellen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7163">Controls if users can take screenshots of the browser page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7164">Wenn diese Option aktiviert ist, können Benutzer keine Screenshots mithilfe von Tastenkombinationen oder Erweiterungs-APIs erstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7164">If enabled, user can't take screenshots by using keyboard shortcuts or extension APIs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7165">Wenn diese Richtlinie deaktiviert oder nicht konfiguriert wird, können die Benutzer Screenshots erstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7165">If disabled or don't configure this policy, users can take screenshots.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7166">Bitte beachten Sie, dass diese Richtlinie sich auf Screenshots auswirkt, die im Browser selbst aufgenommen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7166">Please note this policy controls screenshots taken from within the browser itself.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7167">Auch wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können die Benutzer möglicherweise weiterhin Screenshots erstellen, wenn sie dazu eine Methode außerhalb des Browsers verwenden (wie die Verwendung eines Betriebssystem-Features oder einer anderen Anwendung).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7167">Even if you enable this policy, users might still be able to take screenshots using some method outside of the browser (like using an operating system feature or another application).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7168">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7168">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7169">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7169">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7170">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7170">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7171">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7171">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7172">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7172">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7173">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7173">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7174">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7174">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7175">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7175">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7176">GP eindeutiger Name: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7176">GP unique name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7177">GP-Name: Deaktivieren der Anfertigung von Screenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7177">GP name: Disable taking screenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7178">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7178">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7179">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7179">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7180">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7180">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7181">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7181">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7182">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7182">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7183">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7183">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7184">Wertname: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7184">Value Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7185">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7185">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7186">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7186">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7187">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7187">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7188">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DisableScreenshots</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7188">Preference Key Name: DisableScreenshots</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7189">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7189">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="diskcachedir"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7191">DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7191">DiskCacheDir</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-disk-cache-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7192">Festlegen des Datenträgercache Verzeichnisses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7192">Set disk cache directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7193">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7193">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7194">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7194">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7195">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7195">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7196">Konfiguriert das Verzeichnis, das zum Speichern zwischengespeicherter Dateien verwendet werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7196">Configures the directory to use to store cached files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7197">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge das bereitgestellte Verzeichnis unabhängig davon, ob der Benutzer das Flag "--disk-cache-dir" festgelegt hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7197">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7198">Zum Vermeiden von Datenverlust oder anderen unerwarteten Fehlern konfigurieren Sie diese Richtlinie nicht auf das Stammverzeichnis eines Volumes oder auf ein Verzeichnis, das für andere Zwecke verwendet wird, da Microsoft Edge dessen Inhalte verwaltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7198">To avoid data loss or other unexpected errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7199">Eine Liste der Variablen, die Sie beim Angeben von Verzeichnissen und Pfaden verwenden können, finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7199">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use when specifying directories and paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7200">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird das standardmäßige Cacheverzeichnis verwendet, und die Benutzer können diese Standardeinstellung außer Kraft setzen, indem Sie das Befehlszeilenkennzeichen "--disk-cache-dir" verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7200">If you don't configure this policy, the default cache directory is used, and users can override that default with the '--disk-cache-dir' command line flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7201">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7201">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7202">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7202">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7203">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7203">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7204">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7204">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7205">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7205">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7206">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7206">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7207">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7207">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7208">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7208">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7209">GP eindeutiger Name: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7209">GP unique name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7210">GP-Name: Festlegen des Datenträgercache Verzeichnisses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7210">GP name: Set disk cache directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7211">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7211">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7212">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7212">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7213">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7213">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7214">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7214">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7215">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7215">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7216">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7216">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7217">Wertname: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7217">Value Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7218">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7218">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7219">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7219">Example value:</span></span>

```
"${user_home}/Edge_cache"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7220">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7220">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7221">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DiskCacheDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7221">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheDir</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7222">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7222">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>${user_home}/Edge_cache</string>
```

  ### <a name="diskcachesize"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7224">DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7224">DiskCacheSize</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-disk-cache-size-in-bytes"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7225">Festlegen der Datenträgercachegröße, in Bytes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7225">Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7226">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7226">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7227">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7227">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7228">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7228">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7229">Konfiguriert die Cachegröße (in Bytes), die zum Speichern von Dateien auf dem Datenträger verwendet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7229">Configures the size of the cache, in bytes, used to store files on the disk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7230">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge die bereitgestellte Cachegröße unabhängig davon, ob der Benutzer das Flag "--disk-cache-size" festgelegt hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7230">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided cache size regardless of whether the user has specified the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7231">Der Wert, der in dieser Richtlinie angegeben ist, ist keine feste Grenze, sondern ein Vorschlag für das Cachingsystem. Ein Wert geringer als einige Megabytes ist zu klein und wird auf ein vertretbares Minimum gerundet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7231">The value specified in this policy isn't a hard boundary but rather a suggestion to the caching system; any value below a few megabytes is too small and will be rounded up to a reasonable minimum.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7232">Wenn Sie den Wert dieser Richtlinie auf "0" festlegen, wird die Standardcachegröße verwendet, und die Benutzer können diese nicht ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7232">If you set the value of this policy to 0, the default cache size is used, and users can't change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7233">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird die Standardgröße verwendet, aber die Benutzer können sie mit dem Flag "--disk-cache-size" außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7233">If you don't configure this policy, the default size is used, but users can override it with the '--disk-cache-size' flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7234">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7234">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7235">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7235">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7236">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7236">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7237">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7237">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7238">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7238">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7239">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7239">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7240">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7240">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7241">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7241">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7242">GP eindeutiger Name: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7242">GP unique name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7243">GP-Name: Festlegen der Datenträgercachegröße, in Bytes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7243">GP name: Set disk cache size, in bytes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7244">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7244">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7245">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7245">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7246">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7246">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7247">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7247">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7248">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7248">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7249">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7249">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7250">Wertname: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7250">Value Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7251">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7251">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7252">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7252">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x06400000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7253">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7253">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7254">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DiskCacheSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7254">Preference Key Name: DiskCacheSize</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7255">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7255">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>104857600</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-7256">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7256">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="dnsoverhttpsmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7257">DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7257">DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-the-mode-of-dns-over-https"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7258">Steuern des Modus von „DNS-over-HTTPS“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7258">Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7259">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7259">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7260">Auf Windows und macOS ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7260">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7261">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7261">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7262">Steuern des Modus des „DNS-over-HTTPS“-Resolvers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7262">Control the mode of the DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7263">Beachten Sie, dass mit dieser Richtlinie nur der Standardmodus für jede Abfrage festgelegt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7263">Note that this policy will only set the default mode for each query.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7264">Der Modus kann für spezielle Arten von Abfragen überschrieben werden, z.B. Anforderungen zum Auflösen eines DNS-over-HTTPS-Server-Hostnamens.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7264">The mode can be overridden for special types of queries such as requests to resolve a DNS-over-HTTPS server hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7265">Der Modus "Aus" deaktiviert DNS-over-HTTPS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7265">The "off" mode will disable DNS-over-HTTPS.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7266">Der Modus "automatisch" sendet DNS-over-HTTPS-Abfragen erst, wenn ein DNS-over-HTTPS-Server verfügbar ist, und er kann beim Auftreten eines Fehlers auf das Senden von unsicheren Abfragen zurückgreifen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7266">The "automatic" mode will send DNS-over-HTTPS queries first if a DNS-over-HTTPS server is available and may fallback to sending insecure queries on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7267">Der Modus "sicher" sendet nur DNS-over-HTTPS-Abfragen kann im Fehlerfall nicht auflösen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7267">The "secure" mode will only send DNS-over-HTTPS queries and will fail to resolve on error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7268">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, sendet der Browser möglicherweise DNS-über-HTTPS-Anforderungen an einen Resolver, der dem konfigurierten Systemresolver des Benutzers zugeordnet ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7268">If you don't configure this policy, the browser might send DNS-over-HTTPS requests to a resolver associated with the user's configured system resolver.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7269">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7269">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7270">Off (Aus) = DNS-over-HTTPS deaktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7270">off (off) = Disable DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7271">Automatic (Automatisch) = DNS-over-HTTPS mit unsicheren Abfragen aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7271">automatic (automatic) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS with insecure fallback</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7272">Secure (Sicher) = DNS-over-HTTPS ohne unsichere Abfragen aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7272">secure (secure) = Enable DNS-over-HTTPS without insecure fallback</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7273">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7273">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7274">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7274">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7275">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7275">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7276">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7276">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7277">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7277">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7278">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7278">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7279">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7279">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7280">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7280">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7281">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7281">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7282">GP eindeutiger Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7282">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7283">GP-Name: Steuern des Modus von „DNS-over-HTTPS“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7283">GP name: Control the mode of DNS-over-HTTPS</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7284">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7284">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7285">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7285">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7286">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7286">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7287">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7287">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7288">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7288">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7289">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7289">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7290">Wertname: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7290">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7291">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7291">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7292">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7292">Example value:</span></span>

```
"off"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7293">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7293">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7294">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DnsOverHttpsMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7294">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7295">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7295">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>off</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-7296">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7296">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="dnsoverhttpstemplates"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7297">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7297">DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-uri-template-of-desired-dns-over-https-resolver"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7298">Geben Sie die URI-Vorlage des gewünschten DNS-over-HTTPS-Resolvers an</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7298">Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7299">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7299">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7300">Auf Windows und macOS ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7300">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7301">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7301">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7302">Die URI-Vorlage des gewünschten DNS-over-HTTPS-Resolvers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7302">The URI template of the desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7303">Wenn Sie mehrere DNS-über-HTTPS-Resolver angeben möchten, trennen Sie die entsprechenden URI-Vorlagen durch Leerzeichen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7303">To specify multiple DNS-over-HTTPS resolvers, separate the corresponding URI templates with spaces.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7304">Wenn Sie [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) auf "sicher" festlegen, muss diese Richtlinie festgelegt und darf nicht leer sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7304">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "secure" then this policy must be set and cannot be empty.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7305">Wenn Sie [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) auf "automatisch" festlegen und diese Richtlinie festgelegt ist, werden die angegebenen URI-Vorlagen verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7305">If you set [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) to "automatic" and this policy is set then the URI templates specified will be used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7306">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, werden hartcodierte Zuordnungen verwendet, um zu versuchen, den aktuelle DNS-Resolver des Benutzers auf einen DoH-Resolver zu aktualisieren, der vom gleichen Anbieter betrieben wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7306">If you don't set this policy, then hardcoded mappings will be used to attempt to upgrade the user's current DNS resolver to a DoH resolver operated by the same provider.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7307">Wenn die URI-Vorlage eine DNS-Variable enthält, verwenden Anforderungen an den Resolver GET, andernfalls verwenden sie POST.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7307">If the URI template contains a dns variable, requests to the resolver will use GET; otherwise requests will use POST.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7308">Falsch formatierte Vorlagen werden ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7308">Incorrectly formatted templates will be ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7309">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7309">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7310">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7310">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7311">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7311">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7312">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7312">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7313">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7313">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7314">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7314">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7315">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7315">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7316">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7316">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7317">GP eindeutiger Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7317">GP unique name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7318">GP-Name: Geben Sie die URI-Vorlage des gewünschten DNS-over-HTTPS-Resolvers an</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7318">GP name: Specify URI template of desired DNS-over-HTTPS resolver</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7319">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7319">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7320">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7320">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7321">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7321">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7322">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7322">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7323">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7323">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7324">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7324">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7325">Wertname: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7325">Value Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7326">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7326">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7327">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7327">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7328">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7328">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7329">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7329">Preference Key Name: DnsOverHttpsTemplates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7330">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7330">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://dns.example.net/dns-query{?dns}</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-7331">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7331">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="downloaddirectory"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7332">Download Directory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7332">DownloadDirectory</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-download-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7333">Downloadverzeichnis festlegen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7333">Set download directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7334">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7334">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7335">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7335">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7336">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7336">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7337">Konfiguriert das Verzeichnis, das zum Speichern heruntergeladener Dateien verwendet werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7337">Configures the directory to use when downloading files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7338">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge das bereitgestellte Verzeichnis unabhängig davon, ob der Benutzer eines festgelegt hat oder gewählt hat, jedes Mal nach einem Downloadort gefragt zu werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7338">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory regardless of whether the user has specified one or chosen to be prompted for download location every time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7339">Eine Liste der Variablen, die verwendet werden können, finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7339">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7340">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird das standardmäßige Downloadverzeichnis verwendet und der Benutzer kann es ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7340">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the default download directory is used, and the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7341">Wenn Sie einen ungültigen Pfad festlegen, wird Microsoft Edge auf das standardmäßige Downloadverzeichnis des Benutzers zurückgreifen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7341">If you set an invalid path, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's default download directory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7342">Wenn der Ordner, der vom Pfad angegeben wird, nicht vorhanden ist, wird beim Herunterladen eine Eingabeaufforderung angezeigt, in der der Benutzer gefragt wird, wo der Download gespeichert werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7342">If the folder specified by the path doesn't exist, the download will trigger a prompt that asks the user where they want to save their download.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7343">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7343">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7344">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7344">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7345">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7345">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7346">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7346">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7347">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7347">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7348">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7348">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7349">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7349">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7350">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7350">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7351">GP eindeutiger Name: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7351">GP unique name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7352">GP-Name: Downloadverzeichnis festlegen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7352">GP name: Set download directory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7353">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7353">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7354">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7354">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7355">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7355">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7356">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7356">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7357">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7357">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7358">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7358">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7359">Wertname: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7359">Value Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7360">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7360">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7361">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7361">Example value:</span></span>

```
"\n      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads\n      Windows: C:\\Users\\${user_name}\\Downloads"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7362">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7362">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7363">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DownloadDirectory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7363">Preference Key Name: DownloadDirectory</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7364">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7364">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>
      Linux-based OSes (including Mac): /home/${user_name}/Downloads
      Windows: C:\Users\${user_name}\Downloads</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-7365">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7365">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="downloadrestrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7366">DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7366">DownloadRestrictions</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-download-restrictions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7367">Downloadbeschränkungen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7367">Allow download restrictions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7368">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7368">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7369">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7369">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7370">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7370">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7371">Konfiguriert die Art der Downloads, die von Microsoft Edge vollständig blockiert werden, ohne dass die Benutzer die Sicherheitsentscheidung außer Kraft setzen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7371">Configures the type of downloads that Microsoft Edge completely blocks, without letting users override the security decision.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7372">Legen Sie die Einstellung auf „BlockDangerousDownloads“ fest, damit alle Downloads mit Ausnahme derer zulässig sind, die eine Microsoft Defender SmartScreen-Warnung erhalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7372">Set 'BlockDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7373">Legen Sie die Einstellung auf „BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads“ fest, damit alle Downloads mit Ausnahme derer zulässig sind, die eine Microsoft Defender SmartScreen-Warnung für „potenziell gefährliche oder unerwünschte Downloads“ erhalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7373">Set 'BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads' to allow all downloads except for those that carry Microsoft Defender SmartScreen warnings of potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7374">Legen Sie die Einstellung auf „'BlockAllDownloads“ fest, um alle Downloads zu blockieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7374">Set 'BlockAllDownloads' to block all downloads.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7375">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder die Option „DefaultDownloadSecurity“ festlegen, durchlaufen die Downloads die üblichen Sicherheitseinschränkungen, die auf den Analyseergebnissen von Microsoft Defender SmartScreen basieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7375">If you don't configure this policy or set the 'DefaultDownloadSecurity' option, the downloads go through the usual security restrictions based on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen analysis results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7376">Beachten Sie, dass diese Einschränkungen für Downloads aus Webseiteninhalten sowie für die Kontextmenü-Option „Download Link...“ gelten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7376">Note that these restrictions apply to downloads from web page content, as well as the 'download link...' context menu option.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7377">Diese Einschränkungen gelten nicht für das Speichern oder Herunterladen der aktuell angezeigten Seite oder für die Option "als PDF speichern" aus den Druckoptionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7377">These restrictions don't apply to saving or downloading the currently displayed page, nor do they apply to the Save as PDF option from the printing options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7378">Unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) finden Sie weitere Informationen zu Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7378">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094934) for more info on Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7379">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7379">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7380">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = Keine speziellen Beschränkungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7380">DefaultDownloadSecurity (0) = No special restrictions</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7381">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Gefährliche Downloads blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7381">BlockDangerousDownloads (1) = Block dangerous downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7382">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Blockieren potenziell gefährlicher oder unerwünschter Downloads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7382">BlockPotentiallyDangerousDownloads (2) = Block potentially dangerous or unwanted downloads</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7383">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Alle Downloads blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7383">BlockAllDownloads (3) = Block all downloads</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7384">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7384">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7385">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7385">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7386">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7386">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7387">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7387">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7388">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7388">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7389">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7389">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7390">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7390">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7391">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7391">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7392">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7392">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7393">GP eindeutiger Name: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7393">GP unique name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7394">GP-Name: Downloadbeschränkungen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7394">GP name: Allow download restrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7395">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7395">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7396">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7396">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7397">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7397">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7398">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7398">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7399">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7399">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7400">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7400">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7401">Wertname: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7401">Value Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7402">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7402">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7403">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7403">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7404">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7404">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7405">Einstellung Schlüsselname: DownloadRestrictions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7405">Preference Key Name: DownloadRestrictions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7406">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7406">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="edgecollectionsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7408">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7408">EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-collections-feature"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7409">Aktivieren des Features „Sammlungen“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7409">Enable the Collections feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7410">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7410">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7411">Auf Windows und macOS ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7411">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7412">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7412">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7413">Ermöglicht es Benutzern, auf das Sammlungs-Feature zuzugreifen, wodurch sie Inhalte effizienter und mit Office-Integration sammeln, organisieren, freigeben und exportieren können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7413">Lets you allow users to access the Collections feature, where they can collect, organize, share, and export content more efficiently and with Office integration.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7414">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer auf das Feature Sammlungen in Microsoft Edge zugreifen und es verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7414">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can access and use the Collections feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7415">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können Benutzer nicht auf Sammlungen in Microsoft Edge zugreifen und diese verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7415">If you disable this policy, users can't access and use Collections in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7416">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7416">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7417">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7417">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7418">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7418">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7419">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7419">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7420">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7420">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7421">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7421">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7422">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7422">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7423">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7423">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7424">GP eindeutiger Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7424">GP unique name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7425">GP-Name: Aktivieren des Features „Sammlungen“</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7425">GP name: Enable the Collections feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7426">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7426">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7427">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7427">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7428">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7428">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7429">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7429">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7430">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7430">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7431">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7431">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7432">Wertname: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7432">Value Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7433">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7433">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7434">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7434">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7435">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7435">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7436">Einstellung Schlüsselname: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7436">Preference Key Name: EdgeCollectionsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7437">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7437">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-7438">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7438">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="edgeshoppingassistantenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7439">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7439">EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="shopping-in-microsoft-edge-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7440">Einkaufen in Microsoft Edge aktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7440">Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7441">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7441">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7442">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7442">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7443">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7443">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7444">Mit dieser Richtlinie können Benutzer die Preise eines Produkts vergleichen, das sie sich anschauen, Gutscheine oder Rabatte von der Website erhalten, auf der sie sich befinden, oder während dem Auftragsabschluss automatisch Gutscheine anwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7444">This policy lets users compare the prices of a product they are looking at, get coupons or rebates from the website they're on, or auto-apply coupons during checkout.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7445">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden Einkaufsfunktionen wie Preisvergleich, Gutscheine oder Rabatte automatisch für Einzelhandelsdomänen angewendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7445">If you enable or don't configure this policy, shopping features such as price comparison, coupons and rebates will be automatically applied for retail domains.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7446">Gutscheine für den aktuellen Händler und die Preise von anderen Händlern werden auf einem Server abgeholt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7446">Coupons for the current retailer and prices from other retailers will be fetched from a server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7447">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinien für Einkaufsfunktionen wie Preisvergleiche deaktivieren, werden Gutscheine und Rabatte für Einzelhandelsdomänen nicht automatisch gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7447">If you disable this policy shopping features such as price comparison, coupons and rebates will not be automatically found for retail domains.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7448">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7448">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7449">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7449">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7450">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7450">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7451">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7451">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7452">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7452">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7453">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7453">Boolean</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7455">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7455">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7456">Eindeutiger GP-Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7456">GP unique name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7457">GP-Name: Einkaufen in Microsoft Edge aktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7457">GP name: Shopping in Microsoft Edge Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7458">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7458">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7459">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7459">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7460">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7460">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7462">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7462">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7463">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7463">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7464">Wertname: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7464">Value Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7465">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7465">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7466">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7466">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7467">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7467">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7468">Einstellung Schlüsselname: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7468">Preference Key Name: EdgeShoppingAssistantEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7469">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7469">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="editfavoritesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7471">EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7471">EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allows-users-to-edit-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7472">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Bearbeiten von Favoriten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7472">Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7473">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7473">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7474">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7474">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7475">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7475">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7476">Aktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, damit Benutzer Favoriten hinzufügen, entfernen und ändern können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7476">Enable this policy to let users add, remove, and modify favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7477">Dies ist das Standardverhalten, wenn Sie die Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7477">This is the default behavior if you don't configure the policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7478">Deaktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um zu verhindern, dass Benutzer Favoriten hinzufügen, entfernen oder ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7478">Disable this policy to stop users from adding, removing, or modifying favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7479">Sie können die vorhandenen Favoriten weiterhin verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7479">They can still use existing favorites.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7480">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7480">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7481">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7481">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7482">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7482">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7483">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7483">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7484">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7484">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7485">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7485">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7486">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7486">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7487">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7487">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7488">GP eindeutiger Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7488">GP unique name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7489">GP-Name: Ermöglicht Benutzern das Bearbeiten von Favoriten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7489">GP name: Allows users to edit favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7490">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7490">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7491">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7491">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7492">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7492">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7493">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7493">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7494">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7494">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7495">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7495">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7496">Wertname: EditFavoritesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7496">Value Name: EditFavoritesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7497">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7497">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7498">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7498">Example value:</span></span>

```

```
