  ### <a name="forcebingsafesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7909">ForceBingSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7909">ForceBingSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <a name="enforce-bing-safesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7910">Erzwingen von Bing SafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7910">Enforce Bing SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7911">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7911">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7912">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7912">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7913">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7913">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7914">Stellt sicher, dass Abfragen in der Bing-Websuche mit dem festgelegten SafeSearch-Wert ausgeführt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7914">Ensure that queries in Bing web search are done with SafeSearch set to the value specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7915">Benutzer können diese Einstellung nicht ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7915">Users can't change this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7916">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode“ konfigurieren, greift SafeSearch in der Bing-Suche auf den Bing.com-Wert zurück.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7916">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode', SafeSearch in Bing search falls back to the bing.com value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7917">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „BingSafeSearchModerateMode“ konfigurieren, wird die moderate Einstellung in SafeSearch verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7917">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchModerateMode', the moderate setting is used in SafeSearch.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7918">Die moderate Einstellung filtert Videos und Bilder für Erwachsene aus, nicht aber Text aus den Suchergebnissen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7918">The moderate setting filters adult videos and images but not text from search results.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7919">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „BingSafeSearchStrictMode“ konfigurieren, wird die strikte Einstellung in SafeSearch verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7919">If you configure this policy to 'BingSafeSearchStrictMode', the strict setting in SafeSearch is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7920">Die strikte Einstellung filtert Text, Bilder und Videos für Erwachsene aus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7920">The strict setting filters adult text, images, and videos.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7921">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird SafeSearch in Bing Search nicht erzwungen, und die Benutzer können den gewünschten Wert auf Bing.com festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7921">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Bing search isn't enforced, and users can set the value they want on bing.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7922">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7922">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7923">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Keine Suchbeschränkungen in Bing konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7923">BingSafeSearchNoRestrictionsMode (0) = Don't configure search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7924">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = Moderate Suchbeschränkungen in Bing konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7924">BingSafeSearchModerateMode (1) = Configure moderate search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-7925">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = Strikte Suchbeschränkungen in Bing konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7925">BingSafeSearchStrictMode (2) = Configure strict search restrictions in Bing</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7926">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7926">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7927">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7927">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7928">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7928">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>

  ### <a name="forcecertificatepromptsonmultiplematches"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7950">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7950">ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-whether-microsoft-edge-should-automatically-select-a-certificate-when-there-are-multiple-certificate-matches-for-a-site-configured-with-autoselectcertificateforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7951">Konfigurieren, ob Microsoft Edge automatisch ein Zertifikat auswählen soll, wenn mehrere Zertifikat-Übereinstimmungen für eine Website vorhanden sind, die mit „AutoSelectCertificateForUrls“ konfiguriert ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7951">Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7952">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7952">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7953">Auf Windows und macOS ab 81 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7953">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7954">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7954">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7955">Legt fest, ob Benutzer zum Auswählen eines Zertifikats aufgefordert werden, wenn mehrere Zertifikate verfügbar sind und eine Website mit [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) konfiguriert ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7955">Toggles whether users are prompted to select a certificate if there are multiple certificates available and a site is configured with [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7956">Wenn Sie [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) für eine Website nicht konfigurieren, wird der Benutzer immer aufgefordert, ein Zertifikat auszuwählen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7956">If you don't configure [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) for a site, the user will always be prompted to select a certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7957">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "wahr" festlegen, fordert Microsoft Edge den Benutzer auf, ein Zertifikat für Websites aus der Liste auszuwählen, die durch [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) definiert wird, falls mehr als ein Zertifikat vorhanden ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7957">If you set this policy to True, Microsoft Edge will prompt a user to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) if and only if there is more than one certificate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7958">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "false" festlegen oder Sie nicht konfigurieren, wählt Microsoft Edge automatisch ein Zertifikat aus, auch wenn mehrere Übereinstimmungen für ein Zertifikat vorhanden sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7958">If you set this policy to False or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge will automatically select a certificate even if there are multiple matches for a certificate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7959">Der Benutzer wird nicht aufgefordert, ein Zertifikat für Websites aus der Liste auszuwählen, die in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls) definiert ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7959">The user will not be prompted to select a certificate for sites on the list defined in [AutoSelectCertificateForUrls](#autoselectcertificateforurls).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7960">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7960">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7961">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7961">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7962">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7962">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7963">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7963">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7964">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7964">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7965">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7965">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7966">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7966">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7967">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7967">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7968">GP eindeutiger Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7968">GP unique name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7969">GP-Name: Konfigurieren, ob Microsoft Edge automatisch ein Zertifikat auswählen soll, wenn mehrere Zertifikat-Übereinstimmungen für eine Website vorhanden sind, die mit „AutoSelectCertificateForUrls“ konfiguriert ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7969">GP name: Configure whether Microsoft Edge should automatically select a certificate when there are multiple certificate matches for a site configured with "AutoSelectCertificateForUrls"</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7970">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7970">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7971">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7971">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7972">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7972">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7973">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7973">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7974">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7974">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7975">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7975">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7976">Wertname: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7976">Value Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7977">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7977">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7978">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7978">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7979">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7979">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7980">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7980">Preference Key Name: ForceCertificatePromptsOnMultipleMatches</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7981">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7981">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="forceephemeralprofiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7983">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7983">ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-use-of-ephemeral-profiles"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7984">Verwendung von kurzlebigen Profilen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7984">Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7985">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7985">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-7986">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7986">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7987">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7987">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-7988">Steuert, ob Benutzerprofile in den kurzlebigen Modus verlagert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7988">Controls whether user profiles are switched to ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7989">Beim Start einer Sitzung wird ein kurzlebiges Profil erstellt, beim Ende der Sitzung gelöscht und dem ursprünglichen Profil des Benutzers zugeordnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7989">An ephemeral profile is created when a session begins, is deleted when the session ends, and is associated with the user's original profile.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7990">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden Profile im kurzlebigen Modus ausgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7990">If you enable this policy, profiles run in ephemeral mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7991">Auf diese Weise können Benutzer auf ihren eigenen Geräten arbeiten, ohne die Browserdaten auf diesen Geräten zu speichern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7991">This lets users work from their own devices without saving browsing data to those devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7992">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie als Betriebssystemrichtlinie (z.B. mithilfe von Gruppenrichtlinienobjekten unter Windows) aktivieren, gilt sie für alle Profile im System.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7992">If you enable this policy as an OS policy (by using GPO on Windows, for example), it applies to every profile on the system.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7993">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, erhalten die Benutzer beim Anmelden beim Browser ihre regulären Profile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7993">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users get their regular profiles when they sign in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-7994">Im kurzlebigen Modus werden Profildaten nur für die Dauer der Benutzersitzung auf dem Datenträger gespeichert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7994">In ephemeral mode, profile data is saved on disk only for the length of the user session.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7995">Features wie Browserverlauf, Erweiterungen und deren Daten, Webdaten wie Cookies und Webdatenbanken werden nach dem Schließen des Browsers nicht gespeichert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7995">Features like browser history, extensions and their data, web data like cookies, and web databases aren't saved after the browser is closed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7996">Damit wird nicht verhindert, dass Benutzer Daten manuell auf den Datenträger herunterladen oder Seiten speichern oder drucken können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7996">This doesn't prevent a user from manually downloading any data to disk, or from saving pages or printing them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7997">Wenn der Benutzer die Synchronisierung aktiviert hat, werden alle Daten in ihren Synchronisierungskonten, wie bei normalen Profilen, beibehalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7997">If the user has enabled sync, all data is preserved in their sync accounts just like with regular profiles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-7998">Benutzer können auch InPrivate-Browsen im kurzlebigen Modus verwenden, sofern Sie dies nicht explizit deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7998">Users can also use InPrivate browsing in ephemeral mode unless you explicitly disable this.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-7999">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-7999">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8000">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8000">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8001">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8001">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8002">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8002">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8003">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8003">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8004">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8004">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8005">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8005">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8006">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8006">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8007">GP eindeutiger Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8007">GP unique name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8008">GP-Name: Verwendung von kurzlebigen Profilen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8008">GP name: Enable use of ephemeral profiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8009">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8009">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8010">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8010">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8011">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8011">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8012">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8012">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8013">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8013">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8014">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8014">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8015">Wertname: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8015">Value Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8016">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8016">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8017">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8017">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8018">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8018">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8019">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8019">Preference Key Name: ForceEphemeralProfiles</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8020">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8020">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="forcegooglesafesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8022">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8022">ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>

  #### <a name="enforce-google-safesearch"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8023">Google SafeSearch erzwingen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8023">Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8024">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8024">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8025">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8025">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8026">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8026">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8027">Erzwingt, dass Abfragen in der Google-Websuche mit der SafeSearch-Einstellung „Aktiv“ durchgeführt werden und hindert Benutzer daran, diese Einstellung zu ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8027">Forces queries in Google Web Search to be performed with SafeSearch set to active, and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8028">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, ist SafeSearch in der Google-Suche immer aktiv.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8028">If you enable this policy, SafeSearch in Google Search is always active.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8029">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird SafeSearch in der Google-Suche nicht erzwungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8029">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, SafeSearch in Google Search isn't enforced.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8032">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8032">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8033">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8033">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8034">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8034">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8035">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8035">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8036">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8036">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8037">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8037">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8038">GP eindeutiger Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8038">GP unique name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8039">GP-Name: Google SafeSearch erzwingen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8039">GP name: Enforce Google SafeSearch</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8040">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8040">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8041">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8041">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8042">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8042">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8043">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8043">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8044">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8044">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8045">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8045">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8046">Wertname: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8046">Value Name: ForceGoogleSafeSearch</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="forcelegacydefaultreferrerpolicy"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8053">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8053">ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-a-default-referrer-policy-of-no-referrer-when-downgrade-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8054">Verwenden Sie eine Standard-Referrer-Richtlinie „no-referrer-when-downgrade“ (veraltet).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8054">Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-8055">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach Microsoft Edge 88 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8055">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8056">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8056">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8057">Unter Windows und macOS seit 81 bis 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8057">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8058">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8058">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8059">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nicht, weil sie nur als kurzfristiger Mechanismus vorgesehen war, um Unternehmen mehr Zeit zum Aktualisieren ihrer Webinhalte zu geben, falls diese mit der neuen Standard-Referrer-Richtlinie inkompatibel waren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8059">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with the new default referrer policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8060">Die Standard-Referrer-Richtlinie von Microsoft Edge wurde vom Wert „no-referrer-when-downgrade“ auf den sichereren Wert „strict-origin-when-cross-origin“ verstärkt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8060">Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy was strengthened from the value of no-referrer-when-downgrade to the more secure strict-origin-when-cross-origin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8061">Wenn diese Unternehmensrichtlinie aktiviert ist, wird die Standard-Referrer-Richtlinie von Microsoft Edge auf den alten Wert „no-referrer-when-downgrade“ festgelegt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8061">When this enterprise policy is enabled, Microsoft Edge's default referrer policy will be set to its old value of no-referrer-when-downgrade.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8062">Diese Unternehmensrichtlinie ist standardmäßig deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8062">This enterprise policy is disabled by default.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8063">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8063">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8064">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8064">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8065">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8065">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8066">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8066">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8067">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8067">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8068">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8068">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8069">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8069">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8070">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8070">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8071">GP eindeutiger Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8071">GP unique name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8072">GP-Name: Verwenden Sie die Standard-Referrer-Richtlinie „no-referrer-when-downgrade“ (veraltet).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8072">GP name: Use a default referrer policy of no-referrer-when-downgrade (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8073">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8073">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8074">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8074">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8075">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8075">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8076">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8076">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8077">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8077">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8078">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8078">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8079">Wertname: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8079">Value Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8080">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8080">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8081">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8081">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8082">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8082">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8083">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8083">Preference Key Name: ForceLegacyDefaultReferrerPolicy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8084">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8084">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="forcenetworkinprocess"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8086">ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8086">ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-networking-code-to-run-in-the-browser-process-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8087">Erzwingen der Ausführung des Netzwerkcodes im Browserprozess (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8087">Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-8088">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach Microsoft Edge 83 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8088">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 83.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8089">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8089">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8090">Auf Windows seit 78, bis 83</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8090">On Windows since 78, until 83</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8091">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8091">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8092">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nicht, da es sich nur um einen kurzfristigen Mechanismus handeln sollte, um Unternehmen mehr Zeit für die Migration zu Software von Drittanbietern zu geben, die nicht vom einbinden von Netzwerk-APIs abhängig ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8092">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to migrate to 3rd party software that doesn't depend on hooking networking APIs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8093">Proxyserver werden über LSPs und Win32-API-Patching empfohlen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8093">Proxy servers are recommended over LSPs and Win32 API patching.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8094">Diese Richtlinie erzwingt das Ausführen von Netzwerkcode im Browserprozess.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8094">This policy forces networking code to run in the browser process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8095">Diese Richtlinie ist standardmäßig deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8095">This policy is disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8096">Wenn sie aktiviert ist, sind Benutzer Sicherheitsproblemen ausgesetzt, wenn der Netzwerkvorgang in der Sandbox ausgeführt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8096">If enabled, users are open to security issues when the networking process is sandboxed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8097">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8097">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8098">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8098">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8099">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8099">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8100">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8100">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8101">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8101">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8102">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8102">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8103">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8103">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8104">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8104">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8105">GP eindeutiger Name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8105">GP unique name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8106">GP-Name: Erzwingen des Ausführens von Netzwerkcode im Browserprozess (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8106">GP name: Force networking code to run in the browser process (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8107">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8107">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8108">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8108">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8109">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8109">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8110">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8110">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8111">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8111">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8112">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8112">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8113">Wertname: ForceNetworkInProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8113">Value Name: ForceNetworkInProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8114">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8114">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8115">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8115">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-8116">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8116">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="forcesync"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8117">ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8117">ForceSync</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-synchronization-of-browser-data-and-do-not-show-the-sync-consent-prompt"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8118">Synchronisierung von Browserdaten erzwingen und Zustimmungsaufforderung für die Synchronisierung nicht anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8118">Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8119">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8119">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8120">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8120">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8121">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8121">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8122">Erzwingt die Datensynchronisierung in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8122">Forces data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8123">Diese Richtlinie hindert den Benutzer außerdem daran, die Synchronisierung zu deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8123">This policy also prevents the user from turning sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8124">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer die Synchronisierung aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8124">If you don't configure this policy, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8125">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können die Benutzer die Synchronisierung nicht deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8125">If you enable this policy, users will not be able to turn sync off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8126">Damit diese Richtlinie ordnungsgemäß funktioniert, darf die [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)-Richtlinie nicht konfiguriert oder aktiviert sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8126">For this policy to work as intended, [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy must not be configured, or must be set to enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8127">Wenn [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) auf "Deaktiviert" festgelegt ist, ist [ForceSync](#forcesync) nicht wirksam.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8127">If [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) is set to disabled, then [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8128">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) darf nicht konfiguriert sein oder muss auf "False" festgelegt sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8128">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) must not be configured or must be set to False.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8129">Wenn sie auf "True" festgelegt ist, ist [ForceSync](#forcesync) nicht wirksam.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8129">If this is set to True, [ForceSync](#forcesync) will not take affect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8130">0 = Synchronisierung nicht automatisch starten und Zustimmungsaufforderung für die Synchronisierung anzeigen (Standardeinstellung) 1 = Aktivierung der Synchronisierung für Azure AD-/Azure AD-herabgesetztes Benutzerprofil erzwingen und Zustimmungsaufforderung für die Synchronisierung nicht anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8130">0 = Do not automatically start sync and show the sync consent (default) 1 = Force sync to be turned on for Azure AD/Azure AD-Degraded user profile and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8131">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8131">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8132">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8132">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8133">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8133">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8134">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8134">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8135">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8135">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8136">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8136">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8137">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8137">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8138">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8138">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8139">Eindeutiger GP-Name: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8139">GP unique name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8140">GP-Name: Synchronisierung von Browserdaten erzwingen und Zustimmungsaufforderung für die Synchronisierung nicht anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8140">GP name: Force synchronization of browser data and do not show the sync consent prompt</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8141">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8141">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8142">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8142">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8143">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8143">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8144">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8144">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8145">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8145">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8146">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8146">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8147">Wertname: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8147">Value Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8148">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8148">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8149">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8149">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8150">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8150">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8151">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ForceSync</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8151">Preference Key Name: ForceSync</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8152">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8152">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="forceyoutuberestrict"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8154">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8154">ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-minimum-youtube-restricted-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8155">Erzwingen des minimal eingeschränkten Modus für YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8155">Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8156">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8156">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8157">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8157">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8158">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8158">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8159">Erzwingt einen minimalen eingeschränkten Modus auf YouTube und hindert Benutzer daran, einen weniger eingeschränkten Modus zu wählen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8159">Enforces a minimum Restricted Mode on YouTube and prevents users from picking a less restricted mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8160">Auf „strikt“ setzen, um den Modus „strikt einschränkt“ auf YouTube zu erzwingen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8160">Set to 'Strict' to enforce Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8161">Auf „moderat“ setzen, um den Benutzer zu zwingen, auf YouTube nur den Modus „moderat eingeschränkt“ und „strikt eingeschränkt“ Modus zu verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8161">Set to 'Moderate' to enforce the user to only use Moderate Restricted Mode and Strict Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8162">Der Benutzer kann den eingeschränkten Modus nicht deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8162">They can't disable Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8163">Setzen Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Aus“ oder konfigurieren Sie sie nicht, so dass der eingeschränkte Modus auf YouTube nicht erzwungen wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8163">Set to 'Off' or don't configure this policy to not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8164">Externe Richtlinien, z.B. YouTube-Richtlinien, können den eingeschränkten Modus dennoch durchsetzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8164">External policies such as YouTube policies might still enforce Restricted Mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8165">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8165">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-8166">Off (0) = Den eingeschränkten Modus auf YouTube nicht erzwingen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8166">Off (0) = Do not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-8167">Moderate (1) = Mindestens den moderat eingeschränkten Modus auf YouTube erzwingen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8167">Moderate (1) = Enforce at least Moderate Restricted Mode on YouTube</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-8168">Strict (2) = Erzwingen des strikt eingeschränkten Modus auf YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8168">Strict (2) = Enforce Strict Restricted Mode for YouTube</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8169">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8169">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8170">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8170">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8171">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8171">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8172">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8172">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8173">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8173">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8174">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8174">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8175">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8175">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8176">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8176">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8177">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8177">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8178">GP eindeutiger Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8178">GP unique name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8179">GP-Name: Erzwingen des Minimum-beschränkten Modus für YouTube</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8179">GP name: Force minimum YouTube Restricted Mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8180">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8180">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8181">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8181">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8182">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8182">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8183">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8183">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8184">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8184">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8185">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8185">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8186">Wertname: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8186">Value Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8187">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8187">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8188">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8188">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8189">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8189">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8190">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8190">Preference Key Name: ForceYouTubeRestrict</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8191">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8191">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>0</integer>
```

  ### <a name="fullscreenallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8193">FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8193">FullscreenAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-full-screen-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8194">Vollbild-Modus zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8194">Allow full screen mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8195">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8195">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8196">Auf Windows ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8196">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8197">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8197">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8198">Festlegen der Verfügbarkeit des Vollbildmodus – die gesamte Microsoft Edge-Benutzeroberfläche ist ausgeblendet, und nur Webinhalte werden angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8198">Set the availability of full screen mode - all Microsoft Edge UI is hidden and only web content is visible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8199">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können der Benutzer, Apps und Erweiterungen mit den entsprechenden Berechtigungen in den Vollbildmodus wechseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8199">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the user, apps, and extensions with appropriate permissions can enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8200">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können Benutzer, Apps und Erweiterungen nicht in den Vollbildmodus wechseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8200">If you disable this policy, users, apps, and extensions can't enter full screen mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8201">Das Öffnen von Microsoft Edge im Kioskmodus mithilfe der Befehlszeile ist nicht verfügbar, wenn der Vollbildmodus deaktiviert ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8201">Opening Microsoft Edge in kiosk mode using the command line is unavailable when full screen mode is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8202">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8202">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8203">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8203">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8204">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8204">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8205">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8205">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8206">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8206">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8207">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8207">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8208">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8208">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8209">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8209">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8210">GP eindeutiger Name: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8210">GP unique name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8211">GP-Name: Vollbild-Modus zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8211">GP name: Allow full screen mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8212">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8212">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8213">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8213">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8214">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8214">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8215">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8215">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8216">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8216">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8217">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8217">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8218">Wertname: FullscreenAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8218">Value Name: FullscreenAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8219">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8219">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8220">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8220">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="globallyscopehttpauthcacheenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8222">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8222">GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-globally-scoped-http-auth-cache"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8223">Aktivieren von globalem HTTP-Authentifizierungscache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8223">Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8224">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8224">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8225">Auf Windows und macOS ab 81 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8225">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8226">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8226">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8227">Diese Richtlinie konfiguriert einen einzelnen globalen Cache pro Profil mit Anmeldeinformationen für die HTTP-Serverauthentifizierung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8227">This policy configures a single global per profile cache with HTTP server authentication credentials.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8228">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht festlegen, verwendet der Browser das Standardverhalten der websiteübergreifenden Authentifizierung, die ab Version 80 die Festlegung der HTTP-Serverauthentifizierungs-Anmeldeinformationen nach Top-Level-Websites ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8228">If you disable or don't set this policy, the browser will use the default behavior of cross-site auth, which as of version 80, will be to scope HTTP server authentication credentials by top-level site.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8229">Wenn also zwei Websites Ressourcen aus derselben authentifizierenden Domäne verwenden, müssen die Anmeldeinformationen im Kontext beider Websites unabhängig voneinander bereitgestellt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8229">So, if two sites use resources from the same authenticating domain, credentials will need to be provided independently in the context of both sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8230">Zwischengespeicherte Proxyanmeldeinformationen werden für alle Websites wiederverwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8230">Cached proxy credentials will be reused across sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8231">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden die im Kontext einer Website eingegebenen HTTP-Authentifizierungs-Anmeldeinformationen automatisch im Kontext einer anderen Website verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8231">If you enable this policy HTTP auth credentials entered in the context of one site will automatically be used in the context of another site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8232">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, bleiben Websites für einige Arten von Cross-Site-Attacken offen, und Benutzer können auch ohne Cookies über mehrere Websites nachverfolgt werden, und zwar durch Hinzufügen von Einträgen im HTTP-Authentifizierungscache mithilfe von in URLs eingebetteten Anmeldeinformationen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8232">Enabling this policy leaves sites open to some types of cross-site attacks, and allows users to be tracked across sites even without cookies by adding entries to the HTTP auth cache using credentials embedded in URLs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8233">Diese Richtlinie dient dazu, Unternehmen je nach Legacy-Verhalten die Möglichkeit zu geben, ihre Anmeldeverfahren zu aktualisieren, und wird künftig entfernt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8233">This policy is intended to give enterprises depending on the legacy behavior a chance to update their login procedures and will be removed in the future.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8234">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8234">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8235">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8235">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8236">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8236">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8237">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8237">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8238">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8238">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8239">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8239">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8240">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8240">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8241">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8241">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8242">GP eindeutiger Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8242">GP unique name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8243">GP-Name: Aktivieren von globalem HTTP-Authentifizierungscache</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8243">GP name: Enable globally scoped HTTP auth cache</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8244">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8244">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8245">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8245">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8246">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8246">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8247">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8247">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8248">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8248">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8249">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8249">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8250">Wertname: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8250">Value Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8251">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8251">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8252">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8252">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8253">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8253">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8254">Einstellung Schlüsselname: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8254">Preference Key Name: GloballyScopeHTTPAuthCacheEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8255">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8255">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
