  ### <a name="gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8257">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8257">GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-direct-intranet-site-navigation-instead-of-searching-on-single-word-entries-in-the-address-bar"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8258">Erzwingen der direkten Intranet-Websitenavigation anstelle der Suche nach Einzelwort-Einträgen in der Adressleiste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8258">Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8259">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8259">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8260">Auf Windows und macOS ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8260">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8261">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8261">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8262">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird in der Vorschlagsliste der Adressleiste das erste Ergebnis zu Intranet-Websites navigieren, wenn der in der Adressleiste eingegebene Text nur ein einzelnes Wort ohne Interpunktion ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8262">If you enable this policy, the top auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will navigate to intranet sites if the text entered in the address bar is a single word without punctuation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8263">Wenn Sie ein einzelnes Wort ohne Interpunktionszeichen eingeben, wird die Navigation zu einer Intranetsite durchgeführt, die mit dem eingegebenen Text übereinstimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8263">Default navigation when typing a single word without punctuation will conduct a navigation to an intranet site matching the entered text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8264">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird in der Vorschlagsliste der Adressleiste das zweite Ergebnis eine exakt diesem Begriff entsprechende Internetsuche auslösen, wenn der in der Adressleiste eingegebene Text nur ein einzelnes Wort ohne Interpunktion ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8264">If you enable this policy, the second auto-suggest result in the address bar suggestion list will conduct a web search exactly as it was entered, provided that this text is a single word without punctuation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8265">Der standardmäßige Suchanbieter wird verwendet, es sei denn, es ist zusätzlich eine Richtlinie zur Verhinderung der Websuche aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8265">The default search provider will be used unless a policy to prevent web search is also enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8266">Die Aktivierung dieser Richtlinie hat zwei Auswirkungen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8266">Two effects of enabling this policy are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8267">Die Navigation zu Websites als Reaktion auf Einzelwortabfragen, die normalerweise ein Verlaufselement erzeugen würden, wird nicht mehr ausgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8267">Navigation to sites in response to single word queries that would typically resolve to a history item will no longer happen.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8268">Stattdessen versucht der Browser zu internen Websites zu navigieren, die im Intranet einer Organisation möglicherweise nicht vorhanden sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8268">Instead, the browser will attempt navigate to internal sites that may not exist in an organization's intranet.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8269">Dies führt zu einem 404-Fehler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8269">This will result in a 404 error.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8270">Beliebte Einzelwort-Suchbegriffe benötigen eine manuelle Auswahl von Suchvorschlägen, um die Suche richtig durchführen zu können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8270">Popular, single-word search terms will require manual selection of search suggestions to properly conduct a search.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8271">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8271">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8272">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8272">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8273">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8273">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8274">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8274">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8275">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8275">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8276">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8276">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8277">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8277">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8278">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8278">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8279">GP eindeutiger Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8279">GP unique name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8280">GP-Name: Erzwingen der direkten Intranet-Websitenavigation anstelle der Suche nach Einzelwort-Einträgen in der Adressleiste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8280">GP name: Force direct intranet site navigation instead of searching on single word entries in the Address Bar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8281">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8281">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8282">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8282">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8283">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8283">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8284">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8284">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8285">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8285">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8286">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8286">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8287">Wertname: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8287">Value Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8288">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8288">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8289">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8289">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8290">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8290">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8291">Einstellung Schlüsselname: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8291">Preference Key Name: GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8292">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8292">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="hstspolicybypasslist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8294">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8294">HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-names-that-will-bypass-the-hsts-policy-check"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8295">Konfigurieren der Liste der Namen, die die HSTS-Richtlinienüberprüfung umgehen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8295">Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8296">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8296">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8297">Auf Windows und macOS ab 79 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8297">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8298">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8298">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8299">Hostnamen, die in dieser Liste angegeben sind, sind von der HSTS-Richtlinienüberprüfung ausgenommen, die möglicherweise Anfragen von "http://" auf "https://" hochstuft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8299">Hostnames specified in this list will be exempt from the HSTS policy check that could potentially upgrade requests from "http://" to "https://".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8300">In dieser Richtlinie sind nur Einzelbezeichnungs-Hostnamen zulässig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8300">Only single-label hostnames are allowed in this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8301">Hostnamen müssen kanonisch sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8301">Hostnames must be canonicalized.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8302">Jeder IDN muss in sein A-Label-Format konvertiert werden, und alle ASCII-Zeichen müssen in Kleinbuchstaben vorliegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8302">Any IDNs must be converted to their A-label format, and all ASCII letters must be lowercase.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8303">Diese Richtlinie gilt nur für die explizit angegebenen Hostnamen. Er gilt nicht für Unterdomänen der Namen in der Liste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8303">This policy only applies to the specific hostnames specified; it doesn't apply to subdomains of the names in the list.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8304">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8304">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8305">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8305">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8306">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8306">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8307">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8307">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8308">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8308">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8309">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8309">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8310">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8310">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8311">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8311">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8312">GP eindeutiger Name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8312">GP unique name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8313">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der Liste der Namen, die die HSTS-Richtlinienüberprüfung umgehen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8313">GP name: Configure the list of names that will bypass the HSTS policy check</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8314">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8314">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8315">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8315">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8316">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8316">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8317">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8317">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8318">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8318">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8319">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8319">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8320">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8320">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8321">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8321">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8322">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8322">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\HSTSPolicyBypassList\1 = "meet"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8323">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8323">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8324">Einstellung Schlüsselname: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8324">Preference Key Name: HSTSPolicyBypassList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8325">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8325">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>meet</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="hardwareaccelerationmodeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8327">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8327">HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-hardware-acceleration-when-available"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8328">Verwenden der Hardwarebeschleunigung, falls verfügbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8328">Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8329">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8329">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8330">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8330">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8331">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8331">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8332">Gibt an, ob die Hardwarebeschleunigung verwendet werden soll, wenn sie verfügbar ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8332">Specifies whether to use hardware acceleration if it's available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8333">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird die Hardwarebeschleunigung aktiviert, sofern kein GPU-Feature explizit blockiert wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8333">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, hardware acceleration is enabled unless a GPU feature is explicitly blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8334">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, ist die Hardwarebeschleunigung deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8334">If you disable this policy, hardware acceleration is disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8335">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8335">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8336">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8336">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8337">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8337">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8338">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8338">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8339">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8339">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8340">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8340">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8341">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8341">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8342">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8342">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8343">GP eindeutiger Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8343">GP unique name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8344">GP-Name: Verwenden der Hardwarebeschleunigung, falls verfügbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8344">GP name: Use hardware acceleration when available</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8345">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8345">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8346">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8346">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8347">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8347">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8348">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8348">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8349">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8349">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8350">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8350">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8351">Wertname: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8351">Value Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8352">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8352">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8353">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8353">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8354">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8354">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8355">Einstellung Schlüsselname: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8355">Preference Key Name: HardwareAccelerationModeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8356">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8356">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="hidefirstrunexperience"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8358">HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8358">HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-first-run-experience-and-splash-screen"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8359">Unterdrücken der ersten Ausführungsumgebung und des Begrüßungsbildschirms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8359">Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8360">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8360">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8361">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8361">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8362">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8362">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8363">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden die Erstausführungsumgebung und der Begrüßungsbildschirm Benutzern nicht angezeigt, wenn sie Microsoft Edge zum ersten Mal ausführen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8363">If you enable this policy, the First-run experience and the splash screen will not be shown to users when they run Microsoft Edge for the first time.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8364">Bei den Konfigurationsoptionen, die in der Erstausführungsumgebung dargestellt werden, wird im Browser standardmäßig Folgendes gewählt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8364">For the configuration options shown in the First Run Experience, the browser will default to the following:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8365">– Auf der neuen Registerkartenseite ist der Feedtyp auf "MSN News" und Layout auf „Inspirational“ festgelegt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8365">-On the New Tab Page, the feed type will be set to MSN News and the layout to Inspirational.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8366">– Der Benutzer wird weiterhin automatisch bei Microsoft Edge angemeldet, wenn es sich bei dem Windows-Konto um den Azure AD- oder MSA-Typ handelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8366">-The user will still be automatically signed into Microsoft Edge if the Windows account is of Azure AD or MSA type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8367">- Die Synchronisierung wird nicht standardmäßig aktiviert sein, und die Benutzer werden aufgefordert, auszuwählen, ob beim Starten des Browsers synchronisiert werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8367">-Sync will not be enabled by default and users will be prompted to choose whether they'd like to sync on browser startup.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8368">Sie können die Richtlinie [ForceSync](#forcesync) oder [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) verwenden, um die Synchronisierung und den Zustimmungsdialog für die Synchronisierung zu konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8368">You can use the [ForceSync](#forcesync) or the [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) policy to configure sync and the sync consent prompt.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8369">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden die Erstausführungsumgebung und der Begrüßungsbildschirm angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8369">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the First-run experience and the Splash screen will be shown.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8370">Hinweis: die spezifischen Konfigurationsoptionen, die dem Benutzer in der Erstausführungsumgebung angezeigt werden, können auch mit anderen spezifischen Richtlinien verwaltet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8370">Note: The specific configuration options shown to the user in the First Run Experience, can also be managed by using other specific policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8371">Sie können die HideFirstRunExperience-Richtlinie in Kombination mit diesen Richtlinien verwenden, um eine bestimmte Browseroberfläche auf Ihren verwalteten Geräten zu konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8371">You can use the HideFirstRunExperience policy in combination with these policies to configure a specific browser experience on your managed devices.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8372">Einige dieser anderen Richtlinien sind:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8372">Some of these other policies are:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8373">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8373">-[AutoImportAtFirstRun](#autoimportatfirstrun)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8374">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8374">-[NewTabPageLocation](#newtabpagelocation)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8375">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8375">-[NewTabPageSetFeedType](#newtabpagesetfeedtype)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8376">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8376">-[ForceSync](#forcesync)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8377">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8377">-[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8378">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8378">-[BrowserSignin](#browsersignin)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8379">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8379">-[NonRemovableProfileEnabled](#nonremovableprofileenabled)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8380">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8380">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8381">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8381">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8382">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8382">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8383">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8383">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8384">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8384">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8385">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8385">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8386">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8386">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8387">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8387">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8388">GP eindeutiger Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8388">GP unique name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8389">GP-Name: Unterdrücken der ersten Ausführungsumgebung und des Begrüßungsbildschirms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8389">GP name: Hide the First-run experience and splash screen</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8390">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8390">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8391">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8391">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8392">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8392">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8393">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8393">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8394">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8394">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8395">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8395">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8396">Wertname: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8396">Value Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8397">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8397">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8398">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8398">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8399">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8399">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8400">Einstellung Schlüsselname: HideFirstRunExperience</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8400">Preference Key Name: HideFirstRunExperience</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8401">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8401">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-8402">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8402">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="hideinternetexplorerredirectuxforincompatiblesitesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8403">HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8403">HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="hide-the-one-time-redirection-dialog-and-the-banner-on-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8404">Ausblenden des einmaligen Dialogfelds „Umleitung“ und des Banners auf Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8404">Hide the one-time redirection dialog and the banner on Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8405">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8405">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8406">Unter Windows seit 87 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8406">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8407">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8407">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8408">Mit dieser Richtlinie können Sie das einmalige Dialogfeld „Umleitung“ und das Banner deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8408">This policy gives an option to disable one-time redirection dialog and the banner.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8409">Wenn diese Richtlinie aktiviert ist, wird den Benutzern weder das einmalige Dialogfeld „Umleitung“ noch das Banner angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8409">When this policy is enabled, users will not see both the one-time dialog and the banner.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-8410">Die Benutzer werden weiterhin an Microsoft Edge umgeleitet, wenn Sie in Internet Explorer auf eine inkompatible Website stoßen, aber Ihre Browserdaten werden nicht importiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8410">Users will continue to be redirected to Microsoft Edge when they encounter an incompatible website on Internet Explorer, but their browsing data will not be imported.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-8411">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird den Benutzern das Dialogfeld einmalige Dialogfeld „Umleitung“ und das Banner nicht angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8411">If you enable this policy the one-time redirection dialog and banner will never be shown to users.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8412">Die Browserdaten der Benutzer werden nicht importiert, wenn eine Umleitung stattfindet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8412">Users' browsing data will not be imported when a redirection happens.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-8413">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird das Dialogfeld „Einmalige Umleitung“ bei der ersten Umleitung angezeigt, und das persistente Umleitungsbanner wird Benutzern für Sitzungen angezeigt, die mit einer Umleitung beginnen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8413">If you disable or don't set this policy, the redirection dialog will be shown on the first redirection and the persistent redirection banner will be shown to users on sessions that begin with a redirection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8414">Die Browserdaten der Benutzer werden jedes Mal importiert, wenn der Benutzer auf eine solche Umleitung stößt (nur wenn der Benutzer dies im einmaligen Dialog akzeptiert hat).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8414">Users' browsing data will be imported every time user encounters such redirection (ONLY IF user consents to it on the one-time dialog).</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8415">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8415">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8416">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8416">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8417">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8417">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8418">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8418">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8419">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8419">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8420">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8420">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8421">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8421">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8422">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8422">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8423">Eindeutiger GP-Name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8423">GP unique name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8424">GP-Name: Ausblenden des einmaligen Dialogfelds „Umleitung“ und des Banners auf Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8424">GP name: Hide the one-time redirection dialog and the banner on Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8425">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8425">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8426">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8426">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8427">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8427">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8428">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8428">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8429">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8429">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8430">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8430">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8431">Wertname: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8431">Value Name: HideInternetExplorerRedirectUXForIncompatibleSitesEnabled</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="importautofillformdata"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8435">ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8435">ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-autofill-form-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8436">Import von AutoFill-Formulardaten zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8436">Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8437">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8437">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8438">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8438">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8439">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8439">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8440">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von AutoFill-Daten aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8440">Allows users to import autofill form data from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8441">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird die Option zum manuellen Importieren von AutoFill-Daten automatisch ausgewählt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8441">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import autofill data is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8442">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die AutoFill-Formulardaten nicht bei der ersten Ausführung importiert und die Benutzer können die Daten nicht manuell importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8442">If you disable this policy, autofill form data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8443">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden die AutoFill-Daten bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, und die Benutzer können auswählen, ob diese Daten während späteren Browsersitzungen manuell importiert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8443">If you don't configure this policy, autofill data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8444">Sie können diese Richtlinie als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8444">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8445">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge die AutoFill-Daten bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, aber die Benutzer können während des manuellen Imports die Option **AutoFill-Daten** aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8445">This means that Microsoft Edge will import autofill data on first run, but users can select or clear **autofill data** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8446">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie verwaltet zurzeit den Import aus den Browsern Google Chrome (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS) und Mozilla Firefox (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8446">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8447">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8447">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8448">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8448">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8449">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8449">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8450">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8450">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8451">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8451">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8452">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8452">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8453">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8453">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8454">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8454">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8455">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8455">GP unique name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8456">GP-Name: Import von AutoFill-Formulardaten zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8456">GP name: Allow importing of autofill form data</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8457">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8457">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8458">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8458">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8459">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8459">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8460">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8460">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8461">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8461">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8462">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8462">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8463">Wertname: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8463">Value Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8464">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8464">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8465">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8465">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8466">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8466">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8467">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImportAutofillFormData</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8467">Preference Key Name: ImportAutofillFormData</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8468">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8468">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importbrowsersettings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8470">ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8470">ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-browser-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8471">Import von Browsereinstellungen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8471">Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8472">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8472">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8473">Auf Windows und macOS ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8473">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8474">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8474">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8475">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von Browsereinstellungen aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8475">Allows users to import browser settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8476">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird das Kontrollkästchen **Browsereinstellungen** im Dialogfeld **Import von Browserdaten** aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8476">If you enable this policy, the **Browser settings** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8477">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Browsereinstellungen nicht bei der ersten Ausführung importiert und die Benutzer können sie nicht manuell importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8477">If you disable this policy, browser settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8478">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden die Browsereinstellungen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, und die Benutzer können auswählen, ob sie während späteren Browsersitzungen manuell importiert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8478">If you don't configure this policy, browser settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8479">Sie können diese Richtlinie auch als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8479">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8480">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge die Einstellungen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, aber die Benutzer können während des manuellen Imports die Option **Browsereinstellungen** aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8480">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **browser settings** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8481">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie verwaltet zurzeit das Importieren aus Google Chrome (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8481">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8482">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8482">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8483">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8483">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8484">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8484">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8485">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8485">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8486">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8486">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8487">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8487">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8488">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8488">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8489">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8489">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8490">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8490">GP unique name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8491">GP-Name: Import von Browsereinstellungen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8491">GP name: Allow importing of browser settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8492">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8492">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8493">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8493">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8494">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8494">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8495">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8495">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8496">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8496">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8497">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8497">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8498">Wertname: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8498">Value Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8499">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8499">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8500">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8500">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8501">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8501">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8502">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImportBrowserSettings</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8502">Preference Key Name: ImportBrowserSettings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8503">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8503">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importcookies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8505">ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8505">ImportCookies</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8507">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8507">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8508">Auf Windows und macOS ab 81 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8508">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8509">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8509">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8510">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von Cookies aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8510">Allows users to import Cookies from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8511">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden Cookies bei der ersten Ausführung nicht importiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8511">If you disable this policy, Cookies aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8512">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden Cookies bei der ersten Ausführung importiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8512">If you don't configure this policy, Cookies are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8513">Sie können diese Richtlinie auch als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8513">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8514">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge Cookies bei der ersten Ausführung importiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8514">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Cookies on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8515">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie verwaltet zurzeit das Importieren aus Google Chrome (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8515">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8516">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8516">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8517">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8517">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8518">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8518">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8519">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8519">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8520">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8520">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8521">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8521">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8522">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8522">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8523">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8523">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8524">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8524">GP unique name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8525">GP-Name: Import von Cookies zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8525">GP name: Allow importing of Cookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8526">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8526">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8527">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8527">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8528">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8528">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8529">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8529">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8530">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8530">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8531">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8531">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8532">Wertname: ImportCookies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8532">Value Name: ImportCookies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8533">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8533">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8534">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8534">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="importextensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8539">ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8539">ImportExtensions</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-extensions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8540">Lassen Sie den Import von Erweiterungen zu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8540">Allow importing of extensions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8541">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8541">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8542">Auf Windows und macOS ab 81 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8542">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8543">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8543">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8544">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von Browsererweiterungen aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8544">Allows users to import extensions from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8545">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird das Kontrollkästchen **Browsererweiterungen** im Dialogfeld **Import von Browserdaten** aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8545">If you enable this policy, the **Extensions** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8546">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Browsererweiterungen nicht bei der ersten Ausführung importiert und die Benutzer können sie nicht manuell importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8546">If you disable this policy, extensions aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8547">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden die Browsererweiterungen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, und die Benutzer können auswählen, ob sie während späteren Browsersitzungen manuell importiert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8547">If you don't configure this policy, extensions are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8548">Sie können diese Richtlinie auch als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8548">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8549">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge die Erweiterungen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, aber die Benutzer können während des manuellen Imports die Option **Favoriten** aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8549">This means that Microsoft Edge imports extensions on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8550">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie unterstützt zurzeit lediglich das Importieren aus Google Chrome (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8550">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8551">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8551">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8552">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8552">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8553">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8553">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8554">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8554">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8555">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8555">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8556">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8556">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8557">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8557">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8558">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8558">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8559">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8559">GP unique name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8560">GP-Name: Import von Erweiterungen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8560">GP name: Allow importing of extensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8561">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8561">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8562">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8562">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8563">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8563">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8564">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8564">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8565">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8565">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8566">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8566">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8567">Wertname: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8567">Value Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8568">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8568">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8569">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8569">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8570">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8570">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8571">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImportExtensions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8571">Preference Key Name: ImportExtensions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8572">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8572">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importfavorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8574">ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8574">ImportFavorites</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8575">Import von Favoriten zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8575">Allow importing of favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8576">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8576">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8577">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8577">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8578">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8578">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8579">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von Favoriten aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8579">Allows users to import favorites from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8580">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird das Kontrollkästchen **Favoriten** im Dialogfeld **Import von Browserdaten** aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8580">If you enable this policy, the **Favorites** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8581">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Favoriten nicht bei der ersten Ausführung importiert und die Benutzer können sie nicht manuell importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8581">If you disable this policy, favorites aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8582">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden die Favoriten bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, und die Benutzer können auswählen, ob sie während späteren Browsersitzungen manuell importiert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8582">If you don't configure this policy, favorites are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8583">Sie können diese Richtlinie auch als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8583">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8584">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge die Favoriten bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, aber die Benutzer können während des manuellen Imports die Option **Favoriten** aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8584">This means that Microsoft Edge imports favorites on first run, but users can select or clear the **favorites** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8585">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie verwaltet zurzeit den Import aus Internet Explorer (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10), Google Chrome (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 und unter macOS), Mozilla Firefox (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS) und Apple Safari-Browsern (unter macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8585">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8586">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8586">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8587">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8587">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8588">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8588">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8589">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8589">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8590">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8590">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8591">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8591">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8592">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8592">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8593">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8593">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8594">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8594">GP unique name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8595">GP-Name: Import von Favoriten zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8595">GP name: Allow importing of favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8596">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8596">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8597">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8597">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8598">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8598">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8599">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8599">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8600">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8600">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8601">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8601">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8602">Wertname: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8602">Value Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8603">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8603">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8604">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8604">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8605">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8605">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8606">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImportFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8606">Preference Key Name: ImportFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8607">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8607">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
