  ### <a name="importhistory"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8609">ImportHistory</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8609">ImportHistory</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-browsing-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8610">Import des Browserverlaufs zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8610">Allow importing of browsing history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8611">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8611">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8612">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8612">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8613">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8613">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8614">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren des Browserverlaufs aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8614">Allows users to import their browsing history from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8615">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird das Kontrollkästchen **Browserverlauf** im Dialogfeld **Import von Browserdaten** aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8615">If you enable this policy, the **Browsing history** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8616">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird der Browserverlauf nicht bei der ersten Ausführung importiert und die Benutzer können die Daten nicht manuell importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8616">If you disable this policy, browsing history data isn't imported at first run, and users can't import this data manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8617">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der Browserverlauf bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, und die Benutzer können auswählen, ob er während späteren Browsersitzungen manuell importiert werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8617">If you don't configure this policy, browsing history data is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8618">Sie können diese Richtlinie auch als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8618">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8619">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge den Browserverlauf bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, aber die Benutzer können während des manuellen Imports die Option **Browserverlauf** aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8619">This means that Microsoft Edge imports browsing history on first run, but users can select or clear the **history** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8620">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie verwaltet zurzeit den Import aus Internet Explorer (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10), Google Chrome (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 und unter macOS), Mozilla Firefox (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS) und Apple Safari-Browsern (macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8620">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Apple Safari (macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8621">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8621">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8622">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8622">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8623">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8623">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8624">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8624">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8628">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8628">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8631">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8631">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8632">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8632">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8633">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8633">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8636">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8636">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>

  ### <a name="importhomepage"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8644">ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8644">ImportHomepage</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-home-page-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8645">Import von Startseiteneinstellungen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8645">Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8646">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8646">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8647">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8647">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8648">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8648">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8649">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von Startseiteneinstellungen aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8649">Allows users to import their home page setting from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8650">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird die Option zum manuellen Importieren von Startseiteneinstellungen automatisch ausgewählt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8650">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import the home page setting is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8651">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Startseiteneinstellungen nicht bei der ersten Ausführung importiert und die Benutzer können die Daten nicht manuell importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8651">If you disable this policy, the home page setting isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8652">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden die Startseiteneinstellungen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, und die Benutzer können auswählen, ob diese Daten während späteren Browsersitzungen manuell importiert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8652">If you don't configure this policy, the home page setting is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8653">Sie können diese Richtlinie als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8653">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8654">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge die Startseiteneinstellungen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, aber die Benutzer können während des manuellen Imports die Option **Startseite** aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8654">This means that Microsoft Edge imports the home page setting on first run, but users can select or clear the **home page** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8655">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie verwaltet zurzeit den Import aus Internet Explorer (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8655">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8656">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8656">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8657">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8657">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8658">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8658">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8659">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8659">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8660">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8660">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8661">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8661">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8662">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8662">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8663">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8663">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8664">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8664">GP unique name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8665">GP-Name: Import von Startseiteneinstellungen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8665">GP name: Allow importing of home page settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8666">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8666">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8667">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8667">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8668">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8668">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8669">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8669">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8670">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8670">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8671">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8671">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8672">Wertname: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8672">Value Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8673">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8673">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8674">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8674">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8675">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8675">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8676">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImportHomepage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8676">Preference Key Name: ImportHomepage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8677">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8677">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importopentabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8679">ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8679">ImportOpenTabs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-open-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8680">Import von Offenen Registerkarten zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8680">Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8681">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8681">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8682">Auf Windows und macOS ab 79 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8682">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8683">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8683">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8684">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von offenen und angehefteten Tabs aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8684">Allows users to import open and pinned tabs from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8685">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird das Kontrollkästchen **Offene Tabs** im Dialogfeld **Import von Browserdaten** aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8685">If you enable this policy, the **Open tabs** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8686">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die offenen Tabs nicht bei der ersten Ausführung importiert und die Benutzer können sie nicht manuell importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8686">If you disable this policy, open tabs aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8687">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden die offenen Tabs bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, und die Benutzer können auswählen, ob sie während späteren Browsersitzungen manuell importiert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8687">If you don't configure this policy, open tabs are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8688">Sie können diese Richtlinie auch als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8688">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8689">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge die offenen Tabs bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, aber die Benutzer können während des manuellen Imports die Option **Offene Tabs** aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8689">This means that Microsoft Edge imports open tabs on first run, but users can select or clear the **Open tabs** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8690">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie unterstützt zurzeit lediglich das Importieren aus Google Chrome (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8690">**Note**: This policy currently only supports importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8691">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8691">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8692">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8692">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8693">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8693">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8694">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8694">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8695">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8695">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8696">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8696">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8697">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8697">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8698">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8698">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8699">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8699">GP unique name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8700">GP-Name: Import von Offenen Registerkarten zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8700">GP name: Allow importing of open tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8701">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8701">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8702">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8702">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8703">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8703">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8704">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8704">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8705">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8705">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8706">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8706">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8707">Wertname: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8707">Value Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8708">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8708">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8709">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8709">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8710">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8710">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8711">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImportOpenTabs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8711">Preference Key Name: ImportOpenTabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8712">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8712">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importpaymentinfo"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8714">ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8714">ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-payment-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8715">Import von Zahlungsinformationen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8715">Allow importing of payment info</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8716">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8716">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8717">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8717">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8718">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8718">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8719">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von Zahlungsinformationen aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8719">Allows users to import payment info from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8720">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird das Kontrollkästchen **Zahlungsinformationen** im Dialogfeld **Import von Browserdaten** aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8720">If you enable this policy, the **payment info** check box is automatically selected in the **Import browser data** dialog box.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8721">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Zahlungsinformationen nicht bei der ersten Ausführung importiert und die Benutzer können die Daten nicht manuell importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8721">If you disable this policy, payment info isn't imported at first run, and users can't import it manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8722">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden Zahlungsinformationen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, und die Benutzer können auswählen, ob diese während späteren Browsersitzungen manuell importiert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8722">If you don't configure this policy, payment info is imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import it manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8723">Sie können diese Richtlinie auch als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8723">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8724">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge die Zahlungsinformationen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, aber die Benutzer können während des manuellen Imports die Option **Zahlungsinformationen** aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8724">This means that Microsoft Edge imports payment info on first run, but users can select or clear the **payment info** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8725">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie verwaltet zurzeit das Importieren aus Google Chrome (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8725">**Note:** This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8734">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportPaymentInfo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8734">GP unique name: ImportPaymentInfo</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8735">GP-Name: Import von Zahlungsinformationen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8735">GP name: Allow importing of payment info</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8736">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8736">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8737">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8737">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8738">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8738">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8739">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8739">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8740">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8740">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8741">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8741">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8743">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8743">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>


  ### <a name="importsavedpasswords"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8749">ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8749">ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-saved-passwords"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8750">Import von gespeicherten Kennwörtern zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8750">Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8751">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8751">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8752">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8752">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8753">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8753">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8754">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von gespeicherten Passwörtern aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8754">Allows users to import saved passwords from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8755">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird die Option zum manuellen Importieren von gespeicherten Passwörtern automatisch ausgewählt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8755">If you enable this policy, the option to manually import saved passwords is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8756">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die gespeicherten Passwörter nicht bei der ersten Ausführung importiert und die Benutzer können sie nicht manuell importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8756">If you disable this policy, saved passwords aren't imported on first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8757">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden die gespeicherten Passwörter bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, und die Benutzer können auswählen, ob sie während späteren Browsersitzungen manuell importiert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8757">If you don't configure this policy, passwords are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import them manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8758">Sie können diese Richtlinie als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8758">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8759">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge die gespeicherten Passwörter bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, aber die Benutzer können während des manuellen Imports die Option **gespeicherten Passwörter** aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8759">This means that Microsoft Edge imports passwords on first run, but users can select or clear the **passwords** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8760">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie verwaltet zurzeit den Import aus Internet Explorer (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10), Google Chrome (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 und unter macOS) und Mozilla Firefox (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8760">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10), Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS), and Mozilla Firefox (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS) browsers.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8761">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8761">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8762">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8762">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8763">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8763">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8764">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8764">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8765">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8765">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8766">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8766">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8767">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8767">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8768">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8768">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8769">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8769">GP unique name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8770">GP-Name: Import von gespeicherten Kennwörtern zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8770">GP name: Allow importing of saved passwords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8771">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8771">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8772">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8772">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8773">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8773">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8774">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8774">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8775">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8775">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8776">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8776">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8777">Wertname: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8777">Value Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8778">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8778">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8779">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8779">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8780">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8780">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8781">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImportSavedPasswords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8781">Preference Key Name: ImportSavedPasswords</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8782">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8782">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="importsearchengine"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8784">ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8784">ImportSearchEngine</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-importing-of-search-engine-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8785">Import von Suchmaschinen-Einstellungen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8785">Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8786">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8786">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8787">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8787">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8788">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8788">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8789">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von Suchmaschineneinstellungen aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8789">Allows users to import search engine settings from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8790">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird die Option zum manuellen Importieren von Suchmaschineneinstellungen automatisch ausgewählt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8790">If you enable, this policy, the option to import search engine settings is automatically selected.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8791">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Suchmaschineneinstellungen nicht bei der ersten Ausführung importiert und die Benutzer können sie nicht manuell importieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8791">If you disable this policy, search engine settings aren't imported at first run, and users can't import them manually.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8792">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden die Suchmaschineneinstellungen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, und die Benutzer können auswählen, ob diese Daten während späteren Browsersitzungen manuell importiert werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8792">If you don't configure this policy, search engine settings are imported at first run, and users can choose whether to import this data manually during later browsing sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8793">Sie können diese Richtlinie als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8793">You can set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8794">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge die Suchmaschineneinstellungen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert, aber die Benutzer können während des manuellen Imports die Option **Suchmaschineneinstellungen** aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8794">This means that Microsoft Edge imports search engine settings on first run, but users can select or clear the **search engine** option during manual import.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8795">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie verwaltet zurzeit den Import aus Internet Explorer (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8795">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Internet Explorer (on Windows 7, 8, and 10).</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8797">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8797">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8798">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8798">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8799">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8799">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8803">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8803">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8804">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8804">GP unique name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8805">GP-Name: Import von Suchmaschinen-Einstellungen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8805">GP name: Allow importing of search engine settings</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8806">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8806">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8807">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8807">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8808">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8808">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8809">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8809">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8810">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8810">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8811">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8811">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8812">Wertname: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8812">Value Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8813">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8813">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8816">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImportSearchEngine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8816">Preference Key Name: ImportSearchEngine</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8821">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8821">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8822">Auf Windows und macOS ab 81 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8822">On Windows and macOS since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8823">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8823">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8824">Ermöglicht Benutzern das Importieren von Verknüpfungen aus einem anderen Browser in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8824">Allows users to import Shortcuts from another browser into Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8825">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden Verknüpfungen bei der ersten Ausführung nicht importiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8825">If you disable this policy, Shortcuts aren't imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8826">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, werden Verknüpfungen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8826">If you don't configure this policy, Shortcuts are imported on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8827">Sie können diese Richtlinie auch als Empfehlung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8827">You can also set this policy as a recommendation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8828">Dies bedeutet, dass Microsoft Edge Verknüpfungen bei der ersten Ausführung importiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8828">This means that Microsoft Edge imports Shortcuts on first run.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8829">**Hinweis**: Diese Richtlinie verwaltet zurzeit das Importieren aus Google Chrome (unter Windows 7, 8 und 10 sowie unter macOS).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8829">**Note**: This policy currently manages importing from Google Chrome (on Windows 7, 8, and 10 and on macOS).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8830">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8830">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8831">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8831">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8832">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8832">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8833">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8833">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8834">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8834">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8835">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8835">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8836">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8836">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8837">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8837">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8838">GP eindeutiger Name: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8838">GP unique name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8839">GP-Name: Import von Verknüpfungen zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8839">GP name: Allow importing of shortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8840">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8840">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8841">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8841">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8842">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8842">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8843">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8843">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8844">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8844">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8845">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8845">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8846">Wertname: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8846">Value Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8847">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8847">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8848">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8848">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8849">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8849">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8850">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ImportShortcuts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8850">Preference Key Name: ImportShortcuts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8851">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8851">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="inprivatemodeavailability"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8853">InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8853">InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-inprivate-mode-availability"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8854">Konfigurieren der InPrivate-Modus-Verfügbarkeit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8854">Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8855">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8855">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8856">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8856">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8857">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8857">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8858">Gibt an, ob der Benutzer Seiten im InPrivate-Modus in Microsoft Edge öffnen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8858">Specifies whether the user can open pages in InPrivate mode in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8859">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder auf „Enabled“ setzen, können Benutzer Seiten im InPrivate-Modus öffnen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8859">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Enabled', users can open pages in InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8860">Setzen Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Disabled“, um Benutzer an der Verwendung des InPrivate-Modus zu hindern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8860">Set this policy to 'Disabled' to stop users from using InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8861">Setzen Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Forced“, um den InPrivate-Modus immer zu verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8861">Set this policy to 'Forced' to always use InPrivate mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8862">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8862">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-8863">Enabled (0) = InPrivate-Modus verfügbar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8863">Enabled (0) = InPrivate mode available</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-8864">Disabled (1) = InPrivate-Modus deaktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8864">Disabled (1) = InPrivate mode disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-8865">Forced (2) = InPrivate-Modus erzwingen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8865">Forced (2) = InPrivate mode forced</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8866">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8866">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8867">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8867">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8868">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8868">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8869">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8869">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8870">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8870">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8871">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8871">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8872">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8872">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8873">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8873">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8874">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8874">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8875">GP eindeutiger Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8875">GP unique name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8876">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der InPrivate-Modus-Verfügbarkeit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8876">GP name: Configure InPrivate mode availability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8877">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8877">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8878">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8878">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8879">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8879">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8880">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8880">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8881">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8881">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8882">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8882">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8883">Wertname: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8883">Value Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8884">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8884">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8885">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8885">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8886">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8886">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8887">Einstellung Schlüsselname: InPrivateModeAvailability</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8887">Preference Key Name: InPrivateModeAvailability</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8888">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8888">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="insecureformswarningsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8890">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8890">InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-warnings-for-insecure-forms"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8891">Aktivieren von Warnungen für unsichere Formulare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8891">Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8892">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8892">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8893">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8893">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8894">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8894">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8895">Mit dieser Richtlinie wird der Umgang mit unsicheren Formulare (Formulare, die über HTTP übermittelt werden) gesteuert, die in sichere (HTTPS) Websites im Browser eingebettet sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8895">This policy controls the handling of insecure forms (forms submitted over HTTP) embedded in secure (HTTPS) sites in the browser.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-8896">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht festlegen, wird eine ganzseitige Warnung angezeigt, wenn ein unsicheres Formular gesendet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8896">If you enable this policy or don't set it, a full page warning will be shown when an insecure form is submitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8897">Außerdem wird neben den Formularfeldern, in denen der Fokus liegt, eine Warnmeldung angezeigt, und das automatische Ausfüllen wird für diese Formulare deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8897">Additionally, a warning bubble will be shown next to the form fields when they are focused, and autofill will be disabled for those forms.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-8898">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden für unsichere Formulare keine Warnungen angezeigt, und das automatische Ausfüllen funktioniert normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8898">If you disable this policy, warnings will not be shown for insecure forms, and autofill will work normally.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8899">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8899">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8900">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8900">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8901">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8901">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8902">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8902">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8903">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8903">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8904">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8904">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8905">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8905">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8906">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8906">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8907">Eindeutiger GP-Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8907">GP unique name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8908">GP-Name: Warnungen für unsichere Formulare aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8908">GP name: Enable warnings for insecure forms</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8909">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8909">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8910">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8910">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8911">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8911">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8912">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8912">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8913">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8913">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8914">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8914">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8915">Wertname: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8915">Value Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8916">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8916">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8917">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8917">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8918">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8918">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8919">Einstellung Schlüsselname: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8919">Preference Key Name: InsecureFormsWarningsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8920">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8920">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="intensivewakeupthrottlingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8922">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8922">IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-the-intensivewakeupthrottling-feature"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8923">Regulierung des IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled-Features</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8923">Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8924">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8924">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8925">Auf Windows und MacOS ab 85 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8925">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8926">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8926">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8927">Wenn aktiviert, bewirkt das IntensiveWakeUpThrottling-Feature, dass Javascript-Zeitgeber in Registerkarten im Hintergrund aggressiv gedrosselt und zusammengefügt werden, mit einer Laufzeit von nicht mehr als einmal pro Minute, nachdem eine Seite in den Hintergrund verschoben wurde für 5 Minuten oder mehr. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8927">When enabled the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature causes Javascript timers in background tabs to be aggressively throttled and coalesced, running no more than once per minute after a page has been backgrounded for 5 minutes or more.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8928">Dies ist eine Webstandard-Richtlinienkonforme-Feature, könnte aber zu einem Bruch der Funktionalität auf manchen Websites führen, indem bestimme Ausführungen bis zu einer Minute verzögert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8928">This is a web standards compliant feature, but it may break functionality on some websites by causing certain actions to be delayed by up to a minute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8929">Jedoch wird der CPU und die Batterie erheblich gespart, wenn es aktiviert ist. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8929">However, it results in significant CPU and battery savings when enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8930">Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter https://bit.ly/30b1XR4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8930">See https://bit.ly/30b1XR4 for more details.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8931">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird das Feature zwangsaktiviert, und die Benutzer können diese Einstellung nicht außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8931">If you enable this policy, the feature will be force enabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-8932">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird das Feature zwangsdeaktiviert, und die Benutzer können diese Einstellung nicht außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8932">If you disable this policy, the feature will be force disabled, and users will not be able to override this setting.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-8933">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird das Feature durch seine eigene interne Logik gesteuert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8933">If you don't configure this policy, the feature will be controlled by its own internal logic.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8934">Benutzer können diese Einstellung manuell konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8934">Users can manually configure this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8935">Beachten Sie, dass die Richtlinie pro Renderer angewendet wird, wobei der aktuellste Wert der Richtlinieneinstellung beim Start eines Renderer-Prozesses gilt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8935">Note that the policy is applied per renderer process, with the most recent value of the policy setting in force when a renderer process starts.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8936">Der vollständige Neustart ist erforderlich, um sicherzustellen, dass alle geladenen Registerkarten eine einheitliche Richtlinieneinstellung erhalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8936">A full restart is required to ensure that all the loaded tabs receive a consistent policy setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8937">Es ist harmlos, dass Prozesse mit unterschiedlichen Werten dieser Richtlinie ausgeführt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8937">It is harmless for processes to be running with different values of this policy.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8938">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8938">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8939">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8939">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8940">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8940">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8941">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8941">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8942">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8942">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8943">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8943">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8944">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8944">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8945">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8945">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8946">Eindeutiger Name des GP: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8946">GP unique name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8947">GP-Name: Steuern des IntensiveWakeUpThrottling-Features</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8947">GP name: Control the IntensiveWakeUpThrottling feature</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8948">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8948">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8949">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8949">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8950">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8950">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8951">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8951">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8952">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8952">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8953">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8953">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8954">Wertname: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8954">Value Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8955">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8955">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8956">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8956">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8957">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8957">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8958">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8958">Preference Key Name: IntensiveWakeUpThrottlingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8959">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8959">Example value:</span></span>
