  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationenhancedhangdetection"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8961">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8961">InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-enhanced-hang-detection-for-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8962">Konfigurieren der Ermittlung von Anwendungsstillständen für Internet Explorer-Modus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8962">Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8963">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8963">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8964">Unter Windows seit 84 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8964">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8965">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8965">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-8966">Die verbesserte Ermittlung von Anwendungsstillständen ist ein differenzierterer Ansatz zum Erkennen von Webseiten die nicht reagieren im Internet Explorer-Modus, im Gegensatz zu dem, welches der eigenständige Internet Explorer benutzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8966">Enhanced hang detection is a more granular approach to detecting hung webpages in Internet Explorer mode than what standalone Internet Explorer uses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8967">Wenn ein Anwendungsstillstand einer Webseite erkannt wird, wendet der Browser eine Abschwächung an, um zu verhindern, dass der Rest des Browsers hängen bleibt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8967">When a hung webpage is detected, the browser will apply a mitigation to prevent the rest of the browser from hanging.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8968">Diese Einstellung ermöglicht es Ihnen, die Verwendung von Enhanced Hang Detection für den Fall zu konfigurieren, dass Sie mit einer ihrer Websites nicht kompatible Probleme haben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8968">This setting allows you to configure the use of enhanced hang detection in case you run into incompatible issues with any of your websites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-8969">Es wird empfohlen, diese Richtlinie nur zu deaktivieren, wenn Benachrichtigungen wie "(Website) reagiert nicht" im Internet Explorer-Modus, aber nicht in eigenständigem Internet Explorer angezeigt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8969">We recommend disabling this policy only if you see notifications such as "(website) is not responding" in Internet Explorer mode but not in standalone Internet Explorer.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8970">Diese Einstellung funktioniert in Verbindung mit: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) auf „IEMode“ und der Richtlinie „[InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist)“, wenn die Liste mindestens einen Eintrag hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8970">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8971">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Enabled“ setzen oder Sie nicht konfigurieren, verwenden Websites im Internet Explorer die erweiterte Anwendungsstillstand-Erkennung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8971">If you set this policy to 'Enabled' or don't configure it, websites running in Internet Explorer mode will use enhanced hang detection.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8972">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Disabled“ setzen, ist die Option „erweiterte Anwendungsstillstand-Erkennung“ deaktiviert, und die Benutzer erhalten die normale Anwendungsstillstand-Erkennung des Internet Explorers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8972">If you set this policy to 'Disabled', enhanced hang detection is disabled, and users will get the basic Internet Explorer hang detection behavior.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8973">Weitere Informationen zum Internet Explorer-Modus finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8973">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8974">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8974">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-8975">Disabled (0) = Erweiterte Anwendungsstillstand-Erkennung deaktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8975">Disabled (0) = Enhanced hang detection disabled</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-8976">Enabled (1) = Erweiterte Anwendungsstillstand-Erkennung aktiviert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8976">Enabled (1) = Enhanced hang detection enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-8977">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8977">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8978">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8978">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8979">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8979">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8980">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8980">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8981">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8981">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8982">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8982">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8983">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8983">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8984">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8984">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8985">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8985">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8986">Eindeutiger Name des GP: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8986">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8987">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der erweiterten Anwendungsstillstand-Erkennung für Internet Explorer-Modus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8987">GP name: Configure enhanced hang detection for Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8988">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8988">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8989">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8989">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8990">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8990">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8991">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8991">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8992">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8992">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8993">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8993">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8994">Wertname: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8994">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationEnhancedHangDetection</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-8995">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8995">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-8996">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-8996">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9003">Informationen zum Konfigurieren der optimalen Benutzeroberfläche für den Internet Explorer-Modus finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9003">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9022">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9022">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9023">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9023">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9024">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9024">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9025">Wertname: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9025">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9026">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9026">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9027">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9027">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9029">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9029">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-launching-of-local-files-in-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9030">Zulassen, dass lokale Dateien im Internet Explorer-Modus gestartet werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9030">Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9031">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9031">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9032">Unter Windows ab Version 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9032">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9033">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9033">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9034">Diese Richtlinie steuert die Verfügbarkeit des Befehlszeilenarguments „--ie-mode-file-url“, das verwendet wird, um Microsoft Edge mit einer auf der Befehlszeile angegebenen lokalen Datei im Internet Explorer-Modus zu starten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9034">This policy controls the availability of the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument which is used to launch Microsoft Edge with a local file specified on the command line into Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9035">Diese Einstellung kann verwendet werden in Verbindung mit: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel), festgelegt auf „IEMode“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9035">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9036">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „true“ festlegen oder nicht konfigurieren, darf der Benutzer das Befehlszeilenargument „--ie-mode-file-url“ zum Starten lokaler Dateien im Internet Explorer-Modus verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9036">If you set this policy to true, or don't configure it, the user is allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9037">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „false“ festlegen, darf der Benutzer das Befehlszeilenargument „--ie-mode-file-url“ nicht zum Starten lokaler Dateien im Internet Explorer-Modus verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9037">If you set this policy to false, the user isn't allowed to use the --ie-mode-file-url command line argument for launching local files in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9038">Weitere Informationen zum Internet Explorer-Modus finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9038">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9039">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9039">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9040">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9040">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9041">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9041">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9042">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9042">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9043">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9043">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9044">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9044">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9045">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9045">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9046">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9046">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9047">Eindeutiger GP-Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9047">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9048">GP-Name: Zulassen, dass lokale Dateien im Internet Explorer-Modus gestartet werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9048">GP name: Allow launching of local files in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9049">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9049">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9050">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9050">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9051">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9051">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9052">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9052">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9053">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9053">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9054">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9054">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9055">Wertname: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9055">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9056">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9056">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9057">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9057">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileextensionallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9059">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9059">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>

  #### <a name="open-local-files-in-internet-explorer-mode-file-extension-allow-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9060">Dateierweiterungs-Zulassungsliste zum Öffnen von lokalen Dateien im Internet Explorer-Modus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9060">Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9061">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9061">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9062">Unter Windows ab Version 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9062">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9063">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9063">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9064">Diese Richtlinie begrenzt, welche file://-URLs basierend auf der Dateierweiterung im Internet Explorer-Modus gestartet werden dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9064">This policy limits which file:// URLs are allowed to be launched into Internet Explorer mode based on file extension.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9065">Diese Einstellung kann verwendet werden in Verbindung mit: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel), festgelegt auf „IEMode“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9065">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9066">Bei der Anforderung, eine file://-URL im Internet Explorer-Modus zu starten, muss die Dateierweiterung der URL in dieser Liste vorhanden sein, damit die URL im Internet Explorer-Modus gestartet werden darf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9066">When a file:// URL is requested to launch in Internet Explorer mode, the file extension of the URL must be present in this list in order for the URL to be allowed to launch in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9067">Eine URL, deren Öffnen im Internet Explorer-Modus blockiert ist, wird stattdessen im Microsoft Edge-Modus geöffnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9067">A URL which is blocked from opening in Internet Explorer mode will instead open in Edge mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9068">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf den speziellen Wert „\*“ festlegen oder sie nicht konfigurieren, sind alle Dateierweiterungen erlaubt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9068">If you set this policy to the special value "\*" or don't configure it, all file extensions are allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9069">Weitere Informationen zum Internet Explorer-Modus finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9069">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9070">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9070">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9071">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9071">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9072">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9072">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9073">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9073">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9074">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9074">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9075">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9075">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9076">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9076">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9077">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9077">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9078">Eindeutiger GP-Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9078">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9079">GP-Name: Dateierweiterungs-Zulassungsliste zum Öffnen von lokalen Dateien im Internet Explorer-Modus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9079">GP name: Open local files in Internet Explorer mode file extension allow list</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9080">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9080">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9081">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9081">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9082">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9082">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9083">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9083">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9084">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9084">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9085">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9085">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9086">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9086">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9087">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9087">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9088">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9088">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\1 = ".mht"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\2 = ".pdf"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileExtensionAllowList\3 = ".vsdx"

```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationlocalfileshowcontextmenu"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9090">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9090">InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-context-menu-to-open-a-link-in-internet-explorer-mode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9091">Anzeigen des Kontextmenüs zum Öffnen eines Links im Internet Explorer-Modus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9091">Show context menu to open a link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9092">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9092">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9093">Unter Windows ab Version 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9093">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9094">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9094">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9095">Diese Richtlinie steuert die Sichtbarkeit der Option „Link in der neuen Internet Explorer-Modus-Registerkarte öffnen“ im Kontextmenü für file://-Links.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9095">This policy controls the visibility of the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' option on the context menu for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9096">Diese Einstellung kann verwendet werden in Verbindung mit: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel), festgelegt auf „IEMode“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9096">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9097">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „true“ festlegen, ist das Kontextmenüelement „Link in der neuen Internet Explorer-Modus-Registerkarte öffnen“ für file://-Links verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9097">If you set this policy to true, the 'Open link in new Internet Explorer mode tab' context menu item will be available for file:// links.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9098">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „false“ festlegen oder nicht konfigurieren, wird das Kontextmenüelement nicht hinzugefügt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9098">If you set this policy to false or don't configure it, the context menu item will not be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9099">Weitere Informationen zum Internet Explorer-Modus finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9099">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9100">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9100">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9101">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9101">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9102">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9102">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9103">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9103">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9104">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9104">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9105">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9105">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9106">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9106">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9107">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9107">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9108">Eindeutiger GP-Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9108">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9109">GP-Name: Anzeigen des Kontextmenüs zum Öffnen eines Links im Internet Explorer-Modus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9109">GP name: Show context menu to open a link in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9110">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9110">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9111">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9111">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9112">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9112">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9113">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9113">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9114">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9114">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9115">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9115">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9116">Wertname: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9116">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationLocalFileShowContextMenu</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9117">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9117">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationsitelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9120">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9120">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList</span></span>

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationsiteredirect"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9146">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9146">InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-how-in-page-navigations-to-unconfigured-sites-behave-when-started-from-internet-explorer-mode-pages"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9147">Angeben, wie sich „seiteninterne“ Navigationen zu nicht konfigurierten Websites verhalten, wenn sie von Seiten im Internet Explorer-Modus gestartet werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9147">Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9148">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9148">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9149">Auf Windows ab 81 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9149">On Windows since 81 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9150">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9150">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9151">Eine „seiteninterne“ Navigation wird über einen Link, ein Skript oder ein Formular auf der aktuellen Seite gestartet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9151">An "in-page" navigation is started from a link, a script, or a form on the current page.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9152">Es kann sich auch um eine serverseitige Umleitung eines früheren Versuchs der „seiteninternen“ Navigation handeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9152">It can also be a server-side redirect of a previous "in-page" navigation attempt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9153">Umgekehrt kann ein Benutzer eine nicht „seiteninterne“ Navigation, die von der aktuellen Seite unabhängig ist, auf verschiedene Weise mithilfe der Browsersteuerelemente starten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9153">Conversely, a user can start a navigation that isn't "in-page" that's independent of the current page in several ways by using the browser controls.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9154">Zum Beispiel über die Adressleiste, die Zurück-Schaltfläche oder einen Favoritenlink.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9154">For example, using the address bar, the back button, or a favorite link.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9155">Mit dieser Einstellung können Sie festlegen, ob Navigationen, die von im Internet Explorer-Modus geladenen Seiten zu nicht konfigurierten Websites führen (die nicht in der Liste der Unternehmens Modus-Websites konfiguriert sind), zurück zu Microsoft Edge wechseln oder im Internet Explorer-Modus verbleiben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9155">This setting lets you specify whether navigations from pages loaded in Internet Explorer mode to unconfigured sites (that are not configured in the Enterprise Mode Site List) switch back to Microsoft Edge or remain in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9156">Diese Einstellung funktioniert in Verbindung mit: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) auf „IEMode“ und der Richtlinie „[InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist)“, wenn die Liste mindestens einen Eintrag hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9156">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9157">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden nur die im Internet Explorer-Modus konfigurierten Websites in diesem Modus geöffnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9157">If you disable or don't configure this policy, only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9158">Alle Websites, die nicht zum Öffnen im Internet Explorer-Modus konfiguriert sind, werden zurück zu Microsoft Edge umgeleitet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9158">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9159">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „Default“ setzen, werden nur Seiten, die im Internet Explorer-Modus konfigurierten sind, geöffnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9159">If you set this policy to 'Default', only sites configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will open in that mode.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9160">Alle Websites, die nicht zum Öffnen im Internet Explorer-Modus konfiguriert sind, werden zurück zu Microsoft Edge umgeleitet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9160">Any site not configured to open in Internet Explorer mode will be redirected back to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9161">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „AutomaticNavigationsOnly“ setzen, erhalten Sie die Standardeinstellung, mit Ausnahme, dass alle automatischen Navigationselemente (wie z.B. 302-Umleitungen) zu nicht-konfigurierten Webseiten im Internet Explorer-Modus beibehalten werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9161">If you set this policy to 'AutomaticNavigationsOnly', you get the default experience except that all automatic navigations (such as 302 redirects) to unconfigured sites will be kept in Internet Explorer mode.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9162">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „AllInPageNavigations“ setzen, werden alle Navigationen von Seiten zu nicht-konfigurierten Seiten, die im IE-Modus geladen wurden im Internet Explorer-Modus beibehalten (am wenigsten empfohlen).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9162">If you set this policy to 'AllInPageNavigations', all navigations from pages loaded in IE mode to unconfigured sites are kept in Internet Explorer mode (Least Recommended).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9163">Weitere Informationen zum Internet Explorer-Modus finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9163">To learn more about Internet Explorer mode, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2105106)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9164">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9164">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-9165">Default (0) = Standard</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9165">Default (0) = Default</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-9166">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Nur automatische Navigationen im Internet Explorer-Modus beibehalten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9166">AutomaticNavigationsOnly (1) = Keep only automatic navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-9167">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Alle seiteninternen Navigationen im Internet Explorer-Modus beibehalten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9167">AllInPageNavigations (2) = Keep all in-page navigations in Internet Explorer mode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9168">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9168">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9169">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9169">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9170">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9170">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9171">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9171">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9172">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9172">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9173">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9173">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9174">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9174">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9175">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9175">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9176">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9176">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9177">GP eindeutiger Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9177">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9178">GP-Name: Angeben, wie sich „seiteninterne“ Navigationen zu nicht konfigurierten Websites verhalten, wenn sie von Seiten im Internet Explorer-Modus gestartet werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9178">GP name: Specify how "in-page" navigations to unconfigured sites behave when started from Internet Explorer mode pages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9179">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9179">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9180">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9180">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9181">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9181">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9182">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9182">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9183">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9183">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9184">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9184">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9185">Wertname: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9185">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteRedirect</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9186">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9186">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9187">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9187">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="internetexplorerintegrationtestingallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9189">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9189">InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-internet-explorer-mode-testing"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9190">Internet Explorer-Modus-Tests zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9190">Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9191">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9191">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9192">Unter Windows 86 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9192">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9193">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9193">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9194">Diese Richtlinie ermöglicht Benutzern das Testen von Anwendungen im Internet Explorer-Modus durch Öffnen eines IE-Modus-Tabs in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9194">This policy allows users to test applications in Internet Explorer mode by opening an Internet Explorer mode tab in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9195">Dies ist über das Menü "Weitere Tools" durch Auswahl der Option "Websites im Internet Explorer-Modus öffnen" möglich.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9195">Users can do so from within the "More tools" menu by selecting 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9196">Darüber hinaus können Benutzer ihre Anwendungen in einem modernen Browser testen, ohne Anwendungen aus der Websiteliste zu entfernen, indem sie die Option "Websites im Edge-Modus öffnen" verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9196">Additionally, users can test their applications in a modern browser without removing applications from the site list using the option 'Open sites in Edge mode'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9197">Diese Einstellung funktioniert in Verbindung mit: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) auf „IEMode“ und der Richtlinie „[InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist)“, wenn die Liste mindestens einen Eintrag hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9197">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9198">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird die Option "Websites im Internet Explorer-Modus öffnen" unter "Weitere Tools" angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9198">If you enable this policy, the option to 'Open sites in Internet Explorer mode' will be visible under "More tools".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9199">Benutzer können ihre Websites im Internet Explorer-Modus in diesem Tab anzeigen. Die Option "Websites im Edge-Modus öffnen" wird auch unter "Weitere Tools" angezeigt, um das Testen von Websites in einem modernen Browser zu ermöglichen, ohne sie aus der Websiteliste zu entfernen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9199">Users can view their sites in Internet Explorer mode on this tab. Another option to 'Open sites in Edge mode' will also be visible under "More tools" to help testing sites in a modern browser without removing them from the site list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9200">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden die Optionen "Im Internet Explorer-Modus öffnen" und "Im Edge-Modus öffnen" nicht im Menü "Weitere Tools" angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9200">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can't see the options 'Open in Internet Explorer mode' and 'Open in Edge mode' under "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9201">Benutzer können diese Optionen jedoch mit dem --ie-mode-test-Flag konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9201">However, users can configure these options with the --ie-mode-test flag.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9202">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9202">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9203">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9203">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9204">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9204">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9205">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9205">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9206">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9206">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9207">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9207">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9208">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9208">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9209">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9209">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9210">Eindeutiger GP-Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9210">GP unique name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9211">GP-Name: Internet Explorer-Modus-Tests zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9211">GP name: Allow Internet Explorer mode testing</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9212">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9212">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9213">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9213">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9214">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9214">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9215">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9215">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9216">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9216">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9217">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9217">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9218">Wertname: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9218">Value Name: InternetExplorerIntegrationTestingAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9219">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9219">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9220">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9220">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-9221">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9221">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="intranetredirectbehavior"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9222">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9222">IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>

  #### <a name="intranet-redirection-behavior"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9223">Verhalten der Intranetumleitung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9223">Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9224">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9224">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9225">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9225">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9226">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9226">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9227">Diese Richtlinie konfiguriert das Verhalten für die Intranetumleitung über DNS-Interception-Prüfungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9227">This policy configures behavior for intranet redirection via DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9228">Bei den Prüfungen wird versucht zu ermitteln, ob sich der Browser hinter einem Proxy befindet, der unbekannte Hostnamen umleitet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9228">The checks attempt to discover whether the browser is behind a proxy that redirects unknown host names.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9229">Wenn diese Richtlinie nicht konfiguriert ist, verwendet der Browser das Standardverhalten von DNS-Interception-Prüfungen und Intranetumleitungsvorschlägen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9229">If this policy isn't configured, the browser will use the default behavior of DNS interception checks and intranet redirect suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9230">In M88 sind sie standardmäßig aktiviert, werden aber im zukünftigen Release standardmäßig deaktiviert sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9230">In M88, they are enabled by default but will be disabled by default in the future release.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9231">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) ist eine verwandte Richtlinie, die DNS-Interception-Prüfungen möglicherweise auch deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9231">[DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) is a related policy that might also disable DNS interception checks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9232">Diese Richtlinie ist jedoch eine flexiblere Version, die Infoleiste für Intranetumleitungen separat steuern kann und in Zukunft erweitert werden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9232">However, this policy is a more flexible version which might separately control intranet redirection infobars and might be expanded in the future.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-9233">Wenn entweder [DNSInterceptionChecksChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) oder diese Richtlinie die Deaktivierung von Interception-Prüfungen anfordert, werden die Prüfungen deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9233">If either [DNSInterceptionChecksEnabled](#dnsinterceptionchecksenabled) or this policy make a request to disable interception checks, the checks will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-9234">Wenn DNS-Interception-Prüfungen durch diese Richtlinie deaktiviert werden, [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar) jedoch aktiviert ist, führen Einzelwortabfragen immer noch zu Intranetnavigationen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9234">If DNS interception checks are disabled by this policy but [GoToIntranetSiteForSingleWordEntryInAddressBar](#gotointranetsiteforsinglewordentryinaddressbar) is enabled, single word queries will still result in intranet navigations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9235">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9235">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-9236">Default (0) = Standardverhalten des Browsers verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9236">Default (0) = Use default browser behavior.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-9237">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = DNS-Interception-Prüfungen und Meinten Sie "http://intranetsite/"-Infoleisten deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9237">DisableInterceptionChecksDisableInfobar (1) = Disable DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-9238">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = DNS-Interception-Prüfungen deaktivieren und Meinten Sie "http://intranetsite/"-Infoleisten zulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9238">DisableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (2) = Disable DNS interception checks; allow did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-9239">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = DNS-Interception-Prüfungen und Meinten Sie "http://intranetsite/"-Infoleisten zulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9239">EnableInterceptionChecksEnableInfobar (3) = Allow DNS interception checks and did-you-mean "http://intranetsite/" infobars.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9240">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9240">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9241">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9241">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9242">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9242">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9243">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9243">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9244">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9244">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9245">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9245">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9246">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9246">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9247">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9247">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9248">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9248">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9249">Eindeutiger GP-Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9249">GP unique name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9250">GP-Name: Verhalten der Intranetumleitung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9250">GP name: Intranet Redirection Behavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9251">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9251">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9252">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9252">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9253">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9253">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9254">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9254">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9255">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9255">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9256">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9256">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9257">Wertname: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9257">Value Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9258">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9258">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9259">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9259">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9260">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9260">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9261">Einstellung Schlüsselname: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9261">Preference Key Name: IntranetRedirectBehavior</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9262">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9262">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>1</integer>
```

  ### <a name="isolateorigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9264">IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9264">IsolateOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-site-isolation-for-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9265">Aktivieren der Website-Isolation für bestimmte Ursprünge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9265">Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9266">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9266">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9267">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9267">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9268">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9268">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9269">Legt Ursprünge fest, die in Ihrem eigenen Prozess isoliert ausgeführt werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9269">Specify origins to run in isolation, in their own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9270">Diese Richtlinie isoliert außerdem die von Unterdomänen benannten Ursprünge. so wird beispielsweisedurch die Angabe von https://contoso.com/ https://foo.contoso.com/ als Bestandteil der https://contoso.com/-Website isoliert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9270">This policy also isolates origins named by subdomains - for example, specifying https://contoso.com/ will cause https://foo.contoso.com/ to be isolated as part of the https://contoso.com/ site.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9271">Wenn die Richtlinie aktiviert ist, wird jeder der in einer durch Trennzeichen getrennten Liste benannten Ursprünge in einem eigenen Prozess ausgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9271">If the policy is enabled, each of the named origins in a comma-separated list will run in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9272">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Funktionen "IsolateOrigins" und "SitePerProcess" deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9272">If you disable this policy, then both the 'IsolateOrigins' and 'SitePerProcess' features are disabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9273">Benutzer können die Richtlinie für "IsolateOrigins" weiterhin manuell über Befehlszeilenkennzeichnungen aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9273">Users can still enable 'IsolateOrigins' policy manually, via command line flags.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9274">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9274">If you don't configure the policy, the user can change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9275">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9275">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9276">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9276">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9277">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9277">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9278">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9278">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9279">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9279">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9280">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9280">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9281">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9281">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9282">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9282">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9283">GP eindeutiger Name: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9283">GP unique name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9284">GP-Name: Aktivieren der Website-Isolation für bestimmte Ursprünge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9284">GP name: Enable site isolation for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9285">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9285">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9286">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9286">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9287">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9287">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9288">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9288">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9289">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9289">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9290">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9290">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9291">Wertname: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9291">Value Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9292">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9292">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9293">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9293">Example value:</span></span>

```
"https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9294">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9294">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9295">Einstellung Schlüsselname: IsolateOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9295">Preference Key Name: IsolateOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9296">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9296">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>https://contoso.com/,https://fabrikam.com/</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-9297">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9297">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="localprovidersenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9298">LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9298">LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-suggestions-from-local-providers"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9299">Vorschläge von lokalen Anbietern zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9299">Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9300">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9300">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9301">Auf Windows und macOS ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9301">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9302">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9302">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9303">Lässt Vorschläge von Vorschlagsanbietern auf dem Gerät (lokale Anbieter), z.B. "Favoriten" und "Browserverlauf", in der Adressleiste von Microsoft Edge und der Liste der automatischen Vorschläge, zu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9303">Allow suggestions from suggestion providers on the device (local providers), for example, Favorites and Browsing History, in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9304">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden Vorschläge von lokalen Anbietern verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9304">If you enable this policy, suggestions from local providers are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9305">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden keine Vorschläge von lokalen Anbietern verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9305">If you disable this policy, suggestions from local providers are never used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9306">Vorschläge für lokalen Verlauf und lokale Favoriten werden nicht angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9306">Local history and local favorites suggestions will not appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9307">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, sind Vorschläge von lokalen Anbietern zulässig, aber der Benutzer kann dies mithilfe der Umschaltfläche in "Einstellungen" ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9307">If you do not configure this policy, suggestions from local providers are allowed but the user can change that using the settings toggle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9308">Beachten Sie, dass einige Features möglicherweise nicht verfügbar sind, wenn eine Richtlinie zum Deaktivieren dieses Features angewendet wurde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9308">Note that some features may not be available if a policy to disable this feature has been applied.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9309">So sind beispielsweise die Vorschläge zum Durchsuchen des Verlaufs nicht verfügbar, wenn Sie die Richtlinie [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9309">For example, Browsing History suggestions will not be available if you enable the [SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled](#savingbrowserhistorydisabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9310">Zur Anwendung dieser Richtlinie ist ein Browser-Neustart erforderlich.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9310">This policy requires a browser restart to finish applying.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9311">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9311">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9312">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9312">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9313">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9313">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9314">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9314">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9315">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9315">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9316">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9316">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9317">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9317">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9318">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9318">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9319">GP eindeutiger Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9319">GP unique name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9320">GP-Name: Vorschläge von lokalen Anbietern zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9320">GP name: Allow suggestions from local providers</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9321">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9321">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9322">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9322">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9323">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9323">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9324">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9324">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9325">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9325">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9326">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9326">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9327">Wertname: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9327">Value Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9328">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9328">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9329">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9329">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9330">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9330">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9331">Einstellung Schlüsselname: LocalProvidersEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9331">Preference Key Name: LocalProvidersEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9332">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9332">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```
