  ### <a name="managedconfigurationperorigin"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9334">ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9334">ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>

  #### <a name="sets-managed-configuration-values-for-websites-to-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9335">Legt verwaltete Konfigurationswerte für Websites auf bestimmte Ursprünge fest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9335">Sets managed configuration values for websites to specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9336">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9336">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9337">Unter Windows und macOS seit 90 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9337">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9338">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9338">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9339">Durch Festlegen dieser Richtlinie wird der Rückgabewert der API für die verwaltete Konfiguration für den angegebenen Ursprung definiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9339">Setting this policy defines the return value of Managed Configuration API for given origin.</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="09666-9340">Die verwaltete Konfigurations-API ist eine Schlüsselwert-Konfiguration, auf die über den Javascript-Aufruf „navigator.device.getManagedConfiguration()“ zugegriffen werden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9340">Managed Configuration API is a key-value configuration that can be accessed via navigator.device.getManagedConfiguration() javascript call.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9341">Diese API ist nur für Ursprünge verfügbar, die erzwungen installierten Webanwendungen über [WebAppInstallForceList](#webappinstallforcelist) entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9341">This API is only available to origins which correspond to force-installed web applications via [WebAppInstallForceList](#webappinstallforcelist).</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9342">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9342">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9343">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9343">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9344">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9344">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9345">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9345">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9346">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9346">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9347">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9347">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9348">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9348">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9349">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9349">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9350">GP eindeutiger Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9350">GP unique name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9351">GP-Name: Legt verwaltete Konfigurationswerte für Websites auf bestimmte Ursprünge fest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9351">GP name: Sets managed configuration values for websites to specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9352">GP-Pfad (Verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9352">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9353">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9353">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9354">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9354">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9355">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9355">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9356">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9356">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9357">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9357">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9358">Wertname: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9358">Value Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9359">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9359">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9360">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9360">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin = [
  {
    "managed_configuration_hash": "asd891jedasd12ue9h", 
    "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json", 
    "origin": "https://www.contoso.com"
  }, 
  {
    "managed_configuration_hash": "djio12easd89u12aws", 
    "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json", 
    "origin": "https://www.example.com"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9361">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9361">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin = [{"managed_configuration_hash": "asd891jedasd12ue9h", "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json", "origin": "https://www.contoso.com"}, {"managed_configuration_hash": "djio12easd89u12aws", "managed_configuration_url": "https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json", "origin": "https://www.example.com"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9362">Mac-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9362">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9363">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9363">Preference Key Name: ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9364">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9364">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>ManagedConfigurationPerOrigin</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>managed_configuration_hash</key>
    <string>asd891jedasd12ue9h</string>
    <key>managed_configuration_url</key>
    <string>https://static.contoso.com/configuration.json</string>
    <key>origin</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>managed_configuration_hash</key>
    <string>djio12easd89u12aws</string>
    <key>managed_configuration_url</key>
    <string>https://static.contoso.com/configuration2.json</string>
    <key>origin</key>
    <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="managedfavorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9366">ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9366">ManagedFavorites</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-favorites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9367">Favoriten konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9367">Configure favorites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9368">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9368">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9369">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9369">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9370">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9370">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9371">Konfiguriert eine Liste der verwalteten Favoriten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9371">Configures a list of managed favorites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9372">Die Richtlinie erstellt eine Liste von Favoriten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9372">The policy creates a list of favorites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9373">Jeder Favorit enthält die Schlüssel "Name" und "URL", die den Namen des Favoriten und dessen Ziel enthalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9373">Each favorite contains the keys "name" and "url," which hold the favorite's name and its target.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9374">Sie können einen Unterordner konfigurieren, indem Sie einen Favoriten ohne einen "URL"-Schlüssel, aber mit einem weiteren "Children"-Schlüssel definieren, der eine Liste der oben definierten Favoriten enthält (von denen einige möglicherweise wieder Ordner sind).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9374">You can configure a subfolder by defining a favorites without an "url" key but with an additional "children" key that contains a list of favorites as defined above (some of which may be folders again).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9375">Microsoft Edge ändert unvollständige URLs so, als ob Sie über die Adressleiste übermittelt wurden. so wird beispielsweise "microsoft.com" zu "https://microsoft.com/".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9375">Microsoft Edge amends incomplete URLs as if they were submitted via the Address Bar, for example "microsoft.com" becomes "https://microsoft.com/".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9376">Diese Favoriten werden in einem Ordner abgelegt, der vom Benutzer nicht geändert werden kann (aber der Benutzer kann festlegen, ihn auf der Favoritenleiste auszublenden).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9376">These favorites are placed in a folder that can't be modified by the user (but the user can choose to hide it from the favorites bar).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9377">Standardmäßig lautet der Ordnername "verwaltete Favoriten". Sie können ihn aber auch ändern, indem Sie zur Favoritenliste ein Wörterbuch mit dem Schlüssel "toplevel_name" mit dem gewünschten Ordnernamen als Wert hinzufügen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9377">By default the folder name is "Managed favorites" but you can change it by adding to the list of favorites a dictionary containing the key "toplevel_name" with the desired folder name as the value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9378">Verwaltete Favoriten werden nicht mit dem Benutzerkonto synchronisiert und können nicht durch Erweiterungen geändert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9378">Managed favorites are not synced to the user account and can't be modified by extensions.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9379">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9379">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9380">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9380">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9381">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9381">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9382">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9382">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9383">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9383">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9384">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9384">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9385">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9385">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9386">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9386">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9387">GP eindeutiger Name: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9387">GP unique name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9388">GP-Name: Favoriten konfigurieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9388">GP name: Configure favorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9389">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9389">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9390">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9390">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9391">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9391">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9392">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9392">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9393">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9393">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9394">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9394">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9395">Wertname: ManagedFavorites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9395">Value Name: ManagedFavorites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9396">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9396">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9397">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9397">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedFavorites = [
  {
    "toplevel_name": "My managed favorites folder"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Microsoft", 
    "url": "microsoft.com"
  }, 
  {
    "name": "Bing", 
    "url": "bing.com"
  }, 
  {
    "children": [
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge Insiders", 
        "url": "www.microsoftedgeinsider.com"
      }, 
      {
        "name": "Microsoft Edge", 
        "url": "www.microsoft.com/windows/microsoft-edge"
      }
    ], 
    "name": "Microsoft Edge links"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9398">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9398">Compact example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="managedsearchengines"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9403">ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9403">ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-search-engines"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9404">Verwalten von Suchmaschinen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9404">Manage Search Engines</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9405">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9405">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9406">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9406">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9407">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9407">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9408">Sie können Sie eine Liste mit bis zu 10 Suchmaschinen konfigurieren, von denen eine als Standardsuchmaschine gekennzeichnet sein muss.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9408">Lets you configure a list of up to 10 search engines, one of which must be marked as the default search engine.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-9409">Sie müssen die Codierung nicht angeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9409">You do not need to specify the encoding.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9410">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 80 sind die suggest_url-und image_search_url-Parameter optional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9410">Starting in Microsoft Edge 80, the suggest_url and image_search_url parameters are optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9411">Der optionale Parameter image_search_post_params (besteht aus durch Trennzeichen getrennten Namen/Wert-Paaren), ist ab Microsoft Edge 80 verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9411">The optional parameter, image_search_post_params (consists of comma-separated name/value pairs), is available starting in Microsoft Edge 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9412">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 83 können Sie Suchmaschinen-Ermittlungen mit dem optionalen Parameter allow_search_engine_discovery aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9412">Starting in Microsoft Edge 83, you can enable search engine discovery with the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9413">Dieser Parameter muss das erste Element in der Liste sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9413">This parameter must be the first item in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9414">Wenn allow_search_engine_discovery nicht angegeben ist, wird die Suchmaschinen-Ermittlung standardmäßig deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9414">If allow_search_engine_discovery is not specified, search engine discovery will be disabled by default.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9415">Beginnend mit Microsoft Edge 84 können Sie diese Richtlinie als empfohlene Richtlinie festlegen, um die Ermittlung des Suchanbieters zu ermöglichen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9415">Starting in Microsoft Edge 84, you can set this policy as a recommended policy to allow search provider discovery.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9416">Sie müssen den optionalen Parameter allow_search_engine_discovery nicht hinzufügen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9416">You do not need to add the allow_search_engine_discovery optional parameter.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9417">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können Benutzer in der Liste keine Suchmaschinen hinzufügen, entfernen oder ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9417">If you enable this policy, users can't add, remove, or change any search engine in the list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9418">Benutzer können ihre Standardsuchmaschine auf eine beliebige Suchmaschine in der Liste festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9418">Users can set their default search engine to any search engine in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9419">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer die Suchmaschinenliste nach Belieben ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9419">If you disable or don't configure this policy, users can modify the search engines list as desired.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9420">Wenn die Richtlinie [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) festgelegt ist, wird diese Richtlinie (ManagedSearchEngines) ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9420">If the [DefaultSearchProviderSearchURL](#defaultsearchprovidersearchurl) policy is set, this policy (ManagedSearchEngines) is ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9421">Der Benutzer muss seinen Browser neu starten, um die Anwendung dieser Richtlinie abzuschließen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9421">The user must restart their browser to finish applying this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9422">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9422">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9423">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9423">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9424">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9424">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9425">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9425">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9426">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9426">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9427">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9427">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9428">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9428">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9429">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9429">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9430">GP eindeutiger Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9430">GP unique name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9431">GP-Name: Verwalten von Suchmaschinen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9431">GP name: Manage Search Engines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9432">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9432">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9433">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9433">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9434">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9434">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9435">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9435">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9436">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9436">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9437">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9437">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9438">Wertname: ManagedSearchEngines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9438">Value Name: ManagedSearchEngines</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9439">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9439">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9440">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9440">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\ManagedSearchEngines = [
  {
    "allow_search_engine_discovery": true
  }, 
  {
    "is_default": true, 
    "keyword": "example1.com", 
    "name": "Example1", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example1.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example1.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "image_search_post_params": "content={imageThumbnail},url={imageURL},sbisrc={SearchSource}", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example2.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example2.com", 
    "name": "Example2", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example2.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example2.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "encoding": "UTF-8", 
    "image_search_url": "https://www.example3.com/images/detail/search?iss=sbiupload", 
    "keyword": "example3.com", 
    "name": "Example3", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example3.com/search?q={searchTerms}", 
    "suggest_url": "https://www.example3.com/qbox?query={searchTerms}"
  }, 
  {
    "keyword": "example4.com", 
    "name": "Example4", 
    "search_url": "https://www.example4.com/search?q={searchTerms}"
  }
]
```

  ```

  ```

  ### <a name="maxconnectionsperproxy"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9446">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9446">MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>

  #### <a name="maximum-number-of-concurrent-connections-to-the-proxy-server"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9447">Maximale Anzahl gleichzeitiger Verbindungen mit dem Proxyserver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9447">Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9448">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9448">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9449">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9449">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9450">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9450">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9451">Gibt die maximale Anzahl gleichzeitiger Verbindungen mit dem Proxyserver an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9451">Specifies the maximum number of simultaneous connections to the proxy server.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9452">Einige Proxyserver können eine hohe Anzahl gleichzeitiger Verbindungen pro Client nicht verarbeiten. Dies können Sie lösen, indem Sie diese Richtlinie auf einen niedrigeren Wert festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9452">Some proxy servers can't handle a high number of concurrent connections per client - you can solve this by setting this policy to a lower value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9453">Der Wert dieser Richtlinie sollte kleiner als 100 und höher als 6 sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9453">The value of this policy should be lower than 100 and higher than 6.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9454">Der Standardwert lautet %%amp;quot;32%%amp;quot;.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9454">The default value is 32.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9455">Einige Web-Apps sind bekannt dafür, viele Verbindungen mit hängenden GETs zu blockieren – das Senken der maximalen Anzahl von Verbindungen unter 32 kann dazu führen, dass die Netzwerkaktivität des Browsers hängenbleibt, wenn zu viele dieser Arten von Webanwendungen geöffnet sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9455">Some web apps are known to consume many connections with hanging GETs - lowering the maximum connections below 32 may lead to browser networking hangs if too many of these kind of web apps are open.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9456">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der Standardwert (32) verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9456">If you don't configure this policy, the default value (32) is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9457">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9457">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9458">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9458">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9459">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9459">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9460">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9460">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9461">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9461">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9462">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9462">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9463">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9463">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9464">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9464">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9465">GP eindeutiger Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9465">GP unique name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9466">GP-Name: Maximale Anzahl gleichzeitiger Verbindungen mit dem Proxyserver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9466">GP name: Maximum number of concurrent connections to the proxy server</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9467">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9467">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9468">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9468">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9469">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9469">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9470">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9470">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9471">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9471">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9472">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9472">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9473">Wertname: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9473">Value Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9474">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9474">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9475">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9475">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000020
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9476">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9476">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9477">Einstellung Schlüsselname: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9477">Preference Key Name: MaxConnectionsPerProxy</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9478">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9478">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<integer>32</integer>
```

  ### <a name="mediaroutercastallowallips"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9480">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9480">MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-google-cast-to-connect-to-cast-devices-on-all-ip-addresses"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9481">Zulassen, dass Google Cast eine Verbindung mit den Cast-Geräten aller IP-Adressen herstellt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9481">Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9482">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9482">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9483">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9483">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9484">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9484">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9485">Aktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, damit Google Cast eine Verbindung mit Cast-Geräten auf allen IP-Adressen herstellt – nicht nur zu privaten RFC1918/RFC4193-Adressen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9485">Enable this policy to let Google Cast connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses, not just RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9486">Deaktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um Google Cast auf private RFC1918/RFC4193-Adressen zu beschränken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9486">Disable this policy to restrict Google Cast to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9487">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, stellt Google Cast nur Verbindungen zu Cast-Geräten unter RFC1918/RFC4193-Adressen her, es sei denn, Sie aktivieren das Feature CastAllowAllIPs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9487">If you don't configure this policy, Google Cast connects to Cast devices on RFC1918/RFC4193 private addresses only, unless you enable the CastAllowAllIPs feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9488">Wenn die Richtlinie [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) deaktiviert ist, hat diese Richtlinie keine Wirkung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9488">If the [EnableMediaRouter](#enablemediarouter) policy is disabled, then this policy has no effect.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9489">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9489">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9490">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9490">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9491">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9491">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9492">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9492">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9493">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9493">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9494">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9494">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9495">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9495">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9496">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9496">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9497">GP eindeutiger Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9497">GP unique name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9498">GP-Name: Zulassen, dass Google Cast eine Verbindung mit den Cast-Geräten aller IP-Adressen herstellt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9498">GP name: Allow Google Cast to connect to Cast devices on all IP addresses</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9499">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9499">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9500">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9500">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9501">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9501">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9502">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9502">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9503">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9503">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9504">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9504">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9505">Wertname: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9505">Value Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9506">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9506">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9507">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9507">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9508">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9508">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9509">Einstellung Schlüsselname: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9509">Preference Key Name: MediaRouterCastAllowAllIPs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9510">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9510">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="metricsreportingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9512">MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9512">MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-usage-and-crash-related-data-reporting-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9513">Aktivieren der Berichterstellung für Nutzungs- und Absturzdaten (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9513">Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-9514">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach Microsoft Edge 88 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9514">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9515">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9515">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9516">Unter Windows und macOS seit 77 bis 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9516">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9517">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9517">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9518">Diese Richtlinie wird nicht mehr unterstützt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9518">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9519">Sie wird durch [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (für Windows 7, Windows 8 und macOS) und „Telemetrie zulassen“ unter Windows 10 ersetzt ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9519">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9520">Diese Richtlinie ermöglicht die Erstellung von Berichten zu Nutzungs- und Absturzdaten für Microsoft Edge an Microsoft.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9520">This policy enables reporting of usage and crash-related data about Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9521">Aktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um Berichte zu Nutzungs- und Absturzdaten an Microsoft zu senden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9521">Enable this policy to send reporting of usage and crash-related data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9522">Deaktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, wenn Sie die Daten nicht an Microsoft senden möchten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9522">Disable this policy to not send the data to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9523">In beiden Fällen können Benutzer die Einstellung weder ändern noch außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9523">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9524">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie unter Windows 10 nicht konfigurieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge standardmäßig die Windows-Diagnosedateneinstellung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9524">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9525">Wenn diese Richtlinie aktiviert ist, sendet Microsoft Edge nur dann Nutzungsdaten, wenn die Einstellung für Windows-Diagnosedaten auf Erweitert oder Vollständig festgelegt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9525">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge will only send usage data if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Enhanced or Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9526">Wenn diese Richtlinie deaktiviert ist, werden von Microsoft Edge keine Nutzungsdaten gesendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9526">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will not send usage data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9527">Absturzdaten werden basierend auf der Einstellung für Windows-Diagnosedaten gesendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9527">Crash-related data is sent based on the Windows Diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9528">Weitere Informationen zu den Einstellungen für Windows-Diagnosedaten finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9528">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9529">Unter Windows 7, Windows 8 und macOS steuert diese Richtlinie das Senden von Nutzungs- und Absturzdaten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9529">On Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS, this policy controls sending usage and crash-related data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9530">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge standardmäßig die Präferenz des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9530">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9531">Um diese Richtlinie zu aktivieren, muss [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) auf Aktiviert gesetzt sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9531">To enable this policy,[SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9532">Wenn [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) oder [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) nicht konfiguriert oder deaktiviert ist, werden diese Daten nicht an Microsoft gesendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9532">If [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) or [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9533">Diese Richtlinie ist nur für Windows-Instanzen verfügbar, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind, oder MacOS-Instanzen, die über MDM verwaltet oder über MCX einer Domäne beigetreten sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9533">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management, or macOS instances that are that are managed via MDM or joined to a domain via MCX.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9534">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9534">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9535">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9535">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9536">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9536">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9537">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9537">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9538">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9538">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9539">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9539">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9540">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9540">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9541">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9541">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9542">GP eindeutiger Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9542">GP unique name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9543">GP-Name: Aktivieren der Berichterstellung für Nutzungs- und Absturzdaten (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9543">GP name: Enable usage and crash-related data reporting (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9544">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9544">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9545">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9545">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9546">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9546">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9547">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9547">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9548">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9548">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9549">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9549">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9550">Wertname: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9550">Value Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9551">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9551">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9552">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9552">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9553">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9553">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9554">Einstellung Schlüsselname: MetricsReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9554">Preference Key Name: MetricsReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9555">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9555">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="nativewindowocclusionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9557">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9557">NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-native-window-occlusion-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9558">Systemeigene Fenster-Okklusion aktivieren (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9558">Enable Native Window Occlusion (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-9559">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9559">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9560">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9560">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9561">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9561">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9562">Unter Windows seit 84 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9562">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9563">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9563">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9564">Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet. Verwenden Sie stattdessen die Richtlinie „[WindowOcclusionEnabled](#windowocclusionenabled)“.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9564">This policy is deprecated, use the '[WindowOcclusionEnabled](#windowocclusionenabled)' policy instead.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9565">Dies wird in Microsoft Edge, Version 92 nicht funktionieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9565">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 92.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9566">Aktiviert systemeigene Fenster-Okklusion in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9566">Enables native window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9567">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren, wird Microsoft Edge zum Verringern der benötigten CPU-Leistung und des Stromverbrauchs erkennen, ob ein Fenster von anderen Fenstern überlagert wird, und das Zeichnen der überdeckten Pixel wird unterbrochen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9567">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9568">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren, wird Microsoft Edge nicht erkennen, wenn ein Fenster von anderen Fenstern überdeckt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9568">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9569">Wenn diese Richtlinie nicht festgelegt ist, wird die Erkennung von Okklusion aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9569">If this policy is left not set, occlusion detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9570">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9570">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9571">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9571">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9572">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9572">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9573">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9573">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9574">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9574">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9575">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9575">Boolean</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9578">GP eindeutiger Name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9578">GP unique name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9579">GP-Name: Systemeigene Fenster-Okklusion aktivieren (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9579">GP name: Enable Native Window Occlusion (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9580">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9580">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9582">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9582">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9583">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9583">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9584">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9584">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9585">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9585">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9586">Wertname: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9586">Value Name: NativeWindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="navigationdelayforinitialsitelistdownloadtimeout"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9590">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9590">NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-a-timeout-for-delay-of-tab-navigation-for-the-enterprise-mode-site-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9591">Festlegen eines Zeitlimits für die Verzögerung der Registerkartennavigation für die Enterprise Mode Site List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9591">Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9592">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9592">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9593">Unter Windows seit 84 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9593">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9594">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9594">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9595">Ermöglicht es Ihnen, einen Zeitlimit (in Sekunden) für Microsoft Edge-Registerkarten festzulegen, die auf die Navigation warten, bis der Browser die ursprüngliche Standortliste im Enterprise-Modus heruntergeladen hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9595">Allows you to set a timeout, in seconds, for Microsoft Edge tabs waiting to navigate until the browser has downloaded the initial Enterprise Mode Site List.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9596">Diese Einstellung funktioniert in Verbindung mit: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) auf „IEMode“ und der Richtlinie „[InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist)“, wenn die Liste mindestens einen Eintrag hat und [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) auf „All eligible navigations“ (1) gesetzt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9596">This setting works in conjunction with: [InternetExplorerIntegrationLevel](#internetexplorerintegrationlevel) is set to 'IEMode' and [InternetExplorerIntegrationSiteList](#internetexplorerintegrationsitelist) policy where the list has at least one entry and [DelayNavigationsForInitialSiteListDownload](#delaynavigationsforinitialsitelistdownload) is set to "All eligible navigations" (1).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9597">Die Registerkarten warten nicht länger als dieses Zeitlimit, um die Enterprise Mode Site List herunterzuladen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9597">Tabs will not wait longer than this timeout for the Enterprise Mode Site List to download.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9598">Wenn der Browser die Enterprise Mode Site List nach Ablauf des Zeitlimits nicht heruntergeladen hat, werden die Microsoft Edge-Registerkarten trotzdem weiter navigiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9598">If the browser has not finished downloading the Enterprise Mode Site List when the timeout expires, Microsoft Edge tabs will continue navigating anyway.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9599">Der Wert des Zeitlimits sollte nicht größer als 20 Sekunden und nicht weniger als 1 Sekunde sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9599">The value of the timeout should be no greater than 20 seconds and no fewer than 1 second.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9600">Wenn Sie für das Zeitlimit in dieser Richtlinie einen höheren als den Standardwert von 2 Sekunden festlegen, wird dem Benutzer eine Informationsleiste nach 2 Sekunden angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9600">If you set the timeout in this policy to a value greater than the default of 2 seconds, an information bar is shown to the user after 2 seconds.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9601">Die Informationsleiste enthält eine Schaltfläche, mit der der Benutzer auf den Abschluss des Downloads des Enterprise Mode Site List verzichten kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9601">The information bar contains a button that allows the user to quit waiting for the Enterprise Mode Site List download to complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9602">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird das Standardzeitlimit von 2 Sekunden verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9602">If you don't configure this policy, the default timeout of 2 seconds is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9603">Dieser Standardwert wird künftig geändert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9603">This default is subject to change in the future.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9604">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9604">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9605">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9605">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9606">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9606">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9607">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9607">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9608">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9608">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9609">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9609">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9610">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9610">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9611">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9611">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9612">Eindeutiger Name des GP: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9612">GP unique name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9613">GP-Name: Festlegen eines Zeitlimits für die Verzögerung der Registerkartennavigation für die Enterprise Mode Site List</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9613">GP name: Set a timeout for delay of tab navigation for the Enterprise Mode Site List</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9614">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9614">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9615">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9615">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9616">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9616">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9617">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9617">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9618">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9618">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9619">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9619">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9620">Wertname: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9620">Value Name: NavigationDelayForInitialSiteListDownloadTimeout</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9621">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9621">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9622">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9622">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x0000000a
```
