  ### <a name="networkpredictionoptions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9624">NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9624">NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-network-prediction"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9625">Aktivieren der Netzwerkvorhersage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9625">Enable network prediction</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9626">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9626">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9627">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9627">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9628">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9628">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9629">Aktiviert Netzwerkvorhersage und hindert Benutzer daran, diese Einstellung zu ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9629">Enables network prediction and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9630">Hiermit werden DNS-Prefetch-Vorgänge, die TCP-und SSL-Vorverbindung sowie die Vordarstellung von Webseiten gesteuert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9630">This controls DNS prefetching, TCP and SSL preconnection, and prerendering of web pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9631">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, ist die Netzwerkvorhersage aktiviert, aber der Benutzer kann dies ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9631">If you don't configure this policy, network prediction is enabled but the user can change it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9632">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9632">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-9633">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = Vorhersagen von Netzwerkaktionen für alle Netzwerkverbindungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9633">NetworkPredictionAlways (0) = Predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-9634">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = Nicht unterstützt. Wenn dieser Wert verwendet wird, wird er so behandelt, als ob „Predict network actions on any network connection“ (0) eingestellt wurde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9634">NetworkPredictionWifiOnly (1) = Not supported, if this value is used it will be treated as if 'Predict network actions on any network connection' (0) was set</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-9635">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = Keine Vorhersagen von Netzwerkaktionen auf irgendeiner Netzwerkverbindung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9635">NetworkPredictionNever (2) = Don't predict network actions on any network connection</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9636">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9636">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9637">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9637">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9638">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9638">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9639">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9639">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9640">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9640">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9641">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9641">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9642">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9642">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9643">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9643">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9644">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9644">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9645">GP eindeutiger Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9645">GP unique name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9646">GP-Name: Aktivieren der Netzwerkvorhersage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9646">GP name: Enable network prediction</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9647">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9647">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9648">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9648">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9649">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9649">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9650">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9650">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9651">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9651">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9652">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9652">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9653">Wertname: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9653">Value Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9654">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9654">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9655">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9655">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9656">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9656">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9657">Einstellung Schlüsselname: NetworkPredictionOptions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9657">Preference Key Name: NetworkPredictionOptions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9658">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9658">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-9659">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9659">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="nonremovableprofileenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9660">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9660">NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-whether-a-user-always-has-a-default-profile-automatically-signed-in-with-their-work-or-school-account"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9661">Konfigurieren, ob ein Benutzer immer ein Standardprofil hat, das automatisch mit seinem Geschäfts- oder Schulkonto angemeldet ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9661">Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9662">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9662">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9663">Auf Windows ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9663">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9664">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9664">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9665">Mit dieser Richtlinie wird festgelegt, ob ein Benutzer das Microsoft Edge-Profil, das automatisch mit dem Geschäfts- oder Schulkonto eines Benutzers angemeldet ist, entfernen kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9665">This policy determines if a user can remove the Microsoft Edge profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9666">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird ein nicht entfernbares Profil mit dem Geschäfts- oder Schulkonto des Benutzers unter Windows erstellt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9666">If you enable this policy, a non-removable profile will be created with the user's work or school account on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9667">Dieses Profil lässt sich nicht abmelden oder entfernen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9667">This profile can't be signed out or removed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9668">Das Profil kann nur dann „nicht entfernbar“ werden, wenn das Profil mit einem lokalen Konto oder einem Azure AD-Konto angemeldet ist, das dem Anmeldekonto des Betriebssystems entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9668">The profile will be non-removable only if profile is signed-in with either on-premises account or Azure AD account that matches OS sign-in account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9669">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, kann das Profil, das automatisch mit dem Geschäfts- oder Schulkonto eines Benutzers in Windows angemeldet wird, vom Benutzer abgemeldet oder entfernt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9669">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the profile automatically signed in with a user's work or school account on Windows can be signed out or removed by the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9670">Wenn Sie die Browseranmeldung konfigurieren möchten, verwenden Sie die Richtlinie [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9670">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9671">Diese Richtlinie gilt nur für Windows-Instanzen, die mit einer Microsoft Active Directory-Domäne verknüpft sind, Windows 10 Pro- oder Enterprise-Instanzen, die für die Geräteverwaltung registriert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9671">This policy is available only on Windows instances that are joined to a Microsoft Active Directory domain, Windows 10 Pro or Enterprise instances that enrolled for device management.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9672">Wenn ab Microsoft Edge 89 ein vorhandenes lokales Profil mit deaktivierter Synchronisierung vorhanden ist und der Computer hybrid verbunden ist, aktualisiert es das lokale Profil automatisch auf das Azure AD-Profil und macht es „nicht entfernbar“, anstatt ein neues nicht entfernbares Azure AD-Profil zu erstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9672">From Microsoft Edge 89 onwards, if there is an existing on-premises profile with sync disabled and machine is hybrid joined, it will auto-upgrade the on-premises profile to Azure AD profile and make it non-removable instead of creating a new non-removable Azure AD profile.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9673">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9673">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9674">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9674">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9675">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9675">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9676">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9676">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9677">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9677">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9678">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9678">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9679">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9679">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9680">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9680">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9681">GP eindeutiger Name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9681">GP unique name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9682">GP-Name: Konfigurieren, ob ein Benutzer immer ein Standardprofil hat, das automatisch mit seinem Geschäfts- oder Schulkonto angemeldet ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9682">GP name: Configure whether a user always has a default profile automatically signed in with their work or school account</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9683">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9683">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9684">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9684">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9685">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9685">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9686">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9686">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9687">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9687">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9688">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9688">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9689">Wertname: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9689">Value Name: NonRemovableProfileEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9690">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9690">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9691">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9691">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="overridesecurityrestrictionsoninsecureorigin"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9693">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9693">OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>

  #### <a name="control-where-security-restrictions-on-insecure-origins-apply"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9694">Steuern, wo Sicherheitseinschränkungen bei unsicheren Ursprüngen angewendet werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9694">Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9695">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9695">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9696">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9696">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9697">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9697">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9698">Gibt eine Liste von Ursprüngen (URLs) oder Hostname-Mustern (z. b. "\*.contoso.com") an, für die Sicherheitseinschränkungen bei unsicheren Ursprüngen nicht zutreffen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9698">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "\*.contoso.com") for which security restrictions on insecure origins don't apply.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9699">Mit dieser Richtlinie können Sie die zulässigen Ursprünge für Legacy-Anwendungen angeben, die TLS nicht bereitstellen können, oder keinen Stagingserver für interne Webentwicklungen einrichten, sodass Entwickler Features testen können, die sichere Kontexte erfordern, ohne dass TLS auf dem Stagingserver bereitgestellt werden muss.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9699">This policy lets you specify allowed origins for legacy applications that can't deploy TLS or set up a staging server for internal web development so that developers can test out features requiring secure contexts without having to deploy TLS on the staging server.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9700">Durch diese Richtlinie wird außerdem verhindert, dass der Ursprung in der Omnibox als "nicht sicher" gekennzeichnet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9700">This policy also prevents the origin from being labeled "Not Secure" in the omnibox.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9701">Das Festlegen einer Liste von URLs in dieser Richtlinie hat dieselbe Wirkung wie das Festlegen der Befehlszeilenkennzeichnung "--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure" auf eine durch Trennzeichen getrennte Liste gleicher URLs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9701">Setting a list of URLs in this policy has the same effect as setting the command-line flag '--unsafely-treat-insecure-origin-as-secure' to a comma-separated list of the same URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9702">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird die Befehlszeilenkennzeichnung außer Kraft gesetzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9702">If you enable this policy, it overrides the command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9703">Weitere Informationen zu sicheren Kontexten finden Sie unter https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9703">For more information on secure contexts, see https://www.w3.org/TR/secure-contexts/.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9704">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9704">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9705">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9705">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9706">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9706">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9707">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9707">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9708">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9708">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9709">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9709">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9710">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9710">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9711">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9711">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9712">GP eindeutiger Name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9712">GP unique name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9713">GP-Name: Steuern, wo Sicherheitseinschränkungen bei unsicheren Ursprüngen angewendet werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9713">GP name: Control where security restrictions on insecure origins apply</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9714">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9714">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9715">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9715">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9716">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9716">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9717">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9717">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9718">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9718">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9719">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9719">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9720">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9720">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9721">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9721">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9722">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9722">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\1 = "http://testserver.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin\2 = "*.contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9723">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9723">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9724">Einstellung Schlüsselname: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9724">Preference Key Name: OverrideSecurityRestrictionsOnInsecureOrigin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9725">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9725">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>http://testserver.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>*.contoso.com</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="paymentmethodqueryenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9727">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9727">PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-websites-to-query-for-available-payment-methods"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9728">Websites erlauben, nach verfügbaren Zahlungsmethoden zu fragen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9728">Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9729">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9729">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9730">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9730">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9731">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9731">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9732">Hiermit können Sie festlegen, ob Websites überprüfen können, ob der Benutzer Zahlungsmethoden gespeichert hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9732">Allows you to set whether websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9733">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden Websites, welche die PaymentRequest.canMakePayment oder PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument-API verwenden, informiert, dass keine Zahlungsmethoden verfügbar sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9733">If you disable this policy, websites that use PaymentRequest.canMakePayment or PaymentRequest.hasEnrolledInstrument API will be informed that no payment methods are available.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9734">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, können Websites überprüfen, ob der Benutzer Zahlungsmethoden gespeichert hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9734">If you enable this policy or don't set this policy, websites can check if the user has payment methods saved.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9735">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9735">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9736">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9736">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9737">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9737">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9738">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9738">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9739">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9739">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9740">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9740">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9741">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9741">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9742">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9742">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9743">GP eindeutiger Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9743">GP unique name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9744">GP-Name: Websites erlauben, nach verfügbaren Zahlungsmethoden zu fragen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9744">GP name: Allow websites to query for available payment methods</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9745">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9745">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9746">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9746">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9747">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9747">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9748">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9748">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9749">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9749">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9750">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9750">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9751">Wertname: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9751">Value Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9752">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9752">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9753">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9753">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9754">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9754">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9755">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9755">Preference Key Name: PaymentMethodQueryEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9756">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9756">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="personalizationreportingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9758">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9758">PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-personalization-of-ads-search-and-news-by-sending-browsing-history-to-microsoft"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9759">Die Personalisierung von Werbung, der Suche und von Nachrichten ermöglichen, indem der Browserverlauf an Microsoft gesendet wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9759">Allow personalization of ads, search and news by sending browsing history to Microsoft</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9760">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9760">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9761">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9761">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9762">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9762">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9763">Diese Richtlinie hindert Microsoft am Sammeln des Microsoft Edge-Browserverlaufs eines Benutzers zum Personalisieren von Werbung, Suche, Nachrichten und anderen Microsoft-Diensten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9763">This policy prevents Microsoft from collecting a user's Microsoft Edge browsing history to be used for personalizing advertising, search, news and other Microsoft services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9764">Diese Einstellung ist nur für Benutzer mit einem Microsoft-Konto verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9764">This setting is only available for users with a Microsoft account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9765">Diese Einstellung ist für Kinder- oder Enterprise-Konten nicht verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9765">This setting is not available for child accounts or enterprise accounts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9766">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können die Benutzer die Einstellung nicht ändern oder außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9766">If you disable this policy, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9767">Wenn diese Richtlinie aktiviert oder nicht konfiguriert ist, wird von Microsoft Edge standardmäßig die Benutzereinstellung verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9767">If this policy is enabled or not configured, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9768">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9768">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9769">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9769">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9770">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9770">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9771">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9771">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9772">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9772">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9773">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9773">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9774">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9774">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9775">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9775">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9776">GP eindeutiger Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9776">GP unique name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9777">GP-Name: Die Personalisierung von Werbung, der Suche und von Nachrichten ermöglichen, indem der Browserverlauf an Microsoft gesendet wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9777">GP name: Allow personalization of ads, search and news by sending browsing history to Microsoft</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9778">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9778">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9779">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9779">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9780">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9780">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9781">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9781">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9782">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9782">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9783">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9783">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9784">Wertname: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9784">Value Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9785">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9785">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9786">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9786">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9787">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9787">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9788">Einstellung Schlüsselname: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9788">Preference Key Name: PersonalizationReportingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9789">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9789">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="pinningwizardallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9791">PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9791">PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-pin-to-taskbar-wizard"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9792">Assistent „an Taskleiste anheften“ zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9792">Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9793">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9793">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9794">Auf Windows ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9794">On Windows since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9795">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9795">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9796">Microsoft Edge verwendet den Assistenten "an Taskleiste anheften", damit Benutzer vorgeschlagene Websites an die Taskleiste anheften können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9796">Microsoft Edge uses the Pin to taskbar wizard to help users pin suggested sites to the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9797">Das Feature "an Taskleiste anheften" ist standardmäßig aktiviert und für den Benutzer im Menü "Einstellungen und mehr" zugänglich.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9797">The Pin to taskbar wizard feature is enabled by default and accessible to the user through the Settings and more menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9798">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer im Menü Einstellungen und mehr den Assistenten zum Anheften an die Taskleiste aufrufen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9798">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can call the Pin to taskbar wizard from the Settings and More menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9799">Der Assistent kann auch über einen Protokollstart aufgerufen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9799">The wizard can also be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9800">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, ist der Assistent "an Taskleiste anheften" im Menü deaktiviert und kann nicht über einen Protokollstart aufgerufen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9800">If you disable this policy, the Pin to taskbar wizard is disabled in the menu and cannot be called via a protocol launch.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9801">Benutzereinstellungen zum Aktivieren oder Deaktivieren des Assistenten zum Anheften an die Taskleiste stehen nicht zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9801">User settings to enable or disable the Pin to taskbar wizard aren't available.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9802">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9802">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9803">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9803">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9804">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9804">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9805">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9805">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9806">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9806">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9807">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9807">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9808">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9808">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9809">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9809">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9810">GP eindeutiger Name: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9810">GP unique name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9811">GP-Name: Assistent „an Taskleiste anheften“ zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9811">GP name: Allow Pin to taskbar wizard</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9812">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9812">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9813">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9813">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9814">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9814">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9815">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9815">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9816">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9816">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9817">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9817">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9818">Wertname: PinningWizardAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9818">Value Name: PinningWizardAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9819">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9819">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9820">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9820">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="proactiveauthenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9822">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9822">ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-proactive-authentication-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9823">Proaktive Authentifizierung aktivieren (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9823">Enable Proactive Authentication (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-9824">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9824">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9825">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9825">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9826">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9826">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9827">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9827">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9828">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9828">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9829">Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet, da sie nicht unabhängig von der Browser-Anmeldung funktioniert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9829">This policy is deprecated because it does not work independently of browser sign in.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9830">Funktioniert nicht in Microsoft Edge Version 91.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9830">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 91.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9831">Wenn Sie die Browser-Anmeldung konfigurieren möchten, verwenden Sie die Richtlinie [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9831">If you want to configure browser sign in, use the [BrowserSignin](#browsersignin) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9832">Sie können konfigurieren, ob die proaktive Authentifizierung in Microsoft Edge aktiviert werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9832">Lets you configure whether to turn on Proactive Authentication in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9833">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, versucht Microsoft Edge, sich nahtlos bei Websites und Diensten mit dem Konto zu authentifizieren, das sich beim Browser angemeldet hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9833">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge tries to seamlessly authenticate to websites and services using the account which is signed-in to the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9834">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, versucht Microsoft Edge nicht, sich bei Websites oder Diensten über Single Sign-on (SSO) zu authentifizieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9834">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge does not try to authenticate with websites or services using single sign-on (SSO).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9835">Authentifizierte Benutzererfahrungen, wie Enterprise New Tab Page, funktionieren nicht (z.B. neuere und empfohlene Office-Dokumente sind nicht verfügbar).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9835">Authenticated experiences like the Enterprise New Tab Page will not work (e.g. recent and recommended Office documents will not be available).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9836">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, ist die proaktive Authentifizierung aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9836">If you don't configure this policy, Proactive Authentication is turned on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9837">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9837">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9838">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9838">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9839">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9839">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9840">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9840">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9841">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9841">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9842">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9842">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9843">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9843">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9844">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9844">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9845">Eindeutiger GP-Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9845">GP unique name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9846">GP-Name: proaktive Authentifizierung aktivieren (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9846">GP name: Enable Proactive Authentication (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9847">GP-Pfad (zwingend erforderlich): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9847">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9848">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9848">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9849">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9849">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9850">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9850">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9851">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9851">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9852">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9852">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9853">Wertname: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9853">Value Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9854">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9854">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9855">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9855">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9856">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9856">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9857">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9857">Preference Key Name: ProactiveAuthEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9858">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9858">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="promotionaltabsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9860">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9860">PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-full-tab-promotional-content"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9861">Aktivieren von Promotion-Inhalten auf der gesamten Registerkarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9861">Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9862">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9862">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9863">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9863">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9864">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9864">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9865">Steuern der vollflächigen Präsentation von Promotions- oder Lehrinhalten auf Registerkarten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9865">Control the presentation of full-tab promotional or educational content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9866">Mit dieser Einstellung wird die Präsentation von Willkommensseiten gesteuert, die Benutzern bei der Anmeldung bei Microsoft Edge helfen, den Standardbrowser auswählen lassen oder die über Produktfunktionen informieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9866">This setting controls the presentation of welcome pages that help users sign into Microsoft Edge, choose their default browser, or learn about product features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9867">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren (auf „true“ festlegen) oder nicht konfigurieren, kann Microsoft Edge vollflächige Registerkarteninhalte für Benutzer anzeigen, um Produktinformationen bereitzustellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9867">If you enable this policy (set it true) or don't configure it, Microsoft Edge can show full-tab content to users to provide product information.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9868">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren (auf "false" festlegen), kann Microsoft Edge Benutzern keine vollflächigen Registerkarteninhalte anzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9868">If you disable (set to false) this policy, Microsoft Edge can't show full-tab content to users.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9871">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9871">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9872">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9872">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9873">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9873">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9874">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9874">Boolean</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9876">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9876">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9877">GP eindeutiger Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9877">GP unique name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9878">GP-Name: Aktivieren von Promotion-Inhalten auf der gesamten Registerkarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9878">GP name: Enable full-tab promotional content</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9879">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9879">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9880">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9880">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9881">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9881">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9883">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9883">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9885">Wertname: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9885">Value Name: PromotionalTabsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9886">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9886">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ### <a name="promptfordownloadlocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9892">PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9892">PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="ask-where-to-save-downloaded-files"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9893">Fragen, wo heruntergeladene Dateien gespeichert werden sollen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9893">Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9894">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9894">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9895">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9895">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9896">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9896">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9897">Legen Sie fest, ob gefragt werden soll, wo eine Datei gespeichert werden soll, bevor diese heruntergeladen wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9897">Set whether to ask where to save a file before downloading it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9898">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird der Benutzer gefragt, wo jede Datei vor dem herunterladen gespeichert werden soll. Wenn Sie sie nicht konfigurieren, werden die Dateien automatisch am Standardspeicherort gespeichert, ohne dass Sie den Benutzer fragen müssen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9898">If you enable this policy, the user is asked where to save each file before downloading; if you don't configure it, files are saved automatically to the default location, without asking the user.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9899">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer diese Einstellung ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9899">If you don't configure this policy, the user will be able to change this setting.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9900">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9900">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9901">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9901">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9902">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9902">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9903">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9903">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9904">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9904">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9905">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9905">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9906">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9906">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9907">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9907">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9908">GP eindeutiger Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9908">GP unique name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9909">GP-Name: Fragen, wo heruntergeladene Dateien gespeichert werden sollen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9909">GP name: Ask where to save downloaded files</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9910">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9910">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9911">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9911">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9912">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9912">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9913">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9913">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9914">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9914">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9915">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9915">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9916">Wertname: PromptForDownloadLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9916">Value Name: PromptForDownloadLocation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9917">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9917">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9918">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9918">Example value:</span></span>

```

```

  ### <a name="quicallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9923">QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9923">QuicAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-quic-protocol"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9924">QUIC-Protokoll zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9924">Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9925">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9925">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9926">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9926">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9927">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9927">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9928">Ermöglicht die Verwendung des QUIC-Protokolls in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9928">Allows use of the QUIC protocol in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9929">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, ist das QUIC-Protokoll zulässig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9929">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the QUIC protocol is allowed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9930">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird das QUIC-Protokoll blockiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9930">If you disable this policy, the QUIC protocol is blocked.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9931">QUIC ist ein Tranportschicht-Netzwerkprotokoll, das die Leistung von Webanwendungen, die aktuell TCP verwenden, verbessern kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9931">QUIC is a transport layer network protocol that can improve performance of web applications that currently use TCP.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9932">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9932">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9933">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9933">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9934">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9934">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9935">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9935">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9936">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9936">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9937">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9937">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9938">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9938">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9939">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9939">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9940">GP eindeutiger Name: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9940">GP unique name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9941">GP-Name: QUIC-Protokoll zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9941">GP name: Allow QUIC protocol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9942">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9942">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9943">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9943">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9944">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9944">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9945">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9945">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9946">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9946">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9947">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9947">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9948">Wertname: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9948">Value Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9949">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9949">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9950">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9950">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9951">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9951">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9952">Einstellung Schlüsselname: QuicAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9952">Preference Key Name: QuicAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9953">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9953">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml

```

  ### <a name="quickviewofficefilesenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9955">QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9955">QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-quickview-office-files-capability-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9956">Verwalten der Funktion zur Schnellansicht von Office-Dateien in Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9956">Manage QuickView Office files capability in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9957">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9957">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9958">Unter Windows und macOS seit 90 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9958">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9959">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9959">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9960">Hiermit können Sie festlegen, ob Benutzer Office-Dateien im Web anzeigen können, die sich nicht auf OneDrive oder SharePoint befinden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9960">Allows you to set whether users can view Office files on the web that aren't on OneDrive or SharePoint.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9961">(Beispiel: Word-Dokumente, PowerPoint-Präsentationen und Excel-Tabellenkalkulationen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9961">(For example: Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, and Excel spreadsheets)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9962">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können diese Dateien in Microsoft Edge mithilfe von Office Viewer angezeigt werden, ohne sie herunterzuladen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9962">If you enable or don't configure this policy, these files can be viewed in Microsoft Edge using Office Viewer instead of downloading the files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9963">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Dateien heruntergeladen, um angezeigt zu werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9963">If you disable this policy, these files will be downloaded to be viewed.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9964">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9964">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9965">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9965">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9966">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9966">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9967">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9967">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9968">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9968">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9969">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9969">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9970">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9970">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9971">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9971">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9974">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9974">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9976">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9976">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9977">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9977">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9978">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9978">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9979">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9979">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9980">Wertname: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9980">Value Name: QuickViewOfficeFilesEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9981">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9981">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9982">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9982">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9983">Mac-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9983">Mac information and settings</span></span>
