  ### <a name="redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerpreventbhoinstall"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9987">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9987">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>

  #### <a name="prevent-install-of-the-bho-to-redirect-incompatible-sites-from-internet-explorer-to-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9988">Verhindern der Installation des BHO zum Umleiten von inkompatiblen Websites von Internet Explorer zu Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9988">Prevent install of the BHO to redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9989">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9989">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9990">Unter Windows seit 87 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9990">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9991">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9991">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-9992">Diese Einstellung ermöglicht Ihnen festzulegen, ob die Installation des Browser Helper Object (BHO) blockiert werden soll, mit dem inkompatible Websites von Internet Explorer nach Microsoft Edge umgeleitet werden können, wenn für Websites ein moderner Browser erforderlich ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9992">This setting lets you specify whether to block the install of the Browser Helper Object (BHO) that enables redirecting incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge for sites that require a modern browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9993">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird das BHO nicht installiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9993">If you enable this policy, the BHO will not be installed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-9994">Wenn es bereits installiert ist, wird es beim nächsten Microsoft Edge-Update deinstalliert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9994">If it is already installed it will be uninstalled on the next Microsoft Edge update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9995">Wenn diese Richtlinie nicht konfiguriert oder deaktiviert ist, wird das BHO installiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9995">If this policy is not configured or is disabled, the BHO will be installed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9996">Das BHO ist erforderlich, damit eine Umleitung für inkompatible Websites gemacht wird, ob aber die Umleitung stattfindet oder nicht, wird auch durch [RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode](#redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode) gesteuert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9996">The BHO is required for incompatible site redirection to occur, however whether redirection occurs or not is also controlled by [RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode](#redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-9997">Weitere Informationen zu dieser Richtlinie finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9997">For more information about this policy see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-9998">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9998">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-9999">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-9999">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10000">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10000">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10001">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10001">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10002">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10002">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10003">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10003">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10004">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10004">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10005">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10005">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10006">Eindeutiger GP-Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10006">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10007">GP-Name: Verhindern der Installation des BHO zum Umleiten von inkompatiblen Websites von Internet Explorer zu Microsoft Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10007">GP name: Prevent install of the BHO to redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10008">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10008">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10009">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10009">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10010">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10010">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10011">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10011">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10012">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10012">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10013">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10013">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10014">Wertname: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10014">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerPreventBHOInstall</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10015">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10015">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10016">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10016">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-10017">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10017">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="redirectsitesfrominternetexplorerredirectmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10018">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10018">RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="redirect-incompatible-sites-from-internet-explorer-to-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10019">Umleiten von inkompatiblen Websites von Internet Explorer zu MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10019">Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10020">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10020">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10021">Unter Windows seit 87 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10021">On Windows since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10022">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10022">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10023">Mit dieser Einstellung können Sie angeben, ob Internet Explorer Navigationsanforderungen für Websites, die einen modernen Browser benötigen, zu Microsoft Edge umleitet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10023">This setting lets you specify whether Internet Explorer will redirect navigations to sites that require a modern browser to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10024">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder auf „Websiteliste“ festlegen, leitet Internet Explorer ab M87 inkompatible Websites, die einen modernen Browser benötigen, zu Microsoft Edge um.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10024">If you don't configure this policy or set it to 'Sitelist', beginning in M87, Internet Explorer will redirect sites that require a modern browser to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10025">Wenn eine Website von Internet Explorer zu Microsoft Edge umgeleitet wird, wird die Internet Explorer-Registerkarte, auf der die Website geladen wurde, geschlossen, wenn Sie keine vorherigen Inhalte hatte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10025">When a site is redirected from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge, the Internet Explorer tab that began loading that site is closed if it had no prior content.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10026">Andernfalls wird die Registerkarte zu einer Microsoft-Hilfeseite weitergeleitet, die erklärt, warum die Website an Microsoft Edge umgeleitet wurde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10026">Otherwise, it is navigated to a Microsoft help page explaining why the site was redirected to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10027">Wenn Microsoft Edge zum Laden einer Website aus dem Internet Explorer gestartet wird, wird dem Benutzer eine Informationsleiste angezeigt, in der erklärt wird, dass die Website in einem modernen Browser am besten funktioniert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10027">When Microsoft Edge is launched to load a site from IE, an information bar is shown to the user explaining that the site works best in a modern browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10028">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, leitet Internet Explorer keinen Datenverkehr zu Microsoft Edge um.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10028">If you set this policy to 'Disable', Internet Explorer will not redirect any traffic to Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10029">Weitere Informationen zu dieser Richtlinie finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10029">For more information about this policy see  [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141715)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10030">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10030">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-10031">Disable (0) = Deaktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10031">Disable (0) = Disable</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-10032">Sitelist (1) = Websites basierend auf der Liste inkompatibler Websiteliste umleiten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10032">Sitelist (1) = Redirect sites based on the incompatible sites sitelist</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10033">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10033">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10034">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10034">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10035">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10035">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10036">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10036">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10037">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10037">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10038">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10038">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10039">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10039">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10040">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10040">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10041">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10041">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10042">Eindeutiger GP-Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10042">GP unique name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10043">GP-Name: Umleiten von inkompatiblen Websites aus Internet Explorer zu MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10043">GP name: Redirect incompatible sites from Internet Explorer to Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10044">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10044">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10045">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10045">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10046">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10046">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10047">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10047">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10048">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10048">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10049">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10049">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10050">Wertname: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10050">Value Name: RedirectSitesFromInternetExplorerRedirectMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10051">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10051">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10052">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10052">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-10053">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10053">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="relaunchnotification"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10054">RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10054">RelaunchNotification</span></span>

  #### <a name="notify-a-user-that-a-browser-restart-is-recommended-or-required-for-pending-updates"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10055">Einen Benutzer informieren, dass für ausstehende Updates ein Browser-Neustart empfohlen oder erforderlich ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10055">Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10056">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10056">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10057">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10057">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10058">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10058">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10059">Informiert die Benutzer, dass sie Microsoft Edge neu starten müssen, um eine ausstehende Aktualisierung anzuwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10059">Notify users that they need to restart Microsoft Edge to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10060">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, fügt Microsoft Edge ein Neustartsymbol ganz rechts in der oberen Menüleiste hinzu, um die Benutzer aufzufordern, den Browser neu zu starten, um die Aktualisierung anzuwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10060">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge adds a recycle icon at the far right of the top menu bar to prompt users to restart the browser to apply the update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10061">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren und auf „Recommended“ setzen, werden Benutzer durch eine wiederkehrende Warnung darauf hingewiesen, dass ein Neustart empfohlen wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10061">If you enable this policy and set it to 'Recommended', a recurring warning prompts users that a restart is recommended.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10062">Benutzer können diese Warnung schließen und den Neustart zurückstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10062">Users can dismiss this warning and defer the restart.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10063">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf „Required“ setzen, werden Benutzer durch eine wiederkehrende Warnung darauf hingewiesen, dass der Browser automatisch neu gestartet wird, sobald eine Benachrichtigungsfrist verstrichen ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10063">If you set the policy to 'Required', a recurring warning prompts users that the browser will be restarted automatically as soon as a notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10064">Der Standardzeitraum beträgt sieben Tage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10064">The default period is seven days.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10065">Sie können diesen Zeitraum mit der Richtlinie [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10065">You can configure this period with the [RelaunchNotificationPeriod](#relaunchnotificationperiod) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10066">Die Sitzung des Benutzers wird beim Neustart des Browsers wiederhergestellt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10066">The user's session is restored when the browser restarts.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10067">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10067">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-10068">Recommended (1) = Empfohlen – Zeigt dem Benutzer durch eine wiederkehrende Warnung an, dass ein Neustart empfohlen wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10068">Recommended (1) = Recommended - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is recommended</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-10069">Required (2) = Erforderlich – Zeigt dem Benutzer durch eine wiederkehrende Warnung an, dass ein Neustart erforderlich ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10069">Required (2) = Required - Show a recurring prompt to the user indicating that a restart is required</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10070">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10070">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10071">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10071">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10072">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10072">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10073">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10073">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10074">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10074">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10075">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10075">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10076">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10076">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10077">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10077">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10078">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10078">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10079">GP eindeutiger Name: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10079">GP unique name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10080">GP-Name: Einen Benutzer informieren, dass für ausstehende Updates ein Browser-Neustart empfohlen oder erforderlich ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10080">GP name: Notify a user that a browser restart is recommended or required for pending updates</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10081">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10081">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10082">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10082">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10083">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10083">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10084">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10084">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10085">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10085">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10086">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10086">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10087">Wertname: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10087">Value Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10088">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10088">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10089">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10089">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10091">Einstellung Schlüsselname: RelaunchNotification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10091">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotification</span></span>


  ### <a name="relaunchnotificationperiod"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10094">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10094">RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-time-period-for-update-notifications"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10095">Festlegen des Zeitraums für Aktualisierungsbenachrichtigungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10095">Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10096">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10096">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10097">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10097">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10098">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10098">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10099">Hiermit können Sie den Zeitraum in Millisekunden festlegen, in dem Benutzer benachrichtigt werden, dass Microsoft Edge neu gestartet werden muss, um ein ausstehendes Update anzuwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10099">Allows you to set the time period, in milliseconds, over which users are notified that Microsoft Edge must be relaunched to apply a pending update.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10100">Über diesen Zeitraum wird der Benutzer wiederholt informiert, dass eine Aktualisierung erforderlich ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10100">Over this time period, the user will be repeatedly informed of the need for an update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10101">In Microsoft Edge ändert sich das App-Menü, um anzuzeigen, dass ein Neustart erforderlich ist, sobald ein Drittel des Benachrichtigungszeitraums abgelaufen ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10101">In Microsoft Edge the app menu changes to indicate that a relaunch is needed once one third of the notification period passes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10102">Diese Benachrichtigung ändert die Farbe, sobald zwei Drittel des Benachrichtigungszeitraums abgelaufen sind, und erneut, wenn der vollständige Benachrichtigungszeitraum abgelaufen ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10102">This notification changes color once two thirds of the notification period passes, and again once the full notification period has passed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10103">Die zusätzlichen Benachrichtigungen, die durch die Richtlinie [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) aktiviert sind, folgen diesem Zeitplan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10103">The additional notifications enabled by the [RelaunchNotification](#relaunchnotification) policy follow this same schedule.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10104">Wenn diese Option nicht festgelegt ist, wird der Standardzeitraum von 604800000 Millisekunden (eine Woche) verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10104">If not set, the default period of 604800000 milliseconds (one week) is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10105">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10105">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10106">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10106">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10107">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10107">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10108">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10108">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10109">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10109">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10110">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10110">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10111">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10111">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10112">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10112">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10113">GP eindeutiger Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10113">GP unique name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10114">GP-Name: Festlegen des Zeitraums für Aktualisierungsbenachrichtigungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10114">GP name: Set the time period for update notifications</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10115">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10115">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10116">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10116">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10117">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10117">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10118">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10118">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10119">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10119">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10120">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10120">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10121">Wertname: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10121">Value Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10122">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10122">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10123">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10123">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x240c8400
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10124">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10124">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10125">Einstellung Schlüsselname: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10125">Preference Key Name: RelaunchNotificationPeriod</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10126">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10126">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>604800000</integer>
```

  ### <a name="renderercodeintegrityenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10128">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10128">RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-renderer-code-integrity"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10129">Aktivieren der Codeintegrität des Renderers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10129">Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10130">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10130">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10131">Auf Windows ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10131">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10132">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10132">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10133">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf "Aktiviert" setzen oder sie nicht setzen, wird die Renderer-Code-Integrität aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10133">Setting the policy to Enabled or leaving it unset turns Renderer Code Integrity on.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-10134">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf "Deaktiviert" setzen, wirkt sich dies nachteilig auf die Sicherheit und Stabilität von Microsoft Edge aus, da unbekannter und potenziell schädlicher Code innerhalb der Renderer-Prozesse von Microsoft Edge geladen werden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10134">Setting the policy to Disabled has a detrimental effect on Microsoft Edge's security and stability as unknown and potentially hostile code can load inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10135">Deaktivieren Sie die Richtlinie nur, wenn Kompatibilitätsprobleme mit Software von Drittanbietern auftreten, die innerhalb der Renderer-Prozesse von Microsoft Edge ausgeführt werden müssen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10135">Only turn off the policy if there are compatibility issues with third-party software that must run inside Microsoft Edge's renderer processes.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10136">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10136">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10137">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10137">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10138">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10138">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10139">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10139">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10140">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10140">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10141">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10141">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10142">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10142">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10143">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10143">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10144">GP eindeutiger Name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10144">GP unique name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10145">GP-Name: Aktivieren der Codeintegrität des Renderers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10145">GP name: Enable renderer code integrity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10146">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10146">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10147">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10147">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10148">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10148">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10149">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10149">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10150">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10150">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10151">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10151">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10152">Wertname: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10152">Value Name: RendererCodeIntegrityEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10153">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10153">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10154">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10154">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="requireonlinerevocationchecksforlocalanchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10156">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10156">RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-if-online-ocspcrl-checks-are-required-for-local-trust-anchors"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10157">Angeben, ob Online-OCSP-/-CRL-Prüfungen für lokale Vertrauensanker erforderlich sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10157">Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10158">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10158">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10159">Auf Windows ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10159">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10160">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10160">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10161">Legt fest, ob Online-Sperrprüfungen (OCSP/CRL-Prüfungen) erforderlich sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10161">Control whether online revocation checks (OCSP/CRL checks) are required.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10162">Wenn Microsoft Edge keine Widerrufsstatusinformationen erhalten kann, werden diese Zertifikate als widerrufen behandelt ("hard-fail").</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10162">If Microsoft Edge can't get revocation status information, these certificates are treated as revoked ("hard-fail").</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10163">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, führt Microsoft Edge immer eine Sperrüberprüfung für Serverzertifikate durch, die erfolgreich überprüft wurden und durch lokal installierte CA-Zertifikate signiert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10163">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge always performs revocation checking for server certificates that successfully validate and are signed by locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10164">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder deaktivieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge die vorhandenen Einstellungen für die Online-Sperrprüfung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10164">If you don't configure or disable this policy, then Microsoft Edge uses the existing online revocation checking settings.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10165">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10165">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10168">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10168">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10169">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10169">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10170">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10170">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10171">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10171">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10172">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10172">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10173">GP eindeutiger Name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10173">GP unique name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10174">GP-Name: Angeben, ob Online-OCSP-/-CRL-Prüfungen für lokale Vertrauensanker erforderlich sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10174">GP name: Specify if online OCSP/CRL checks are required for local trust anchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10175">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10175">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10176">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10176">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10177">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10177">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10178">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10178">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10179">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10179">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10180">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10180">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10181">Wertname: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10181">Value Name: RequireOnlineRevocationChecksForLocalAnchors</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10182">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10182">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10183">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10183">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  ### <a name="resolvenavigationerrorsusewebservice"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10185">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10185">ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-resolution-of-navigation-errors-using-a-web-service"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10186">Aktivieren der Auflösung von Navigationsfehlern mithilfe eines Webdiensts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10186">Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10187">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10187">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10188">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10188">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10189">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10189">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10190">Ermöglichen Sie Microsoft Edge den Aufbau einer datenlosen Verbindung mit einem Webdienst, um die Netzwerkkonnektivität in Fällen wie Hotel- und Airport-WLANs zu sondieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10190">Allow Microsoft Edge to issue a dataless connection to a web service to probe networks for connectivity in cases like hotel and airport Wi-Fi.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10191">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird ein Webdienst für Netzwerkverbindungstests verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10191">If you enable this policy, a web service is used for network connectivity tests.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10192">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge systemeigene APIs, um zu versuchen, Netzwerkkonnektivitäts- und Navigationsprobleme zu lösen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10192">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses native APIs to try to resolve network connectivity and navigation issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10193">**Hinweis**: außer unter Windows 8 und neueren Versionen von Windows verwendet Microsoft Edge *immer* systemeigene APIs, um Verbindungsprobleme zu lösen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10193">**Note**: Except on Windows 8 and later versions of Windows, Microsoft Edge *always* uses native APIs to resolve connectivity issues.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10194">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, respektiert Microsoft Edge die Benutzereinstellungen, die unter Dienste unter Edge://Settings/Privacy festgelegt sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10194">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge respects the user preference that's set under Services at edge://settings/privacy.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-10195">Insbesondere gibt es ein Wahlfeld **Verwenden eines Webdiensts zum Beheben von Navigationsfehlern**, das der Benutzer ein- oder ausschalten kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10195">Specifically, there's a **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** toggle, which the user can switch on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10196">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService) aktiviert haben, sollten Sie wissen, dass die Einstellung **Verwenden eines Webdiensts zum Beheben von Navigationsfehlern** aktiviert ist, der Benutzer die Einstellung jedoch nicht mithilfe der Umschaltfläche ändern kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10196">Be aware that if you have enabled this policy (ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService), the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned on, but the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10197">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktiviert haben, ist die Einstellung **Verwenden eines Webdiensts zum Beheben von Navigationsfehlern** deaktiviert und der Benutzer kann die Einstellung nicht mithilfe der Umschaltfläche ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10197">If you have disabled this policy, the **Use a web service to help resolve navigation errors** setting is turned off, and the user can't change the setting by using the toggle.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10198">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10198">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10199">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10199">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10200">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10200">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10201">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10201">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10202">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10202">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10203">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10203">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10204">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10204">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10205">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10205">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10206">GP eindeutiger Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10206">GP unique name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10207">GP-Name: Aktivieren der Auflösung von Navigationsfehlern mithilfe eines Webdiensts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10207">GP name: Enable resolution of navigation errors using a web service</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10208">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10208">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10209">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10209">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10210">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10210">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10211">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10211">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10212">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10212">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10213">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10213">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10214">Wertname: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10214">Value Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10215">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10215">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10216">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10216">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10217">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10217">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10218">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10218">Preference Key Name: ResolveNavigationErrorsUseWebService</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10219">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10219">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="restrictsignintopattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10221">RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10221">RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-which-accounts-can-be-used-as-microsoft-edge-primary-accounts"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10222">Einschränken, welche Konten als primäre Microsoft Edge-Konten verwendet werden können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10222">Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10223">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10223">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10224">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10224">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10225">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10225">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10226">Bestimmt, welche Konten als primäre Browserkonten in Microsoft Edge (das Konto, das während des Synchronisierungs-Zustimmungs-Stroms ausgewählt wurde) festgelegt werden können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10226">Determines which accounts can be set as browser primary accounts in Microsoft Edge (the account that is chosen during the Sync opt-in flow).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10227">Wenn ein Benutzer versucht, ein primäres Browserkonto mit einem Benutzernamen zu konfigurieren, der diesem Muster nicht entspricht, wird dies blockiert und erhält die entsprechende Fehlermeldung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10227">If a user tries to configure a browser primary account with a username that doesn't match this pattern, they are blocked and will get the appropriate error message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10228">Sie können diese Richtlinie so konfigurieren, dass mehrere Konten mit einem regulären Ausdruck im Perl-Stil für das Muster übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10228">You can configure this policy to match multiple accounts using a Perl style regular expression for the pattern.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10229">Beachten Sie, dass bei Musterübereinstimmungen die Groß-/Kleinschreibung beachtet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10229">Note that pattern matches are case sensitive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10230">Weitere Informationen über die Regeln für reguläre Ausdrücke, die verwendet werden, finden Sie unter https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10230">For more information about the regular expression rules that are used, refer to https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2133903.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10231">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder sie leer lassen, können Benutzer jedes Konto als primäres Browserkonto in Microsoft Edge festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10231">If you don't configure this policy or leave it blank, users can set any account as a browser primary account in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10232">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10232">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10233">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10233">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10234">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10234">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10235">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10235">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10236">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10236">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10237">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10237">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10238">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10238">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10239">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10239">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10240">GP eindeutiger Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10240">GP unique name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10241">GP-Name: Einschränken, welche Konten als primäre Microsoft Edge-Konten verwendet werden können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10241">GP name: Restrict which accounts can be used as Microsoft Edge primary accounts</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10242">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10242">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10243">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10243">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10244">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10244">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10245">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10245">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10246">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10246">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10247">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10247">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10248">Wertname: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10248">Value Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10249">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10249">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10250">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10250">Example value:</span></span>

```
".*@contoso.com"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10251">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10251">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10252">Einstellung Schlüsselname: RestrictSigninToPattern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10252">Preference Key Name: RestrictSigninToPattern</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10253">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10253">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>.*@contoso.com</string>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-10254">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10254">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="roamingprofilelocation"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10255">RoamingProfileLocation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10255">RoamingProfileLocation</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-roaming-profile-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10256">Festlegen des Server gespeicherten Profilverzeichnisses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10256">Set the roaming profile directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10257">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10257">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10258">Auf Windows seit 85 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10258">On Windows since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10259">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10259">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10260">Konfiguriert das Verzeichnis zum Aufbewahren der Server gespeicherten Kopie der Profile.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10260">Configures the directory to use to store the roaming copy of profiles.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10261">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge das bereitgestellte Verzeichnis, um eine Server gespeicherte Kopie der Profile zu sichern, sofern Sie die Richtlinie [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) aktiviert haben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10261">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the provided directory to store a roaming copy of the profiles, as long as you've also enabled the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10262">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird der in dieser Richtlinie gespeicherte Wert nicht verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10262">If you disable the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy or don't configure it, the value stored in this policy isn't used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10263">Eine Liste der Variablen, die Sie verwenden können, finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10263">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables you can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10264">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der Standardpfad für den Server gespeicherten Profile verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10264">If you don't configure this policy, the default roaming profile path is used.</span></span>

  ### <a name="roamingprofilesupportenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10285">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10285">RoamingProfileSupportEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10289">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10289">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10290">Aktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um Server gespeicherte Profile unter Windows zu verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10290">Enable this policy to use roaming profiles on Windows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10291">Die in Microsoft Edge-Profile (Favoriten und Einstellungen) gespeicherten Einstellungen werden auch in einer Datei gespeichert, die im Server gespeicherten Benutzerprofilordner gespeichert ist (oder der vom Administrator durch die [RoamingProfileLocation-](#roamingprofilelocation) Richtlinie angegebenen Position).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10291">The settings stored in Microsoft Edge profiles (favorites and preferences) are also saved to a file stored in the Roaming user profile folder (or the location specified by the administrator through the [RoamingProfileLocation](#roamingprofilelocation) policy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10292">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden nur die normalen lokalen Profile verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10292">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, only the regular local profiles are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10293">[SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) deaktiviert nur die Cloud-Synchronisierung und hat keine Auswirkungen auf diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10293">The [SyncDisabled](#syncdisabled) only disables cloud synchronization and has no impact on this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10294">Weitere Informationen zur Verwendung von Roaming-Benutzerprofilen finden Sie unter[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10294">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2150058) for more information on using roaming user profiles.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10304">GP-Name: Aktivieren der Verwendung von Roaming-Kopien für Microsoft Edge-Profildaten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10304">GP name: Enable using roaming copies for Microsoft Edge profile data</span></span>

  ### <a name="runallflashinallowmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10315">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10315">RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>

  #### <a name="extend-adobe-flash-content-setting-to-all-content-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10316">Erweitern der Einstellung für Adobe Flash-Inhalte auf alle Inhalte (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10316">Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-10317">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach der Microsoft Edge-Version 87 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10317">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 87.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10318">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10318">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10319">Unter Windows und macOS seit 77 bis 87</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10319">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 87</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10320">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10320">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10321">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nicht, da Flash nicht mehr von Microsoft Edge unterstützt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10321">This policy doesn't work because Flash is no longer supported by Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10322">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden alle in Websites, die so eingerichtet sind, dass sie Adobe Flash in den Inhaltseinstellungen zulassen – entweder vom Benutzer oder von einer Unternehmensrichtlinie – eingebetteten Adobe Flash-Inhalte ausgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10322">If you enable this policy, all Adobe Flash content embedded in websites that are set to allow Adobe Flash in the content settings -- either by the user or by enterprise policy -- will run.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10323">Dies umfasst Inhalte aus anderen Ursprüngen und/oder kleine Inhalte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10323">This includes content from other origins and/or small content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10324">Wenn Sie steuern möchten, welche Websites Adobe Flash ausführen können, lesen Sie die Spezifikationen in den [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls) und [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls)-Richtlinien.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10324">To control which websites are allowed to run Adobe Flash, see the specifications in the [DefaultPluginsSetting](#defaultpluginssetting), [PluginsAllowedForUrls](#pluginsallowedforurls), and [PluginsBlockedForUrls](#pluginsblockedforurls) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10325">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden Adobe Flash-Inhalte von anderen Ursprüngen (von Websites, die nicht in den drei erwähnten Richtlinien angegeben sind) oder kleine Inhalte möglicherweise blockiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10325">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, Adobe Flash content from other origins (from sites that aren't specified in the three policies mentioned immediately above) or small content might be blocked.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10327">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10327">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10328">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10328">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10329">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10329">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10334">Eindeutiger GP-Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10334">GP unique name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10335">GP-Name: Erweitern der Einstellung für Adobe Flash-Inhalte auf alle Inhalte (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10335">GP name: Extend Adobe Flash content setting to all content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10336">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10336">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10337">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10337">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10338">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10338">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10339">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10339">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10340">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10340">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10342">Wertname: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10342">Value Name: RunAllFlashInAllowMode</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10343">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10343">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-proceed-from-the-https-warning-page"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10350">Zulassen, dass Benutzer die HTTPS-Warnungsseite überschreiten können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10350">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10351">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10351">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10352">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10352">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10353">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10353">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10354">Microsoft Edge zeigt eine Warnseite an, wenn Benutzer Websites besuchen, die SSL-Fehler aufweisen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10354">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10355">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren (Standardeinstellung), können die Benutzer diese Warnseiten durch Klicken schließen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10355">If you enable or don't configure (default) this policy, users can click through these warning pages.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10356">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden die Benutzer daran gehindert, jegliche Warnseiten durch Klicken zu schließen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10356">If you disable this policy, users are blocked from clicking through any warning page.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10367">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10367">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
