  ### <a name="sslerroroverrideallowedfororigins"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10380">SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10380">SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-users-to-proceed-from-the-https-warning-page-for-specific-origins"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10381">Zulassen, dass Benutzer von der HTTPS-Warnseite für bestimmte Ursprünge fortfahren können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10381">Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page for specific origins</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10382">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10382">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10383">Unter Windows und macOS seit 90 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10383">On Windows and macOS since 90 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10384">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10384">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10385">Microsoft Edge zeigt eine Warnseite an, wenn Benutzer Websites besuchen, die SSL-Fehler aufweisen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10385">Microsoft Edge shows a warning page when users visit sites that have SSL errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10386">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, bewirkt diese Richtlinie nichts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10386">If you enable or don't configure the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy, this policy does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10387">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) deaktivieren, können Sie durch Konfigurieren dieser Richtlinie eine Liste von Ursprungsmustern für Websites konfigurieren, auf denen Benutzer weiterhin durch die SSL-Fehlerseiten klicken können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10387">If you disable the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy, configuring this policy lets you configure a list of origin patterns for sites where users can continue to click through SSL error pages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10388">Benutzer können bei Ursprüngen, die nicht in dieser Liste enthalten sind, nicht durch SSL-Fehlerseiten klicken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10388">Users can't click through SSL error pages on origins that are not on this list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10389">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, gilt die Richtlinie [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) für alle Websites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10389">If you don't configure this policy, the [SSLErrorOverrideAllowed](#sslerroroverrideallowed) policy applies for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10390">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen Ursprungsmustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10390">For detailed information about valid origin patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10391">\* ist kein akzeptierter Wert für diese Richtlinie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10391">\* is not an accepted value for this policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10392">Diese Richtlinie stimmt nur mit dem Ursprung überein, sodass alle Pfade oder Abfragen im URL-Muster ignoriert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10392">This policy only matches based on origin, so any path or query in the URL pattern is ignored.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10393">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10393">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10394">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10394">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10395">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10395">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10396">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10396">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10397">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10397">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10398">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10398">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10399">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10399">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10400">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10400">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10401">GP eindeutiger Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10401">GP unique name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10402">GP-Name: Zulassen, dass Benutzer von der HTTPS-Warnseite für bestimmte Ursprünge fortfahren können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10402">GP name: Allow users to proceed from the HTTPS warning page for specific origins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10403">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10403">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10404">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10404">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10405">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10405">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10406">Windows Registry-Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10406">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10407">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10407">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10408">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10408">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10409">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10409">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10410">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10410">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10411">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10411">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins\1 = "https://www.example.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins\2 = "[*.]example.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10412">Mac-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10412">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10413">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10413">Preference Key Name: SSLErrorOverrideAllowedForOrigins</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10414">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10414">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.example.com</string>
  <string>[*.]example.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="sslversionmin"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10416">SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10416">SSLVersionMin</span></span>

  #### <a name="minimum-tls-version-enabled-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10417">Minimale TLS-Version aktiviert (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10417">Minimum TLS version enabled (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-10418">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10418">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10419">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10419">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10420">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10420">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10421">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10421">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10422">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10422">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10423">Die Unterstützung für die Unterdrückung der TLS 1.0/1.1-Warnung wird ab Version 91 (ca. Mai 2021) aus Microsoft Edge entfernt und diese Richtlinie wird dann nicht mehr funktionieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10423">Support for suppressing the TLS 1.0/1.1 warning will be removed from Microsoft Edge starting in version 91 (around May 2021) and this policy will stop working then.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10424">Bestimmt die mindestens unterstützte Version von TLS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10424">Sets the minimum supported version of TLS.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10425">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, zeigt Microsoft Edge einen Fehler für TLS 1.0 und TLS 1.1 an, der Benutzer kann ihn jedoch umgehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10425">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will show an error for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1, but the user will be able to bypass it.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10426">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie festlegen, verwendet Microsoft Edge keine SSL/TLS-Versionen, die niedriger als die angegebene Version sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10426">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge won't use any version of SSL/TLS lower than the specified version.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10427">Jeder nicht erkannte Wert wird ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10427">Any unrecognized value is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10428">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10428">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-10429">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10429">TLSv1 (tls1) = TLS 1.0</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-10430">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10430">TLSv1.1 (tls1.1) = TLS 1.1</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-10431">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10431">TLSv1.2 (tls1.2) = TLS 1.2</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10432">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10432">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10433">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10433">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10434">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10434">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10435">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10435">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10436">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10436">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10437">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10437">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10438">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10438">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10439">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10439">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10440">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10440">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10441">GP eindeutiger Name: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10441">GP unique name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10442">GP-Name: Minimale TLS-Version aktiviert (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10442">GP name: Minimum TLS version enabled (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10443">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10443">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10444">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10444">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10445">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10445">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10446">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10446">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10447">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10447">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10448">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10448">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10449">Wertname: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10449">Value Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10450">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10450">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10451">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10451">Example value:</span></span>

```
"tls1"
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10453">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SSLVersionMin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10453">Preference Key Name: SSLVersionMin</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10454">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10454">Example value:</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10458">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10458">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10459">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10459">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10460">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10460">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10461">Wenn diese Richtlinie aktiviert ist, werden die angegebenen Cookies beim Schließen des Browsers nicht gelöscht werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10461">When this policy is enabled, the specified set of cookies is exempt from deletion when the browser closes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10462">Diese Richtlinie ist nur wirksam, wenn:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10462">This policy is only effective when:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="09666-10463">Der Umschalter "Cookies und andere Site-Daten" unter "Einstellungen"/"Datenschutz und Dienste"/"Browserdaten beim Schließen löschen" konfiguriert wurde, oder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10463">The 'Cookies and other site data' toggle is configured in Settings/Privacy and services/Clear browsing data on close or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="09666-10464">Die Richtlinie [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) ist aktiviert oder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10464">The policy [ClearBrowsingDataOnExit](#clearbrowsingdataonexit) is enabled or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="09666-10465">Die Richtlinie [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) auf "Cookies für die Dauer der Sitzung beibehalten" festgelegt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10465">The policy [DefaultCookiesSetting](#defaultcookiessetting) is set to 'Keep cookies for the duration of the session'.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10466">Sie können basierend auf URL-Mustern eine Liste von Websites definieren, deren Cookies über Sitzungen hinweg beibehalten werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10466">You can define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that will have their cookies preserved across sessions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10467">Hinweis: Benutzer können die Cookie-Site-Liste weiterhin bearbeiten, um URLs hinzuzufügen oder zu entfernen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10467">Note: Users can still edit the cookie site list to add or remove URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10468">Sie können jedoch keine URLs entfernen, die von einem Administrator hinzugefügt wurden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10468">However, they can't remove URLs that have been added by an Admin.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10469">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird die Liste der Cookies beim Schließen des Browsers nicht gelöscht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10469">If you enable this policy, the list of cookies won't be cleared when the browser closes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10470">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10470">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the user's personal configuration is used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10471">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10471">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10472">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10472">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10473">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10473">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10474">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10474">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10475">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10475">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10476">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10476">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10477">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10477">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10478">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10478">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10479">Eindeutiger Name der GP: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10479">GP unique name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10480">GP-Name: Speichern Sie Cookies, wenn Microsoft Edge geschlossen wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10480">GP name: Save cookies when Microsoft Edge closes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10481">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10481">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10482">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10482">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10483">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10483">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10484">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10484">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10485">Pfad (obligatorisch): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10485">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10486">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10486">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10487">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10487">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10488">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10488">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10489">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10489">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SaveCookiesOnExit\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10490">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10490">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10491">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: SaveCookiesOnExit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10491">Preference Key Name: SaveCookiesOnExit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10492">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10492">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="savingbrowserhistorydisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10494">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10494">SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-saving-browser-history"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10495">Speichern des Browserverlaufs deaktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10495">Disable saving browser history</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10496">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10496">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10497">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10497">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10498">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10498">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10499">Deaktiviert den Browserverlauf und hindert Benutzer daran, diese Einstellung zu ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10499">Disables saving browser history and prevents users from changing this setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10500">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird der Browserverlauf nicht gespeichert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10500">If you enable this policy, browsing history isn't saved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10501">Dadurch wird auch die Synchronisierung von Registerkarten deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10501">This also disables tab syncing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10502">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird der Browserverlauf gespeichert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10502">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, browsing history is saved.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10503">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10503">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10504">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10504">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10505">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10505">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10506">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10506">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10507">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10507">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10508">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10508">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10509">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10509">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10510">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10510">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10511">GP eindeutiger Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10511">GP unique name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10512">Speichern des Browserverlaufs deaktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10512">GP name: Disable saving browser history</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10513">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10513">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10514">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10514">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10515">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10515">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10516">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10516">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10517">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10517">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10518">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10518">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10519">Wertname: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10519">Value Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10520">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10520">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10521">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10521">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10522">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10522">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10523">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10523">Preference Key Name: SavingBrowserHistoryDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10524">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10524">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="screencaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10526">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10526">ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-deny-screen-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10527">Bildschirmaufnahme zulassen oder verweigern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10527">Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10528">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10528">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10529">Auf Windows und macOS ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10529">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10530">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10530">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10531">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, kann eine Webseite Bildschirmfreigabe-APIs (z.B. getDisplayMedia() oder die API für die Desktopaufnahme-Erweiterung) für eine Bildschirmaufnahme verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10531">If you enable this policy, or don't configure this policy, a web page can use screen-share APIs (for example, getDisplayMedia() or the Desktop Capture extension API) for a screen capture.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-10532">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, treten beim Aufrufen von Screen-Share-APIs Fehler auf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10532">If you disable this policy, calls to screen-share APIs will fail.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10533">Wenn Sie beispielsweise eine webbasierte Onlinebesprechung verwenden, funktioniert die Video- oder Bildschirmfreigabe nicht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10533">For example, if you're using a web-based online meeting, video or screen sharing will not work.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10534">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10534">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10535">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10535">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10536">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10536">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10537">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10537">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10538">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10538">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10539">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10539">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10540">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10540">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10541">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10541">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10542">GP eindeutiger Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10542">GP unique name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10543">GP-Name: Bildschirmaufnahme zulassen oder verweigern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10543">GP name: Allow or deny screen capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10544">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10544">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10545">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10545">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10546">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10546">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10547">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10547">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10548">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10548">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10549">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10549">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10550">Wertname: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10550">Value Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10551">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10551">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10552">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10552">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10553">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10553">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10554">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10554">Preference Key Name: ScreenCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10555">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10555">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-10556">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10556">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="scrolltotextfragmentenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10557">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10557">ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-scrolling-to-text-specified-in-url-fragments"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10558">Aktivieren des Scrollens zu Text, der in URL-Fragmenten angegeben ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10558">Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10559">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10559">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10560">Auf Windows und macOS ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10560">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10561">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10561">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10562">Mithilfe dieses Features können Links- und Adressleisten-URL-Navigationen auf einen bestimmten Text auf einer Webseite abzielen, der nach dem Laden der Webseite durch Scrollen erreicht wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10562">This feature lets hyperlink and address bar URL navigations target specific text on a web page, which will be scrolled to after the web page finishes loading.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10563">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird der Webseiten-Bildlauf zu bestimmten Textfragmenten über eine URL aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10563">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10564">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird der Webseiten-Bildlauf zu bestimmten Textfragmenten über eine URL deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10564">If you disable this policy, web page scrolling to specific text fragments via a URL will be disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10565">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10565">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10566">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10566">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10567">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10567">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10568">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10568">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10569">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10569">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10570">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10570">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10571">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10571">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10572">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10572">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10573">GP eindeutiger Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10573">GP unique name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10574">GP-Name: Aktivieren des Scrollens zu Text, der in URL-Fragmenten angegeben ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10574">GP name: Enable scrolling to text specified in URL fragments</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10575">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10575">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10576">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10576">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10577">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10577">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10578">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10578">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10579">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10579">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10580">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10580">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10581">Wertname: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10581">Value Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10582">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10582">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10583">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10583">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10584">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10584">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10585">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10585">Preference Key Name: ScrollToTextFragmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10586">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10586">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="searchsuggestenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10588">SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10588">SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-search-suggestions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10589">Suchvorschläge zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10589">Enable search suggestions</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10590">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10590">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10591">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10591">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10592">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10592">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10593">Aktiviert Websuche-Vorschläge in der Adressleiste von Microsoft Edge und der Liste "Auto-Vorschläge" und hindert Benutzer daran, diese Richtlinie zu ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10593">Enables web search suggestions in Microsoft Edge's Address Bar and Auto-Suggest List and prevents users from changing this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10594">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden Vorschläge für Websuchen verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10594">If you enable this policy, web search suggestions are used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10595">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden Vorschläge für die Websuche nie verwendet, doch werden die Vorschläge für den lokalen Verlauf und lokale Favoriten weiterhin angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10595">If you disable this policy, web search suggestions are never used, however local history and local favorites suggestions still appear.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10596">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden weder die eingegebenen Zeichen noch die besuchten URLs zur Telemetrie an Microsoft hinzugefügt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10596">If you disable this policy, neither the typed characters, nor the URLs visited will be included in telemetry to Microsoft.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10597">Wenn diese Richtlinie nicht festgelegt wurde, sind Suchvorschläge aktiviert, aber der Benutzer kann dies ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10597">If this policy is left not set, search suggestions are enabled but the user can change that.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10598">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10598">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10599">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10599">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10600">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10600">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10601">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10601">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10602">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10602">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10603">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10603">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10604">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10604">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10605">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10605">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10606">GP eindeutiger Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10606">GP unique name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10607">GP-Name: Suchvorschläge zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10607">GP name: Enable search suggestions</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10608">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10608">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10609">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10609">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10610">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10610">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10611">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10611">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10612">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10612">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10613">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10613">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10614">Wertname: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10614">Value Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10615">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10615">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10616">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10616">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10617">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10617">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10618">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SearchSuggestEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10618">Preference Key Name: SearchSuggestEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10619">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10619">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="securitykeypermitattestation"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10621">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10621">SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>

  #### <a name="websites-or-domains-that-dont-need-permission-to-use-direct-security-key-attestation"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10622">Websites oder Domänen, für die keine Berechtigung zur Verwendung der direkten Sicherheitsschlüssel-Bestätigung erforderlich ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10622">Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10623">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10623">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10624">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10624">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10625">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10625">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10626">Gibt Websites und Domänen an, für die keine explizite Benutzerberechtigung erforderlich ist, wenn Nachweiszertifikate von Sicherheitsschlüsseln angefordert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10626">Specifies websites and domains that don't need explicit user permission when attestation certificates from security keys are requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10627">Darüber hinaus wird ein Signal an den Sicherheitsschlüssel gesendet, das angibt, dass die individuelle Bestätigung verwendet werden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10627">Additionally, a signal is sent to the security key indicating that it can use individual attestation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10628">Ohne dies werden die Benutzer jedes Mal angefragt, wenn eine Website den Nachweis über Sicherheitsschlüssel anfordert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10628">Without this, users are prompted each time a site requests attestation of security keys.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10629">Websites (wie https://contoso.com/some/path) stimmen nur als U2F appIDs überein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10629">Sites (like https://contoso.com/some/path) only match as U2F appIDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10630">Domänen (z.B. contoso.com) stimmen nur als webauthn-RP-IDs überein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10630">Domains (like contoso.com) only match as webauthn RP IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10631">Wenn Sie sowohl U2F als auch webauthn-APIs für eine bestimmte Website abdecken möchten, müssen Sie sowohl die appID URL als auch die Domäne angeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10631">To cover both U2F and webauthn APIs for a given site, you need to list both the appID URL and domain.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10632">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10632">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10633">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10633">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10634">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10634">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10635">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10635">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10636">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10636">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10637">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10637">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10638">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10638">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10639">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10639">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10640">GP eindeutiger Name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10640">GP unique name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10641">GP-Name: Websites oder Domänen, für die keine Berechtigung zur Verwendung der direkten Sicherheitsschlüssel-Bestätigung erforderlich ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10641">GP name: Websites or domains that don't need permission to use direct Security Key attestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10642">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10642">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10643">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10643">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10644">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10644">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10645">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10645">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10646">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10646">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10647">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10647">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10648">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10648">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10649">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10649">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10650">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10650">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SecurityKeyPermitAttestation\1 = "https://contoso.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10651">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10651">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10652">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10652">Preference Key Name: SecurityKeyPermitAttestation</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10653">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10653">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://contoso.com</string>
</array>
```

  #### <a name="send-all-intranet-sites-to-internet-explorer"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10656">Senden aller Intranet-Seiten an Internet Explorer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10656">Send all intranet sites to Internet Explorer</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10657">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10657">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10658">Auf Windows ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10658">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10659">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10659">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10660">Informationen zum Konfigurieren der optimalen Benutzeroberfläche für den Internet Explorer-Modus finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10660">For guidance about configuring the optimal experience for Internet Explorer mode see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2094210)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10661">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10661">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10662">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10662">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10663">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10663">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10664">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10664">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="sendsiteinfotoimproveservices"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10681">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10681">SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>

  #### <a name="send-site-information-to-improve-microsoft-services-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10682">Senden von Website-Informationen, um Microsoft-Dienste zu verbessern (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10682">Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-10683">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach Microsoft Edge 88 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10683">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 88.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10684">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10684">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10685">Unter Windows und macOS seit 77 bis 88</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10685">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 88</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10686">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10686">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10687">Diese Richtlinie wird nicht mehr unterstützt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10687">This policy is no longer supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10688">Sie wird durch [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (für Windows 7, Windows 8 und macOS) und „Telemetrie zulassen“ unter Windows 10 ersetzt ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10688">It is replaced by [DiagnosticData](#diagnosticdata) (for Windows 7, Windows 8, and macOS) and Allow Telemetry on Win 10 ([https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10689">Diese Richtlinie ermöglicht das Senden von Informationen über die in Microsoft Edge besuchten Websites an Microsoft, um Dienste wie die Suche zu verbessern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10689">This policy enables sending info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft to improve services like search.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10690">Aktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um Infos zu den Websites, die in Microsoft Edge besucht wurden, an Microsoft zu senden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10690">Enable this policy to send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10691">Deaktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um keine Infos zu den Websites, die in Microsoft Edge besucht wurden, an Microsoft zu senden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10691">Disable this policy to not send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge to Microsoft.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10692">In beiden Fällen können Benutzer die Einstellung weder ändern noch außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10692">In both cases, users can't change or override the setting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10693">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie unter Windows 10 nicht konfigurieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge standardmäßig die Windows-Diagnosedateneinstellung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10693">On Windows 10, if you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the Windows diagnostic data setting.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10694">Wenn diese Richtlinie aktiviert ist, sendet Microsoft Edge nur Informationen zu Websites, die in Microsoft Edge besucht wurden, wenn die Windows-Diagnosedaten Einstellung auf "voll" festgelegt ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10694">If this policy is enabled Microsoft Edge will only send info about websites visited in Microsoft Edge if the Windows Diagnostic data setting is set to Full.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10695">Wenn diese Richtlinie deaktiviert ist, werden von Microsoft Edge keine Informationen zu besuchten Websites gesendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10695">If this policy is disabled Microsoft Edge will not send info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10696">Weitere Informationen zu den Einstellungen für Windows-Diagnosedaten finden Sie unter: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10696">Learn more about Windows Diagnostic data settings: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2099569)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10697">Unter Windows 7, Windows 8 und MacOS steuert diese Richtlinie das Senden von Informationen zu besuchten Websites.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10697">On Windows 7, windows 8, and macOS this policy controls sending info about websites visited.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10698">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge standardmäßig die Präferenz des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10698">If you don't configure this policy, Microsoft Edge will default to the user's preference.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10699">Um diese Richtlinie zu aktivieren, muss [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) auf Aktiviert gesetzt sein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10699">To enable this policy, [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) must be set to Enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10700">Wenn [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) oder [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) nicht konfiguriert oder deaktiviert ist, werden diese Daten nicht an Microsoft gesendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10700">If [SendSiteInfoToImproveServices](#sendsiteinfotoimproveservices) or [MetricsReportingEnabled](#metricsreportingenabled) is Not Configured or Disabled, this data will not be sent to Microsoft.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10701">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10701">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10702">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10702">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10703">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10703">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10704">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10704">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10705">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10705">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10706">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10706">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10707">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10707">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10708">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10708">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10709">GP eindeutiger Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10709">GP unique name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10710">GP-Name: Senden von Website-Informationen, um Microsoft-Dienste zu verbessern (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10710">GP name: Send site information to improve Microsoft services (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10711">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10711">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10712">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10712">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10713">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10713">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10714">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10714">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10715">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10715">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10716">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10716">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10717">Wertname: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10717">Value Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10718">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10718">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10719">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10719">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10720">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10720">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10721">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10721">Preference Key Name: SendSiteInfoToImproveServices</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10722">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10722">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```
