  ### <a name="sensorsallowedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10724">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10724">SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-access-to-sensors-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10725">Zugriff auf Sensoren auf bestimmten Websites zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10725">Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10726">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10726">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10727">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10727">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10728">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10728">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10729">Definieren Sie eine auf URL-Mustern basierende Liste von Websites, die auf Sensoren wie Bewegungs- und Lichtsensoren zugreifen und diese verwenden dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10729">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can access and use sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10730">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10730">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10731">Bei URL-Mustern, die dieser Richtlinie nicht entsprechen, wird die folgende Prioritätsreihenfolge verwendet: die [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls)-Richtlinie (wenn es eine Übereinstimmung gibt), die [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönlichen Einstellungen des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10731">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10732">Die in dieser Richtlinie definierten URL-Muster dürfen nicht mit jenen in der [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls)-Richtlinie angegebenen in Konflikt stehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10732">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsBlockedForUrls](#sensorsblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10733">Sie können eine URL nicht sowohl zulassen als auch blockieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10733">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10734">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10734">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10735">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10735">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10736">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10736">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10737">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10737">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10738">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10738">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10739">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10739">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10740">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10740">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10741">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10741">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10742">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10742">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10743">Eindeutiger GP-Name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10743">GP unique name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10744">GP-Name: Zugriff auf Sensoren auf bestimmten Websites zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10744">GP name: Allow access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10745">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10745">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10746">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10746">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10747">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10747">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10748">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10748">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10749">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10749">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10750">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10750">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10751">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10751">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10752">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10752">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10753">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10753">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsAllowedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10754">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10754">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10755">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10755">Preference Key Name: SensorsAllowedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10756">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10756">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="sensorsblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10758">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10758">SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-sensors-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10759">Zugriff auf Sensoren auf bestimmten Websites blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10759">Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10760">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10760">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10761">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10761">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10762">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10762">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10763">Definieren Sie eine auf URL-Mustern basierende Liste von Websites, die nicht auf Sensoren wie Bewegungs- und Lichtsensoren zugreifen dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10763">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't access sensors such as motion and light sensors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10764">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10764">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10765">Bei URL-Mustern, die dieser Richtlinie nicht entsprechen, wird die folgende Prioritätsreihenfolge verwendet: die [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls)-Richtlinie (wenn es eine Übereinstimmung gibt), die [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönlichen Einstellungen des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10765">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSensorsSetting](#defaultsensorssetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10766">Die in dieser Richtlinie definierten URL-Muster dürfen nicht mit jenen in der [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls)-Richtlinie angegebenen in Konflikt stehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10766">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SensorsAllowedForUrls](#sensorsallowedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10767">Sie können eine URL nicht sowohl zulassen als auch blockieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10767">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10768">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10768">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10769">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10769">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10770">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10770">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10771">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10771">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10772">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10772">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10773">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10773">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10774">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10774">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10775">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10775">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10776">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10776">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10777">Eindeutiger GP-Name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10777">GP unique name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10778">GP-Name: Zugriff auf Sensoren auf bestimmten Websites blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10778">GP name: Block access to sensors on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10779">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10779">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10780">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10780">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10781">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10781">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10782">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10782">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10783">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10783">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10784">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10784">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10785">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10785">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10786">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10786">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10787">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10787">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SensorsBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10788">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10788">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10789">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10789">Preference Key Name: SensorsBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10790">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10790">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="serialaskforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10792">SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10792">SerialAskForUrls</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10795">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10795">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10797">Definieren Sie eine auf URL-Mustern basierende Liste von Websites, die vom Benutzer Zugriff auf einen seriellen Anschluss anfordern dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10797">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can ask the user for access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10798">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10798">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10799">Bei URL-Mustern, die dieser Richtlinie nicht entsprechen, wird die folgende Prioritätsreihenfolge verwendet: die [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls)-Richtlinie (wenn es eine Übereinstimmung gibt), die [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönlichen Einstellungen des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10799">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10800">Die in dieser Richtlinie definierten URL-Muster dürfen nicht mit jenen in der [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls)-Richtlinie angegebenen in Konflikt stehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10800">The URL patterns defined in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialBlockedForUrls](#serialblockedforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10801">Sie können eine URL nicht sowohl zulassen als auch blockieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10801">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10802">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10802">For detailed information about valid url patterns, please see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10803">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10803">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10805">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10805">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10806">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10806">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10808">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10808">List of strings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10810">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10810">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10811">Eindeutiger GP-Name: SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10811">GP unique name: SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10812">GP-Name: Die Serial-API auf bestimmten Websites zulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10812">GP name: Allow the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10813">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10813">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10814">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10814">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10815">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10815">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10816">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10816">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10817">Pfade (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10817">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10818">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10818">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10819">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10819">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10820">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10820">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10821">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10821">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialAskForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  ### <a name="serialblockedforurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10826">SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10826">SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-the-serial-api-on-specific-sites"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10827">Die Serial-API auf bestimmten Websites blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10827">Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10828">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10828">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10829">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10829">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10830">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10830">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10831">Definieren Sie eine auf URL-Mustern basierende Liste von Websites, die vom Benutzer keinen Zugriff auf einen seriellen Anschluss anfordern dürfen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10831">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that can't ask the user to grant them access to a serial port.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10832">Falls Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird der globale Standardwert aus der [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönliche Konfiguration des Benutzers für alle Websites verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10832">If you don't configure this policy, the global default value from the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set) or the user's personal configuration is used for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10833">Bei URL-Mustern, die dieser Richtlinie nicht entsprechen, wird die folgende Prioritätsreihenfolge verwendet: die [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls)-Richtlinie (wenn es eine Übereinstimmung gibt), die [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting)-Richtlinie (sofern festgelegt) oder die persönlichen Einstellungen des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10833">For URL patterns that don't match this policy, the following order of precedence is used: The [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy (if there is a match), the [DefaultSerialGuardSetting](#defaultserialguardsetting) policy (if set), or the user's personal settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10834">Die URL-Muster in dieser Richtlinie dürfen nicht mit jenen in der [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls)-Richtlinie angegebenen in Konflikt stehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10834">The URL patterns in this policy can't conflict with those configured in the [SerialAskForUrls](#serialaskforurls) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10835">Sie können eine URL nicht sowohl zulassen als auch blockieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10835">You can't allow and block a URL.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10836">Ausführliche Informationen zu gültigen URL-Mustern finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10836">For detailed information about valid URL patterns, see [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10837">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10837">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10838">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10838">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10839">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10839">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10840">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10840">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10841">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10841">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10842">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10842">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10843">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10843">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10844">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10844">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10845">Eindeutiger GP-Name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10845">GP unique name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10846">GP-Name: Die Serial-API auf bestimmten Websites blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10846">GP name: Block the Serial API on specific sites</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10847">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10847">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10848">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10848">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10849">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10849">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10850">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10850">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10851">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10851">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10852">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10852">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10853">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10853">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10854">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10854">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10855">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10855">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SerialBlockedForUrls\2 = "[*.]contoso.edu"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10856">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10856">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10857">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SerialBlockedForUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10857">Preference Key Name: SerialBlockedForUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10858">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10858">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>[*.]contoso.edu</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="showmicrosoftrewards"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10860">ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10860">ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-microsoft-rewards-experiences"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10861">Microsoft Rewards-Erfahrungen anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10861">Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10862">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10862">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10863">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10863">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10864">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10864">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10865">Microsoft Rewards Benutzererfahrungen und Benachrichtigungen anzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10865">Show Microsoft Rewards experience and notifications.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-10866">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10866">If you enable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10867">Benutzer von Microsoft-Konten (ausgenommen Azure AD-Konten) in Suchen-und-Punkten-Märkten werden die Microsoft Rewards-Umgebung in ihrem Microsoft Edge-Benutzerprofil sehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10867">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10868">Die Einstellung zur Aktivierung von Microsoft Rewards in den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen wird aktiviert und eingeschaltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10868">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10869">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10869">If you disable this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10870">Benutzer von Microsoft-Konten (ausgenommen Azure AD-Konten) in Suchen-und-Punkten-Märkten werden die Microsoft Rewards-Umgebung nicht in ihrem Microsoft Edge-Benutzerprofil sehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10870">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will not see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10871">Die Einstellung zur Aktivierung von Microsoft Rewards in den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen wird deaktiviert und ausgeschaltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10871">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be disabled and toggled off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10872">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10872">If you don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10873">Benutzer von Microsoft-Konten (ausgenommen Azure AD-Konten) in Suchen-und-Punkten-Märkten werden die Microsoft Rewards-Umgebung in ihrem Microsoft Edge-Benutzerprofil sehen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10873">Microsoft account users (excludes Azure AD accounts) in search and earn markets will see the Microsoft Rewards experience in their Microsoft Edge user profile.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10874">Die Einstellung zur Aktivierung von Microsoft Rewards in den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen wird aktiviert und eingeschaltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10874">The setting to enable Microsoft Rewards in Microsoft Edge settings will be enabled and toggled on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10875">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10875">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10876">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10876">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10877">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10877">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10878">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10878">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10880">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10880">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10881">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10881">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10882">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10882">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10883">Eindeutiger GP-Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10883">GP unique name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10884">GP-Name: Microsoft Rewards-Umgebung anzeigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10884">GP name: Show Microsoft Rewards experiences</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10885">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10885">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10886">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10886">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10887">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10887">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10888">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10888">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10889">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10889">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10890">Pfad (empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10890">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10891">Wertname: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10891">Value Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10892">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10892">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10893">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10893">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10894">Mac-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10894">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10895">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10895">Preference Key Name: ShowMicrosoftRewards</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10896">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10896">Example value:</span></span>

``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="showofficeshortcutinfavoritesbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10898">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10898">ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>

  #### <a name="show-microsoft-office-shortcut-in-favorites-bar-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10899">Microsoft Office-Verknüpfung auf der Favoritenleiste anzeigen (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10899">Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-10900">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10900">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10901">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10901">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10902">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10902">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10903">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10903">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10904">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10904">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10905">Diese Richtlinie hat aufgrund veränderter betrieblicher Anforderungen nicht erwartungsgemäß funktioniert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10905">This policy didn't work as expected due to changes in operational requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10906">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10906">Therefore it's deprecated and should not be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10907">Gibt an, ob eine Verknüpfung mit Office.com in die Favoritenleiste einbezogen werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10907">Specifies whether to include a shortcut to Office.com in the favorites bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-10908">Benutzer, die bei Microsoft Edge angemeldet sind, gelangen durch diese Verknüpfung zu ihren Microsoft Office Apps und Dokumenten. Wenn diese Richtlinie aktiviert oder nicht konfiguriert ist, können Benutzer auswählen, ob die Verknüpfung angezeigt werden soll, indem sie die Umschaltfläche im Kontextmenü der Favoritenleiste ändern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10908">For users signed into Microsoft Edge the shortcut takes users to their Microsoft Office apps and docs. If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can choose whether to see the shortcut by changing the toggle in the favorites bar context menu.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-10909">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird die Verknüpfung nicht angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10909">If you disable this policy, the shortcut isn't shown.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10910">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10910">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10911">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10911">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10912">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10912">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10913">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10913">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10914">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10914">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10915">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10915">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10916">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10916">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10917">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10917">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10918">GP eindeutiger Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10918">GP unique name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10919">GP-Name: Microsoft Office-Verknüpfung auf der Favoritenleiste anzeigen (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10919">GP name: Show Microsoft Office shortcut in favorites bar (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10920">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10920">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10921">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10921">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10922">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10922">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10923">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10923">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10924">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10924">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10925">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10925">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10926">Wertname: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10926">Value Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10927">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10927">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10928">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10928">Example value:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10930">Einstellung Schlüsselname: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10930">Preference Key Name: ShowOfficeShortcutInFavoritesBar</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10931">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10931">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="showrecommendationsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10933">ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10933">ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-recommendations-and-promotional-notifications-from-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10934">Empfehlungen und Werbebenachrichtigungen von Microsoft Edge zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10934">Allow recommendations and promotional notifications from Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10935">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10935">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10936">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 89 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10936">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10937">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10937">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10938">Mit dieser Richtlinieneinstellung können Sie festlegen, ob Mitarbeiter Empfehlungen und Benachrichtigungen zur produktinternen Unterstützung von Microsoft Edge erhalten sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10938">This policy setting lets you decide whether employees should receive recommendations and in-product assistance notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10939">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, erhalten Mitarbeiter Empfehlungen/Benachrichtigungen von Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10939">If you enable or don't configure this setting, employees receive recommendations / notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10940">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren, werden Mitarbeiter keine Empfehlungen/Benachrichtigungen von Microsoft Edge erhalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10940">If you disable this setting, employees will not receive any recommendations / notifications from Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10942">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10942">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10943">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10943">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10944">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10944">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10945">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10945">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10946">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10946">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10947">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10947">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10948">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10948">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10949">Eindeutiger GP-Name: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10949">GP unique name: ShowRecommendationsEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="signedhttpexchangeenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10964">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10964">SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-signed-http-exchange-sxg-support"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10965">Unterstützung für Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10965">Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10966">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10966">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10967">Auf Windows und macOS ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10967">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10968">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10968">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-10969">Unterstützung für Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10969">Enable support for Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10970">Wenn diese Richtlinie nicht festgelegt oder aktiviert ist, akzeptiert Microsoft Edge Webinhalte, die als signierter HTTP-Austausch angeboten werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10970">If this policy isn't set or enabled, Microsoft Edge will accept web contents served as Signed HTTP Exchanges.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-10971">Wenn diese Richtlinie auf deaktiviert festgelegt ist, können signierte HTTP-Austausche nicht geladen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10971">If this policy is set to disabled, Signed HTTP Exchanges can't be loaded.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10972">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10972">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10973">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10973">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10974">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10974">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10975">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10975">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10976">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10976">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10977">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10977">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10978">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10978">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10979">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10979">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10980">GP eindeutiger Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10980">GP unique name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10981">GP-Name: Unterstützung für Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10981">GP name: Enable Signed HTTP Exchange (SXG) support</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10982">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10982">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10983">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10983">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10984">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10984">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10985">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10985">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10986">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10986">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10987">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10987">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10988">Wertname: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10988">Value Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10989">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10989">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10990">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10990">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10991">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10991">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10992">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10992">Preference Key Name: SignedHTTPExchangeEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10993">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10993">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="siteperprocess"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10995">SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10995">SitePerProcess</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-site-isolation-for-every-site"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10996">Aktivieren der Website-Isolation für alle Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10996">Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10997">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10997">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-10998">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10998">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-10999">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-10999">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11000">Die "SitePerProcess"-Richtlinie kann verwendet werden, um zu verhindern, dass Benutzer das Standardverhalten für das Isolieren aller Websites deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11000">The 'SitePerProcess' policy can be used to prevent users from opting out of the default behavior of isolating all sites.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11001">Beachten Sie, dass Sie auch die [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins)-Richtlinie verwenden können, um zusätzliche, feiner definierte Ursprünge zu isolieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11001">Note that you can also use the [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policy to isolate additional, finer-grained origins.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11002">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können die Benutzer das Standardverhalten nicht deaktivieren, in dem jede Website in Ihrem eigenen Prozess ausgeführt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11002">If you enable this policy, users can't opt out of the default behavior where each site runs in its own process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11003">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer die Website-Isolation deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11003">If you disable or don't configure this policy, a user can opt out of site isolation.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11004">(z.B. mithilfe des Eintrags "Website-Isolation deaktivieren" in edge://flags.) Wenn Sie die Richtlinie deaktivieren oder die Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird die Website-Isolation nicht deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11004">(For example, by using "Disable site isolation" entry in edge://flags.)  Disabling the policy or not configuring the policy doesn't turn off Site Isolation.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11005">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11005">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11006">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11006">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11007">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11007">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11008">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11008">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11009">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11009">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11010">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11010">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11011">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11011">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11012">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11012">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11013">GP eindeutiger Name: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11013">GP unique name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11014">GP-Name: Aktivieren der Website-Isolation für alle Websites</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11014">GP name: Enable site isolation for every site</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11015">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11015">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11016">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11016">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11017">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11017">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11018">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11018">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11019">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11019">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11020">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11020">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11021">Wertname: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11021">Value Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11022">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11022">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11023">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11023">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11024">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11024">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11025">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SitePerProcess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11025">Preference Key Name: SitePerProcess</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11026">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11026">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="smartactionsblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11028">SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11028">SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-smart-actions-for-a-list-of-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11029">Blockieren intelligenter Aktionen für eine Liste von Diensten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11029">Block smart actions for a list of services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11030">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11030">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11031">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 89 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11031">On Windows and macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11032">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11032">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11033">Listen Sie bestimmte Dienste auf, z. B. PDFs, die keine intelligenten Aktionen anzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11033">List specific services, such as PDFs, that don't show smart actions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11034">(Intelligente Aktionen sind Aktionen wie „definieren“, die in Voll- und Minikontextmenüs in Microsoft Edge verfügbar sind.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11034">(Smart actions are actions like "define" which are available in full and mini context menus in Microsoft Edge.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11035">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie aktivieren:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11035">If you enable the policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11036">Die intelligente Aktion in Mini- und Vollkontextmenüs wird für alle Profile für Dienste deaktiviert, die der angegebenen Liste entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11036">The smart action in the mini and full context menu will be disabled for all profiles for services that match the given list.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11037">Benutzern wird die intelligente Aktion in Mini- und Vollkontextmenüs für die Textauswahl für Dienste nicht angezeigt, die der angegebenen Liste entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11037">Users will not see the smart action in the mini and full context menu on text selection for services that match the given list.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11038">In den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen wird die intelligente Aktion in Mini- und Vollkontextmenüs für Dienste deaktiviert, die der angegebenen Liste entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11038">In Microsoft Edge settings, the smart action in the mini and full context menu will be disabled for services that match the given list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11039">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11039">If you disable or don't configure this policy:</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11040">Die intelligente Aktion in Mini- und Vollkontextmenüs wird für alle Profile aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11040">The smart action in the mini and full context menu will be enabled for all profiles.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11041">Benutzer sehen die intelligente Aktion in Mini- und Vollkontextmenüs für die Textauswahl.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11041">Users will see the smart action in the mini and full context menu on text selection.</span></span>
   - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11042">In den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen wird die intelligente Aktion in Mini- und Vollkontextmenüs aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11042">In Microsoft Edge settings, the smart action in the mini and full context menu will be enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11043">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11043">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-11044">smart_actions_pdf (smart_actions_pdf) = Intelligente Aktionen in PDF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11044">smart_actions_pdf (smart_actions_pdf) = Smart actions in PDF</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11045">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11045">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11046">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11046">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11047">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11047">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11048">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11048">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11049">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11049">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11050">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11050">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11051">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11051">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11052">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11052">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11053">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11053">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11054">GP eindeutiger Name: SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11054">GP unique name: SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11055">GP-Name: Blockieren intelligenter Aktionen für eine Liste von Diensten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11055">GP name: Block smart actions for a list of services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11056">GP-Pfad (Verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11056">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11057">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11057">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11058">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11058">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11059">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11059">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11060">Pfad (Verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11060">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11061">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SmartActionsBlockList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11061">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended\SmartActionsBlockList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11062">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11062">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11063">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11063">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11064">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11064">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SmartActionsBlockList\1 = "smart_actions_pdf"
```

  ### <a name="speechrecognitionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11069">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11069">SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-speech-recognition"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11070">Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11070">Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11071">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11071">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11072">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11072">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11073">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11073">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11074">Legen Sie fest, ob Websites die W3C-websprach-API verwenden können, um die Sprache des Benutzers zu erkennen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11074">Set whether websites can use the W3C Web Speech API to recognize speech from the user.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11075">Die Microsoft Edge-Implementierung der Web-Sprach-API verwendet Azure Cognitive Services, sodass Sprach Daten den Computer verlassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11075">The Microsoft Edge implementation of the Web Speech API uses Azure Cognitive Services, so voice data will leave the machine.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11076">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können webbasierte Anwendungen, die die websprach-API verwenden, die Spracherkennung verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11076">If you enable or don't configure this policy, web-based applications that use the Web Speech API can use Speech Recognition.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11077">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, ist die Spracherkennung über die websprach-API nicht verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11077">If you disable this policy, Speech Recognition is not available through the Web Speech API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11078">Hier finden Sie weitere Informationen zu diesem Feature: SpeechRecognition-API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11078">Read more about this feature here: SpeechRecognition API: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143388) Cognitive Services: [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2143680)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11079">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11079">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11080">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11080">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11081">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11081">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11082">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11082">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11083">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11083">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11084">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11084">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11085">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11085">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11086">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11086">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11087">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11087">GP unique name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11088">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11088">GP name: Configure Speech Recognition</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11089">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11089">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11090">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11090">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11091">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11091">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11092">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11092">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11093">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11093">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11094">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11094">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11095">Value Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11095">Value Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11096">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11096">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11097">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11097">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11098">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11098">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11099">Preference Key Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11099">Preference Key Name: SpeechRecognitionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11100">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11100">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
