  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11104">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11104">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11105">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11105">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11106">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11106">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11107">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, kann der Benutzer die Rechtschreibprüfung verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11107">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the user can use spellcheck.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11108">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, kann der Benutzer keine Rechtsschreibprüfung verwenden, und die [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) und [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) Richtlinien sind ebenfalls deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11108">If you disable this policy, the user can't use spellcheck and the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policies are also disabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11109">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11109">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11110">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11110">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11111">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11111">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11112">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11112">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11115">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11115">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11116">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11116">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11117">GP eindeutiger Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11117">GP unique name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11118">GP-Name: Rechtschreibprüfung aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11118">GP name: Enable spellcheck</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11119">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11119">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11120">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11120">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11121">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11121">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11122">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11122">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11123">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11123">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11124">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11124">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11125">Wertname: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11125">Value Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11126">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11126">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```

```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11129">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SpellcheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11129">Preference Key Name: SpellcheckEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="spellchecklanguage"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11132">SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11132">SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-specific-spellcheck-languages"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11133">Aktivieren spezifischer Sprachen für die Rechtschreibprüfung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11133">Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11134">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11134">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11135">Auf Windows ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11135">On Windows since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11136">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11136">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11137">Aktiviert unterschiedliche Sprachen für die Rechtschreibprüfung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11137">Enables different languages for spellcheck.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11138">Jede von Ihnen festgelegte Sprache, die nicht erkannt wird, wird ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11138">Any language that you specify that isn't recognized is ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11139">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, ist die Rechtschreibprüfung für die angegebenen Sprachen sowie alle Sprachen, die der Benutzer aktiviert hat, aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11139">If you enable this policy, spellcheck is enabled for the languages specified, as well as any languages the user has enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11140">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder deaktivieren, gibt es keine Änderungen an den Einstellungen für die Rechtschreibprüfung des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11140">If you don't configure or disable this policy, there's no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11141">Wenn die Richtlinie [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) deaktiviert ist, hat diese Richtlinie keine Wirkung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11141">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11142">Wenn eine Sprache sowohl in der "SpellcheckLanguage" als auch in der [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) Richtlinie enthalten ist, ist die Sprache für die Rechtschreibprüfung aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11142">If a language is included in both the 'SpellcheckLanguage' and the [SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist](#spellchecklanguageblocklist) policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11143">Die unterstützten Sprachen sind: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11143">The supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, cy, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11144">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11144">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11145">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11145">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11146">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11146">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11147">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11147">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11148">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11148">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11149">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11149">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11150">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11150">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11151">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11151">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11152">GP eindeutiger Name: SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11152">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11153">GP-Name: Aktivieren spezifischer Sprachen für die Rechtschreibprüfung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11153">GP name: Enable specific spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11154">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11154">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11155">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11155">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11156">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11156">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11157">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11157">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11158">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11158">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11159">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11159">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11160">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11160">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11161">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11161">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11162">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11162">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguage\2 = "es"

```

  ### <a name="spellchecklanguageblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11164">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11164">SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="force-disable-spellcheck-languages"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11165">Deaktivierung der Rechtschreibprüfungssprachen erzwingen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11165">Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11166">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11166">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11167">Auf Windows ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11167">On Windows since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11168">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11168">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11169">Deaktivierung der Rechtschreibprüfung für Sprachen erzwingen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11169">Force-disables spellcheck languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11170">Nicht erkannte Sprachen in dieser Liste werden ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11170">Unrecognized languages in that list will be ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11171">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird die Rechtschreibprüfung für die angegebenen Sprachen deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11171">If you enable this policy, spellcheck will be disabled for the languages specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11172">Benutzer können die Rechtschreibprüfung für Sprachen, die nicht in der Liste enthalten sind, weiterhin aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11172">The user can still enable or disable spellcheck for languages not in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11173">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen oder deaktivieren, gibt es keine Änderungen an den Einstellungen für die Rechtschreibprüfung des Benutzers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11173">If you do not set this policy, or disable it, there will be no change to the user's spellcheck preferences.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11174">Wenn die Richtlinie [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) deaktiviert ist, hat diese Richtlinie keine Wirkung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11174">If the [SpellcheckEnabled](#spellcheckenabled) policy is set to disabled, this policy will have no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11175">Wenn eine Sprache sowohl in der [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) als auch in der „SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist“ Richtlinie enthalten ist, ist die Sprache für die Rechtschreibprüfung aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11175">If a language is included in both the [SpellcheckLanguage](#spellchecklanguage) and the 'SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist' policy, the spellcheck language is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11176">Die derzeit unterstützten Sprachen sind: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11176">The currently supported languages are: af, bg, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-AU, en-CA, en-GB, en-US, es, es-419, es-AR, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, et, fa, fo, fr, he, hi, hr, hu, id, it, ko, lt, lv, nb, nl, pl, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro, ru, sh, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, ta, tg, tr, uk, vi.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11177">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11177">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11178">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11178">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11179">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11179">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11180">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11180">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11181">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11181">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11182">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11182">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11183">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11183">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11184">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11184">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11185">GP eindeutiger Name: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11185">GP unique name: SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11186">GP-Name: Deaktivierung der Rechtschreibprüfungssprachen erzwingen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11186">GP name: Force disable spellcheck languages</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11187">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11187">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11188">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11188">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11189">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11189">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11190">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11190">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11191">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11191">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11192">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11192">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11193">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11193">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11194">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11194">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11195">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11195">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\1 = "fr"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SpellcheckLanguageBlocklist\2 = "es"

```

  ### <a name="strictermixedcontenttreatmentenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11197">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11197">StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-stricter-treatment-for-mixed-content-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11198">Aktivieren der strikteren Behandlung von gemischten Inhalten (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11198">Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-11199">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach der Microsoft Edge-Version 84 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11199">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11200">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11200">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11201">Unter Windows und macOS ab 81 bis 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11201">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11202">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11202">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11203">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nicht, da sie nur als kurzfristiger Mechanismus vorgesehen war, um Unternehmen mehr Zeit zum Aktualisieren ihrer Webinhalte zu geben, wenn festgestellt wurde, dass sie mit einer strikteren Behandlung gemischter Inhalte nicht kompatibel sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11203">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if it was found to be incompatible with stricter mixed content treatment.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11204">Mit dieser Richtlinie wird die Behandlung gemischter Inhalte (HTTP-Inhalt auf HTTPS-Websites) im Browser gesteuert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11204">This policy controls the treatment for mixed content (HTTP content in HTTPS sites) in the browser.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11205">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "wahr" eingestellt oder nicht festgelegt wird, werden gemischte Audio- und Videoinhalte automatisch auf HTTPS aktualisiert (d.h. die URL wird als HTTPS neu geschrieben, ohne dass eine Ausweichaktion ausgeführt wird, wenn die Ressource nicht über HTTPS verfügbar ist), und die Warnung "nicht sicher" wird in der URL-Leiste für gemischten Bildinhalt angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11205">If you set this policy to true or not set, audio and video mixed content will be automatically upgraded to HTTPS (that is, the URL will be rewritten as HTTPS, without a fallback if the resource isn't available over HTTPS) and a 'Not Secure' warning will be shown in the URL bar for image mixed content.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11206">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie auf "false" festlegen, werden die automatischen Upgrades für Audio und Video deaktiviert, und es werden keine Warnungen für Bilder angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11206">If you set the policy to false, auto upgrades will be disabled for audio and video, and no warning will be shown for images.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11207">Diese Richtlinie wirkt sich nicht auf andere Typen von gemischten Inhalten außer Audio, Video und Bildern aus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11207">This policy does not affect other types of mixed content other than audio, video, and images.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11208">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11208">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11209">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11209">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11210">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11210">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11211">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11211">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11212">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11212">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11213">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11213">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11214">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11214">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11215">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11215">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11216">GP eindeutiger Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11216">GP unique name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11217">GP-Name: Aktivieren einer strikteren Behandlung gemischter Inhalte (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11217">GP name: Enable stricter treatment for mixed content (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11218">GP-Pfad (Verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11218">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11219">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11219">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11220">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11220">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11221">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11221">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11222">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11222">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11223">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11223">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11224">Wertname: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11224">Value Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11225">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11225">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11226">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11226">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11227">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11227">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11228">Einstellung Schlüsselname: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11228">Preference Key Name: StricterMixedContentTreatmentEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11229">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11229">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="suppressunsupportedoswarning"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11231">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11231">SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>

  #### <a name="suppress-the-unsupported-os-warning"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11232">Unterdrücken der Warnung in Bezug auf nicht unterstützte Betriebssysteme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11232">Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11233">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11233">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11234">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11234">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11235">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11235">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11236">Unterdrückt die Warnung, die angezeigt wird, wenn Microsoft Edge auf einem Computer oder Betriebssystem ausgeführt wird, das nicht mehr unterstützt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11236">Suppresses the warning that appears when Microsoft Edge is running on a computer or operating system that is no longer supported.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11237">Wenn diese Richtlinie falsch oder nicht festgelegt ist, werden die Warnungen auf solchen nicht unterstützten Computern oder Betriebssystemen angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11237">If this policy is false or unset, the warnings will appear on such unsupported computers or operating systems.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11238">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11238">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11239">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11239">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11240">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11240">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11241">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11241">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11243">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11243">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11244">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11244">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11245">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11245">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11246">GP eindeutiger Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11246">GP unique name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11247">GP-Name: Unterdrücken der Warnung in Bezug auf nicht unterstützte Betriebssysteme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11247">GP name: Suppress the unsupported OS warning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11248">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11248">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11249">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11249">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11250">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11250">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11251">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11251">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11252">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11252">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11253">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11253">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11254">Wertname: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11254">Value Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11255">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11255">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11256">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11256">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11257">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11257">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11258">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11258">Preference Key Name: SuppressUnsupportedOSWarning</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11259">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11259">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="syncdisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11261">SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11261">SyncDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="disable-synchronization-of-data-using-microsoft-sync-services"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11262">Deaktivieren der Synchronisierung von Daten mit Microsoft Sync Services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11262">Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11263">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11263">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11264">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11264">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11265">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11265">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11266">Deaktiviert die Datensynchronisierung in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11266">Disables data synchronization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11267">Durch diese Richtlinie wird außerdem verhindert, dass die Zustimmungsaufforderung für die Synchronisierung angezeigt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11267">This policy also prevents the sync consent prompt from appearing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11268">Diese Richtlinie deaktiviert nur die Cloud-Synchronisierung und hat keine Auswirkungen auf die Richtlinie [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11268">This policy disables cloud synchronization only and has no impact on the [RoamingProfileSupportEnabled](#roamingprofilesupportenabled) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11269">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen oder sie nicht wie empfohlen anwenden, können die Benutzer die Synchronisierung aktivieren oder deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11269">If you don't set this policy or apply it as recommended, users will be able to turn sync on or off.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11270">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie als zwingend erforderlich anwenden, können die Benutzer die Synchronisierung nicht aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11270">If you apply this policy as mandatory, users will not be able to turn sync on.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11271">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11271">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11272">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11272">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11273">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11273">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11274">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11274">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11275">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11275">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11276">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11276">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11277">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11277">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11278">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11278">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11279">GP eindeutiger Name: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11279">GP unique name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11280">GP-Name: Deaktivieren der Synchronisierung von Daten mit Microsoft Sync Services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11280">GP name: Disable synchronization of data using Microsoft sync services</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11281">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11281">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11282">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11282">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11283">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11283">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11284">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11284">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11285">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11285">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11286">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11286">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11287">Wertname: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11287">Value Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11288">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11288">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11289">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11289">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11290">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11290">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11291">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SyncDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11291">Preference Key Name: SyncDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11292">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11292">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="synctypeslistdisabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11294">SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11294">SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-the-list-of-types-that-are-excluded-from-synchronization"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11295">Konfigurieren Sie die Liste der Typen, die von der Synchronisierung ausgeschlossen werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11295">Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11296">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11296">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11297">Auf Windows und macOS ab 83 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11297">On Windows and macOS since 83 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11298">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11298">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11299">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, werden alle angegebenen Datentypen aus der Synchronisierung ausgeschlossen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11299">If you enable this policy all the specified data types will be excluded from synchronization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11300">Diese Richtlinie kann verwendet werden, um die Datenypen einzuschränken, die in den Microsoft Edge-Synchronisierungsdienst hochgeladen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11300">This policy can be used to limit the type of data uploaded to the Microsoft Edge synchronization service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11301">Sie können einen der folgenden Datentypen für diese Richtlinie angeben: "Favoriten", "Einstellungen", "Kennwörter", "Adressen und mehr", "Erweiterungen", "Verlauf", "openTabs" und "Sammlungen".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11301">You can provide one of the following data types for this policy: "favorites", "settings", "passwords", "addressesAndMore", "extensions", "history", "openTabs", and "collections".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11302">Beachten Sie, dass bei diesen Datentypnamen die Groß-/Kleinschreibung beachtet wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11302">Note that these data type names are case sensitive.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11303">Benutzer sind nicht dazu in der Lage, die Deaktivierung von Datentypen außer Kraft zu setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11303">Users will not be able to override the disabled data types.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11304">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11304">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11305">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11305">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11306">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11306">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11307">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11307">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11308">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11308">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11309">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11309">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11310">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11310">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11311">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11311">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11312">GP eindeutiger Name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11312">GP unique name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11313">GP-Name: Konfigurieren Sie die Liste der Typen, die von der Synchronisierung ausgeschlossen werden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11313">GP name: Configure the list of types that are excluded from synchronization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11314">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11314">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11315">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11315">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11316">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11316">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11317">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11317">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11318">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11318">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11319">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11319">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11320">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11320">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11321">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11321">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11322">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11322">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\SyncTypesListDisabled\1 = "favorites"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11323">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11323">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11324">Einstellung Schlüsselname: SyncTypesListDisabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11324">Preference Key Name: SyncTypesListDisabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11325">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11325">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>favorites</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-11326">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11326">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="tls13hardeningforlocalanchorsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11327">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11327">TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-a-tls-13-security-feature-for-local-trust-anchors-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11328">Aktivieren eines TLS 1.3-Sicherheitsfeatures für lokale Vertrauensanker (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11328">Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-11329">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach Microsoft Edge 85 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11329">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 85.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11330">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11330">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11331">Unter Windows und MacOS ab 81 bis 85</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11331">On Windows and macOS since 81, until 85</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11332">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11332">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11333">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nicht, da sie nur als kurzfristiger Mechanismus gedacht war, um Unternehmen mehr Zeit für das Upgrade betroffener Proxys zu geben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11333">This policy doesn't work because it was only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to upgrade affected proxies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11334">Diese Richtlinie steuert ein Sicherheitsfeature in TLS 1.3, das Verbindungen vor Downgrade-Attacken schützt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11334">This policy controls a security feature in TLS 1.3 that protects connections against downgrade attacks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11335">Es ist abwärtskompatibel und wirkt sich nicht auf Verbindungen mit konformen TLS 1.2-Servern oder -Proxies aus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11335">It is backwards-compatible and will not affect connections to compliant TLS 1.2 servers or proxies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11336">Ältere Versionen einiger TLS-abfangender Proxies weisen allerdings einen Implementierungsfehler auf, der dazu führt, dass diese inkompatibel sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11336">However, older versions of some TLS-intercepting proxies have an implementation flaw which causes them to be incompatible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11337">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht festlegen, aktiviert Microsoft Edge diese Sicherheitsfunktionen für alle Verbindungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11337">If you enable this policy or don't set it, Microsoft Edge will enable these security protections for all connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11338">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, deaktiviert Microsoft Edge diese Sicherheitsmaßnahmen für Verbindungen, die mit lokal installierten CA-Zertifikaten authentifiziert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11338">If you disable this policy, Microsoft Edge will disable these security protections for connections authenticated with locally-installed CA certificates.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11339">Diese Schutzfunktionen sind für Verbindungen, die mit öffentlich vertrauenswürdigen CA-Zertifikaten authentifiziert sind, immer aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11339">These protections are always enabled for connections authenticated with publicly-trusted CA certificates.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11340">Diese Richtlinie kann verwendet werden, um auf betroffene Proxys zu testen und diese zu aktualisieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11340">This policy can be used to test for any affected proxies and upgrade them.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11341">Bei betroffenen Proxies wird erwartet, dass Verbindungen mit dem Fehlercode ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED fehlschlagen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11341">Affected proxies are expected to fail connections with an error code of ERR_TLS13_DOWNGRADE_DETECTED.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11342">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11342">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11343">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11343">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11344">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11344">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11345">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11345">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11346">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11346">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11347">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11347">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11348">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11348">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11349">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11349">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11350">GP eindeutiger Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11350">GP unique name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11351">GP-Name: Aktivieren der TLS 1.3-Sicherheitsfunktion für lokale Vertrauensanker (veraltet).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11351">GP name: Enable a TLS 1.3 security feature for local trust anchors (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11352">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11352">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11353">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11353">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11354">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11354">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11355">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11355">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11356">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11356">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11357">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11357">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11358">Wertname: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11358">Value Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11359">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11359">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11360">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11360">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11361">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11361">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11362">Einstellung Schlüsselname: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11362">Preference Key Name: TLS13HardeningForLocalAnchorsEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="tlsciphersuitedenylist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11365">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11365">TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>

  #### <a name="specify-the-tls-cipher-suites-to-disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11366">Angeben der zu deaktivierenden TLS-Verschlüsselungssammlungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11366">Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11367">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11367">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11368">Auf Windows und MacOS ab 85 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11368">On Windows and macOS since 85 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11369">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11369">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11370">Konfigurieren Sie die Liste der Verschlüsselungssammlungen, die für TLS-Verbindungen deaktiviert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11370">Configure the list of cipher suites that are disabled for TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11371">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren, wird die Liste der konfigurierten Verschlüsselungssammlungen beim Einrichten von TLS-Verbindungen nicht verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11371">If you configure this policy, the list of configured cipher suites will not be used when establishing TLS connections.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11372">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wählt der Browser aus, welche TLS-Verschlüsselungssammlungen verwendet werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11372">If you don't configure this policy, the browser will choose which TLS cipher suites to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11373">Verschlüsselungssammlungen-Werte, die deaktiviert werden sollen, werden als 16-Bit-Hexadezimalwerte angegeben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11373">Cipher suite values to be disabled are specified as 16-bit hexadecimal values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11374">Die Werte werden von der IANA-Registrierung (Internet Assigned Numbers Authority) zugewiesen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11374">The values are assigned by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) registry.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11375">Die TLS 1,3 Cipher Suite TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) ist für TLS 1,3 erforderlich und kann nicht durch diese Richtlinie deaktiviert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11375">The TLS 1.3 cipher suite TLS_AES_128_GCM_SHA256 (0x1301) is required for TLS 1.3 and can't be disabled by this policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11376">Diese Richtlinie hat keine Auswirkungen auf QUIC-basierte Verbindungen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11376">This policy does not affect QUIC-based connections.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11377">QUIC kann über die [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed)-Richtlinie deaktiviert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11377">QUIC can be turned off via the [QuicAllowed](#quicallowed) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11378">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11378">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11379">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11379">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11380">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11380">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11381">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11381">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11382">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11382">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11383">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11383">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11384">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11384">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11385">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11385">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11386">Eindeutiger Name des GP: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11386">GP unique name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11387">GP-Name: Angeben der zu deaktivierenden TLS-Verschlüsselungssammlungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11387">GP name: Specify the TLS cipher suites to disable</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11388">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11388">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11389">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11389">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11390">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11390">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11391">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11391">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11392">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11392">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11393">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11393">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11394">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11394">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11395">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11395">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11396">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11396">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\1 = "0x1303"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\2 = "0xcca8"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\TLSCipherSuiteDenyList\3 = "0xcca9"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11397">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11397">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11398">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11398">Preference Key Name: TLSCipherSuiteDenyList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11399">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11399">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>0x1303</string>
  <string>0xcca8</string>
  <string>0xcca9</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="tabfreezingenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11401">TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11401">TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-freezing-of-background-tabs"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11402">Einfrieren von Hintergrundregisterkarten zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11402">Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11403">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11403">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11404">Auf Windows und macOS ab 79 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11404">On Windows and macOS since 79 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11405">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11405">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11406">Steuert, ob Microsoft Edge Registerkarten einfrieren kann, die sich für mindestens 5 Minuten im Hintergrund befinden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11406">Controls whether Microsoft Edge can freeze tabs that are in the background for at least 5 minutes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11407">Das Einfrieren von Registerkarten reduziert die CPU-, Akku- und Speichernutzung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11407">Tab freezing reduces CPU, battery, and memory usage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11408">Microsoft Edge verwendet Heuristiken, um zu verhindern, dass Registerkarten mit nützlichen Arbeiten im Hintergrund fixiert werden, z.B. solche, die Benachrichtigungen anzeigen, Sound abspielen und Video streamen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11408">Microsoft Edge uses heuristics to avoid freezing tabs that do useful work in the background, such as display notifications, play sound, and stream video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11409">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, werden Registerkarten, die für mindestens 5 Minuten im Hintergrund waren, möglicherweise eingefroren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11409">If you enable or don't configure this policy, tabs that have been in the background for at least 5 minutes might be frozen.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11410">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, werden keine Registerkarten eingefroren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11410">If you disable this policy, no tabs will be frozen.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11411">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11411">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11412">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11412">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11413">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11413">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11414">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11414">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11415">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11415">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11416">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11416">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11417">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11417">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11418">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11418">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11419">GP eindeutiger Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11419">GP unique name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11420">GP-Name: Einfrieren von Hintergrundregisterkarten zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11420">GP name: Allow freezing of background tabs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11421">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11421">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11422">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11422">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11423">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11423">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11424">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11424">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11425">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11425">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11426">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11426">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11427">Wertname: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11427">Value Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11428">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11428">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11429">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11429">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11430">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11430">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11431">Einstellung Schlüsselname: TabFreezingEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11431">Preference Key Name: TabFreezingEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11432">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11432">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="targetblankimpliesnoopener"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11434">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11434">TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>

  #### <a name="do-not-set-windowopener-for-links-targeting-_blank"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11435">Window.opener für Links mit dem Ziel _blank nicht setzen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11435">Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11436">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11436">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11437">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11437">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11438">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11438">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11439">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht festlegen, wird die Eigenschaft window.opener auf NULL festgelegt, es sei denn, der Anker gibt rel="opener" an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11439">If you enable this policy or leave it unset, the window.opener property is set to null unless the anchor specifies rel="opener".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11440">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, dürfen Popups, die auf _blank zielen, via JavaScript auf die Seite zugreifen, die das Öffnen des Popups angefordert hat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11440">If you disable this policy, popups that target _blank are permitted to access (via JavaScript) the page that requested to open the popup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11441">Diese Richtlinie wird in der Microsoft Edge-Version 95 veraltet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11441">This policy will be obsoleted in Microsoft Edge version 95.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11442">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11442">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11443">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11443">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11444">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11444">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11445">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11445">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11446">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11446">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11447">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11447">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11448">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11448">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11449">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11449">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11450">GP eindeutiger Name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11450">GP unique name: TargetBlankImpliesNoOpener</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11451">GP-Name: Legen Sie window.opener für Links, die auf _blank zielen, nicht fest</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11451">GP name: Do not set window.opener for links targeting _blank</span></span>

  ### <a name="taskmanagerendprocessenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11465">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11465">TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11470">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer Prozesse im Browser-Task-Manager beenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11470">If you enable or don't configure this policy, users can end processes in the Browser task manager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11471">Wenn Sie sie deaktivieren, können Benutzer keine Prozesse beenden, und die Schaltfläche "Prozess beenden" ist im Task-Manager des Browsers deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11471">If you disable it, users can't end processes, and the End process button is disabled in the Browser task manager.</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11479">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11479">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11481">GP-Name: Beenden von Prozessen im Task-Manager des Browsers zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11481">GP name: Enable ending processes in the Browser task manager</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11482">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11482">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11484">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11484">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11485">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11485">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11486">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11486">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11487">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11487">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11488">Wertname: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11488">Value Name: TaskManagerEndProcessEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11489">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11489">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

