  ### <a name="totalmemorylimitmb"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11495">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11495">TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-limit-on-megabytes-of-memory-a-single-microsoft-edge-instance-can-use"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11496">Festlegen der Speicherbegrenzung in Megabyte, die eine einzelne Microsoft Edge-Instanz verwenden kann</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11496">Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11497">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11497">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11498">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11498">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11499">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11499">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11500">Konfiguriert die Größe des Arbeitsspeichers, den eine einzelne Microsoft-Edge-Instanz verwenden kann, bevor Registerkarten verworfen werden, um Speicherplatz zu sparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11500">Configures the amount of memory that a single Microsoft Edge instance can use before tabs start getting discarded to save memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11501">Der von der Registerkarte verwendete Speicherplatz wird freigegeben, und die Registerkarte muss bei Aufruf neu geladen werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11501">The memory used by the tab will be freed and the tab will have to be reloaded when switched to.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11502">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, beginnt der Browser mit dem Verwerfen von Registerkarten, um Speicherplatz zu sparen, sobald die Beschränkung überschritten wurde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11502">If you enable this policy, the browser will start to discard tabs to save memory once the limitation is exceeded.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11503">Es gibt jedoch keine Garantie dafür, dass der Browser immer unter dem Limit ausgeführt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11503">However, there is no guarantee that the browser is always running under the limit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11504">Jeder Wert unter 1024 wird auf 1024 aufgerundet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11504">Any value under 1024 will be rounded up to 1024.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11505">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, versucht der Browser nur dann, Speicher zu sparen, wenn er erkannt hat, dass die Größe des physikalischen Speichers auf dem Computer niedrig ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11505">If you don't set this policy, the browser will only attempt to save memory when it has detected that the amount of physical memory on its machine is low.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11506">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11506">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11507">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11507">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11508">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11508">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11509">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11509">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11510">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11510">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11511">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11511">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11512">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11512">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11513">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11513">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11514">GP eindeutiger Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11514">GP unique name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11515">GP-Name: Festlegen der Speicherbegrenzung in Megabyte, die eine einzelne Microsoft Edge-Instanz verwenden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11515">GP name: Set limit on megabytes of memory a single Microsoft Edge instance can use</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11516">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11516">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11517">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11517">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11518">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11518">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11519">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11519">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11520">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11520">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11521">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11521">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11522">Wertname: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11522">Value Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11523">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11523">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11524">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11524">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000800
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11525">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11525">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11526">Einstellung Schlüsselname: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11526">Preference Key Name: TotalMemoryLimitMb</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11527">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11527">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2048</integer>
```

  ### <a name="trackingprevention"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11529">TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11529">TrackingPrevention</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-tracking-of-users-web-browsing-activity"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11530">Blockieren der Nachverfolgung der Browsing-Aktivitäten des Benutzers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11530">Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11531">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11531">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11532">Auf Windows und macOS ab 78 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11532">On Windows and macOS since 78 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11533">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11533">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11534">Legt fest, ob blockiert werden soll, dass Websites die Browsing-Aktivitäten der Benutzer nachverfolgen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11534">Lets you decide whether to block websites from tracking users' web-browsing activity.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11535">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer selbst den Umfang der Nachverfolgungsverhinderung festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11535">If you disable this policy or don't configure it, users can set their own level of tracking prevention.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11536">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11536">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-11537">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Aus (keine Nachverfolgungsverhinderung )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11537">TrackingPreventionOff (0) = Off (no tracking prevention)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-11538">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = Basis (Blockierung schädlicher Tracker, Inhalte und Anzeigen werden personalisiert)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11538">TrackingPreventionBasic (1) = Basic (blocks harmful trackers, content and ads will be personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-11539">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = Ausgeglichen (blockiert schädliche Tracker und Tracker von Websites, die der Benutzer nicht besucht hat; Inhalt und Anzeigen werden weniger personalisiert)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11539">TrackingPreventionBalanced (2) = Balanced (blocks harmful trackers and trackers from sites user has not visited; content and ads will be less personalized)</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-11540">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = Strikt (blockiert schädliche Tracker und die Mehrzahl der Tracker aller Websites. Inhalte und Anzeigen werden nur minimal personalisiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11540">TrackingPreventionStrict (3) = Strict (blocks harmful trackers and majority of trackers from all sites; content and ads will have minimal personalization.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11541">Möglicherweise funktionieren einige Teile von Websites nicht)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11541">Some parts of sites might not work)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11542">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11542">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11543">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11543">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11544">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11544">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11545">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11545">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11546">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11546">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11547">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11547">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11548">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11548">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11549">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11549">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11550">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11550">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11551">GP eindeutiger Name: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11551">GP unique name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11552">GP-Name: Blockieren der Nachverfolgung der Browsing-Aktivitäten des Benutzers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11552">GP name: Block tracking of users' web-browsing activity</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11553">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11553">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11554">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11554">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11555">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11555">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11556">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11556">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11557">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11557">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11558">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11558">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11559">Wertname: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11559">Value Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11560">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11560">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11561">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11561">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000002
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11562">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11562">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11563">Einstellung Schlüsselname: TrackingPrevention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11563">Preference Key Name: TrackingPrevention</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11564">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11564">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<integer>2</integer>
```

  ### <a name="translateenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11566">TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11566">TranslateEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-translate"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11567">Übersetzungen aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11567">Enable Translate</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11568">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11568">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11569">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11569">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11570">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11570">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11571">Aktiviert den integrierten Microsoft-Übersetzungsdienst in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11571">Enables the integrated Microsoft translation service on Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11572">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, bietet Microsoft Edge Übersetzungsfunktionen für den Benutzer, indem ggf. ein integriertes Flyout „Übersetzen“ angezeigt wird, und im Kontextmenü die Option „Übersetzen“ auftaucht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11572">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge offers translation functionality to the user by showing an integrated translate flyout when appropriate, and a translate option on the right-click context menu.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11573">Deaktivieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um alle integrierten Übersetzungsfunktionen zu deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11573">Disable this policy to disable all built-in translate features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11574">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, können die Benutzer auswählen, ob die Übersetzungsfunktionen verwendet werden sollen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11574">If you don't configure the policy, users can choose whether to use the translation functionality or not.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11575">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11575">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11576">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11576">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11577">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11577">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11578">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11578">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11579">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11579">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11580">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11580">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11581">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11581">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11582">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11582">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11583">GP eindeutiger Name: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11583">GP unique name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11584">GP-Name: Übersetzungen aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11584">GP name: Enable Translate</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11585">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11585">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11586">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge – Standardeinstellungen (Benutzer können diese außer Kraft setzen)/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11586">GP path (Recommended): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge - Default Settings (users can override)/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11587">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11587">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11588">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11588">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11589">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11589">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11590">Pfad (Empfohlen): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11590">Path (Recommended): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\Recommended</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11591">Wertname: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11591">Value Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11592">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11592">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11593">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11593">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11594">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11594">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11595">Einstellung Schlüsselname: TranslateEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11595">Preference Key Name: TranslateEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11596">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11596">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-11597">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11597">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="urlallowlist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11598">URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11598">URLAllowlist</span></span>

  #### <a name="define-a-list-of-allowed-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11599">Definieren einer Liste zulässiger URLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11599">Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11600">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11600">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11601">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11601">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11602">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11602">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11603">Das Aktivieren der Richtlinie ermöglicht den Zugriff auf die aufgelisteten URLs, als Ausnahmen zur [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11603">Setting the policy provides access to the listed URLs, as exceptions to [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11604">Formatieren Sie das URL-Muster gemäß [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11604">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11605">Mithilfe dieser Richtlinie können Sie Ausnahmen für restriktive Sperrlisten formulieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11605">You can use this policy to open exceptions to restrictive block lists.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11606">Sie können z.B. „\“ in die Sperrliste einschließen, um alle Anforderungen zu blockieren, und dann diese Richtlinie verwenden, um den Zugriff auf eine beschränkte Liste von URLs zuzulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11606">For example, you can include '\*' in the block list to block all requests, and then use this policy to allow access to a limited list of URLs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11607">Mithilfe dieser Richtlinie können Sie Ausnahmen für bestimmte Schemas, Unterdomänen anderer Domänen, Ports oder bestimmte Pfade einrichten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11607">You can use this policy to open exceptions to certain schemes, subdomains of other domains, ports, or specific paths.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11608">Der spezifischste Filter bestimmt, ob eine URL blockiert oder zulässig ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11608">The most specific filter determines if a URL is blocked or allowed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11609">Die Zulassungsliste hat Vorrang vor der Sperrliste.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11609">The allowed list takes precedence over the block list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11610">Diese Richtlinie ist auf 1.000 Einträge beschränkt, weitere Einträge werden ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11610">This policy is limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11611">Diese Richtlinie ermöglicht es dem Browser auch, automatisch externe Anwendungen aufzurufen, die als Protokollhandler für Protokolle wie "tel:" oder "ssh:" registriert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11611">This policy also allows the browser to automatically invoke external applications registered as protocol handlers for protocols like "tel:" or "ssh:".</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11612">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, gibt es keine Ausnahmen zur Sperrliste in der Richtlinie [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11612">If you don't configure this policy, there are no exceptions to the block list in the [URLBlocklist](#urlblocklist) policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11613">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11613">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11614">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11614">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11615">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11615">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11616">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11616">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11617">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11617">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11618">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11618">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11619">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11619">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11620">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11620">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11621">GP eindeutiger Name: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11621">GP unique name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11622">GP-Name: Definieren einer Liste zulässiger URLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11622">GP name: Define a list of allowed URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11623">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11623">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11624">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11624">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11625">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11625">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11626">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11626">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11627">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11627">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11628">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11628">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11629">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11629">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11630">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11630">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11631">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11631">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\3 = "hosting.com/good_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLAllowlist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11632">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11632">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11633">Einstellung Schlüsselname: URLAllowlist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11633">Preference Key Name: URLAllowlist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11634">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11634">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/good_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
</array>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-11635">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11635">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="urlblocklist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11636">URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11636">URLBlocklist</span></span>

  #### <a name="block-access-to-a-list-of-urls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11637">Blockieren des Zugriffs auf eine Liste von URLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11637">Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11638">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11638">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11639">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11639">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11640">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11640">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11641">Sie können eine Liste an Websites, basierend auf URL-Mustern, definieren, die blockiert werden (Ihre Benutzer können sie nicht aufrufen).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11641">Define a list of sites, based on URL patterns, that are blocked (your users can't load them).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11642">Formatieren Sie das URL-Muster gemäß [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11642">Format the URL pattern according to [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095322).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11643">Sie können in der Richtlinie [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) Ausnahmen festlegen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11643">You can define exceptions in the [URLAllowlist](#urlallowlist) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11644">Diese Richtlinien sind auf 1.000-Einträge beschränkt, weitere Einträge werden ignoriert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11644">These policies are limited to 1000 entries; subsequent entries are ignored.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11645">Beachten Sie, dass das Blockieren interner "edge://\*"-URLs nicht empfohlen wird. Dies kann zu unerwarteten Fehlern führen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11645">Note that blocking internal 'edge://\*' URLs isn't recommended - this may lead to unexpected errors.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11646">Durch diese Richtlinie wird nicht verhindert, dass die Seite über JavaScript dynamisch aktualisiert wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11646">This policy doesn't prevent the page from updating dynamically through JavaScript.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11647">Wenn Sie beispielsweise "contoso.com/abc" blockieren, können Benutzer möglicherweise weiterhin "contoso.com" besuchen und auf einen Link klicken, um "contoso.com/ABC" zu besuchen, solange die Seite nicht aktualisiert wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11647">For example, if you block 'contoso.com/abc', users might still be able to visit 'contoso.com' and click on a link to visit 'contoso.com/abc', as long as the page doesn't refresh.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11648">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, sind keine URLs blockiert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11648">If you don't configure this policy, no URLs are blocked.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11649">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11649">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11650">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11650">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11651">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11651">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11652">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11652">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11653">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11653">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11654">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11654">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11655">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11655">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11656">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11656">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11657">GP eindeutiger Name: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11657">GP unique name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11658">GP-Name: Blockieren des Zugriffs auf eine Liste von URLs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11658">GP name: Block access to a list of URLs</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11659">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11659">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11660">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11660">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11661">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11661">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11662">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11662">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11663">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11663">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11664">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11664">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11665">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11665">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11666">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11666">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11667">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11667">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\1 = "contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\2 = "https://ssl.server.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\3 = "hosting.com/bad_path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\4 = "https://server:8080/path"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\5 = ".exact.hostname.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\6 = "file://*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\7 = "custom_scheme:*"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\URLBlocklist\8 = "*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11668">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11668">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11669">Einstellung Schlüsselname: URLBlocklist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11669">Preference Key Name: URLBlocklist</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11670">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11670">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>contoso.com</string>
  <string>https://ssl.server.com</string>
  <string>hosting.com/bad_path</string>
  <string>https://server:8080/path</string>
  <string>.exact.hostname.com</string>
  <string>file://*</string>
  <string>custom_scheme:*</string>
  <string>*</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="updatepolicyoverride"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11672">UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11672">UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>

  #### <a name="specifies-how-microsoft-edge-update-handles-available-updates-from-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11673">Legt fest, wie Microsoft Edge Update verfügbare Updates von Microsoft Edge verarbeitet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11673">Specifies how Microsoft Edge Update handles available updates from Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11674">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11674">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11675">Unter macOS seit 89 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11675">On macOS since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11676">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11676">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11677">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, verarbeitet Microsoft Edge Update Microsoft Edge-Updates entsprechend der Konfiguration der folgenden Optionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11677">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge Update handles Microsoft Edge updates according to how you configure the following options:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-11678">Nur automatische unbeaufsichtigte Updates: Updates werden nur angewendet, wenn sie von der regelmäßigen Updateprüfung gefunden werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11678">Automatic silent updates only: Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-11679">Nur manuelle Updates: Updates werden nur angewendet, wenn der Benutzer eine manuelle Updateprüfung ausführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11679">Manual updates only: Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11680">(Nicht alle Apps bieten eine Schnittstelle für diese Option.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11680">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11681">Wenn Sie „manuelle Updates” auswählen, stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie regelmäßig mit Microsoft AutoUpdate nach Updates suchen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11681">If you select manual updates, make sure you periodically check for updates by using Microsoft Autoupdate.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11682">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht aktivieren und konfigurieren, sucht Microsoft Edge Update automatisch nach Updates.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11682">If you don't enable and configure this policy, Microsoft Edge Update automatically checks for updates.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="09666-11683">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11683">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-11684">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only) = Updates werden nur angewendet, wenn sie von der regelmäßigen Updateprüfung gefunden werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11684">automatic-silent-only (automatic-silent-only) = Updates are applied only when they're found by the periodic update check.</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-11685">manual-only (manual-only) = Updates werden nur angewendet, wenn der Benutzer eine manuelle Updateprüfung ausführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11685">manual-only (manual-only) = Updates are applied only when the user runs a manual update check.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11686">(Nicht alle Apps bieten eine Schnittstelle für diese Option.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11686">(Not all apps provide an interface for this option.)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11687">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11687">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11688">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11688">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11689">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11689">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11690">Kann empfohlen werden: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11690">Can be recommended: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11691">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11691">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11692">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11692">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11693">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11693">String</span></span>

  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11694">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11694">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11695">Einstellung Schlüsselname: UpdatePolicyOverride</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11695">Preference Key Name: UpdatePolicyOverride</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11696">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11696">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>automatic-silent-only</string>
```

  ### <a name="useragentclienthintsenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11698">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11698">UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-user-agent-client-hints-feature-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11699">Aktivieren des Features User-Agent Client Hints (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11699">Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-11700">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11700">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11701">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11701">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11702">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11702">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11703">Unter Windows und macOS ab 86 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11703">On Windows and macOS since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11704">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11704">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11705">Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet, da sie nur als kurzfristiger Mechanismus gedacht ist, um Unternehmen mehr Zeit für die Aktualisierung ihrer Webinhalte zu geben, wenn sich herausstellt, dass sie nicht mit der User-Agent Client Hint-Funktion kompatibel sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11705">This policy is deprecated because it's only intended to be a short-term mechanism to give enterprises more time to update their web content if and when it's found to be incompatible with the User-Agent Client Hints feature.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11706">Dies wird in Microsoft Edge, Version 93 nicht funktionieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11706">It won't work in Microsoft Edge version 93.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11707">Wenn diese Funktion aktiviert ist, sendet die Funktion User-Agent Client Hints granulare Anforderungsheader, die Informationen über den Browser des Benutzers (z.B. die Browserversion) und die Umgebung (z.B, die Systemarchitektur) bereitstellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11707">When enabled the User-Agent Client Hints feature sends granular request headers that provide information about the user browser (for example, the browser version) and environment (for example, the system architecture).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11708">Die ist eine zusätzliche Funktion. Die neuen Header können einige Websites unterbrechen, die die Zeichen einschränken, die Anfragen enthalten können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11708">This is an additive feature, but the new headers may break some websites that restrict the characters that requests may contain.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11709">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, ist die Funktion User-Agent Client Hints aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11709">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the User-Agent Client Hints feature is enabled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11710">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, ist diese Funktion nicht verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11710">If you disable this policy, this feature is unavailable.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11711">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11711">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11712">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11712">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11713">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11713">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11714">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11714">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11715">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11715">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11716">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11716">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11717">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11717">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11718">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11718">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11719">Eindeutiger GP-Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11719">GP unique name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11720">GP-Name: Aktivieren der Funktion User-Agent Client Hints (veraltet).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11720">GP name: Enable the User-Agent Client Hints feature (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11721">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11721">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11722">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11722">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11723">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11723">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11724">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11724">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11725">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11725">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11726">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11726">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11727">Wertname: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11727">Value Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11728">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11728">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11729">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11729">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11730">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11730">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11731">Name des Einstellungsschlüssels: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11731">Preference Key Name: UserAgentClientHintsEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11732">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11732">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-11733">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11733">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="userdatadir"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11734">UserDataDir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11734">UserDataDir</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-the-user-data-directory"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11735">Festlegen des Benutzerdatenverzeichnisses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11735">Set the user data directory</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11736">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11736">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11737">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11737">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11738">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11738">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11739">Legen Sie fest, welches Verzeichnis zum Speichern von Benutzerdaten verwendet werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11739">Set the directory to use for storing user data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11740">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, verwendet Microsoft Edge unabhängig davon, ob der Benutzer das Befehlszeilenkennzeichen "--user-data-dir" festgelegt hat, das angegebene Verzeichnis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11740">If you enable this policy, Microsoft Edge uses the specified directory regardless of whether the user has set the '--user-data-dir' command-line flag.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11741">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht aktivieren, wird der Standardprofilpfad verwendet, aber der Benutzer kann ihn mithilfe des Kennzeichens "--user-data-dir" außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11741">If you don't enable this policy, the default profile path is used, but the user can override it by using the '--user-data-dir' flag.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11742">Benutzer finden das Verzeichnis für das Profil unter edge://version/ unter Profilpfad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11742">Users can find the directory for the profile at edge://version/ under profile path.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11743">Zum Vermeiden von Datenverlust oder anderen Fehlern konfigurieren Sie diese Richtlinie nicht auf das Stammverzeichnis eines Volumes oder auf ein Verzeichnis, das für andere Zwecke verwendet wird, da Microsoft Edge dessen Inhalte verwaltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11743">To avoid data loss or other errors, don't configure this policy to a volume's root directory or to a directory that's used for other purposes, because Microsoft Edge manages its contents.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11744">Eine Liste der Variablen, die verwendet werden können, finden Sie unter [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11744">See [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2095041) for a list of variables that can be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11745">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11745">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11746">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11746">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11747">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11747">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11748">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11748">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11749">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11749">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11750">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11750">String</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11752">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11752">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11760">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11760">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>

  ### <a name="userdatasnapshotretentionlimit"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11768">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11768">UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>

  #### <a name="limits-the-number-of-user-data-snapshots-retained-for-use-in-case-of-emergency-rollback"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11769">Schränkt die Anzahl der Benutzerdaten-Momentaufnahmen ein, die zur Verwendung für Notfall-Rollbacks aufbewahrt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11769">Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11770">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11770">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11771">Unter Windows 86 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11771">On Windows since 86 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11772">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11772">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11773">Nach jedem größeren Versionsupdate erstellt Microsoft Edge eine Momentaufnahme von Teilen der Browserdaten des Benutzers, die für einen etwaigen späteren Notfall verwendet werden können, der ein vorübergehendes Versions-Rollback erfordert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11773">Following each major version update, Microsoft Edge will create a snapshot of parts of the user's browsing data to use in case of a later emergency that requires a temporary version rollback.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11774">Wenn ein vorübergehendes Rollback zu einer Version durchgeführt wird, für die ein Benutzer über eine entsprechende Momentaufnahme verfügt, werden die Daten in der Momentaufnahme wiederhergestellt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11774">If a temporary rollback is performed to a version for which a user has a corresponding snapshot, the data in the snapshot is restored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11775">Auf diese Weise werden Benutzereinstellungen wie Textmarken und Daten für das automatische Ausfüllen beibehalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11775">This lets users keep settings such as bookmarks and autofill data.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11776">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, wird der Standardwert von 3 Momentaufnahmen verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11776">If you don't set this policy, the default value of 3 snapshots is used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11777">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie festlegen, werden alte Momentaufnahmen nach Bedarf gelöscht, um dem von Ihnen festgelegten Wert zu entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11777">If you set this policy, old snapshots are deleted as needed to respect the limit you set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11778">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "0" festlegen, werden keine Momentaufnahmen erstellt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11778">If you set this policy to 0, no snapshots are taken.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11779">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11779">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11780">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11780">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11781">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11781">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11782">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11782">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11783">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11783">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11784">Ganze Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11784">Integer</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11785">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11785">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11786">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11786">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11787">Eindeutiger GP-Name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11787">GP unique name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11788">GP-Name: Schränkt die Anzahl der Benutzerdaten-Momentaufnahmen ein, die zur Verwendung für Notfall-Rollbacks aufbewahrt werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11788">GP name: Limits the number of user data snapshots retained for use in case of emergency rollback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11789">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11789">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11790">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11790">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11791">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11791">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11792">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11792">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11793">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11793">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11794">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11794">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11795">Wertname: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11795">Value Name: UserDataSnapshotRetentionLimit</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11796">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11796">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11797">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11797">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000003
```

  ### <a name="userfeedbackallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11799">UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11799">UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-user-feedback"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11800">Benutzerfeedback zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11800">Allow user feedback</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11801">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11801">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11802">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11802">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11803">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11803">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11804">Microsoft Edge verwendet das Edge-Feedback-Feature (standardmäßig aktiviert), um Benutzern das Senden von Feedback, Vorschlägen oder Kundenumfragen und das Melden von Problemen mit dem Browser zu ermöglichen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11804">Microsoft Edge uses the Edge Feedback feature (enabled by default) to allow users to send feedback, suggestions or customer surveys and to report any issues with the browser.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11805">Außerdem können Benutzer das Microsoft Edge Feedback-Feature standardmäßig nicht deaktivieren (abschalten).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11805">Also, by default, users can't disable (turn off) the Edge Feedback feature.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11806">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, können Benutzer Microsoft Edge Feedback aufrufen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11806">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, users can invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11807">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können die Benutzer Microsoft Edge Feedback nicht aufrufen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11807">If you disable this policy, users can't invoke Edge Feedback.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11808">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11808">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11809">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11809">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11810">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11810">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11811">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11811">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11812">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11812">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11813">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11813">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11814">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11814">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11815">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11815">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11816">GP eindeutiger Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11816">GP unique name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11817">GP-Name: Benutzerfeedback zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11817">GP name: Allow user feedback</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11818">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11818">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11819">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11819">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11820">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11820">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11821">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11821">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11822">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11822">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11823">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11823">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11824">Wertname: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11824">Value Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11825">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11825">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11826">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11826">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11827">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11827">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11828">Einstellung Schlüsselname: UserFeedbackAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11828">Preference Key Name: UserFeedbackAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11829">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11829">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```
  

  [<span data-ttu-id="09666-11830">Zurück zum Anfang</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11830">Back to top</span></span>](#microsoft-edge---policies)

  ### <a name="verticaltabsallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11831">VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11831">VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="configures-availability-of-a-vertical-layout-for-tabs-on-the-side-of-the-browser"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11832">Konfiguriert die Verfügbarkeit eines vertikalen Layouts für Registerkarten auf der Seite des Browsers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11832">Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11833">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11833">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11834">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11834">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11835">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11835">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11836">Konfiguriert, ob ein Benutzer auf ein alternatives Layout zugreifen kann, bei dem die Registerkarten vertikal an der Seite des Browsers statt oben ausgerichtet sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11836">Configures whether a user can access an alternative layout where tabs are vertically aligned on the side of the browser instead of at the top.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-11837">Wenn mehrere Registerkarten geöffnet sind, ermöglicht dieses Layout eine bessere Anzeige und Verwaltung von Registerkarten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11837">When there are several tabs open, this layout provides better tab viewing and management.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11838">Die Websitetitel sind besser sichtbar, es ist einfacher, ausgerichtete Symbole zu scannen, und es gibt mehr Platz zum Verwalten und Schließen von Registerkarten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11838">There's better visibility of the site titles, it's easier to scan aligned icons, and there's more space to manage and close tabs.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11839">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, ist das vertikale Registerkartenlayout nicht als Option für Benutzer verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11839">If you disable this policy, then the vertical tab layout will not be available as an option for users.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11840">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, befindet sich das Registerkartenlayout weiterhin oben, aber Benutzer können vertikale Registerkarten an der Seite aktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11840">If you enable or don't configure this policy, the tab layout will still be at the top, but a user has the option to turn on vertical tabs on the side.</span></span>


  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11841">Unterstützte Features:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11841">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11842">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11842">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11843">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11843">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11844">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11844">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11845">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11845">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11846">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11846">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11847">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11847">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11848">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11848">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11849">Eindeutiger GP-Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11849">GP unique name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11850">GP-Name: Konfiguriert die Verfügbarkeit eines vertikalen Layouts für Registerkarten auf der Seite des Browsers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11850">GP name: Configures availability of a vertical layout for tabs on the side of the browser</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11851">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11851">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11852">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11852">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11853">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11853">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11854">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11854">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11855">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11855">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11856">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11856">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11857">Wertname: VerticalTabsAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11857">Value Name: VerticalTabsAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11858">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11858">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```
