  ### <a name="videocaptureallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11864">VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11864">VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-or-block-video-capture"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11865">Video-Aufnahme zulassen oder blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11865">Allow or block video capture</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11866">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11866">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11867">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11867">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11868">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11868">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11869">Steuert, ob Websites Video aufzeichnen können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11869">Control whether sites can capture video.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11870">Falls diese Richtlinie aktiviert oder nicht konfiguriert (Standardeinstellung) ist, wird der Benutzer von allen Websites um Erlaubnis zum Zugriff auf die Videoaufzeichnung gebeten, mit Ausnahme derjenigen, die in der Richtlinienliste [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) konfiguriert sind und denen der Zugriff gewährt wird, ohne dass der Benutzer gefragt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11870">If enabled or not configured (default), the user will be asked about video capture access for all sites except those with URLs configured in the [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy list, which will be granted access without prompting.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11871">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird der Benutzer nicht gefragt, und die Videoaufzeichnung ist nur für URLs verfügbar, die in der Richtlinie [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) konfiguriert sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11871">If you disable this policy, the user isn't prompted, and video capture is only available to URLs configured in [VideoCaptureAllowedUrls](#videocaptureallowedurls) policy.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11872">Diese Richtlinie wirkt sich auf alle Arten von Video-Eingaben aus, nicht nur auf die integrierte Kamera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11872">This policy affects all types of video inputs, not only the built-in camera.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11873">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11873">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11874">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11874">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11875">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11875">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11876">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11876">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11877">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11877">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11878">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11878">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11879">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11879">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11880">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11880">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11881">GP eindeutiger Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11881">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11882">GP-Name: Video-Aufnahme zulassen oder blockieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11882">GP name: Allow or block video capture</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11883">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11883">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11884">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11884">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11885">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11885">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11886">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11886">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11887">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11887">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11888">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11888">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11889">Wertname: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11889">Value Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11890">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11890">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11891">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11891">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11892">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11892">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11893">Einstellung Schlüsselname: VideoCaptureAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11893">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowed</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11894">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11894">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<false/>
```

  ### <a name="videocaptureallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11896">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11896">VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="sites-that-can-access-video-capture-devices-without-requesting-permission"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11897">Websites, die auf Video-Aufnahmegeräte zugreifen können, ohne eine Berechtigung anfordern zu müssen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11897">Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11898">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11898">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11899">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11899">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11900">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11900">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11901">Sie können auf der Grundlage von URL-Mustern Websites angeben, die Videoaufnahmegeräte verwenden können, ohne den Benutzer um Erlaubnis zu bitten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11901">Specify websites, based on URL patterns, that can use video capture devices without asking the user for permission.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11902">Muster in dieser Liste werden mit dem Sicherheitsursprung der anfordernden URL abgeglichen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11902">Patterns in this list are matched against the security origin of the requesting URL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-11903">Wenn eine Übereinstimmung vorliegt, wird automatisch der Zugriff auf die Videoaufnahmegeräte gewährt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11903">If they match, the site is automatically granted access to video capture devices.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11904">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11904">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11905">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11905">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11906">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11906">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11907">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11907">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11908">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11908">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11909">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11909">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11910">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11910">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11911">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11911">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11912">GP eindeutiger Name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11912">GP unique name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11913">GP-Name: Websites, die auf Video-Aufnahmegeräte zugreifen können, ohne eine Berechtigung anfordern zu müssen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11913">GP name: Sites that can access video capture devices without requesting permission</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11914">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11914">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11915">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11915">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11916">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11916">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11917">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11917">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11918">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11918">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11919">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11919">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11920">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11920">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11921">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11921">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11922">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11922">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com/"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\VideoCaptureAllowedUrls\2 = "https://[*.]contoso.edu/"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11923">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11923">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11924">Einstellung Schlüsselname: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11924">Preference Key Name: VideoCaptureAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11925">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11925">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com/</string>
  <string>https://[*.]contoso.edu/</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="wpadquickcheckenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11927">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11927">WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="set-wpad-optimization"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11928">WPAD-Optimierung einrichten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11928">Set WPAD optimization</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11929">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11929">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11930">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11930">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11931">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11931">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11932">Ermöglicht es Ihnen, die WPAD-Optimierung (Web Proxy Auto-Discovery) in Microsoft Edge zu deaktivieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11932">Allows you to turn off WPAD (Web Proxy Auto-Discovery) optimization in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11933">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird die WPAD-Optimierung deaktiviert, wodurch der Browser bei DNS-basierten WPAD-Servern länger wartet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11933">If you disable this policy, WPAD optimization is disabled, which makes the browser wait longer for DNS-based WPAD servers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11934">Wenn Sie die Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, ist die WPAD-Optimierung aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11934">If you enable or don't configure the policy, WPAD optimization is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11935">Unabhängig davon, ob und wie diese Richtlinie aktiviert ist, kann die WPAD-Optimierungseinstellung nicht von Benutzern geändert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11935">Independent of whether or how this policy is enabled, the WPAD optimization setting cannot be changed by users.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11936">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11936">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11937">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11937">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11938">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11938">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11939">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11939">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11940">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11940">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11941">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11941">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11942">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11942">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11943">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11943">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11944">GP eindeutiger Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11944">GP unique name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11945">GP-Name: WPAD-Optimierung einrichten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11945">GP name: Set WPAD optimization</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11946">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11946">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11947">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11947">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11948">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11948">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11949">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11949">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11950">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11950">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11951">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11951">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11952">Wertname: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11952">Value Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11953">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11953">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11954">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11954">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11955">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11955">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11956">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11956">Preference Key Name: WPADQuickCheckEnabled</span></span>

  ### <a name="webappinstallforcelist"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11959">WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11959">WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>

  #### <a name="configure-list-of-force-installed-web-apps"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11960">Konfigurieren der Liste der erzwungen installierten Web-Apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11960">Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11961">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11961">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11962">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11962">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11963">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11963">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11964">Konfigurieren Sie diese Richtlinie, um eine Liste von Webanwendungen anzugeben, die im Hintergrund installieren, ohne dass Benutzerinteraktionen vorgenommen werden, und die Benutzer nicht deinstallieren oder deaktivieren können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11964">Configure this policy to specify a list of web apps that install silently, without user interaction, and which users can't uninstall or turn off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11965">Jedes Listenelement der Richtlinie ist ein Objekt mit einem obligatorischen Element: url (die URL der zu installierenden Web-App)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11965">Each list item of the policy is an object with a mandatory member: url (the URL of the web app to install)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-11966">und drei optionale Elemente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11966">and 3 optional members:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="09666-11967">default_launch_container (gibt den Fenstermodus an, mit dem die Web-App geöffnet wird – eine neue Registerkarte ist die Standardeinstellung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11967">default_launch_container (specifies the window mode that the web app opens with-a new tab is the default.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-11968">create_desktop_shortcut (Wahr, wenn Sie Linux- und Microsoft Windows-Desktopverknüpfungen erstellen möchten.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11968">create_desktop_shortcut (True if you want to create Linux and Microsoft Windows desktop shortcuts.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="09666-11969">fallback_app_name (Ab Microsoft Edge 90 können Sie den Namen der App überschreiben, wenn es sich nicht um eine Progressive Web App (PWA) handelt, oder den App-Namen, der vorübergehend installiert wird, wenn es sich um eine PWA handelt, aber eine Authentifizierung erforderlich ist, bevor die Installation abgeschlossen werden kann.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11969">fallback_app_name (Starting with Microsoft Edge 90, allows you to override the app name if it is not a Progressive Web App (PWA), or the app name that is temporarily installed if it is a PWA but authentication is required before the installation can be completed.)</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11970">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11970">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11971">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11971">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11972">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11972">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11973">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11973">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11974">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11974">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11975">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11975">Dictionary</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11976">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11976">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11977">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11977">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11978">GP eindeutiger Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11978">GP unique name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11979">GP-Name: Konfigurieren der Liste der erzwungen installierten Web-Apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11979">GP name: Configure list of force-installed Web Apps</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11980">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11980">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11981">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11981">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11982">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11982">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11983">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11983">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11984">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11984">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11985">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11985">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11986">Wertname: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11986">Value Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11987">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11987">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11988">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11988">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [
  {
    "create_desktop_shortcut": true, 
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "tab", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"
  }, 
  {
    "default_launch_container": "window", 
    "fallback_app_name": "Editor", 
    "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"
  }
]
```

  ##### <a name="compact-example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11989">Kompakter Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11989">Compact example value:</span></span>

  ```
  SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebAppInstallForceList = [{"create_desktop_shortcut": true, "default_launch_container": "window", "url": "https://www.contoso.com/maps"}, {"default_launch_container": "tab", "url": "https://app.contoso.edu"}, {"default_launch_container": "window", "fallback_app_name": "Editor", "url": "https://app.contoso.com/editor"}]
  ```
  

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11990">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11990">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11991">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WebAppInstallForceList</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11991">Preference Key Name: WebAppInstallForceList</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11992">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11992">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<key>WebAppInstallForceList</key>
<array>
  <dict>
    <key>create_desktop_shortcut</key>
    <true/>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://www.contoso.com/maps</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>tab</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.edu</string>
  </dict>
  <dict>
    <key>default_launch_container</key>
    <string>window</string>
    <key>fallback_app_name</key>
    <string>Editor</string>
    <key>url</key>
    <string>https://app.contoso.com/editor</string>
  </dict>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webcaptureenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11994">WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11994">WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-web-capture-feature-in-microsoft-edge"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11995">Aktivieren des Features „Websammlung“ in MicrosoftEdge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11995">Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11996">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11996">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-11997">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11997">On Windows and macOS since 87 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-11998">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11998">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-11999">Aktiviert das Feature „Websammlung“ in Microsoft Edge, das Benutzern das Erfassen von Webinhalten und das Kommentieren der Sammlung mithilfe von Freihandtools ermöglicht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-11999">Enables the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge that allows users to capture web content and annotate the capture using inking tools.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12000">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird die Option „Websammlung“ im Kontextmenü, im Menü „Einstellungen“ und in weiteren Menüs angezeigt, oder mithilfe der Tastenkombination STRG+UMSCHALT+S.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12000">If you enable this policy or don't configure it, the Web capture option shows up in the context menu, Settings and more menu, and by using the keyboard shortcut, CTRL+SHIFT+S.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12001">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, können Benutzer nicht auf das Feature „Websammlungen“ in Microsoft Edge zugreifen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12001">If you disable this policy, users can't access the web capture feature in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12002">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12002">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12003">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12003">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12004">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12004">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12005">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12005">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12006">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12006">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12007">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12007">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12008">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12008">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12009">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12009">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12010">Eindeutiger GP-Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12010">GP unique name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12011">GP-Name: Aktivieren des Features „Websammlung“ in MicrosoftEdge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12011">GP name: Enable web capture feature in Microsoft Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12012">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12012">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12013">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12013">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12014">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12014">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12015">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12015">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12016">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12016">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12017">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12017">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12018">Wertname: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12018">Value Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12019">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12019">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12020">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12020">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12021">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12021">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12022">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WebCaptureEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12022">Preference Key Name: WebCaptureEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12023">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12023">Example value:</span></span>


  ### <a name="webcomponentsv0enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12025">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12025">WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="re-enable-web-components-v0-api-until-m84-obsolete"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12026">Erneut aktivieren der Web Components v0 API bis M84 (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12026">Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>

  
  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-12027">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet und funktioniert nach der Microsoft Edge-Version 84 nicht mehr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12027">OBSOLETE: This policy is obsolete and doesn't work after Microsoft Edge 84.</span></span>
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12028">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12028">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12029">Auf Windows und MacOS ab 80, bis 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12029">On Windows and macOS since 80, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12030">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12030">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-12031">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nicht, da diese Richtlinie erlaubte, die Features wahlweise erneut zu aktivieren bis Microsoft Edge-Version 85.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12031">This policy doesn't work because this policy allowed these features to be selectively re-enabled until Microsoft Edge version 85.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12032">Die Webkomponenten v0 APIs (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0 und HTML Imports) wurden in 2018 verworfen und sind standardmäßig ab M80 deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12032">The Web Components v0 APIs (Shadow DOM v0, Custom Elements v0, and HTML Imports) were deprecated in 2018, and have been disabled by default starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12033">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „wahr“ festlegen, werden die Funktionen der Webkomponenten v0 für alle Websites aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12033">If you set this policy is set to True, the Web Components v0 features will be enabled for all sites.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12034">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf "falsch" festlegen oder diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen, werden die Funktionen der Webkomponenten v0 standardmäßig deaktiviert, beginnend mit M80.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12034">If you set this policy to False or don't set this policy, the Web Components v0 features will be disabled by default, starting in Microsoft Edge version 80.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12035">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12035">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12036">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12036">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12037">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12037">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12038">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12038">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12039">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12039">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12040">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12040">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12041">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12041">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12042">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12042">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12043">GP eindeutiger Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12043">GP unique name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12044">GP-Name: Erneute Aktivierung der Web Components v0-API bis M84 (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12044">GP name: Re-enable Web Components v0 API until M84 (obsolete)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12045">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12045">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12046">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12046">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12047">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12047">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12048">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12048">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12049">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12049">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12050">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12050">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12051">Wertname: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12051">Value Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12052">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12052">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12053">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12053">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12055">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12055">Preference Key Name: WebComponentsV0Enabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12056">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12056">Example value:</span></span>

  ### <a name="webdriveroverridesincompatiblepolicies"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12058">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12058">WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-webdriver-to-override-incompatible-policies-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12059">Zulassen, dass WebDriver inkompatible Richtlinien außer Kraft setzt (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12059">Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-12060">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12060">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12061">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12061">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12062">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12062">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12063">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77, bis 84</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12063">On Windows and macOS since 77, until 84</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12064">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12064">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-12065">Diese Richtlinie funktioniert nicht, da WebDriver nun mit allen vorhandenen Richtlinien kompatibel ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12065">This policy doesn't work because WebDriver is now compatible with all existing policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12066">Diese Richtlinie ermöglicht es Benutzern der WebDriver-Funktion, Richtlinien außer Kraft zu setzen, die sich auf seinen Betrieb auswirken könnten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12066">This policy allows users of the WebDriver feature to override policies which can interfere with its operation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12067">Diese Richtlinie deaktiviert aktuell die Richtlinien [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) und [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12067">Currently this policy disables [SitePerProcess](#siteperprocess) and [IsolateOrigins](#isolateorigins) policies.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12068">Wenn die Richtlinie aktiviert ist, kann WebDriver inkompatible Richtlinien außer Kraft setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12068">If the policy is enabled, WebDriver will be able to override incomaptible policies.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12069">Wenn die Richtlinie deaktiviert oder nicht konfiguriert ist, ist es WebDriver nicht gestattet, inkompatible Richtlinien außer Kraft zu setzen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12069">If the policy is disabled or not configured, WebDriver will not be allowed to override incompatible policies.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12070">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12070">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12071">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12071">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12072">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12072">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12073">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12073">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12074">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12074">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12075">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12075">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12076">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12076">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12077">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12077">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12078">GP eindeutiger Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12078">GP unique name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12079">GP-Name: Zulassen, dass WebDriver inkompatible Richtlinien außer Kraft setzt (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12079">GP name: Allow WebDriver to Override Incompatible Policies (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12080">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12080">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12081">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12081">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12082">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12082">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12083">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12083">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12084">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12084">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12085">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12085">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12086">Wertname: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12086">Value Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12087">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12087">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12088">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12088">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12089">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12089">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12090">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12090">Preference Key Name: WebDriverOverridesIncompatiblePolicies</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12091">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12091">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<true/>
```

  ### <a name="webrtcallowlegacytlsprotocols"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12093">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12093">WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-legacy-tlsdtls-downgrade-in-webrtc-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12094">Zulassen des Legacy-TLS/DTLS-Downgrades in WebRTC (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12094">Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-12095">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12095">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12096">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12096">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12097">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12097">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12098">Unter Windows und MacOS seit 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12098">On Windows and macOS since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12099">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12099">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-12100">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, können WebRTC-Peerverbindungen auf veraltete Versionen der TLS/DTLS-Protokolle (DTLS 1.0, TLS 1.0 und TLS 1.1) herabgestuft werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12100">If you enable this policy, WebRTC peer connections can downgrade to obsolete versions of the TLS/DTLS (DTLS 1.0, TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1) protocols.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12101">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht festlegen, sind diese TLS/DTLS-Versionen deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12101">If you disable or don't set this policy, these TLS/DTLS versions are disabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12102">Diese Richtlinie ist temporär und wird in einer zukünftigen Version von Microsoft Edge entfernt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12102">This policy is temporary and will be removed in a future version of Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12103">Unterstützte Features:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12103">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12104">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12104">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12105">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12105">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12106">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12106">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12107">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12107">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12108">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12108">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12109">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12109">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12110">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12110">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12111">Eindeutiger GP-Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12111">GP unique name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12112">GP-Name: Zulassen des Legacy-TLS/DTLS-Downgrades in WebRTC (veraltet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12112">GP name: Allow legacy TLS/DTLS downgrade in WebRTC (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12113">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12113">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12114">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12114">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12115">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12115">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12116">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12116">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12117">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12117">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12118">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12118">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12119">Wertname: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12119">Value Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12120">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12120">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12121">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12121">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000000
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12122">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12122">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12123">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12123">Preference Key Name: WebRtcAllowLegacyTLSProtocols</span></span>


  ### <a name="webrtclocalipsallowedurls"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12126">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12126">WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>

  #### <a name="manage-exposure-of-local-ip-addressess-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12127">Verwaltung der Gefährdung lokaler IP-Adressen durch WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12127">Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12128">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12128">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12129">Auf Windows und macOS ab 80 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12129">On Windows and macOS since 80 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12130">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12130">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-12131">Gibt eine Liste der Ursprünge (URLs) oder Hostnamen-Muster (wie "*contoso.com*") an, für die die lokale IP-Adresse von WebRTC verfügbar gemacht werden soll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12131">Specifies a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns (like "*contoso.com*") for which local IP address should be exposed by WebRTC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12132">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren und eine Liste von Ursprüngen (URLs) oder Hostnamen-Mustern festlegen, wird beim Aktivieren von edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns die lokale IP-Adresse von WebRTC für Fälle verfügbar gemacht, die den Mustern in der Liste entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12132">If you enable this policy and set a list of origins (URLs) or hostname patterns, when edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will expose the local IP address for cases that match patterns in the list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12133">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren und edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns aktiviert ist, werden in WebRTC keine lokalen IP-Adressen verfügbar gemacht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12133">If you disable or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Enabled, WebRTC will not expose local IP addresses.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12134">Die lokale IP-Adresse wird mit einem mDNS-Hostnamen verborgen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12134">The local IP address is concealed with an mDNS hostname.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12135">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren und edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns deaktiviert ist, werden in WebRTC lokale IP-Adressen verfügbar gemacht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12135">If you enable, disable, or don't configure this policy, and edge://flags/#enable-webrtc-hide-local-ips-with-mdns is Disabled, WebRTC will expose local IP addresses.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12136">Bitte beachten Sie, dass diese Richtlinie den Schutz lokaler IP-Adressen, der für Administratoren ggf. erforderlich ist, schwächt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12136">Please note that this policy weakens the protection of local IP addresses that might be needed by administrators.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12137">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12137">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12138">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12138">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12139">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12139">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12140">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12140">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12141">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12141">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12142">Liste von Zeichenfolgen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12142">List of strings</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12143">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12143">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12144">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12144">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12145">GP eindeutiger Name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12145">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12146">GP-Name: Verwaltung der Gefährdung lokaler IP-Adressen durch WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12146">GP name: Manage exposure of local IP addressess by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12147">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12147">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12148">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12148">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12149">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12149">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12150">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12150">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12151">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12151">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12152">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12152">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12153">Wertname: 1, 2, 3, ...</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12153">Value Name: 1, 2, 3, ...</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12154">Werttyp: REG_SZ-Liste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12154">Value Type: list of REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12155">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12155">Example value:</span></span>

```
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\1 = "https://www.contoso.com"
SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge\WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls\2 = "*contoso.com*"

```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12156">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12156">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12157">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12157">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalIpsAllowedUrls</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12158">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12158">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<array>
  <string>https://www.contoso.com</string>
  <string>*contoso.com*</string>
</array>
```

  ### <a name="webrtclocalhostiphandling"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12160">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12160">WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-exposure-of-local-ip-address-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12161">Einschränken der Gefährdung lokaler IP-Adresse durch WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12161">Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12162">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12162">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12163">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12163">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12164">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12164">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-12165">Hiermit können Sie festlegen, ob WebRTC die lokale IP-Adresse des Benutzers verfügbar macht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12165">Allows you to set whether or not WebRTC exposes the user's local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12166">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „AllowAllInterfaces“ oder „AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces“ setzen, zeigt WebRTC die lokale IP-Adresse an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12166">If you set this policy to "AllowAllInterfaces" or "AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces", WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12167">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie auf „AllowPublicInterfaceOnly“ oder „DisableNonProxiedUdp“ setzen, zeigt WebRTC die lokale IP-Adresse nicht an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12167">If you set this policy to "AllowPublicInterfaceOnly" or "DisableNonProxiedUdp", WebRTC doesn't expose the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12168">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht festlegen oder wenn Sie sie deaktivieren, macht WebRTC die lokale IP-Adresse verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12168">If you don't set this policy, or if you disable it, WebRTC exposes the local IP address.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12169">Zuordnung von Richtlinienoptionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12169">Policy options mapping:</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-12170">AllowAllInterfaces (Standard) = alle Schnittstellen zulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12170">AllowAllInterfaces (default) = Allow all interfaces.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12171">Dies zeigt die lokale IP-Adresse an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12171">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-12172">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = Öffentliche und private Schnittstellen über die HTTP-Standardroute zulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12172">AllowPublicAndPrivateInterfaces (default_public_and_private_interfaces) = Allow public and private interfaces over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12173">Dies zeigt die lokale IP-Adresse an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12173">This exposes the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-12174">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (standard_public_interface_only) = Öffentliche Schnittstelle über HTTP-Standardroute zulassen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12174">AllowPublicInterfaceOnly (default_public_interface_only) = Allow public interface over http default route.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12175">Dadurch wird die lokale IP-Adresse nicht offengelegt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12175">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

* <span data-ttu-id="09666-12176">DisableNonProxiedUp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = TCP verwenden, es sei denn, der Proxy-Server unterstützt UDP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12176">DisableNonProxiedUdp (disable_non_proxied_udp) = Use TCP unless proxy server supports UDP.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12177">Dadurch wird die lokale IP-Adresse nicht offengelegt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12177">This doesn't expose the local IP address</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12178">Verwenden Sie die vorstehenden Informationen, wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12178">Use the preceding information when configuring this policy.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12179">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12179">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12180">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12180">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12181">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12181">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12182">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12182">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12183">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12183">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12184">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12184">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12185">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12185">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12186">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12186">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12187">GP eindeutiger Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12187">GP unique name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12188">GP-Name: Einschränken der Gefährdung lokaler IP-Adresse durch WebRTC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12188">GP name: Restrict exposure of local IP address by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12189">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12189">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12190">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12190">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12191">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12191">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12192">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12192">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12193">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12193">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12194">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12194">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12195">Wertname: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12195">Value Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12196">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12196">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12197">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12197">Example value:</span></span>

```
"default"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12198">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12198">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12199">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12199">Preference Key Name: WebRtcLocalhostIpHandling</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12200">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12200">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>default</string>
```
