  ### <a name="webrtcudpportrange"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12202">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12202">WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>

  #### <a name="restrict-the-range-of-local-udp-ports-used-by-webrtc"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12203">Einschränken des von WebRTC verwendeten lokalen Bereichs an UDP-Ports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12203">Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12204">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12204">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12205">Auf Windows und macOS ab 77 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12205">On Windows and macOS since 77 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12206">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12206">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-12207">Schränkt den von WebRTC verwendeten UDP-Portbereich auf ein angegebenes Port-Intervall (Endpunkte eingeschlossen) ein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12207">Restricts the UDP port range used by WebRTC to a specified port interval (endpoints included).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12208">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie konfigurieren, geben Sie den Bereich lokaler UDP-Ports an, den WebRTC verwenden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12208">By configuring this policy, you specify the range of local UDP ports that WebRTC can use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12209">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren oder wenn Sie sie auf eine leere Zeichenfolge oder einen ungültigen Port-Bereich festlegen, kann WebRTC jeden verfügbaren lokalen UDP-Port verwenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12209">If you don't configure this policy, or if you set it to an empty string or invalid port range, WebRTC can use any available local UDP port.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12210">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12210">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12211">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12211">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12212">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12212">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12213">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12213">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12214">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12214">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12215">Zeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12215">String</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12216">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12216">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12217">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12217">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12218">GP eindeutiger Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12218">GP unique name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12219">GP-Name: Einschränken des von WebRTC verwendeten lokalen Bereichs an UDP-Ports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12219">GP name: Restrict the range of local UDP ports used by WebRTC</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12220">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12220">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12221">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12221">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12222">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12222">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12223">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12223">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12224">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12224">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12225">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12225">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12226">Wertname: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12226">Value Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12227">Werttyp: REG_SZ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12227">Value Type: REG_SZ</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12228">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12228">Example value:</span></span>

```
"10000-11999"
```

  #### <a name="mac-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12229">Mac – Informationen und Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12229">Mac information and settings</span></span>
  
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12230">Einstellung Schlüsselname: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12230">Preference Key Name: WebRtcUdpPortRange</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12231">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12231">Example value:</span></span>
``` xml
<string>10000-11999</string>
```

  ### <a name="webwidgetallowed"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12233">WebWidgetAllowed</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12233">WebWidgetAllowed</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-the-web-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12234">Webwidget aktivieren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12234">Enable the Web widget</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12235">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12235">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12236">Unter Windows ab Version 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12236">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12237">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12237">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-12238">Aktiviert das Webwidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12238">Enables the Web widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12239">Wenn diese Option aktiviert ist, können Benutzer das Widget verwenden, um im Internet vom Desktop aus oder über eine Anwendung zu suchen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12239">When enabled, users can use the widget to search the web from their desktop or from an application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12240">Das Widget bietet ein Suchfeld, im dem Webvorschläge angezeigt werden, und öffnet alle Websuchen in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12240">The widget provides a search box that shows web suggestions and opens all web searches in Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12241">Im Suchfeld werden Vorschläge für die Suche (auf Bing gestützt) und für URLs angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12241">The search box provides search (powered by Bing) and URL suggestions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12242">Das Widget umfasst außerdem Feed-Kacheln, die angeklickt werden können, um weitere Informationen auf msn.com in einem neuen Tab oder im Fenster des Microsoft Edge-Browsers anzuzeigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12242">The widget also includes feed tiles that users can click to see more information on msn.com in a new Microsoft Edge browser tab or window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12243">Die Feed-Kacheln könnten Werbeanzeigen enthalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12243">The feed tiles may include ads.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12244">Das Widget kann über die Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen oder über das Menü "Weitere Tools" in Microsoft Edge gestartet werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12244">The widget can be launched from the Microsoft Edge settings or from the "More tools" menu in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12245">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, ist das Web-Widget automatisch für alle Profile aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12245">If you enable or don't configure this policy: The Web widget will be automatically enabled for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12246">In den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen wird die Option zum Starten des Widgets angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12246">In the Microsoft Edge settings, users will see option to launch the widget.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12247">In den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen wird das Menüelement zum Ausführen des Widgets beim Windows-Start (automatischer Start) angezeigt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12247">In the Microsoft Edge settings, users will see the menu item to run the widget at Windows startup (auto-start).</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12248">Wenn die Richtlinie [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) aktiviert ist, ist die Option zum Aktivieren des Widgets beim Start auf „Ein“ gesetzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12248">The option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled on if the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) policy is enabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12249">Wenn die Richtlinie [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup-](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) deaktiviert oder nicht konfiguriert ist, ist die Option zum Aktivieren des Widgets beim Start auf „Aus“ gesetzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12249">If the [WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup](#webwidgetisenabledonstartup) is disabled or not configured, the option to enable the widget at startup will be toggled off.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12250">Benutzer sehen das Menüelement, um das Widget über das Microsoft Edge-Menü "Weitere Tools" zu starten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12250">Users will see the menu item to launch the widget from the Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12251">Benutzer können das Widget über das Menü "Weitere Tools" starten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12251">Users can launch the widget from "More tools".</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12252">Das Widget kann durch die Option "Beenden" in der Statusleiste oder durch Schließen des Widgets über die Taskleiste deaktiviert werden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12252">The widget can be turned off by the "Quit" option in the System tray or by closing the widget from the taskbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12253">Wenn die Autostart-Option ausgewählt wurde, wird das Widget beim Neustart des Systems neu gestartet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12253">The widget will be restarted on system reboot if auto-start is enabled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12254">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird das Web-Widget für alle Profile deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12254">If you disable this policy: The Web widget will be disabled for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12255">Die Option zum Starten des Widgets über die Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen wird deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12255">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge Settings will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12256">Die Option zum Starten des Widget beim Windows-Start (automatischer Start) wird deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12256">The option to launch start the widget at Windows startup (auto-start) will be disabled.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12257">Die Option zum Starten des Widgets über das Microsoft Edge-Menü "Weitere Tools" wird deaktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12257">The option to launch the widget from Microsoft Edge "More tools" menu will be disabled.</span></span>

  ### <a name="webwidgetisenabledonstartup"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12278">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12278">WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>

  #### <a name="allow-the-web-widget-at-windows-startup"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12279">Web-Widget beim Windows-Start zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12279">Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12280">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12280">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12281">Unter Windows ab Version 88 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12281">On Windows since 88 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12282">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12282">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-12283">Gestattet dem Web-Widget beim Start von Windows zu starten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12283">Allows the Web widget to start running at Windows startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12284">Ist diese Option aktiviert, wird das Web-Widget standardmäßig beim Windows-Start ausgeführt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12284">If you enable: The Web widget will start running at Windows startup by default.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12285">Wenn das Widget über die Richtlinie [WebWidgetAllowed](#webwidgetallowed) deaktiviert wurde, startet diese Richtlinie das Widget nicht beim Windows-Start.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12285">If the widget is disabled via [WebWidgetAllowed](#webwidgetallowed) policy, this policy will not start the widget on Windows startup.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12286">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren, wird das Web-Widget beim Windows-Start für keines der Profile automatisch gestartet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12286">If you disable this policy: The Web widget will not start at Windows startup for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12287">Die Option zum Starten des Widgets beim Windows-Start wird deaktiviert und in den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen auf „Aus“ gesetzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12287">The option to start the widget at Windows startup will be disabled and toggled off in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12288">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie nicht konfigurieren, wird das Web-Widget beim Windows-Start für keines der Profile automatisch gestartet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12288">If you don't configure the policy: The Web widget will not start at Windows startup for all profiles.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="09666-12289">Die Option zum Starten des Widgets beim Windows-Start wird in den Microsoft Edge-Einstellungen auf „Aus“ gesetzt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12289">The option to start the widget at Windows startup will be toggled off in Microsoft Edge settings.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12290">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12290">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12291">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12291">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12292">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12292">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12293">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12293">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12297">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12297">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12298">Eindeutiger GP-Name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12298">GP unique name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12299">GP-Name: Web-Widget beim Windows-Start zulassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12299">GP name: Allow the Web widget at Windows startup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12300">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12300">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12301">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12301">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12302">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12302">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12303">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12303">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12304">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12304">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12305">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12305">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12306">Wertname: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12306">Value Name: WebWidgetIsEnabledOnStartup</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12307">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12307">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

```

```

  ### <a name="winhttpproxyresolverenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12310">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12310">WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="use-windows-proxy-resolver-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12311">Verwenden von Windows-Proxy Konfliktlöser (verworfen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12311">Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>

  ><span data-ttu-id="09666-12312">VERALTET: Diese Richtlinie ist veraltet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12312">DEPRECATED: This policy is deprecated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12313">Sie wird zurzeit unterstützt, aber in einer zukünftigen Version als veraltet behandelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12313">It is currently supported but will become obsolete in a future release.</span></span>
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12314">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12314">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12315">Unter Windows seit 84 oder später</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12315">On Windows since 84 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12316">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12316">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-12317">Diese Richtlinie wird nicht mehr unterstützt, da sie von einem ähnlichen Feature in einer zukünftigen Version abgelöst wird. Erfahren Sie mehr unter https://crbug.com/1032820.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12317">This policy is deprecated because it will be superseded by a similar feature in a future release, see https://crbug.com/1032820.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12318">Verwenden Sie Windows, um Proxys für alle Browser-Netzwerke zu beheben, anstelle des in Microsoft Edge integrierten Proxy-Konfliktlösers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12318">Use Windows to resolve proxies for all browser networking instead of the proxy resolver built into Microsoft Edge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12319">Der Windows Proxy-Konfliktlöser ermöglicht Windows Proxy-Features wie DirectAccess/NRPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12319">The Windows proxy resolver enables Windows proxy features such as DirectAccess/NRPT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12320">Diese Richtlinie umfasst die von https://crbug.com/644030beschriebenen Probleme.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12320">This policy comes with the problems described by https://crbug.com/644030.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12321">Es bewirkt, dass PAC-Dateien von Windows-Code abgerufen und ausgeführt werden, einschließlich PAC-Dateien, die über die [ProxyPacUrl-](#proxypacurl) Richtlinie festgelegt wurden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12321">It causes PAC files to be fetched and executed by Windows code, including PAC files set via the [ProxyPacUrl](#proxypacurl) policy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="09666-12322">Da Netzwerk-Abrufe für die PAC-Datei über Windows statt mit Microsoft Edge-Code stattfinden, gelten Netzwerkrichtlinien wie [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) nicht für Netzwerk-Abrufe für eine PAC-Datei.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12322">Since Network Fetches for the PAC file happen via Windows instead of Microsoft Edge code, network policies such as [DnsOverHttpsMode](#dnsoverhttpsmode) will not apply to network fetches for a PAC file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12323">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie aktivieren, wird der Windows Proxy-Konfliktlöser verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12323">If you enable this policy, the Windows proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12324">Wenn Sie diese Richtlinie deaktivieren oder nicht konfigurieren, wird der Microsoft Edge Proxy-Konfliktlöser verwendet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12324">If you disable or don't configure this policy, the Microsoft Edge proxy resolver will be used.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12325">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12325">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12326">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12326">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12327">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12327">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12328">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Nein – erfordert Browser-Neustart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12328">Dynamic Policy Refresh: No - Requires browser restart</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12329">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12329">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12330">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12330">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12331">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12331">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12332">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12332">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12333">Eindeutiger Name des GP: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12333">GP unique name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12334">GP-Name: Verwenden von Windows-Proxy Konfliktlöser (verworfen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12334">GP name: Use Windows proxy resolver (deprecated)</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12335">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12335">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12336">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12336">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12337">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12337">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12338">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12338">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12339">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12339">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12340">Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12340">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12341">Wertname: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12341">Value Name: WinHttpProxyResolverEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12342">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12342">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>

  ##### <a name="example-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12343">Beispielwert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12343">Example value:</span></span>

```
0x00000001
```

  ### <a name="windowocclusionenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12345">WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12345">WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>

  #### <a name="enable-window-occlusion"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12346">Aktivieren der Fenster-Okklusion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12346">Enable Window Occlusion</span></span>

  
  
  #### <a name="supported-versions"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12347">Unterstützte Versionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12347">Supported versions:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12348">Unter Windows ab 89 oder höher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12348">On Windows since 89 or later</span></span>

  #### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12349">Beschreibung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12349">Description</span></span>

  <span data-ttu-id="09666-12350">Aktiviert die Fenster-Okklusion in Microsoft Edge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12350">Enables window occlusion in Microsoft Edge.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12351">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren, wird Microsoft Edge zum Verringern der benötigten CPU-Leistung und des Stromverbrauchs erkennen, ob ein Fenster von anderen Fenstern überlagert wird, und das Zeichnen der überdeckten Pixel wird unterbrochen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12351">If you enable this setting, to reduce CPU and power consumption Microsoft Edge will detect when a window is covered by other windows, and will suspend work painting pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12352">Wenn Sie diese Einstellung deaktivieren, wird Microsoft Edge nicht erkennen, wenn ein Fenster von anderen Fenstern überdeckt wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12352">If you disable this setting Microsoft Edge will not detect when a window is covered by other windows.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="09666-12353">Wenn diese Richtlinie nicht festgelegt wurde, wird die Erkennung der Fensterüberlagerung aktiviert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12353">If this policy is left not set, window hiding detection will be enabled.</span></span>

  #### <a name="supported-features"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12354">Unterstützte Funktionen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12354">Supported features:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12355">Kann zwingend erforderlich sein: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12355">Can be mandatory: Yes</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12356">Kann empfohlen werden: Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12356">Can be recommended: No</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12357">Dynamische Richtlinienaktualisierung: Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12357">Dynamic Policy Refresh: Yes</span></span>

  #### <a name="data-type"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12358">Datentyp:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12358">Data Type:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12359">Boolesch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12359">Boolean</span></span>

  #### <a name="windows-information-and-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12360">Windows-Informationen und -Einstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12360">Windows information and settings</span></span>

  ##### <a name="group-policy-admx-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12361">Informationen zur Gruppenrichtlinie (ADMX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12361">Group Policy (ADMX) info</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12362">GP eindeutiger Name: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12362">GP unique name: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12363">GP-Name: Aktiviert die Fenster-Okklusion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12363">GP name: Enable Window Occlusion</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12364">GP-Pfad (verpflichtend): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12364">GP path (Mandatory): Administrative Templates/Microsoft Edge/</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12365">GP Pfad (Empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12365">GP path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12366">GP ADMX Dateiname: MSEdge.admx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12366">GP ADMX file name: MSEdge.admx</span></span>

  ##### <a name="windows-registry-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="09666-12367">Windows-Registrierungseinstellungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12367">Windows Registry Settings</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12368">Pfad (verpflichtend): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12368">Path (Mandatory): SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12369">Pfad (empfohlen): n.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12369">Path (Recommended): N/A</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12370">Wertname: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12370">Value Name: WindowOcclusionEnabled</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="09666-12371">Werttyp: REG_DWORD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="09666-12371">Value Type: REG_DWORD</span></span>
